name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Corinthians 1

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Paul, a called apostle of Christ Jesus through the will of God, and Sosthenes my brother,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: to the church of God that is in Corinth, to the sanctified in Christ Jesus, called saints, with all that call on the name of our Lord Jesus Christ in every place, both theirs and ours:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Grace to you and peace from God our Father and our Lord Jesus Christ.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: I thank my God always on your account for the grace of God that was given to you in Christ Jesus,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: that in everything you were enriched in him, in all utterance and all knowledge,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: inasmuch as the testimony of Christ was confirmed in you,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: so that you come behind in no gift, waiting for the revelation of our Lord Jesus Christ,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: who will also confirm you to the end that you may be blameless in the day of our Lord Jesus Christ.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: God is faithful through whom you were called into the fellowship of his Son, Jesus Christ our Lord.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But I exhort you, brethren, through the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, that you all speak the same thing; and that there be no schisms among you; but that you be perfectly joined together in the same mind and in the same judgment.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For it has been declared to me concerning you, my brethren, by those of Chloe, that there are contentions among you.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And I say this, that each of you says: I am of Paul, and, I of Apollos, and, I of Cephas, and, I of Christ.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Is Christ divided? Was Paul crucified for you, or were you baptized into the name of Paul?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: I thank God that I baptized no one of you except Crispus and Gaius:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: that no one might say that you were baptized into my name.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And I baptized also the household of Stephanas: besides I know not whether I baptized any other.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For Christ did not send me to baptize, but to preach the gospel, not in wisdom of speech, lest the cross of Christ should be made of no effect.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For the preaching of the cross is to those that perish foolishness, but to those that are saved it is the power of God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For it is written: I will destroy the wisdom of the wise, and I will

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Where is the wise man? Where is the scribe? Where is the disputer of this age? Has not God made foolish the wisdom of the world?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For since, in the wisdom of God, the world, through wisdom, knew not God, it pleased God through the foolishness of what is preached, to save those that believe:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: since Jews ask for signs, and Greeks seek for wisdom,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: we, however, preach Christ crucified, to Jews indeed a stumbling- block, and to Gentiles foolishness,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: but to these the called, both Jews and Greeks, Christ God’s power and God’s wisdom;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: because the foolishness of God is wiser than men, and the weakness of God is stronger than men.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For see your calling, brethren, that not many wise men according to the flesh, not many mighty, not many noble;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: but the foolish things of the world has God chosen, that he may shame the wise, and the weak things of the world has God chosen, that he may shame the strong,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: and the ignoble things of the world and things that are despised has God chosen, things that are not, that he may bring to nought things that are,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: to the end that no flesh should glory in the sight of God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But of him are you in Christ Jesus, who has become to us wisdom from God, righteousness also, and sanctification, and redemption,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: that as it is written: He that glories, in the Lord let him glory.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Corinthians 2

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And I, brethren, on coming to you, came not according to excellence of speech or of wisdom, announcing to you the testimony of God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For I determined not to know anything among you except Jesus Christ and him crucified.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And I was with you in weakness, and in fear, and in great trembling;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: and my speech and what I preached was not in persuasive words of wisdom, but in demonstration of the Spirit and of power:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: that your faith might not be in the wisdom of men, but in the power of God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Wisdom, however, we do speak among the perfect, yet wisdom not of this age, nor of the rulers of this; age who are brought to naught;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: but we speak God’s wisdom in a mystery, the hidden which God ordained before the ages for our glory;296

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: which no one of the rulers of this age knew; for had they known it, they would not have crucified the Lord of glory.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But as it is written: Which things eye has not seen, and ear has not heard, and into the heart of man have not entered, as many as God has prepared for those that love him.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For to us has God revealed them through his Spirit. For the Spirit searches all things, even the depths of God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For what one of men knows the thoughts of man but the spirit of man which is in him? So also the thoughts of God has no one known but the Spirit of God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But we have received not the spirit of the world, but the Spirit that is from God, that we may know the things that are freely given to us by God;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: which things we also speak not in words taught by human wisdom, but in words taught by the Spirit explaining spiritual things to spiritual men.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But the psychical* man receives not the things of the Spirit of God; for they are foolishness to him, and he is not able to know them, because they are spiritually discerned. *psychical = we would say the “soulish man.” ed.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But the spiritual man discerns all things; he himself, however, is discerned by no one.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For who has known the mind of the Lord, that he may instruct him? But we have the mind of Christ.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Corinthians 3

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And I, brethren, was not able to speak to you as to spiritual, but as to flesh, as to babes in Christ.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: I fed you with milk, not with meat; for you were not yet able. No, not even yet now are you able;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: for you are yet carnal. For whereas there is among you envy and strife, are you not carnal, and do you not walk according to man?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For when one says: I am of Paul; and another: I of Apollos, are you not men?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Who, then, is Apollos? and who is Paul? Ministers through whom you believed, even as the Lord gave to each one.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: I planted, Apollos watered, but God made to grow:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: so, then, neither is he that plants anything, nor he that waters, but he that makes to grow, who is God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Now, he that plants and he that waters are one, but each shall

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For we are God’s fellow-laborers: God’s field. God’s building are you.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: According to the grace of God that is given to me, as a wise architect I have laid the foundation, and another builds upon it. But let each one take heed how he builds upon it.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For other foundation no one can lay beside that which is laid, which is Christ Jesus.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Now, if any one builds on this foundation gold, silver, precious stones, wood, hay, stubble;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: each man’s work shall become manifest; for the day shall make it known, because it is revealed in fire; and each one’s work, what kind it is, the fire itself shall prove.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: If any one’s work shall abide, which he has built on this, he shall receive a reward:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: if any one’s work shall be burned, he shall suffer loss, but himself shall be saved, so, however, as through fire.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Know you not that you are the temple of God, and the Spirit of God dwells in you?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: If any one destroys the temple of God, him shall God destroy; for the temple of God is holy, and such are you.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Let no one deceive himself: if any one seems to be wise among you in this age, let him become a fool, that he may become wise.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For the wisdom of this world is foolishness with God. For it is written: He takes the wise in their own craftiness.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And again: The Lord knows the thoughts of the wise, that they are vain.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: So, then, let no one glory in men; for all things are yours;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: whether Paul, or Apollos, or Cephas, or the world, or life, or death, or things present, or things to come, all are yours,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: and you are Christ’s, and Christ is God’s.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Corinthians 4

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: So let a man regard us as ministers of Christ, and stewards of the mysteries of God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Here, moreover, it is required in stewards that one be found faithful.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But to me it is the very least thing that I be judged by you or by human judgments; yes, I judge not even myself;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: for I am conscious of no wrong, yet not in this am I justified: but he that judges me is the Lord.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: So, then, judge nothing before the time, till the Lord come, who will also bring to light the secret things of darkness, and will make298 manifest the counsels of the hearts; and then shall each one have his praise from God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And these things, brethren, I have transferred in figure to myself and Apollos for your sakes, that in us you may learn “Think not above what things are written,” that you be not puffed up one for one against another.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For who makes thee to differ? and what hast thou that thou didst not receive? and, if thou really didst receive, why dost thou boast as if not having received?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Already are you full: already are you rich: without us have you reigned as kings; and I would indeed that you did reign, that we also might reign with you.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For, I think, God has set forth us the apostles last, as appointed to death; for we have become a spectacle to the world, both to angels and men.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: We, fools for Christ’s sake, but you, wise in Christ; we, weak, but you, strong; you, honored, but we, dishonored.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Till this present hour we both hunger and thirst, and are poorly clad, and are buffeted, and have no certain dwelling-place,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: and labor, working with our own hands: being reviled, we bless; being persecuted, we endure;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: being defamed, we entreat: as the refuse of the world have we become, of all things the offscouring till this day.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Not to shame you do I write these things, but as my beloved children I admonish you.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For, though you have ten thousand instructors in Christ, yet not many fathers; for in Christ Jesus I begot you through the gospel.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: I beseech you, therefore, become imitators of me.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For this cause have I sent to you Timothy, who is my son, beloved and faithful in the Lord, who will remind you of my ways that are in Christ, as I teach everywhere in every church.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Now some have been puffed up as if I were not coming to you:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: but I will come to you quickly, if the Lord will: and I will know not the speech of those that are puffed up, but the power;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: for the kingdom of God is not in speech, but in power.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: What will you? With a rod shall I come to you, or in love, also in the spirit of meekness?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Corinthians 5

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Lewdness is commonly heard of as being among you, and such lewdness as is not even among the Gentiles, that one has his father’s wife.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And are you puffed up, and did you not rather mourn, that he that

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For I indeed, as absent in body but present in spirit, have already judged, as if I were present, him that has so perpetrated this thing:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: in the name of our Lord Jesus, when you have come together, and my spirit, with the power of our Lord Jesus,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: to deliver such a one to Satan, for the destruction of the flesh, that the spirit may be saved in the day of the Lord.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: The ground of your glorying is not good. Know you not that a little leaven leavens the whole mass?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Cleanse out the old leaven, that you may be a fresh lump, as you are unleavened; for our passover also has been sacrificed for us -Christ.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: So, then, let us keep the feast, not with old leaven, neither with the leaven of malice and wickedness, but with the unleavened bread of sincerity and truth.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: I wrote to you in the letter not to keep company with lewd persons,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: not altogether with the lewd persons of this world, or with the covetous and extortioners, or idolaters, for then you ought to have gone out of the world.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But now I wrote to you not to keep company, if any one called brother be a lewd person, or covetous, or an idolater, or a reviler, or a drunkard, or an extortioner, with such a one not even to eat.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For what have I to do to judge those also without? Do you not judge those within?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But those without God judges. Put away from among yourselves the wicked man.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Corinthians 6

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Dare any one of you, having a matter against another, go to law before the unjust and not before the saints?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Or know you not that the saints shall judge the world? and if among you the world is judged, are you unworthy of the smallest judgments?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Know you not that we shall judge angels? much more then things pertaining to this life.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: If you have, then, judgments pertaining to this life, those who are esteemed as nothing in the church, these do you set up?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For shame to you do I speak. So, is there not among you a wise man, not even one, who shall be able to arbitrate between his brethren?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But brother goes to law with brother, and this, too, before unbelievers?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Now, assuredly there is wholly a loss to you, that you have lawsuits with yourselves. Why do you not rather take injustice? Why do you not rather suffer yourselves to be defrauded?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But you do injustice, and defraud, and this to brethren.300

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Or know you not that the unrighteous shall not inherit God’s kingdom? Be not deceived: neither lewd persons, nor idolaters, nor adulterers, nor catamites, nor sodomites.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: nor thieves, nor covetous, nor drunkards, nor revilers, nor extortioners, shall inherit the kingdom of God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And these things were some of you; but you were washed, but you were sanctified, but you were justified in the name of the Lord Jesus, and in the Spirit of our God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: All things are in my power, but not all things are profitable: all things are in my power, but I will not be brought under the power of any.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Meats for the belly, and the belly for meats; but God will destroy both it and them. But the body is not for lewdness, but for the Lord, and the Lord for the body;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: and God both raised up the Lord, and will raise us up through his power.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Know you not that your bodies are the members of Christ? Shall I, then, take the members of Christ and make them the members of a harlot? Let it not be.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Know you not that he that is joined to a harlot is one body? For the two, says he, shall be one flesh.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But he that is joined to the Lord is one spirit.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Flee from lewdness. Every sin whatever a man might commit is without the body; but he that commits lewdness sins against his own body.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Or know you not that your bodies are the temple of the Holy Spirit which is in you, which you have from God, and you are not your own? for you were bought with a price: now, then, glorify God in your body.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Corinthians 7

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But concerning the things of which you wrote, it is good for a man not to touch a woman;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: yet, on account of lewdness, let each one have his own wife, and let each woman have her own husband.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Let the husband render to the wife the duty, and in like manner also the wife to the husband.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: The wife has not power over her own body, but the husband; and in like manner also the husband has not power over his own body, but the wife.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Debar not one another, unless perhaps by consent for a time, that you may give yourselves to prayer; and be together again, lest Satan tempt you on account of your incontinency.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Yet I would that all men be as I myself also am; but each one has his own gift from God, one thus, another thus.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But I say to the unmarried and to the widows, it is good for them if they remain even as I;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: yet, if they have not self-control, let them marry; for it is better to marry than to burn.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But to the married I give command, not I, but the Lord, that the wife depart not from the husband;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: but if she have actually departed, let her remain unmarried or be reconciled to her husband; and that the husband put not away the wife.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But to the rest speak I, not the Lord; if any brother has an unbelieving wife, and she is well pleased to dwell with him, let him not put her away;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: and if any woman has an unbelieving husband, and he is well pleased to dwell with her, let her not put away her husband.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For the unbelieving husband is sanctified in the wife, and the unbelieving wife is sanctified in the brother: otherwise your children are unclean, but now are they holy.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But if the unbelieving depart, let him depart: the brother or the sister is not bound in such cases. But in peace has God called you.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For what knowest thou, O woman, whether thou shalt save thy husband? or what knowest thou, O man, whether thou shalt save thy wife?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But as the Lord has allotted to each one, as God has called each one, so let him walk. And so I ordain in all the churches.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Was any one called, having been circumcised? let him not become uncircumcised. Has any one been called in uncircumcision? let him not be circumcised.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Circumcision is nothing, and uncircumcision is nothing; but the keeping of the commandments of God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Let each one, in the calling in which he was called, in this abide.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Thou wast called being a servant; let it not be a care to thee; but if thou also canst become free, use it rather.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For he that is in the Lord, having been called as a servant, is the Lord’s freedman: in like manner, the free man that has been called is Christ’s servant.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: You were bought with a price: become not servants of men.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Brethren, let each one, in what condition he was called, in this abide with God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But concerning virgins, a commandment of the Lord I have not: yet advice I give as one that has obtained mercy of the Lord to be faithful.302

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: I suppose therefore this to be good on account of the present distress, that it is good for a man so to be.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Hast thou been bound to a wife? seek not a separation: hast thou been loosed from a wife? seek not a wife.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: If however thou hast also married, thou hast not sinned; and if a virgin marry, she has not sinned; yet affliction in the flesh shall such persons have; but I spare you.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But this I say, brethren, the time is shortened: it remains that those who have wives be as though they had none,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: and those who weep as though they wept not, and those who rejoice as though they rejoiced not, and those who buy as not possessing,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: and those who use the world as not abusing it; for the fashion of this world passes away.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But I wish you to be without care. The unmarried man cares for the things of the Lord, how he shall please the Lord;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: but the married man cares for the things of the world, how he shall please his wife.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Both the wife and the virgin are divided: the unmarried woman cares for the things of the Lord, that she may be holy in both body and spirit; but the married woman cares for the things of the world, how she shall please her husband.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But this I say for your profit, not that I may throw a snare over you, but with a view to propriety and assiduous attention to the Lord without distraction.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But if any one thinks that he acts in an unbecoming manner towards his virgin daughter, if she be past the flower of age, and it must needs so be, let him do what he will; he sins not: let them marry.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But he that has stood steadfast in his heart, having no necessity, but has power over his own will, and has determined this in his own heart, to keep his daughter a virgin, does well.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: So then even he that gives her in marriage does well, and yet he that gives her not in marriage does better.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: A wife is bound as long as her husband lives; but if the husband shall have fallen asleep, she is free to be married to whom she will, only in the Lord.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But she is more blessed if she so abide, according to my judgment. I think too, even I, that I have the Spirit of God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Corinthians 8

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But concerning idol-sacrifices we know that we all have knowledge.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: If any one thinks that he knows anything, not yet has he known anything as he ought to know it;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: but if any one loves God, he is known by him.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Concerning therefore the eating of idol-sacrifices we know that there is no idol in the world, and that there is no God other than the one.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For although indeed there are those called gods, whether in heaven or on earth; as there are gods many and lords many;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: but for us there is one God the Father, from whom are all things and we to him, and one Lord Jesus Christ, through whom are all things and we through him.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: However there is not, in all this, knowledge; but some with conscience till now of the idols eat as a thing offered to an idol, and their conscience being weak is defiled.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But meat will not commend us to God: neither if we eat not, are we the worse, neither if we eat, are we the better.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But take heed lest perhaps this right of yours become a stumbling- block to the weak.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For if any one see thee that hast knowledge reclining at table in an idol’s temple, will not the conscience of him that is weak be edified, so as to eat things sacrificed to idols?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For the weak one perishes in thy knowledge, the brother for whom Christ died.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Now in so sinning against the brethren and wounding their weak conscience, you sin against Christ.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Wherefore if meat cause my brother to fall, I will never eat flesh, lest I cause my brother to fall.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Corinthians 9

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Am I not free? Am I not an apostle? Have I not seen Jesus our Lord? Are you not my work in the Lord?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: If to others I am not an apostle, yet certainly to you I am; for the seal of my apostleship are you in the Lord.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: This is my defense to them that examine me.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Have we not a right to eat and drink?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Have we not a right to lead about a sister wife, as the rest of the apostles also, and the brothers of the Lord, and Cephas?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Or I only and Barnabas, have we no right to forbear working?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Who ever goes to war at his own charges? Who plants a vineyard, and eats not its fruit? Or who feeds a flock, and eats not of the milk of the flock?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Say I these things as a man, or does the law also not speak these?304

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For in the law of Moses it is written: Thou shalt not muzzle the ox that treads out the grain. Is it for oxen that God cares?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Or on our account altogether does he speak? For on our account was it written, that he that thrashes ought to thrash in hope, and he that plows, in hope of partaking.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: If we have sown to you spiritual things, is it a great thing if we reap your carnal things?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: If others partake of this right over you, should not we rather? But we used not this right; but we endure all things, that we may give no hindrance to the gospel of Christ.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Know you not that those who perform sacred rites eat from the temple? Those who attend the altar are partakers with the altar?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: So also has the Lord commanded those that preach the gospel to live of the gospel;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: but I have used none of these things. And I have not written these things that it should be so done in my case; for it were better for me to die, than that any one should make my cause of glorying void.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For if I preach the gospel, I have no cause for glorying; for necessity is laid upon me; for woe is to me if I preach not the gospel.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For if I do this willingly, I have a reward; but if unwillingly, I am intrusted with a stewardship.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: What then is my reward? that in preaching the gospel I make the gospel without charge, that I may not abuse my right in the gospel.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For being free from all I made myself servant to all, that I might gain the greater number;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: and I became to the Jews as a Jew, that I might gain the Jews; to those under law as under law, not being myself under law, that I might gain those under law;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: to those without law as without law, not being without law to God, but under law to Christ, that I might gain those without law;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: to the weak I became weak, that I might gain the weak: to all I became all things, that by all means I might save some.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And all things I do for the sake of the gospel, that a fellow- partaker of it I may become.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Know you not that those who run in the racecourse all run, but one takes the prize? So run that you may obtain it.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And every one that contends for a prize is temperate in all things: they indeed then that they may take a corruptible crown, but we an incorruptible.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: I therefore so run not as uncertainly, so fight I as not beating the air;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: but I bruise my body and bring it into subjection, lest perhaps

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Corinthians 10

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For I would not have you ignorant, brethren, that all our fathers were under the cloud, and all passed through the sea,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: and were all baptized into Moses in the cloud and in the sea,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: and all ate the same spiritual food,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: and all drank the same spiritual drink; for they drank of the spiritual rock that followed, and the rock was Christ.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But in the greater number of them God had no pleasure; for they were overthrown in the wilderness.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Now these things became types of us, that we should not be desirers of evil things as they also desired.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Neither become idolaters, as some of them, as it is written: The people sat down to eat and to drink, and rose up to sport.* *In idolatrous dance

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Neither let us commit lewdness, as some of them committed lewdness, and fell in one day twenty-three thousand.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Neither let us tempt Christ, as some of them tempted, and were destroyed by serpents.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Neither murmur, as some of them murmured, and were destroyed by the destroyer.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Now these things happened to them as examples, but were written for the instruction of us, on whom the ends of the ages have come.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: So then let him that thinks he stands take heed lest he fall.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: A temptation has not taken you except such as is common to man; but God is faithful, who will not suffer you to be tempted above what you are able, but will make with the temptation a way also of escape, that you may be able to endure.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Wherefore, my beloved, flee from idolatry.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: As to wise men I speak: judge you what I say.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: The cup of blessing which we bless, is it not the communion of the blood of Christ? The bread which we break, is it not the communion of the body of Christ?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Because one bread, one body we the many are; for we all partake of the one bread.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: See Israel according to the flesh: are not those that eat the sacrifices partakers of the altar?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: What then do I say? that an idol-sacrifice is any thing, or that an idol is any thing?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But, that the things which they sacrifice, to demons they sacrifice and not to God; and I would not have you become partakers with demons.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: You can not drink the cup of the Lord and the cup of demons: you can not partake of the table of the Lord and the table of demons.306

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Or do we provoke the Lord to jealousy? Are we stronger than he?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: All things are in my power, but not all things are profitable: all things are in my power, but not all things edify.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Let no one seek that which is his own, but that which is the other’s.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Everything that is sold in the meat-market, eat, examining nothing on account of conscience;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: for the earth is the Lord’s, and the fulness of it.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And if any one of the unbelievers invites you, and you be disposed to go, everything that is set before you eat, examining nothing on account of conscience.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But if any one say to you. This is offered in sacrifice; eat not for his sake that showed it, and for conscience’ sake.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Conscience I say, not thy own, but that of the other. For why is my freedom judged by another’s conscience?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: If I partake with gratitude, why am I evil spoken of on account of that for which I give thanks?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Whether therefore you eat, or drink, or do any thing, do all to the glory of God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Give no occasion for stumbling either to Jews or to Greeks or to the church of God,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: as I also please every one in all things, not seeking my own profit, but that of the many, that they may be saved.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Corinthians 11

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Become imitators of me, as I also am of Christ.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But I praise you, brethren, that you remember me in all things, and hold fast the traditions as I delivered them to you.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But I wish you to know that the head of every man is Christ, and the head of every woman is the man, and the head of Christ is God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Every man praying or prophesying having any thing on his head shames his head.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And every woman praying or prophesying with her head uncovered shames her own head; for it is one and the same thing as if she were shaved.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For if a woman is not covered, let her also be shorn; but if it is a shame to a woman to be shorn or shaved, let her be covered.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For a man indeed should not cover his head, as he is the image and glory of God; but the woman is the glory of man.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For man is not from woman, but woman from man;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: for man was not created for the woman, but woman for the man.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For this reason ought the woman to have authority* on her head *A token of subjection.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Nevertheless neither is woman without man, nor man without woman in the Lord;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: for as the woman is from the man, so also is the man through the woman, but all things from God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Judge among yourselves; is it becoming that a woman pray to God uncovered?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Does not even nature itself teach you, that, if a man have long hair, it is a dishonor to him,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: but if a woman have long hair, it is a glory to her? because her hair is given for a covering.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But if any one seems to be contentious, we have no such custom, neither the churches of God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Now this I announce not in praise, that you come together not for the better, but for the worse.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For first indeed when you come together in the church, I hear that schisms are among you, and I in some measure believe it.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For there must be parties also among you that the approved also may become manifest among you.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: When therefore you come together to the same place, it is not to eat the Lord’s supper;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: for in eating, each one takes before another his own supper; and one is hungry, and another is drunken.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Why, have you not houses to eat and drink in? Or the church of God do you despise, and shame those that have nothing? What shall I say to you? Shall I praise you? In this I praise you not.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For I received from the Lord that which I also delivered to you, that the Lord Jesus, on the night in which he was delivered up, took bread,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: and after giving thanks he broke and said: This is my body which is for you; this do in remembrance of me.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: In like manner also the cup, after he had supped, saying: This cup is the new covenant in my blood: this do, as often as you drink it, in remembrance of me.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For as often as you eat this bread and drink this cup, the death of the Lord you announce, till he come.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: So then whoever shall eat the bread or drink the cup of the Lord in an unworthy manner, shall be guilty of the body and of the blood of the Lord.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But let a man examine himself, and so of the bread let him eat, and of the cup let him drink;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: for he that eats and drinks condemnation to himself, eats and drinks not discerning the body.308

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For this reason many among you are weak and sickly, and very many sleep.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But if we would judge ourselves, we should not be judged;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: but being judged by the Lord we are chastened, that we may not be condemned with the world.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: So then, my brethren, in coming together to eat, wait one for another.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: If any one is hungry, let him eat at home, that you come not together to condemnation. But the rest will I set in order when I come.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Corinthians 12

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But concerning spiritual things, brethren, I do not wish you to be ignorant.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: You know that when you were Gentiles you were carried away to the dumb idols as you were led.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Wherefore I make known to you that no one speaking in the Spirit of God says: Accursed is Jesus; and no one can say: Lord Jesus, unless in the Holy Spirit.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Now there are diversities of gifts, but the same Spirit;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: and there are diversities of ministries, and the same Lord;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: and there are diversities of operations, and the same God who works all things in all.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But to each one is given the manifestation of the Spirit with a view to the profit of all.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For to one is given, through the Spirit, the word of wisdom; to another, the word of knowledge, according to the same Spirit;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: to another faith, in the same Spirit; to another gifts of healing, in the same Spirit;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: to another the workings of mighty deeds, to another prophecy, to another discernings of spirits, to another kinds of tongues, to another interpretation of tongues;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: but all these work the one and the same Spirit, distributing to each severally as he wills.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For as the body is one, and yet has many members, but all the members of the body, being many, are one body, so also is Christ;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: for in one Spirit were we all baptized into one body, whether Jews or Greeks, whether bond or free, and were all made to drink one Spirit.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For the body is not one member, but many.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: If the foot should say: Because I am not the hand, I am not of the

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And if the ear should say: Because I am not the eye, I am not of the body, it is not therefore not of the body.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: If the whole body were an eye, where were the hearing? If the whole were hearing, where were the smelling?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But now God set the members, each one of them in the body as it pleased him.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But if they all were one member, where were the body?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But now many members, but one body.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And the eye can not say to the hand; I have no need of thee: or, again, the head to the feet: I have no need of you:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: yes, much more the members of the body that seem to be weaker are necessary;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: and those members of the body, which we think to be more dishonorable, around these we put more abundant honor; and our uncomely members have more abundant comeliness;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: and our comely members have no need. But God has well ordered the body, giving more abundant honor to that which lacked,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: that there should be no schism in the body, but that the members should have the same care one for another.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And whether one member suffers, all the members sympathize; or if one member is honored, all the members rejoice with it.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Now you are the body of Christ and members in particular.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And God has set some in the church, first apostles, secondly prophets, thirdly teachers, after that powers, after that gifts of healing, helps, governments, kinds of tongues.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Are all apostles? Are all prophets? Are all teachers? Are all powers? Have all gifts of healing? Do all speak with tongues? Do all interpret?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But ardently desire the greater gifts; and yet I show you a more excellent way.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Corinthians 13

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Though I speak with the tongues of men and of angels, but have not love, I have become sounding brass or a clanging cymbal.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And though I have prophecy, and know all mysteries and all knowledge, and though I have all faith so as to remove mountains, but have not love, I am nothing.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And though I give all my goods away in food, and though I deliver up my body that I may be burned, but have not love, I am profited nothing.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Love suffers long, is kind; love envies not; love is not boastful, is not puffed up;310

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: does not behave itself improperly, seeks not her own, is not provoked, charges not the evil,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: rejoices not in iniquity, but rejoices in the truth:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: bears all things, believes all things, hopes all things, endures all things.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Love never fails; but whether prophecies, they shall come to naught; or tongues, they shall cease; or knowledge, it shall come to naught.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But we know in part, and we prophesy in part:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: when, however, the perfect has come, that in part shall come to naught.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: When I was a child, I talked as a child, I thought as a child, I reasoned as a child: when I became a man, I put away the things of a child.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For now we see by means of a mirror in an enigma, but then face to face: now I know in part, but then I shall know even as I was known.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And now abides faith, hope, love, these three; but the greatest of these is love.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Corinthians 14

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Pursue love, but ardently desire spiritual gifts, rather, however, that you may prophesy.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For he that speaks in a tongue speaks not to men, but to God; for no one understands, though in spirit he speaks mysteries;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: but he that prophesies speaks to men edification, and exhortation, and comfort.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: He that speaks in a tongue edifies himself; but he that prophesies edifies the church.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Now, I wish you all to speak in tongues, but rather that you prophesy; and greater is he that prophesies than he that speaks in tongues, unless he interpret, that the church may receive edification.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But now, brethren, if I come to you speaking in tongues, what shall I profit you, unless I shall speak to you either in revelation, or in knowledge, or in prophecy, or in teaching?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Even things without life, giving sound, whether pipe or harp, yet, if they give not a distinction in tones, how shall that be known which is piped or harped?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For if the trumpet give an uncertain sound, who shall prepare himself for battle?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: So, unless you also, through the tongue, give a word easy to be understood, how shall that be known which is spoken? for you shall

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: There are, it may be, so many kinds of voices in the world, and no one of them without signification:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: if, then, I know not the power of the voice, I shall be to him that speaks a barbarian, and he that speaks a barbarian, in my judgment.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: So also you, since you are ardently desirous of spirits, seek that you may abound with a view to the edification of the church.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Wherefore, let him that speaks with a tongue pray that he may interpret.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For if I pray with a tongue, my spirit prays, but my mind is unfruitful.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: What, then, is it? I will pray with the spirit, but I will pray with the mind also: I will sing with the spirit, but I will sing with the mind also.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Else, if thou shalt have blessed with the spirit, he that occupies the place of the unlearned, how shall he say the amen at thy giving of thanks? since he knows not what thou sayest;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: for thou indeed givest thanks well, but the other is not edified.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: I thank God, I speak with a tongue more than you all;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: but in the church I prefer to speak five words through my mind, that I may instruct others also, than ten thousand words in a tongue.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Brethren, become not little children in understanding, but in malice be childlike, but in understanding become full-grown men.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: In the law it is written: In words of another tongue and in other lips will I speak to this people, and not even thus will they hearken to me, says the Lord.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: So, then, the tongues are for a sign, not for the believers, but for the unbelievers, but prophecy, not for the unbelievers, but for the believers.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: If, then, the whole church shall have come together into the same place, and all speak with tongues, but there come in unlearned men or unbelievers, will they not say that you are mad?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But if all prophesy, and there come in any unbeliever or unlearned man, he is convinced by all, he is judged by all;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: the secrets of his heart become manifest; and so, falling on his face, he will worship God, reporting that in reality God is in you.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: What, then, is it, brethren? When you come together, each one of you has a psalm, has a teaching, has a revelation, has a tongue, has an interpretation: let all things be done with a view to edification.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: If any one speaks with a tongue, by twos, or, at most, by threes, and in turn, and let one interpret;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: but if there be no interpreter, let him be silent in the church, but let him speak to himself and to God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And let two or three prophets speak, and let the others discern;312

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: but if a revelation be made to another sitting by, let the first be silent.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For you can all prophesy one by one, that all may learn and all be comforted.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And the spirits of prophets are subject to prophets;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: for God is not of disorder, but of peace. As in all the churches of the saints,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: let your women be silent in the churches; for it is not permitted to them to speak, but to be in subjection, as the law also says.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But if they wish to learn any thing, let them ask their own husbands at home; for it is a shame to a woman to speak in a church.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Or came the word of God out from you, or to you only did it come?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: If any one thinks he is a prophet or spiritual, let him acknowledge the things which I write. that they are of the Lord;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: but if one is ignorant, let him be ignorant.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: So then, brethren, ardently desire to prophesy, and forbid not to speak with tongues;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: but let all things be done in a becoming manner and in order.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Corinthians 15

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Moreover, I make known to you, brethren, the gospel which I preached to you, which also you received, in which also you have stood.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: through which also you are saved, if you hold fast with what word I preached to you, unless you believed in vain.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For I delivered to you, among the first things, that which I also received; that Christ died for our sins, according to the Scriptures;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: and that he was buried; and that he rose from the dead on the third day, according to the Scriptures;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: and that he appeared to Cephas, then to the twelve.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: After that he appeared to more than five hundred brethren at once, of whom the greater part remain till now, but some have also fallen asleep.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: After that he appeared to James, after that to all the apostles.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But, last of all, as to the one born out of due time, he appeared to me also.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For I am the least of the apostles, who am not worthy to be called an apostle, because I persecuted the church of God;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: but by the grace of God I am what I am, and his grace which was for me became not vain, but I labored more abundantly than they all: not I, however, but the grace of God which was with me.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But if Christ is preached that he has risen from the dead, how say some among you that there is no resurrection of the dead?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But if there is no resurrection of the dead, neither has Christ been raised;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: and if Christ has not been raised, vain then both what we preached, and vain also your faith:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: further, we are also found false witnesses of God, because we testified against God that he raised up Christ whom lie did not raise, if indeed then the dead are not raised.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For if the dead are not raised, neither has Christ been raised;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: but if Christ has not been raised, fruitless your faith, you are yet in your sins:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: then also those that have fallen asleep in Christ have perished.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: If only in this life we have been hoping in Christ, more miserable than all men are we.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But now has Christ been raised from the dead, the firstfruits of those that have slept.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For since through man death, through man also the resurrection of the dead.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For as in Adam all die, so also in Christ shall all be made alive.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But each one in his own order; the firstfruit Christ, afterward those that are Christ’s at his coming:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: then the end, when he shall have delivered up the kingdom to the God and Father, when he shall have destroyed all principality and all authority and power.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For he must reign till he shall have put all enemies under his feet.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Death, the last enemy, shall be destroyed.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For he has put all things under his feet. But when he shall have said that all things have been subjected, it is evident that he is excepted who subjected all things to him;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: but when all things shall have been subjected to him, then shall the Son also be subjected to him who subjected all things to him, that God may be the all in all.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Otherwise, what shall they do who are baptized for the dead? If the dead are not raised at all, why are they even baptized for them?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Why also are we in danger every hour?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: I protest by the rejoicing over you, brethren, which I have in Christ Jesus our Lord, I die daily.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: If as a man I fought with wild beasts in Ephesus, what advantage is it to me? If the dead are not raised, let us eat and drink, for tomorrow we die.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Be not deceived: Evil communications corrupt good manners.314

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Awake to sobriety, as it is right, and sin not: for ignorance of God some have. For shame to you I speak.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But some one will say: How are the dead raised up? and with what body do they come?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Foolish man, that which thou sowest is not made alive unless it die;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: and that which thou sowest, thou sowest not the body that shall be produced, but naked grain it may be of wheat, or some of the rest;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: but God gives it a body as it pleased him, and to each of the seeds its own body.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: All flesh is not the same flesh, but one indeed of men, but another flesh of beasts, but another flesh of birds, but another of fishes.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And there are bodies celestial, and bodies terrestrial; but the glory of the celestial is one, and the glory of the terrestrial another.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: There is one glory of the sun, and another glory of the moon, and another glory of the stars; for star differs from star in glory.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: So also the resurrection of the dead. It is sown in corruption, it is raised in incorruption.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: It is sown in dishonor, it is raised in glory: it is sown in weakness, it is raised in power:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: it is sown a psychical body*, it is raised a spiritual body. If there is a psychical body, there is also a spiritual body. * soma psuchikon = flesh soulish or soulish flesh. ed.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: So also it is written: The first man Adam was made a living soul, the last Adam a life-giving spirit.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But not first the spiritual, but the psychical: after that the spiritual.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: The first man is from the earth, earthy; the second man, from heaven.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: As the earthy, such also the earthy; and as the heavenly, such also the heavenly;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: and as we have worn the image of the earthy, we shall also wear the image of the heavenly.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But this I say, brethren, that flesh and blood cannot inherit the kingdom of God, neither does corruption inherit incorruption.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Behold, I tell you a mystery; we shall not all sleep, but we shall all be changed,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: in a moment, in the twinkling of an eye, at the last trumpet; for the trumpet shall sound, and the dead shall be raised incorruptible, and we shall be changed.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For this corruptible must put on incorruptibility, and this mortal

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And when this corruptible shall have put on incorruptibility, and this mortal shall have put on immortality, then shall come to pass the saying that is written: Death is swallowed up in victory.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Where thy sting, O death? Where thy victory, O death?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: The sting of death is sin, but the strength of sin is the law.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But thanks to God who gives us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: So then, my beloved brethren, become steadfast, immovable, abounding in the work of the Lord always, knowing that your labor is not in vain in the Lord.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Corinthians 16

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But concerning the collection which is for the saints, as I gave order to the churches of Galatia, so also do you.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: On every first day of the week let each one of you lay by himself, treasuring up whatever he has been prospered, that there be no collections when I come.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: And when I have come, whomever you may approve, these will I send with letters to bear your favor to Jerusalem;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: and if it be worth my going also, they shall go with me.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But I will come to you when I shall have passed through Macedonia;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: for I am going through Macedonia, but with you, it may be, I shall remain or even spend the winter, that you may send me forward wherever I may go.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: For I do not wish to see you now in passing; for I hope to remain some time with you, if the Lord permit.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But I shall abide in Ephesus till Pentecost;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: for there has been opened to me a door great and effectual, and there are many adversaries.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Now if Timothy come, see that he be with you without fear; for he works the work of the Lord as I also do:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: let no one therefore despise him. But send him forward in peace, that he may come to me; for I wait for him with the brethren.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But concerning Apollos the brother, I exhorted him much to come to you with the brethren; and his will was not at all to come now; but he will come when he shall have opportunity.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Watch, stand firm in the faith, act like men, be strong.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Let all your deeds be done in love.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: Now I beseech you, brethren: you know the house of Stephanas, that it is the firstfruit of Achaia, and they have given themselves to the ministry of the saints:316

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: that you also submit yourselves to those that are such, and to every one that works with me and labors.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: But I rejoice at the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus, because they have supplied the want of you;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: for they have refreshed my spirit and yours. Therefore acknowledge those that are such.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: The churches of Asia salute you. Aquila and Prisca, with the church that is in their house, salute you much in the Lord.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: All the brethren salute you. Salute one another with a holy kiss.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: The salutation of Paul with my own hand.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: If any one loves not the Lord, let him be accursed. The Lord comes.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 1
text: The grace of the Lord Jesus be with you.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: That which was from the beginning, which we have heard, which we have seen with our eyes, which we looked upon and our hands handled, of the word of life;

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: and the life was manifested, and we have seen and do testify and declare to you the life eternal, which was with the Father and was manifested to us:

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: that which we have seen and heard, declare we to you, that you also may have fellowship with us. And our fellowship indeed is with the Father and with his Son Jesus Christ.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: And these things write we to you, that your joy may be made full.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: And this is the message that we have heard from him, and declare again to you, that God is light and darkness in him there is none.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: If we say that we have fellowship with him, and walk in darkness, we lie and do not the truth;

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: but if we walk in the light as he himself is in the light, we have fellowship one with another, and the blood of Jesus his Son cleanses us from all sin.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: If we say that we have no sin, we deceive ourselves and the truth is not in us.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: If we confess our sins, faithful is he and righteous to forgive us the sins and cleanse us from all unrighteousness.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: If we say that we have not sinned, we make him a liar, and his word is not in us,

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: My little children, these things write I to you that you sin not. And if any one sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous;

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: and he himself is the expiation for our sins, not for ours only, however, but also for the whole world.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: And in this we know that we have known him, if we keep his commandments.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: He that says: I have known him and keeps not his commandments is a liar, and the truth is not in him;

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: but whoever keeps his word, truly in him has the love of God been perfected. In this we know that we are in him.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: He that says that he abides in him ought himself also so to walk as

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Beloved, no new commandment write I to you, but an old commandment, which you had from the beginning: the old commandment is the word which you heard.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Again a new commandment write I to you, which thing is true in him and in you, because the darkness is passing away and the true light now shines.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: He that says that he is in the light, and hates his brother, is in darkness till now.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: He that loves his brother abides in the light, and there is no stumbling-block in him;

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: but he that hates his brother is in darkness, and walks in darkness, and knows not whither he goes, because darkness has blinded his eyes.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: I write to you, little children, because your sins have been forgiven for his name’s sake.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: I write to you, fathers, because you have known him that is from the beginning. I write to you, young men, because you have overcome the wicked one. I have written to you, little children, because you have known the Father.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: I have written to you, fathers, because you have known him that is from the beginning. I have written to you, young men, because you are strong, and the word of God abides in you, and you have overcome the wicked one,

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Love not the world, neither the things that are in the world. If any one love the world, the love of the Father is not in him;

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: because all that is in the world, the desire of the flesh and the desire of the eyes and the pride of life, is not of the Father, but is of the world

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: And the world is passing away and the desire of it; but he that does the will of God abides for ever.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Little children, it is the last time, and as you heard that antichrist comes, even now many antichrists have risen: whence we know that it is the last time.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: They went out from us, but were not of us; for if they had been of us, they would have remained with us; but that they might be made manifest that they are all not of us.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: And you have an anointing from the holy One, and know all things.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: I have not written to you because you know not the truth, but because you know it, and that no lie is from the truth.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Who is the liar, but he that denies that Jesus is the Christ? This is the antichrist that denies the Father and the Son.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Every one that denies the Son, neither has he the Father: he that confesses the Son has the Father also.426

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Let that which you heard from the beginning abide in you. If that abide in you which you heard from the beginning, you also shall abide in the Son and in the Father.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: And this is the promise that he himself promised us, the life eternal.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: These things I have written to you concerning them that deceive you.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: And you — the anointing which you received from him abides in you, and you have no need that any one teach, but as his anointing teaches you concerning all things, and is true and is no lie, even as it has taught you, abide in it.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: And now, little children, abide in him that when he shall be manifested we may have boldness, and not be ashamed away from him in his coming.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: If you know that he is righteous, you know that every one also that works righteousness has been begotten of him.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Behold what manner of love the Father has bestowed on us that we should be called children of God. Therefore the world knows us not, because it knew him not.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Beloved, now are we children of God, and it has not yet been made manifest what we shall be. We know that when it shall be made manifest we shall be like him, because we, shall see him as he is.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: And every one that has this hope on him purifies himself, as he is pure.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Every one that practices sin practices lawlessness also, and sin is lawlessness.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: And you know that he was manifested that he might take away sins, and sin is not in him.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Every one that abides in him sins not: whoever sins has not seen him, neither known him.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Little children, let no one deceive you. He that practices righteousness is righteous, even as he is righteous:

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: he that practices sin is of the devil, because the devil sins from the beginning. For this purpose was the Son of God manifested, that he might destroy the works of the devil.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Whoever has been begotten of God does not practice sin, because his seed abides in him; and he can not sin, because he has been begotten of God.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: In this the children of God are manifest and the children of the devil: whoever practices not righteousness is not of God, also he that

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: For this is the message that you heard from the beginning, that we should love one another,

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: not as Cain was of the wicked one and slew his brother; and for what cause did he slay him? because his works were evil, but those of his brother righteous.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Wonder not, brethren, if the world hates you.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: We know that we have passed from death into life, because we love the brethren: he that loves not abides in death.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Whoever hates his brother is a murderer, and you know that no murderer has eternal life abiding in him.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: In this we have known the love, because he laid down his life for us; and we ought to lay down our lives for the brethren.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: But whoever has this world’s goods, and sees his brother have need, and shuts up his bowels from him, how abides the love of God in him?

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Little children, let us not love in word, neither in tongue, but in deed and in truth.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: And in this we know that we are of the truth, and shall persuade our hearts before him;

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: because if our hearts condemn us, God is greater than our heart, and knows all things.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Beloved, if our heart condemn us not, we have confidence toward God,

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: and whatever we ask we receive from him, because we keep his commandments and do the things that are pleasing in his sight.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: And this is his commandment, that we should believe on the name of his Son Jesus Christ, and love one another as he gave us commandment.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: And he that keeps his commandments abides in him and he in him; and in this we know that he abides in us, by the Spirit that he has given us.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Beloved, believe not every spirit, but prove the spirits, whether they are from God; because many false prophets have gone forth into the world.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: In this know you the Spirit of God: every spirit that confesses that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is of God,

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: and every spirit that confesses not Jesus is not of God; and this is the spirit of antichrist, of which you have heard that it comes, and now is in the world already.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: You are of God, little children, and have overcome them, because greater is he that is in you than he that is in the world.428

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: They are of the world: therefore they speak of the world, and the world hears them.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: We are of God: he that knows God hears us, he that is not of God hears not us. By this we know the spirit of truth and the spirit of error.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Beloved, let us love one another, because love is of God, and every one that loves has been begotten of God, and knows God.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: He that loves not has not known God, for God is love.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: In this has been manifested the love of God in us, that God has sent his Son the only Begotten into the world that we might live through him.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: In this is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son the expiation for our sins.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Beloved, if God so loved us, we also ought to love one another.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: No one has seen God at any time: if we love one another, God abides in us and his love is perfected in us.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: In this we know that we abide in him and he in us, because he has given us of his Spirit.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: And we have seen and do testify that the Father has sent the Son the Saviour of the world.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Whoever confesses that Jesus is the Son of God, God abides in him and he in God.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: And we have known and have believed the love that God has in us. God is love, and he that abides in love abides in God and God in him.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: In this has been perfected the love with us, that we may have boldness in the day of judgment, because as he is we also are in this world.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Fear is not in love, but perfect love casts out fear, because fear has punishment, but he that fears is not made perfect in love.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: We love, because he first loved us.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: If any one say: I love God, and hate his brother, he is a liar; for he that loves not his brother, whom he has seen, God, whom he has not seen, how can he love?

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: And this commandment have we from him, that he that loves God loves his brother also.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Every one that believes that Jesus is the Christ, has been begotten of God; and every one that loves him that begot, loves him also that has been begotten of him.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: In this we know that we love the children of God, when we love God

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: For this is the love of God, that we keep his commandments; and his commandments are not burdensome,

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: because all that has been begotten of God overcomes the world; and this is the victory that overcomes the world, our faith.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Who is he that overcomes the world but he that believes that Jesus is the Son of God?

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: This is he that came through water and blood, Jesus Christ: not in the water only, but in the water and in the blood; and it is the Spirit that testifies, because the Spirit is the truth.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: For they that testify are three,

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: the Spirit, and the water, and the blood, and the three are one.* * Testify the same thing

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: If we receive the testimony of men, the testimony of God is greater; because this is the testimony of God that he has testified concerning his Son.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: He that believes on the Son of God has the testimony in himself: he that believes not God has made him a liar, because he has not believed on the testimony that God has testified concerning his Son.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: And this is the testimony, that God gave us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: He that has the Son has the life: he that has not the Son of God has not the life.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: These things have I written to you that you may know that you have eternal life, who believe on the name of the Son of God.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: And this is the confidence that we have towards him, that if we ask anything according to his will, he hears us.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: And if we know that he hears us as to whatever we ask, we know that we have the petition that we have asked of him.

name: Epistle of John 1st
