text: If any one see his brother sinning a sin not to death, he shall ask, and shall give him life, to those that sin not to death. There is a sin to death: not concerning this do I say that he should ask.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: All unrighteousness is sin, and there is a sin not to death.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: We know that every one that has been begotten of God sins not; but he that has been begotten of God keeps himself, and the wicked one touches him not.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: We know that we are of God, and the whole world lies in the wicked one.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: We know, however, that the Son of God has come, and has given us understanding, that we know him that is true; and we are in him that is true, in his Son Jesus Christ: This is the true God and life eternal.

name: Epistle of John 1st
text: Little children, keep yourselves from idols.430

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: Peter, an apostle of Jesus Christ, to the elect sojourners of the dispersion of Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, Asia and Bithynia,

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: according to the foreknowledge of God the Father, in sanctification of the Spirit, in order to obedience and the sprinkling of the blood of Jesus Christ. Grace to you and peace be multiplied.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who, according to his great mercy, has begotten us again to a living hope, through the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead,

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: for an inheritance incorruptible and undefiled and unfading, reserved in heaven for you,

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: who in the power of God are kept through faith to the salvation ready to be revealed in the last time.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: In which you rejoice, being now for a little while, if need be, sorrowful in diversified temptations,

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: that the proof of your faith, much more precious than gold that perishes, though tried by fire, may be found for praise and glory and honor in the revelation of Jesus Christ,

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: whom not seeing, you love; on whom not now looking but believing, you rejoice with joy unspeakable and glorious,

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: receiving the end of your faith, the salvation of your souls.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: Concerning which salvation the prophets that prophesied of the grace that was for you, earnestly sought and inquired,

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: inquiring into what and what kind of time the Spirit of Christ that was in them did signify, when it testified beforehand the sufferings that were for Christ, and the glories after these;

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: to whom it was revealed, that not for themselves, but for you, they were ministering these things, which are now announced to you through those that preached the gospel to you by the Holy Spirit sent down from heaven, into which things angels desire earnestly to look.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: Wherefore, gird up the loins of your mind, be sober, and hope perfectly for the grace to be brought to you in the revelation of Jesus Christ.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: As children of obedience, not fashioning yourselves according to the desires which you formerly had in your ignorance,

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: but as he that called you is holy, become yourselves also holy in all behavior,

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: because it is written: Be you holy, for I am holy.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: And if you call on, as a Father, him who judges without respect of persons, according to each one’s work, spend the time of your

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: knowing that not with corruptible things, as silver and gold, you were redeemed from your fruitless mode of life delivered to you by your fathers;

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: but with the precious blood of Christ, as of a lamb blameless and without spot;

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: foreknown indeed before the foundation of the world, but manifested in the last of the times for you,

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: who through him do believe in God who raised him from the dead, and gave him glory, so that your faith and hope are in God.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: Having purified your souls in obedience to the truth, to unfeigned love of the brethren, love one another from the heart earnestly,

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: having been begotten again, not of corruptible seed, but of incorruptible, by means of the word of God that lives and abides.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: Because all flesh is as grass, and all its glory as the flower of grass; the grass withers, and the flower of it falls;

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: but the word of the Lord abides for ever. And this is the word which as gospel has been preached to you.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: Having, then, laid aside all malice, and all guile, and hypocrisies, and envies, and all evil speakings,

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: as babes just born, earnestly desire the spiritual unadulterated milk, that by it you may grow to salvation,

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: if indeed you have tasted that the Lord is good.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: To whom coming, a living stone, by men indeed disapproved, but with God chosen, precious,

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: yourselves also as living stones are builded up, a spiritual house, a holy priesthood, to offer up spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ;

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: because it is contained in Scripture: Behold, I lay in Zion a chief corner-stone, chosen, precious, and he that believes on him shall not be ashamed.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: To you, therefore, that believe is the preciousness; but to those that believe not, a stone which the builders rejected, this became the head of the corner, and a stone of stumbling and a rock of offense,

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: to them that stumble at the word being disobedient, to which also they were appointed.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a purchased people, that you should show forth the virtues of him that has called you out of darkness into his wonderful light:

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: who once were not a people, but now are the people of God, who had not obtained mercy, but now have obtained mercy.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: Beloved, I beseech that you as strangers and sojourners abstain from fleshly desires, which war against the soul,416

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: having your conduct among the Gentiles, that in what they speak against you as evildoers, they may, because of your good works, while beholding them, glorify God in the day of visitation.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: Be subject, therefore, to every human creation for the Lord’s sake; whether to the king as supreme,

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: or to governors as sent by him for the punishment of evil-doers, but the praise of those that do good;

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: for so is the will of God that by doing good you may put to silence the ignorance of foolish men:

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: as free, and not holding freedom as a cloak of malice, but as the servants of God.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: Honor all men, love the brotherhood, fear God, honor the king.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: Household servants, be subject in all fear to your masters, not only to the good and gentle, but also to the perverse.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: For this is praiseworthy, if because of consciousness of God any one endures sorrows, suffering wrongfully.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: For what glory is there, if, being buffeted for your faults, you take it patiently? But if, when you do well and suffer, you take it patiently, this is praiseworthy with God.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: For to this end were you called, because Christ also suffered for you, leaving you an example that you should follow his steps;

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: who did no sin, neither was guile found in his mouth;

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: who when reviled reviled not in turn, when suffering he threatened not, but committed his cause to him that judges righteously,

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: who himself bore our sins in his own body on the tree, that having died to sins we should live to righteousness; by whose stripes you were healed;

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: for you were as sheep going astray, but have now returned to the shepherd and overseer of your souls.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: Likewise, wives, be subject to your own husbands, that even if any obey not the word, they may without the word be gained through the conduct of the wives,

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: having beheld your conduct that is chaste in fear.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: Whose adorning let it not be the outward, of braiding the hair, and of putting around of golden ornaments or of putting en of dresses,

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: but the hidden man of the heart in the incorruptible ornament of the meek and quiet spirit, which is in the sight of God of great price.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: For so in former time also the holy women that hoped in God

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: as Sarah obeyed Abraham, calling him lord; whose children you have become by doing good and not being afraid of any terror.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: Husbands, likewise, dwell according to knowledge with the feminine as the weaker vessel, bestowing honor as on those that are also heirs with you of the grace of life, that your prayers be not hindered.

name: Epistle of Peter 1st
text: Finally, be all of the same mind, sympathetic, loving the brethren, compassionate, humble-minded,

text: Give these things in charge and teach.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: Let no one despise thy youth, but become a pattern for the believers, in word, in behavior, in love, in faith, in purity.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: Till I come give attention to reading, to exhortation, to teaching.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: Neglect not the gift that is in thee, which was given thee through prophecy with the laying on of the hands of the eldership.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: Meditate on these things, be engaged in them, that thy advancement may be manifest to all.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: Give heed to thyself and the teaching, continue in them; for in doing this thou shalt save both thyself and them that hear thee.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: Timothy 5

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: Rebuke not an aged man, but entreat him as a father, younger men as brethren,

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: older women as mothers, younger women and sisters in all purity.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: Honor widows that are widows indeed.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: But if any widow has children or grandchildren, let them learn first to show piety at home, and to requite their parents; for this is acceptable in the sight of God.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: But she that is a widow indeed and left alone trusts in God, and continues in supplications and prayers night and day;

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: but she that lives in pleasure is dead while she lives.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: And these things give in charge, that they may be blameless.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: But if any one provides not for his own, and especially for those of his own house, he has denied the faith, and is worse than an unbeliever.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: Let not a widow be taken into the number under sixty years of age, the wife of one husband,

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: well reported of for good works, if she has brought up children, if she has taken care of strangers, if she has washed the saints’ feet, if she has relieved the afflicted, if she has diligently followed every good work.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: But younger widows reject; for when they shall become wanton against Christ, they will marry,

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: having condemnation, because they have set aside their first faith;376

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: and at the same time also they being idle learn to wander about from house to house, and not only idle, but tattlers also and busybodies, speaking things that they ought not.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: I will therefore that younger widows marry, bear children, manage the house, give no occasion to the adversary to speak reproachfully;

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: for some have already turned aside after Satan.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: If any believing man or woman has widows, let them relieve them, and let not the church be burdened, that it may relieve those that are widows indeed.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: Let the elders that rule well be counted worthy of double honor, especially they that labor in word and teaching.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: For the Scripture says: Thou shalt not muzzle the ox that treads out the grain, and: The laborer is worthy of his hire.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: Against an elder receive not an accusation, unless before two or three witnesses.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: Those that sin rebuke before all, that the rest also may fear.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: I solemnly charge thee in the sight of God, and Christ Jesus, and the elect angels, that thou observe these things without prejudice, doing nothing according to partiality.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: Lay hands hastily on no one, neither be partaker of other men’s sins. Keep thyself pure.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: No longer drink water, but use a little wine for thy stomach’s sake and thy frequent infirmities.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: The sins of some men are manifest beforehand, going before to judgment, but some they also follow after:

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: in like manner also works that are good are manifest beforehand, and those that are otherwise can not be hid.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: Timothy 6

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: Let as many as are under the yoke as servants, count their own masters worthy of all honor, that the name of God and the teaching be not blasphemed.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: And they that have believing masters, let them not despise them, because they are brethren, but rather serve them, because they are faithful and beloved who are partakers of the benefit. These things teach and exhort.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: If any one teach otherwise, and assent not to healthful words, those of our Lord Jesus Christ, and to the teaching which is according to godliness,

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: he is conceited, knowing nothing, but doting about questions and word-fightings, from which come envy, contention, blasphemies, evil surmisings,

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: wranglings of men corrupt in mind, and destitute of the truth, who

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: But godliness with contentment is great gain.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: For we brought nothing into the world: it is evident that we can carry nothing out;

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: and having food and raiment, with these let us be content.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: But they that will be rich fall into temptation and a snare, and many foolish and hurtful desires, which sink men into destruction and perdition.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: For the love of money is the root of all evil, which some in longing after have erred from the faith, and pierced themselves through with many sorrows.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: But thou, O man of God, flee these things; and follow righteousness, godliness, faith, love, patience, meekness.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: Fight the good fight of faith, lay hold on eternal life, for which thou wast called and didst confess the good confession before many witnesses.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: I charge thee before God, who makes all things alive, and Christ Jesus, who before Pontius Pilate witnessed the good confession,

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: that thou keep the commandment without spot, blameless, till the appearing of our Lord Jesus Christ,

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: which in his own times he will show, who is the blessed and only Potentate, the King of kings and Lord of lords;

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: who only has immortality, dwelling in light unapproachable, whom no one of men has seen, nor can see: to whom be honor and strength eternal. Amen.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: Charge them that are rich in the present age that they be not high- minded, nor trust in the uncertainty of riches, but in God who gives us all things richly for enjoyment;

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: that they do good, that they be rich in good works, ready to distribute, liberal,

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: treasuring up for themselves a good foundation, for the time to come, that they may lay hold of the real life.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: O Timothy, keep that which is committed to thy trust, avoiding profane, vain babblings and oppositions of falsely named knowledge,

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: which some professing concerning the faith have erred.

name: Paul to Timothy 1
text: Grace be with thee.378

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Corinthians 1

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus through the will of God, and Timothy the brother, to the church of God which is in Corinth, with all the saints that are in all Achaia.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of mercies and God of all comfort,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: who comforts us in all our affliction, that we may be able to comfort those that are in all affliction through the comfort with which we ourselves are comforted by God;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: for as the sufferings of Christ abound toward us, so through Christ our comfort also abounds.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But whether we are afflicted, it is for your comfort and salvation which is effectual in the enduring of the same sufferings which we also suffer; and our hope of you is firm: or if we are comforted, it is for your comfort and salvation,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: knowing that as you are partakers of the sufferings, so also of the comfort.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For we do not wish you to be ignorant, brethren, concerning our affliction that came upon us in Asia, that we were exceedingly pressed beyond our strength, so that we despaired even of life;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: but we ourselves have had in ourselves the sentence of death, that we should not trust in ourselves, but in God who raises the dead,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: who delivered us from so great a death and does deliver, on whom we hope that he will even yet deliver,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: you also helping together by prayer for us, that for the gift bestowed on us because of the prayers of many persons, thanks may be given through many on our behalf.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For our glorying is this, the testimony of our conscience, that in simplicity and godly sincerity, not in carnal wisdom, but in the grace of God, have we conducted ourselves in the world, but more abundantly with you.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For we write no other things to you than what you read or even acknowledge; and I hope you will acknowledge even to the end,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: even as you also acknowledge us in part, that we are your cause of glorying as you also are ours in the day of the Lord Jesus.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: And in this confidence I intended before to come to you, that you might have a second benefit;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: and through you to pass into Macedonia, and to come again from

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Intending this, then, did I use lightness? Or the things which I intend, do I intend according to the flesh, that there should be with me the yes yes and the no no?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But as God is faithful, our word which is toward you is not yes and no.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For the Son of God, Christ Jesus, who was preached among you through us-through me, and Silvanus, and Timothy: was not yes and no, but in him was yes.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For as many promises of God as there are, in him is the yes, and in him the amen to the glory of God through us.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Now he who establishes us with you in Christ, and has anointed us is God,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: who has also sealed us and given us the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But I call God as a witness against my soul, that, because I would spare you, I came no more to Corinth.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Not that we are lords over your faith, but we are helpers of your joy; for by faith you stand.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Corinthians 2

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But I determined this for myself, that I would not come to you again in sorrow.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For if I give you sorrow, who then is he that gives me joy but he that is made sorrowful by me?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: And I wrote this very thing, that I might not on coming have sorrow from those from whom I ought to have joy, having confidence in you all that my joy is the joy of you all.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For out of much affliction and distress of heart I wrote to you through many tears, not that you might be made sorrowful, but that you might know the love that I have more abundantly toward you.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But if any one has caused sorrow, he has not made me sorrowful, but in part, that I may not overcharge all of you.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Sufficient for such a one is this punishment that was inflicted by the many:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: so that on the other hand you should rather forgive and comfort that one, lest exceeding sorrow should swallow up such a one.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Wherefore I exhort you to confirm to him your love;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: for to this end also did I write, that I might know the proof of you, whether you are obedient in all things.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Now to whom you forgive anything, I also forgive; for what I have forgiven, if I have forgiven anything, for your sakes I forgive it in the person of Christ,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: lest Satan should gain an advantage over us; for of his devices we are not ignorant.320

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But when I came to Troas for the gospel of Christ, and a door was opened to me in the Lord,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: I had no rest in my spirit because I found not Titus my brother; but taking leave of them I went forth into Macedonia.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Now thanks to God, who always causes us to triumph in Christ, and makes manifest the odor of his knowledge through us in every place;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: for we are to God a sweet odor of Christ in the saved and in the lost:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: to the one an odor from death to death, to the other an odor from life to life. And for these things, who is sufficient?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For we are not as the many that corrupt the word of God, but as from sincerity, but as from God, in the sight of God we speak in Christ.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Corinthians 3

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Do we begin again to commend ourselves? Or need we, as some, letters of commendation to you, or of commendation from you?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: You are our epistle, written in our hearts, known and read by all men:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: being made manifest that you are an epistle of Christ, ministered by us, written not with ink, but with the Spirit of the living God. Not in tables of stone, but in fleshy tables of the heart.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But such trust have we through Christ toward God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Not that we are sufficient to think anything from ourselves as of ourselves, but our sufficiency is of God,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: who also made us sufficient as ministers of the new covenant, not of letter, but of spirit; for the letter kills, but the spirit makes alive.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But if the ministration of death in letters, which was engraved on stones, was made in glory, so that the sons of Israel were not able to look steadfastly upon the face of Moses because of the glory of his face, which glory was to be done away,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: how shall not the ministration of the spirit be in glory?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For if the ministration of condemnation is glory, much more does the ministration of the spirit abound in glory.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For that which has been made glorious has not been made glorious in this respect because of the excelling glory.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For if that which is done away was through glory, much more that which remains is in glory.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Having therefore this hope, we use great boldness of speech,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: and not as Moses put a veil over his face, that the sons of Israel might not look steadfastly to the end of that which was to be done

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But their understandings were hardened. For till this day the same veil in the reading of the old covenant remains, not taken away because in Christ it is done away;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: but till this day when Moses is read a veil lies over their heart;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: but when it has turned to the Lord, the veil is taken away.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Now the Lord is the Spirit; and where the Spirit of the Lord is, is freedom.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But we all, with unveiled face, beholding as in a mirror the glory of the Lord, are changed into the same image from glory to glory, even as by the Lord the Spirit.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Corinthians 4

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Wherefore, having this ministry, as we have received mercy, we faint not,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: but have renounced the secret things of shame, not walking in craftiness, nor falsifying the word of God, but by manifestation of the truth commending ourselves to every man’s conscience in the sight of God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But if our gospel is also veiled, among those that perish it is veiled,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: among whom the god of this age has darkened the understandings of the unbelieving, that the light of the gospel of the glory of Christ, who is the image of God, might not shine forth.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For not ourselves do we preach, but Christ Jesus the Lord, but ourselves your servants for Jesus’ sake.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For the God who said that out of darkness light should shine, he has shined in our hearts for the shining of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Christ.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But we have this treasure in earthen vessels, that the exceeding greatness of the power may be God’s, and not of us:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: we are pressed in every way, but not straitened; perplexed, but not in despair;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: persecuted, but not forsaken; cast down, but not destroyed;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: always bearing about in the body the dying of Jesus, that the life also of Jesus may be made manifest in our body.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For we that live are always delivered up to death for Jesus’ sake, that the life also of Jesus may be made manifest in our mortal flesh.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: So that death works in us, but life in you.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But having the same spirit of faith, according to that which is written: I believed, therefore I spoke; we also believe, and therefore also speak:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: knowing that 1 he who raised up the Lord Jesus, will also raise us up with Jesus, and present us with you.322

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For all things are for your sakes, that the grace that abounds through: the greater number may multiply thanksgiving to the glory of God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Wherefore, we faint not; but though our outward man perish, yet the inward is renewed day by day.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For the momentary lightness of our affliction works for us exceeding abundantly an eternal weight of glory,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: while we look not at the things seen, but at the things not seen; for the things seen are temporal, but those not seen are eternal.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Corinthians 5

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For we know that if our earthly house of this tabernacle were dissolved, a building from God have we, a house not made with hands, eternal in the heavens.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For in this we groan, earnestly desiring to put on over it our house that is from heaven,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: since, indeed, having been clothed, we shall not be found naked.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For we that are in the tabernacle do groan, being burdened, because we do not wish to be unclothed, but clothed upon, that what is mortal may be swallowed up by life.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Now he that has wrought us up to this very thing is God, who has also given us the earnest of the Spirit.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Being confident therefore always, and knowing that being at home in the body we are away from home from the Lord;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: for by means of faith we walk, not by means of sight:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: we are confident, I say, and well pleased to be away from home out of the body, and to be at home with the Lord.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Wherefore also we make our aim, whether at home or away from home, to be well-pleasing to him.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For we must all be made manifest before the judgment-seat of Christ, that each one may receive the things done in the body according to what he has done, whether good or evil.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Knowing therefore the fear of the Lord, we persuade men; but we have been made manifest to God; and I hope also that we have been made manifest in your consciences.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For we do not again commend ourselves to you, but are giving you an occasion for glorying on our behalf, that you may have an answer to those who glory in appearance, and not in heart.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For if we have been beside ourselves, it is for God: if we are sober, it is for you.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For the love of Christ constrains us,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: because we thus judged, that if one died for all, then all died; and he died for all that they that live should live no longer for themselves,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: So that henceforth we know no one according to the flesh; and even if we have known Christ according to the flesh, yet now no longer do we know him.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: So that if any one is in Christ, he is a new creature: the old things have passed away, behold, all things have become new.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: And all things are from God, who has reconciled us to himself through Christ, and has given to us the ministry of reconciliation,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: seeing that God was reconciling to himself a world in Christ, not charging to them their offenses, and deposited in us the word of reconciliation.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For Christ, then, we act as ambassadors, as if God is beseeching through us: we pray in behalf of Christ, be reconciled to God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Him that knew no sin made he sin for us, that we might become the righteousness of God in him.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Corinthians 6

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Now working together with him, we also beseech that you receive not the grace of God in vain

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: (for he says: In an acceptable season I heard thee, and in a day of salvation I helped thee: behold, now is a well-accepted season; behold, now is a day of salvation).

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Giving no occasion for stumbling in any thing that the ministry be not blamed,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: but as ministers of God commending ourselves in everything; in much patience, in afflictions, in necessities, in straits,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: in stripes, in imprisonment’s, in tumults, in labors, in watchings, in fastings,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: in purity, in knowledge, in longsuffering, in kindness, in the Holy Spirit, in love unfeigned,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: in the word of truth, in the power of God; through the armor of righteousness on the right hand and on the left,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: through glory and dishonor, through evil and good report: as deceivers and true;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: as unknown and well known; as dying; and behold, we live; as chastened and not killed;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: as sorrowing, but always rejoicing; as poor, but making many rich; as having nothing, and possessing all things.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Our mouth has been opened to you. Corinthians, our heart has been enlarged;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: you are not straitened in us, but you are straitened in your own bowels:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: now that you may repay me in like manner, I speak as to children, be you also enlarged.324

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Be not yoked with others, unbelievers: for what participation have righteousness and lawlessness? or what communion has light with darkness?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: and what concord has Christ with Belial? Or what part has a believer with an unbeliever?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: And what agreement has the temple of God with idols? For you are the temple of the living God, as God has said: I will dwell in them and walk among them, and I will be their God and they shall be to me a people.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Wherefore come out from the midst of them, and be separated, says the Lord, and touch not an unclean thing; and I will receive you,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: and I will be to you a Father, and you shall be to me sons and daughters, says the Lord Almighty.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Corinthians 7

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Having therefore these promises, beloved, let us cleanse ourselves from all filthiness of flesh and spirit, perfecting holiness in the fear of God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Receive us: we wronged no man, we corrupted no man, we defrauded no man.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Not with a view to condemnation do I speak; for I have said before that you are in our hearts to die and live with.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Great is my boldness toward you, great is my glorying concerning you: I have been filled with comfort, I exceedingly abound in joy in all our affliction.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For when we came into Macedonia our flesh had no rest, but in every way were we pressed: fightings without, fears within.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But God who comforts those that are cast down comforted us in the coming of Titus;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: and not only in his coming, but also with the comfort with which he was comforted among you, when he told us of your strong desire, your mourning, your zeal for me, so that I rejoiced the more.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For though I made you sorry by means of the letter, I do not regret it: though I did regret it (for I see that that letter made you sorry, though for an hour),

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: now I rejoice, not that you were made sorry, but that you sorrowed to repentance; for you sorrowed according to God, that you might receive injury from us in nothing.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For sorrow according to God works repentance to salvation not to be regretted; but the sorrow of the world works out death.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For behold, this very thing that you sorrowed according to God, what diligence it wrought out in you, yes rather, defense, yes rather, zeal, yes rather, infliction of punishment. In every respect you have shown yourselves to be pure in this matter.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Therefore, although I wrote to you, I wrote not for his sake who had done the wrong, nor for his sake who had suffered the wrong, but that your zeal for us might be made manifest to you in the sight of God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Therefore we have been comforted. But in addition to our comfort we rejoiced exceedingly more at the joy of Titus, because his spirit has been refreshed by you all;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: for if in anything I boasted of you to him, I was not made ashamed; but as we spoke all things to you in truth, so also our boasting which was before Titus was found to be truth.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: And his inward affection is more abundant toward you, while he remembers the obedience of you all. How with fear and trembling you received him.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: I rejoice that I have confidence in you in everything.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Corinthians 8

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But we make known to you, brethren, the grace of God which has been bestowed among the churches of Macedonia,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: that in a great trial of affliction the excess of their joy and their deep poverty abounded to the riches of their liberality;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: for according to their power, I testify, and beyond their power, being willing of themselves,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: with much entreaty beseeching of us the favor and the participation in the ministration which is for the saints,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: and not as we had hoped, but themselves they gave first to the Lord and to us through the will of God,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: so that we have besought Titus, that as he had before begun, so also he would complete among you this grace.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But as you abound in everything, in faith, and speech, and knowledge, and all diligence, and your love to us, see that you abound also in this grace.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Not as a commandment do I speak it, but by means of the forwardness of others, and to prove the sincerity of your love;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: for you know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, that though he was rich, yet for your sakes he became poor, that you through his poverty might become rich.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: And I give an opinion in this matter; for this is profitable for you, who began before them not only to do, but also to be willing since last year;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: but now complete also the doing, that as there was the readiness of willing, so also there may be the completion out of what you have.326

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For if the readiness of mind is present, it is accepted according to what it may have, not according to what it has not.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For it is not that there should be ease to others, but burden to you, but by equality: at the present time your abundance may be for their want,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: that their abundance may be for your want, that there may be equality,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: as it is written: He that gathered much had nothing over, and he that gathered little had no lack.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But thanks to God who is putting the same zeal for you into the heart of Titus;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: for he accepted indeed the exhortation; but being more zealous, he went to you of his own accord.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: And we sent with him the brother, whose praise in the gospel is through all the churches,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: and not that only, but who also was chosen by the churches as our fellow-traveler with this grace which is ministered by us with a view to the glory of the Lord himself, and the manifestation of our readiness of mind,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: avoiding this: that no one should reproach us in this abundance that is ministered by us;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: for we provide for things honorable, not only in the sight of the Lord, but also in the sight of men.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: And we have sent with them our brother, whom we have in many things and at many times proved to be diligent, but now much more diligent because of the great confidence he has in you.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Whether any one inquire of Titus, he is my companion and fellow- workman for you: or if our brethren be inquired of, they are the apostles of churches, the glory of Christ.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Therefore, the proof of your love and of our glorying concerning you, to them you will show in the presence of the churches,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Corinthians 9

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For indeed concerning the relief which is for the saints, it is superfluous for me to write to you;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: for I know your forwardness, of which I boast concerning you to the Macedonians, that Achaia has been ready since last year, and your zeal has roused the greater number.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But have sent the brethren, that our boasting concerning you may not be in vain in this respect; that, as I said, you may be ready:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: lest perhaps if Macedonians come with me, and find you unprepared, we, that we say not you, should be ashamed in this

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: I thought it necessary therefore to exhort the brethren, that they would go before to you, and make up beforehand your blessing that was promised before, that this may be ready as a blessing, and not as covetousness.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But as to this, he that sows sparingly shall also reap sparingly, and he that sows with blessings shall also reap with blessings.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Let each one give as he purposes in his heart, not from sorrow or from necessity; for God loves a cheerful giver.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: And God is able to make every grace abound to you, that you having always all sufficiency in everything, may abound for every good work;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: as it is written: He scattered abroad, he gave to the poor, his righteousness remains for ever.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But he that supplies seed for the sower, and bread for eating, will supply and multiply your seed sown, and increase the fruits of your righteousness:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: being enriched in everything for all liberality, which works out through us thanksgiving to God.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Because the administration of this service not only supplies the wants of the saints, but also abounds through many thanksgivings to God:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: as, through the proof which this ministration gives, they glorify God for the subjection that is caused by your confession in respect to the gospel of Christ, and for the liberality of the contribution for them and for all,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: and by their prayer for you, since they long for you on account of the exceeding grace of God that is in you.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Thanks to God for his unspeakable gift.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Corinthians 10

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Now I Paul myself beseech you by the meekness and gentleness of Christ, who in presence indeed am lowly among you, but being absent am bold towards you;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: but I entreat that I may not when present be bold with that confidence, with which I think to be bold against some who think of us as if we walk according to the flesh.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For though walking in the flesh, we do not war according to the flesh

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: (for the weapons of our warfare are not carnal, but mighty through God for the pulling down of strongholds),

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: casting down reasonings and every high thing that exalts itself against the knowledge of God, and leading captive every thought to the obedience of Christ,328

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: and having in readiness to inflict punishment on every failure in obedience, when your obedience is fulfilled.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Do you look on things according to outward appearance? If anyone confides in himself that he is Christ’s, let him conclude this again of himself, that as he is Christ’s, so also are we Christ’s.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For even if I should boast somewhat more abundantly of our authority, which the Lord gave us for edification, and not for your destruction, I shall not be made ashamed.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: That I may not seem as if I would terrify you by letters.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For his letters, say they, are weighty and powerful, but his bodily presence weak, and his speech contemptible.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Let such a one think this, that such as we are in word by letters, when absent, such are we also in deed, when present.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For we dare not number ourselves among or compare ourselves with some that commend themselves; but they, measuring themselves among themselves, and comparing themselves with themselves, are not wise.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But we will not boast without measure, but according to the measure of the rule, which God has apportioned to us, a measure to reach even to you.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For we do not stretch ourselves too far, as if we do not come to you; for even as far as to you did we come first in the gospel of Christ,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: not boasting without measure in the labors of others; but having hope, when your faith is increased, to be enlarged among you according to our rule, abundantly,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: to preach the gospel in regions beyond you, not to boast ourselves in things made ready in another man’s line.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But he that boasts, in the Lord let him boast;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: for not he that commends himself is approved, but he whom the Lord commends.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Corinthians 11

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Would that you could bear with some little of my folly; but indeed you do bear with me.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For I am jealous over you with a godly jealousy: for I have espoused you to one husband that I may present a chaste virgin to Christ:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: I fear, however, lest perhaps, as the serpent completely deceived Eve in his craftiness, so your minds should be corrupted from the simplicity that is in Christ.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For if indeed he that comes preaches another Jesus whom we did not preach, or you receive another spirit which you did not receive, or another gospel which you did not accept, you might well bear with him;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: If, however, I am rude in speech, yet not in knowledge, but in everything we have made it manifest toward you among all.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Or did I commit a sin in abasing myself that you might be exalted, because I preached to you the gospel of God without charge?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: I robbed other churches, taking wages to do you service; and when present with you, though in want, I was a burden to no one;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: for my want the brethren who came from Macedonia supplied; and in everything I have kept myself from being burdensome to you, and will keep myself.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: The truth of Christ is in me, that this boasting shall not be stopped in my case in the regions of Achaia.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Why? Because I love you not? God knows.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But what I do, I will also do, that I may cut off occasion from them that desire the occasion, that in what they boast they may be found even as we.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For such as they are false apostles, deceitful workers, transforming themselves into apostles of Christ.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: And no wonder; for Satan himself transforms himself into an angel of light.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: No great thing, then, if his ministers also transform themselves as ministers of righteousness: whose end shall be according to their works.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: I say again, let no one think that I am foolish; but if otherwise at least as foolish receive me, that I also may boast myself some little.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: What I say, I say not according to the Lord, but as in folly, in this confidence of boasting.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Since many boast according to the flesh I also will boast.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For you bear with the foolish with pleasure, since you are wise;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: for you bear with it if any one brings you into bond age, if any one devours you, if an one seizes upon you, if any on exalts himself, if any one smite you on the face.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: To my reproach I say it, that we were weak but in whatever any one is bold, in folly I say it. I also am bold.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Are they Hebrews? I also. Are they Israelites? I also. Are they the posterity of Abraham? I also.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Are they ministers of Christ? Speak as if beside myself, I more in labors more abundant, in stripe above measure, in prisons more frequently, in deaths often;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: of the Jews five times received forty stripes save one,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: three times was I beaten with rods, once was I stoned, three times have I beer shipwrecked, a night and a day; spent I in the deep:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: in journeying; often, in dangers of rivers, in dangers of robbers, in dangers from my countrymen, in dangers from Gentiles, in dangers330 in the city, in dangers in the desert, in danger; in the sea, in dangers among false brethren,

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: in labor and toil, in watchings often, in hunger and thirst, in fastings often, in cold and nakedness.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Apart from things besides these, that which presses upon me daily, the care of all the churches.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Who is weak, and I am not weak? Who is ensnared, and I burn not?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: If I must boast, of the things that concern my infirmities will I boast.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: The God and Father of our Lord Jesus, who is blessed throughout the ages, knows that I lie not.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: In Damascus, the governor under Aretas the king guarded the city of the Damascenes, that he might apprehend me;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: and through a window, I was let down in a basket, through the wall, and escaped his hands.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Corinthians 12

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: To boast surely profits me not; for I will come to visions and revelations of the Lord.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: I know a man in Christ, fourteen; years ago, whether in the body I know not, or out of the body I know not, God knows, such a one was caught away even to the third heaven.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: And I know such a man, whether in the body or apart from the body I know not, God knows;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: that he was caught away into paradise, and heard unspeakable words, which it is not lawful for man to utter.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Concerning such a one I will boast, but concerning myself I will not boast, except in my infirmities.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For though I should desire to boast, I shall not be foolish, for I will speak the truth; but I forbear, lest any one should think with regard to me above what he sees me, or hears anything from me.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: And, lest I might be exalted above measure through the exceeding greatness of the revelations, there was given me a thorn in the flesh, a message of Satan that he might buffet me, that I might not be exalted above measure.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Concerning this, three times did I beseech the Lord that it might depart from me.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: And he said to me: My grace is sufficient for thee; for my power is perfected in weakness. Most gladly; then will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may abide upon me.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Wherefore I am well pleased in infirmities, in outrages, in necessities, in persecutions. in straits, for Christ’s sake; for when I

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: I have become foolish: you have compelled me. For I ought to be commended by you; for in nothing was I inferior to these very great apostles, though I am nothing.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: The signs indeed of the apostle were wrought out among you in all patience, in signs and wonders and mighty deeds.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For what is that in which you were inferior to the other churches, except that I did not become a burden to you? Forgive me this wrong.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Behold, I am ready, to come to you the third time, and I will not be a burden to you; for I seek not yours, but you. For the children ought not to lay up treasure for the parents, but the parents for the children.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: And I will most gladly spend and be spent for your souls, though the more abundantly I love you, the less I am loved.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But be it so, I did not become a burden to you; but, being crafty, I caught you with guile.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Did I make gain of you by any one of those that I sent to you?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: I besought Titus, and with him sent the brother. Did Titus make gain of you? Walked we not in the same spirit? not in the same steps?

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For a long time you are thinking that to you we are making a defense. In the presence of God in Christ do we speak; but all things, beloved, for your edification.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For I fear lest perhaps on coming I shall find you not such as I wish, and I shall be found to you as you do not wish; lest perhaps there be contentions, envyings, wraths, factions, evil-speakings, whisperings, high-mindedness, tumults:

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: lest when I come again my God will humble me with respect to you, and I shall bewail many of them that have sinned before, and have not repented because of the uncleanness, and lewdness, and wantonness which they have committed.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Corinthians 13

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: This third time am I am coming to you: in the mouth of two or three witnesses shall every word be established.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: I have said before, and I foretell, as when present the second time, also now in my absence, to those who have sinned before and to all the rest, that if I come again. I will not spare.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Since you seek a proof of Christ speaking in me, who toward you is not weak, but is mighty in you;

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: for though he was crucified through weakness, yet he lives by the power of God; for we are weak in him, but we shall live with him through the power of God toward you.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Try yourselves, whether you are in the faith, prove yourselves: or do you not know yourselves, that Christ Jesus is in you? unless you are disapproved.332

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But I hope that you shall know that we are not disapproved.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: But we pray to God that you may do no evil, not that we may appear approved, but that you may do what is excellent, though we be as disapproved.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For we can do nothing against the truth, but for the truth.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For we rejoice when we are weak, and you are strong: this also we pray for, your perfect union.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: For this reason I write these things while absent, that I may not, when present, use severity, according to the authority which the Lord gave me for edification, and not for destruction.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Finally, brethren, rejoice; be perfectly united, be comforted, be of the same mind, live in peace, and the God of love and of peace shall be with you.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: Salute one another with a holy kiss.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: All the saints salute you.

name: Paul to the Corinthians 2
text: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ, and the love of God, and the

name: Epistle of John 2
text: The elder to the elect lady and her children, whom I love in truth, and not I only, but also all that have known the truth,

name: Epistle of John 2
text: because of this truth that abides in us, and shall be with us for ever.

name: Epistle of John 2
text: There shall be with you grace, mercy, peace, from God the Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.

name: Epistle of John 2
text: I rejoiced greatly that I have found of thy children walking in the truth as we received commandment from the Father.

name: Epistle of John 2
text: And now I beseech thee, lady, not as writing to thee a new commandment, but that which we had from the beginning, that we love one another.

name: Epistle of John 2
text: And this is love, that we walk according to his commandments: the commandment is this: as you heard from the beginning, that you walk in it.

name: Epistle of John 2
text: For many deceivers have gone out into the world, who confess not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh: this is the deceiver and the antichrist.

name: Epistle of John 2
text: Take heed to yourselves, that you lose not the things that you have wrought, but that you receive a full reward.

name: Epistle of John 2
text: Whoever advances and abides not in the teaching of Christ has not God: he that abides in the teaching, he has both the Son and Father.

name: Epistle of John 2
text: If any one comes to you, and brings not this teaching, receive him not into the house, and wish him not well;

name: Epistle of John 2
text: for he that wishes well is partaker in his evil deeds.

name: Epistle of John 2
text: Having many things to write to you, I would not by means of paper and ink; but I hope to be with you, and speak mouth to mouth, that our joy may be full. Epistle of John 3rd

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: Simon Peter, a servant and apostle of Jesus Christ, to those that have obtained equally precious faith with us in the righteousness of our God and Saviour Jesus Christ.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: Grace to you and peace be multiplied in the acknowledgment of God and Jesus our Lord.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: As his divine power has given us all things that pertain to life and godliness, through the acknowledgment of him who has called us by his own glory and virtue,

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: through which very great and precious promises have been given to us, that through these you might become partakers of the divine nature, having escaped the corruption that is in the world in desire;

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: and for this very reason bringing forward all diligence, supply in your faith, virtue, and in virtue, knowledge,

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: and in knowledge, self-control, and in self-control, patience, and in patience, godliness,

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: and in godliness, friendship for brethren, and in friendship for brethren, love.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: For these things being in you and abounding render you neither idle, nor unfruitful for the acknowledgment of our Lord Jesus Christ;

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: but he in whom these are not present, is blind, not seeing afar off, having taken up a forgetfulness of the purification of his old sins.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: Wherefore the rather, brethren, be diligent to make your calling and election sure; for in doing these things you shall never stumble.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: For so shall there be richly supplied to you the entrance into the eternal kingdom of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: Wherefore I shall always remind you of these things, though you know them and are established in the present truth.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: Yes, I think it right, as long as I am in this tabernacle, to stir you up by putting you in remembrance,

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: knowing that shortly I must put off this my tabernacle, even as our Lord Jesus Christ has shown me.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: But I will endeavor that you may always be able, after my departure, to have these things in remembrance.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: For we did not follow cunningly devised fables when we made known to you the power and coming of our Lord Jesus Christ, but had been made eye-witnesses of his majesty.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: For he received from God the Father honor and glory, a voice having been borne to him by the most excellent glory, such as this: This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: And this voice brought from heaven we heard, being with him in

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: and we have the prophetic word more sure, to which you do well to give heed, as to a lamp shining in a dark place, till the day dawn and the day-star arise in your hearts;

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: knowing this first, that no prophecy of Scripture comes from one’s own interpretation.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: For not by the will of man was prophecy ever brought, but men from God spoke, being moved by the Holy Spirit.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: But there arose false prophets among the people, as there shall be false teachers also among you, such as shall privily introduce heresies of destruction, even denying the Lord that bought them, who bring on themselves swift destruction;

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: and many will follow their licentiousness, because of whom the way of truth shall be blasphemed;

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: and in covetousness with deceitful words they will make merchandise of you; for whom the condemnation of old lingers not, and their destruction slumbers not.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: For if God spared not the angels that sinned, but casting them down to Tartarus in chains of darkness delivered them up to be kept for judgment,

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: and spared not the old world, but preserved Noah, the eighth person, a preacher of righteousness, having brought a flood on the world of the ungodly,

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: and turning the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah into ashes, condemned them with an overthrow, making them an example of those that shall live ungodly,

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: and delivered righteous Lot, wearied out with the licentious conduct of the ungodly;

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: for the righteous man dwelling among them, by seeing and hearing, vexed his righteous soul from day to day with their lawless deeds:

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: the Lord knows how to deliver the godly out of temptation, and to keep the unrighteous to the day of judgment to be punished,

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: but especially those that walk after the flesh in unclean desire, and despise governments. Presumptuous, self-willed men, they tremble not while blaspheming dignities;

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: whereas angels, who are greater in strength and power, bring no railing accusation against them before the Lord;

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: but these, as irrational animals made by nature for capture and destruction, speaking evil of things in which they are ignorant, shall also perish in their corruption,

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: thus receiving the reward of unrighteousness, who count reveling in the daytime a delight; spots and blemishes they are reveling in their deceits while feasting with you,422

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: having eyes full of an adulteress, and that can not cease from sin, seducing unsteady souls, having a heart exercised in covetousness, children of the curse:

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: having left the straight way, they have turned aside, following the way of Balaam the son of Beor, who loved the wages of unrighteousness,

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: but was reproved for his iniquity: the dumb beast of burden speaking with man’s voice forbade the madness of the prophet.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: These are wells without water, and mists driven by a tempest, for whom the blackness of darkness is reserved.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: For speaking great swelling words of vanity, they seduce in the desires of the flesh by lasciviousness those that are just escaping from them that live in error,

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: promising them freedom, while they themselves are servants of corruption; for by whom any one has been overcome, by him has he also been made a servant.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: For if, after escaping from the pollutions of the world through the knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ, they are again entangled in these and overcome, their last state becomes worse than the first.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: For it had been better for them not to have known the way of righteousness, than having known it to turn from the holy commandment that had been delivered to them.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: That of the true proverb has happened to them: A dog turned back to his own vomit; and: A sow washed to wallowing in the mire.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: This now, beloved, is the second epistle that I write to you, in both of which I stir up your pure mind by way of remembrance,

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: that you be mindful of the words spoken before by the holy prophets, and of the commandment of the Lord and Saviour, that was given by your apostles,

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: knowing this first, that there shall come in the last days shameless scoffers walking according to their own desires,

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: and saying: Where is the promise of his coming? For since the fathers fell asleep, all things thus continue from the beginning of the creation.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: For this they willingly know not, that the heavens were of old and the earth from water and by means of water consisting by the word of God,

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: by which the then world, having been overflowed with water,

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: but the present heavens and earth are kept in store by the same word, reserved for fire at the day of judgment and perdition of ungodly men.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: But be not ignorant of this one thing, beloved, that one day with the Lord is as a thousand years, and a thousand years as one day.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: The Lord delays not concerning the promise, as some count delaying, but is longsuffering for your sake, not willing that any should perish, but that all should come to repentance.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: But the day of the Lord will come as a thief, in which the heavens shall pass away with a great noise, and the elements shall melt with fervent heat, and the earth and the works that are in it shall be burned up.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: As all these things are thus to be dissolved, what manner of persons ought you to be in holy behavior and godliness,

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: looking for and hastening the coming of the day of God, because of which the heavens being on fire shall be dissolved and the elements shall melt with fervent heat?

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: But we, according to his promise, look for new heavens and a new earth, in which dwells righteousness.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: Wherefore, beloved, as you look for these things, be diligent to be found spotless and blameless before him in peace,

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: and regard the longsuffering of our Lord salvation, even as our beloved brother Paul, according to the wisdom that is given to him, has written to you,

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: as also in all his epistles speaking in them of these things, in which things are some hard to be understood, which the unlearned and unsteady wrest, as they do also the other Scriptures, to their own destruction.

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: Do you then, beloved, knowing it before, beware lest being led away by the error of the lawless you fall from your own steadfastness,

name: Epistle of Peter 2nd
text: but grow in grace and the knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ. To him be glory both now and to the day of eternity.424

text: Thessalonians 1

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: Paul and Silvanus and Timothy to the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: Grace to you and peace from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ,

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: We are bound to give thanks to God always concerning you, brethren, as it is fit, because your faith grows exceedingly, and the love of each one of you all toward one another increases,

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: so that we ourselves glory in you among the churches of God, on account of your patience and faith in all your persecutions and afflictions which you endure,

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: a proof of the righteous judgment of God, that you may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God, for which you also suffer,

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: in naming fire, rendering vengeance to those that know not God and that obey not the gospel of our Lord Jesus;

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: and these shall suffer punishment, an eternal destruction from the presence of the Lord and from the glory of his might;

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: when he shall have come to be glorified in his saints, and to be admired in all that believed (because our testimony to you was believed) in that day.

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: To which end also we pray always for you, that our God may count you worthy of the calling, and fulfill all the good pleasure of goodness, and the work of faith in power,

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: that the name of our Lord Jesus may be glorified in you, and you in him, according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ.

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: And now you know what withholds, that he may be revealed in his own time.

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: But we are bound to give thanks to God always for you, brethren beloved by the Lord, that God from the beginning chose you to salvation in sanctification of the Spirit and belief of the truth,

text: to which he called you through our gospel, to the obtaining of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ.

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: So then, brethren, stand fast, and hold the traditions which you were taught, whether through word or through our letter;

text: and may our Lord Jesus Christ himself, and our God and Father, who loved us and gave eternal consolation and good hope in grace,

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: Finally pray, brethren, for us, that the word of the Lord may run and be glorified as also among you,

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: But the Lord is faithful, who will establish you, and keep you from the evil one.

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: But we have confidence in the Lord with respect to you, that you both do and will do the things which we give in charge.

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: And may the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God and into the patience of Christ.

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: But we charge you, brethren, in the name of the Lord Jesus Christ, that you withdraw yourselves from every brother that walks370 disorderly, and not according to the tradition which they received from us.

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: neither ate we bread from any one for naught, but in labor and toil working night and day, that we might not burden any one of you:

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: not that we have not authority, but that we might give ourselves as a pattern to you to imitate us.

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: For when we were with you, this we charged you, that if any one will not work, neither let him eat.

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: For we hear of some walking among you disorderly, working not at all, but being busybodies:

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: now such we charge and exhort in the Lord Jesus Christ, that working with quietness they eat their own bread.

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: But you, brethren, be not weary in well doing.

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: And if any one obey not our word through the letter, mark that man, and keep no company with him, that he may be put to shame;

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: and count him not as an enemy, but admonish him as a brother.

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2
text: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace always in every way. The Lord be with you all.

name: Paul to the Thessalonians 2

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: to whom they gave heed, from small to great, saying: This man is the power of God, which is called great.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And they gave heed to him because he had for a long time astonished them with his magic arts.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when they believed Philip, preaching concerning the kingdom of God and the name of Jesus Christ, they were baptized, both men and women.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And Simon himself also believed, and having been baptized, he continued with Philip, and seeing the mighty deeds and signs that were done, he was astonished.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But the apostles that were in Jerusalem, hearing that Samaria had received the word of God, sent to them Peter and John,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: who went down and prayed for them, that they might receive the Holy Spirit.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: For he had not yet fallen on any one of them, but they had only been baptized into the name of the Lord Jesus.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Then they laid their hands on them, and they received the Holy Spirit.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But Simon, seeing that through the laying on of the apostles’ hands the Spirit was given, offered them money,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: saying: Give me also this authority, that on whomever I shall have laid hands, he may receive the Holy Spirit.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But Peter said to him: Thy money perish with thee, because thou hast thought to purchase for thyself with money the gift of God.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Thou hast no part, neither lot, in this matter; for thy heart is not right in the sight of God.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Repent therefore of this thy wickedness, and pray the Lord if

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: for I perceive that thou art bitter gall and a bundle of unrighteousness.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But Simon answered and said: Pray you to the Lord for me, that none of the things that you have spoken may come upon me.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: They therefore having testified and spoken the word of the Lord, returned to Jerusalem: they also preached the gospel in many cities of the Samaritans.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But an angel of the Lord spoke to Philip, saying: Arise, and go toward the south, to the road that goes down from Jerusalem to Gaza: this is desert.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And he arose and went; and behold, a man of Ethiopia, a eunuch, a high officer of Candace, queen of the Ethiopians, who was over all her treasure, who had come to Jerusalem to worship,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: was also returning, and, sitting in his chariot, was reading the prophet Isaiah.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And the Spirit said to Philip: Go forward and join thyself to this chariot.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And running forward, Philip heard him reading Isaiah the prophet, and said: Understandest thou, then, what thou readest?

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But he said: How should I unless some one guide me? And he requested Philip to come up and sit with him.

name: Acts of the Apostles
