text: And the passage of Scripture which he was reading was this: As a sheep for slaughter was he led; and as a lamb before his shearer is dumb, so opens he not his mouth.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: In his humiliation his judgment* was taken away: his generation who shall describe? for his life is taken from the earth. * The justice due him.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And the eunuch answered and said to Philip: I pray thee, of whom speaks the prophet this? Of himself or of some other man?

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But Philip opened his mouth and began at the same Scripture, and preached to him Jesus.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And as they went along the road, they came to some water; and the eunuch says: Behold, water: what hinders me from being baptized?

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And he commanded the chariot to stop, and both went down into the water, both Philip and the eunuch, and he baptized him.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when they had come up out of the water, the Spirit of the Lord caught away Philip; and the eunuch saw him no more, for he went on his way rejoicing.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But Philip was found at Azotus; and passing through he preached the gospel in all the cities till he came to Caesarea.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But Saul, yet breathing threatening and slaughter against the disciples of the Lord, went to the chief priest

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and asked of him letters to Damascus to the synagogues, that, if he should find any of the way, both men and women, he might bring them bound to Jerusalem.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But as he was going, it came to pass that he drew near to Damascus, and suddenly there flashed around him a light from heaven;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and having fallen to the ground, he heard a voice saying to him: Saul, Saul,why persecutest thou me?

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And he said: Who art thou, Lord? And he said: I am Jesus whom thou persecuteth!

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But rise, and go into the city, and it shall be told thee what thou must do.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But the men that journeyed with him stood speechless, hearing indeed the voice, but seeing no one.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And Saul arose from the ground; but when his eyes were opened, he saw nothing; and leading him by the hand, they brought him into Damascus.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And he was three days without sight, and he ate not, neither did he drink.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But there was in Damascus a disciple named Ananias; and the Lord said to him in a vision: Ananias. And he said: Behold me, Lord.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And the Lord said to him: Arise, and go into the street that is called Straight, and inquire in the house of Judah for one named Saul, of Tarsus; for behold, he prays,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and has seen a man named Ananias coming in and laying his hand on him, that he may receive sight.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But Ananias answered: Lord, I have heard from many of this man, what evils he has done to thy saints in Jerusalem;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and how he has authority from the chief priests to bind all that call on thy name.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But the Lord said to him: Go; for a chosen vessel is this man to me, to bear my name before Gentiles and kings also, and the sons of Israel;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: for I will show him how great things he must suffer for my name.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And Ananias went, and entered into the house, and having laid his hands on him, said: Brother Saul, the Lord Jesus, who appeared to thee on the way by which thou earnest, has sent me, that thou mayest receive sight and be filled with the Holy Spirit.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And immediately there fell from his eyes as if scales; and he received sight, and arose and was baptized;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and having taken food, he was strengthened. And he was with the

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and immediately in the synagogues he preached Jesus, that this is the Son of God.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But all that heard were astonished, and said: Is not this he that destroyed in Jerusalem those that call on this name, and has he not come hither for this purpose, that he might lead them bound to the chief priests?

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But Saul increased the more in strength, and confounded the Jews that dwelt in Damascus, proving that this is the Christ.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when many days were fulfilled, the Jews counselled together to kill him;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: but their plot was made known to Saul. And they also watched the gates day and night, that they might kill him;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and his disciples took him. and by night let him down through the wall, lowering him in a basket.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And when he had come to Jerusalem, he attempted to join himself to the disciples; and they all feared him, not believing that he was a disciple.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But Barnabas took him, and brought him to the apostles, and told them how on the way he had seen the Lord, and that he had spoken to him, and how in Damascus he had spoken boldly in the name of Jesus.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And he was with them going in and out in Jerusalem; speaking boldly in the name of the Lord,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: he spoke to, and also disputed with, the Hellenists; but they undertook to kill him.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And the brethren, knowing it, brought him down to Caesarea, and sent him forth to Tarsus.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Then indeed the church throughout the whole of Judea and Galilee and Samaria had peace, being edified and walking in the fear of the Lord; and through the aid of the Holy Spirit was multiplied.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But it came to pass that Peter, passing through all places, came down also to the saints that dwell in Lydda.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And he found there a man named Aeneas, that had lain on a bed for eight years, who was a paralytic.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And Peter said to him: Aeneas, Jesus Christ restores thee to health: arise, and make thy bed for thyself. And he immediately arose;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and all that dwelt in Lydda and Saron saw him, and they turned to the Lord.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And there was in Joppa a female disciple named Tabitha, which, translated, is called Dorcas; she was full of good works and charities that she did.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But it came to pass in those days that, having been taken sick, she died; and they washed her and laid her in an upper room.228

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And as Lydda was near to Joppa, the disciples, hearing that Peter was there, sent two men to him, beseeching: Delay not to come to us,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And Peter arose and went with them. When he had come, they brought him into the upper room; and all the widows stood by him weeping and showing the coats and garments which Dorcas made while she was with them.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But having put them all out, Peter kneeled down and prayed; and turning to the body, he said: Tabitha, arise. And she opened her eyes, and, seeing Peter, she sat up.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But giving her a hand, he raised her up; and having called the saints and widows, he presented her alive.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And it became known throughout the whole of Joppa, and many believed on the Lord.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And it came to pass that he remained many days in Joppa with one Simon, a tanner.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But a man in Caesarea named Cornelius, a centurion of the band called Italian,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: devout and fearing God with all his house who gave many charities to the people and prayed to God always,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: saw in a vision, evidently about the ninth hour of the day, an angel of God coming in to him and saying to him: Cornelius.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But looking earnestly on him and becoming afraid, he said: What is it, Lord? And he said to him: Thy prayers and thy charities have come up for a memorial before God.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And now, send men to Joppa and call for one Simon, who is surnamed Peter:

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: he lodges with one Simon, a tanner, who has a house by the sea.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And when the angel that spoke to him had gone away, he called two of the household servants, and a devout soldier of those that waited on him,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and having made known all things to them, he sent them to Joppa.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But on the morrow, as they went on their way and drew near to the city. Peter went up on the housetop to pray, about the sixth hour.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And he became very hungry and desired to eat. But while they made ready, he fell into a trance,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and saw heaven opened, and some vessel, like a great sheet, descending, let down by the four corners upon the earth:

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: in which were all manner of fourfooted beasts, and creeping things of the earth, and birds of the heaven.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But Peter said: By no means, Lord, for I have never eaten anything common and unclean.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And a voice came again a second time to him: The things that God has cleansed call thou not common.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And this was done three times, and immediately the vessel was taken up into heaven.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But while Peter was doubting in himself, what the vision that he had seen might be, behold, the men that had been sent by Cornelius, having inquired for the house of Simon, stood at the gate,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and, calling, asked if Simon who is surnamed Peter lodged there.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But while Peter carefully considered about the vision, the Spirit said to him: Behold, men seek thee;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: but arise and go down, and go with them, doubting nothing, for I have sent them.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And Peter went down to the men and said: Behold, I am he whom you seek: what is the cause for which you are present?

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And they said: Cornelius, a centurion, a man just and fearing God, well reported of also by all the nation of the Jews, was warned by a holy angel to send for thee to his house, and to hear words from thee.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Having called them in therefore, he lodged them. But on the morrow he arose and went forth with them; and some of the brethren that were of Joppa accompanied him.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And on the next day he entered into Caesarea; and Cornelius was looking for him, having called together his relatives and near friends.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But as Peter went in, Cornelius met him, fell at his feet and worshipped.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But Peter raised him up, saying: Stand up: I myself also am a man.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And conversing with him, he went in, and found many that had come together,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and said to them: You know that it is not lawful for a man a Jew to join himself to or go in to one of another race; yet God has showed me that I must call no man common or unclean:

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: wherefore, having been sent for, I came also without objecting. I ask therefore, for what purpose have you sent for me?

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And Cornelius said: Four days ago up to this hour, was I at the ninth praying in my house; and behold, a man stood before me in bright clothing,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and said: Cornelius, thy prayer is heard, and thy charities are remembered before God.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Send therefore to Joppa, and call for Simon, who is surnamed Peter; he lodges in the house of Simon a tanner, by the sea.230

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Immediately therefore I sent to thee, and thou hast done well in coming. Now therefore we all are present before God, to hear all things that have been commanded thee by the Lord.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And Peter opened his mouth and said: In truth, I comprehend that God is not a respecter of persons,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: but in every nation he that fears him and works righteousness is acceptable to him,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: the word that he sent to the sons of Israel, preaching peace through Jesus Christ: he is Lord of all.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: You know the word that was published throughout the whole of Judea, beginning from Galilee after the baptism which John preached,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: JESUS OF NAZARETH, how God anointed him with the Holy Spirit and power, who went about doing good and giving health to all that were oppressed by the devil, for God was with him;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and we are witnesses of all things that he did in the country of the Jews and in Jerusalem: whom they slew by hanging upon a tree.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: This man God raised on the third day and made him manifest,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: not to all the people, but to witnesses that were before appointed by God, to us who

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: ate and drank with him after he had risen from the dead;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and he charged us to preach to the people, and to testify that it is he that has been appointed by God as judge of living and dead.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: To him give all the prophets witness that, through his name, every one that believes on him shall receive remission of sins.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: While Peter was yet speaking these words, the Holy Spirit fell on all that heard the word.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And the believers of the circumcision, as many as came with Peter, were astonished, because on the Gentile; also the gift of the Holy Spirit had been poured out;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: for they heard them speaking with tongues and magnifying God. Then Peter answered:

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Can any one forbid water, that those should not be baptized who have received the Holy Spirit even as we?

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And he commanded them to be baptized in the name of Jesus Christ. Then they besought him to remain some days,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And when Peter went up to Jerusalem, they of the circumcision

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: saying: Thou wentest in to men uncircumcised, and didst eat with them.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And Peter began and laid the matter before them in order, saying:

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: I was in a city, Joppa, praying, and I saw in a trance a vision, some vessel, like a great sheet, descending, let down from heaven by four corners, and it came even to me.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Into which having looked attentively, I observed and saw fourfooted beasts of the earth, and wild beasts, and creeping things, and birds of the heavens.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And I heard also a voice saying to me: Rise, Peter, kill and eat.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But I said: By no means, Lord, for a common or unclean thing has never entered my mouth.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But a voice answered a second time from heaven: The things that God has cleansed, call thou not common.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And this was done three times, and all were drawn up again into heaven.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And behold, immediately three men, sent from Caesarea to me, stood at the house in which I was.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And the Spirit bade me go with them, nothing doubting. And these six brethren also went with me, and we entered the man’s house.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And he told us how he had seen the angel standing in his house and saying: Send to Joppa and call for Simon, who is surnamed Peter,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: who shall speak words to thee, by which thou shalt be saved, and all thy house.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when I began to speak, the Holy Spirit fell on them as on us also in the beginning.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And I remembered the word of the Lord, how he said: John indeed baptized in water, but you shall be baptized in the Holy Spirit.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: If then God gave to them the like gift as to us also, when we believed on the Lord Jesus Christ, who was I that I could withstand God?

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And when they heard these things they were silent, and glorified God, saying: Then has God given to the Gentiles also repentance to life.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: They therefore that were scattered abroad because of the affliction that arose against Stephen, travelled as far as Phenice and Cyprus and Antioch, speaking the word to no one but Jews only.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But some of them were men of Cyprus and Cyrene, who came to Antioch and spoke to the Greeks also, preaching the gospel of the Lord Jesus.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And the hand of the Lord was with them, and a great multitude that believed turned to the Lord.232

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And the report concerning them came to the ears of the church that was in Jerusalem; and they sent forth Barnabas as far as Antioch:

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: who, having come and seen the grace of God, rejoiced, and exhorted all that with determination of the heart they should adhere to the Lord;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: for he was a man good and full of the Holy Spirit and faith. And a great multitude was added to the Lord.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But he went out to Tarsus to seek for Saul; and he found and brought him to Antioch.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And it happened to them that they met together in the church for a whole year and taught a great multitude; also, that the disciples were called Christians first in Antioch.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But in those days there came down prophets from Jerusalem to Antioch;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and one of them, named Agabus, rose up, and signified through the Spirit that there was about to be a great famine over the whole habitable land: which came to pass in the days of Claudius.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And as any one of the disciples was prosperous, they determined each one of them to send to the relief of the brethren that dwelt in Judea:

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: which they also did, sending to the elders through the hand of Barnabas and Saul.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But at that time Herod the king laid hands on some of those who were of the church, to afflict them,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And he slew James the brother of John with the sword.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And, seeing that it was pleasing to the Jews, he apprehended Peter also (but these were the days of unleavened bread);

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: whom having seized he put in prison, delivering him to four tetrads of soldiers to guard him, intending after passover to bring him out to the people.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Peter was, indeed, therefore, kept in prison; but earnest prayer was made to God by the church for him.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when Herod was about to bring him forth, on that night Peter was sleeping between two soldiers, bound with two chains: guards also before the door watched the prison.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And behold, an angel of the Lord stood by, and light shone in the house; and striking Peter on the side, he raised him up, saying: Rise up quickly. And his chains fell off from his hands.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: The angel also said to him: Gird thyself, and bind on thy sandals. And he did so. And he said to him: Throw thy mantle about thee and

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And going out he followed, and knew not that what had been done by the angel was true, but thought that he saw a vision.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But after passing through the first and second guard, they came to the iron gate that leads into the city, which opened to them of its own accord; and having gone out they went along one street; and immediately the angel departed from him.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And Peter, having come to himself, said: Now I know in truth that the Lord has sent his angel, and delivered me from the hand of Herod and from all the expectation of the people of the Jews.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And being aware of this, he went to the house of Mary the mother of John, who is surnamed Mark, where many were assembled and praying.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when he knocked at the door of the entrance there came a maidservant named Rhoda to listen;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and recognizing Peter’s voice, she opened not the entrance for joy, but running in, told that Peter stood before the entrance.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But they said to her: Thou art mad. She however, strongly affirmed that it was so. But they said: It is his angel.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Peter, however, continued knocking; and, having opened, they saw him and were astonished.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But beckoning to them with his hand that they should be silent, he told how the Lord had brought him out of the prison: he said also: Tell these things to James and the brethren. And he went out and departed to another place.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when it was day there was no little consternation among the soldiers, what had become of Peter.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But Herod, having sought for him, and not finding him, examined the guards and commanded them to be put to death; and having gone down from Judea to Caesarea, he continued there.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And he was of hostile mind toward the Tyrians and Sidonians; but they came to him with one consent, and having gained the good will of Blastus, who had charge of the king’s bedchamber, they sought for peace, because their country was sustained by that of the king.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And on an appointed day, Herod, having clothed himself in royal apparel, seated himself on the tribunal and made an oration to them.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And the people shouted: The voice of God, and not of a man,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But an angel of the Lord immediately smote him, because he gave not the glory to God; and, having been eaten by worms, he expired.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And the word of God increased and multiplied.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And Barnabas and Saul returned from Jerusalem, after having fulfilled the ministry, taking with them also John who was surnamed Mark.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And there were in the church that was in Antioch prophets and teachers, both Barnabas and Simon who is called Niger, and Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen also, the foster brother of Herod the tetrarch, and Saul.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And as they were ministering to the Lord and fasting, the Holy Spirit said: Set apart to me Barnabas and Saul for the work to which I have called them.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Then, having fasted and prayed and laid hands on them, they sent them away.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: They therefore having been sent forth by the Holy Spirit, went down to Seleucia, and thence they sailed to Cyprus;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and being in Salamis they preached the word of God in the synagogues of the Jews; and they had also John as attendant.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But having passed through the whole island as far as Paphos, they found a man, a magician, a Jewish false prophet, whose name was BarJesus,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: who was with the proconsul Sergius Paulus, an intelligent man. This man called for Barnabas and Saul, and requested to hear the word of God.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But Elymas the magician, for so is his name translated, withstood them, seeking to turn away the proconsul from the faith.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But Saul, who is also Paul, being filled with the Holy Spirit, looked earnestly upon him

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and said: O full of all deceit and all mischief, son of the devil, enemy of all righteousness, wilt thou not cease to pervert the straight ways of the Lord?

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And now, behold, the hand of the Lord is upon thee, and thou shalt be blind, not seeing the sun for a season. And immediately there fell upon him a mist and darkness, and going about, he sought persons to lead him by the hand.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Then the proconsul, seeing what had been done, believed, being astonished at the teaching of the Lord.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And Paul and his companions, having loosed from Paphos, came to Perga of Pamphylia; but John departing from them, returned to Jerusalem.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But they continued their journey from Perga and came to Antioch of Pisidia; and having entered the synagogue on the sabbath day, they sat down.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And after the reading of the law and the prophets, the rulers of the synagogue sent to them saying: Men, brethren, if there is in you any word of exhortation for the people, speak.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And Paul arose, and, beckoning with Ills hand, said: Men of Israel

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: The God of this people Israel chose our fathers, and the people he exalted during the sojourn in the land of Egypt, and with an uplifted arm brought he them out of it;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and for a time of about forty years he nourished them in the wilderness;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and after he had destroyed seven nations in the land of Canaan, he divided to them their land for an inheritance,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: for about four hundred and fifty years. And after this he gave judges till Samuel the prophet,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And after that they asked for a king; and God gave them Saul the son of Kish, a man of the tribe of Benjamin, forty years;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and he removed him and raised up for them David as a king; to whom he also gave testimony: I have found David the son of Jesse, a man according to my heart, who shall do all my will.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: From this man’s posterity, God, according to promise, has brought to Israel a Saviour, Jesus,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: John having preached, before his entrance, the baptism of repentance to all the people of Israel.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But as John was fulfilling his course, he said: Who do you suppose that I am? I am not he: but behold, there comes after me one, the sandal of whose feet I am not worthy to loose.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Men, brethren, sons of the race of Abraham, and those among you that fear God, to us is the word of this salvation sent.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: For they that dwell in Jerusalem and their rulers, being ignorant of this one, and of the voices of the prophets that are read every sabbath, have fulfilled them in condemning him;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and though they found no cause of death, they asked of Pilate that he might be put to death.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And when they had fulfilled all things that are written concerning him, they took him down from the tree and laid him in a sepulcher.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But God raised him from the dead;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and he appeared for many days to those that went up with him from Galilee to Jerusalem: who now are his witnesses to the people.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And we announce to you glad tidings of the promise made to the fathers, that God has fulfilled this to our children by raising up Jesus,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: as it is also written in the second Psalm: Thou art my Son, this day have I begotten thee.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But that he raised him from the dead no more to return to corruption, he has thus spoken: I will give you the faithful, holy things of David.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Wherefore he says also in another Psalm: Thou wilt not suffer thy Holy One to see corruption.236

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: For David indeed, having served his own generation by the counsel of God, fell asleep and was laid with his fathers and saw corruption;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: but he whom God raised up saw no corruption.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Be it known to you, therefore, men, brethren, that through this man is preached to you remission of sins:

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: in this one, every one that believes is justified from all things, from which you could not be justified in the law of Moses.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Take heed, therefore, lest there come upon you that which is said in the prophets:

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Behold, you despisers, and wonder, and perish, for I work a work in your days, a work which you would not believe, though any one plainly declare it to you.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when they had gone out they besought that these words might be spoken to them on the next sabbath.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And when the synagogue was dismissed, many of the Jews and devout proselytes followed Paul and Barnabas, who, speaking to them, persuaded them to continue in the grace of God.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And on the next sabbath almost all the city came together to hear the word of the Lord.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But the Jews. seeing the multitudes, were filled with envy, and spoke against the things spoken by Paul, contradicting and blaspheming.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And Paul and Barnabas, speaking boldly, said: To you was it needful that the word of God should first be spoken; but since you thrust it from you and judge yourselves unworthy of eternal life, behold, we turn to the Gentiles.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: For so has the Lord commanded us: I have set thee as a light for the Gentiles, that thou shouldst be for salvation to the end of the earth.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And hearing it, the Gentiles rejoiced, and glorified the word of the Lord, and as many as had been ordered for eternal life believed;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and the word of the Lord was carried throughout the whole country.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But the Jews excited the devout women that were honorable, and the chief men of the city, and raised a persecution against Paul and Barnabas, and drove them out from their borders.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But having shaken off the dust from their feet against them, they came to Iconium;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and the disciples were filled with joy and the Holy Spirit.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And it came to pass in Iconium that they went together into the synagogue of the Jews, and so spoke that a great multitude of Jews and also of Greeks believed.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But the Jews that believed not excited and imbittered the souls of the Gentiles against the brethren.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: A long time therefore spent they speaking, boldly in the Lord, who gave testimony to the word of his grace by giving signs and wonders to be done through their hands.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But the multitude of the city was divided, and some were with the Jews and some with the apostles.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when there was a violent intent of the Gentiles and also of the Jews with their rulers, to outrage and to stone them,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: being aware of it, they fled to the cities of Lycaonia, Lystra and Derbe, and the neighboring regions;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and there they preached the gospel.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And a man in Lystra, without strength in his feet, sat, lame from his mother’s womb: who had never walked.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: This man heard Paul speak, who, looking earnestly on him, and seeing that he had faith to be saved,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: said with a loud voice: Stand erect on thy feet. And he leaped up and walked.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And the multitudes, seeing what Paul had done, lifted up their voice, saying in the Lycaonian language: The gods in the likeness of men have come down to us;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and they called Barnabas, Zeus; and Paul, Hermes; because he was the chief speaker.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And the priest of Zeus, who was before the city, having brought bulls and garlands to the gates, intended to offer sacrifice with the multitudes.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But the apostles Barnabas and Paul, hearing of it, rent their garments and ran forth among the multitude, crying out

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and saying: Men, why do these things? We also of like passions with yourselves are men, preaching the gospel that you turn from these vanities to the living God, who made the heaven and the earth and the sea and all things that are in them;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: who, in the past generations, permitted all the nations to walk in their own ways:

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: though, indeed, he left himself not without testimony in doing good, giving you rains from heaven and fruitful seasons, filling your hearts with food and gladness.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And saying these things, they scarcely restrained the multitudes from offering sacrifice to them.238

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But there came thither from Antioch and Iconium Jews; and having persuaded the multitudes and stoned Paul, they dragged him out of the city, supposing that he was dead.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: However, as the disciples stood about him, he rose up and came into the city. And on the next day he went forth with Barnabas to Derbe.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Having preached the gospel to that city also, and having made many disciples, they returned to Lystra and to Iconium and to Antioch,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: strengthening the souls of the disciples, exhorting them to abide in the faith, and saying that through many afflictions we must enter into the kingdom of God.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But having ordained elders for them in every church, with prayer and fasting they commended them to the Lord on whom they had believed.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And after passing through Pisidia they came to Pamphylia;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and having spoken the word in Perga, they came down to Attalia;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and thence sailed to Antioch, whence they had been delivered to the grace of God for the work which they had accomplished.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But after they had arrived and brought the church together, they related what things God had done with them, and that he had opened to the Gentiles the door of faith.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And they spent not a little time with the disciples.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And some went down from Judea and taught the brethren that unless you shall have been circumcised according to the custom of Moses, you cannot be saved.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But after Paul and Barnabas had had no little dissension and discussion with them, they arranged that Paul and Barnabas and some others of them should go up to the apostles and elders at Jerusalem concerning this question.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: They therefore, having been conducted on their journey by the church, passed through Phenice and Samaria, relating the conversion of the Gentiles; and they caused great joy to all the brethren.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when they had arrived at Jerusalem they were received by the church and the apostles and the elders: they also announced what things God had done with them.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And there arose some of the sect of the Pharisees, who had believed, saying that it was necessary to circumcise them: also, to command that they keep the law;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And the apostles and elders came together to consider this matter.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But after there had been much discussion, Peter arose and said to choice among you, that by my mouth the Gentiles should hear the word of the gospel and believe.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And God, who knows the heart, bore them testimony by giving them the Holy Spirit even as to us,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and made no distinction between us and them, having purified their hearts by faith.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Now, therefore, why tempt God by putting a yoke upon the neck of the disciples which neither our fathers nor we were able to bear?

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But, through the grace of the Lord Jesus, we believe that we shall be saved in the same manner as they.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And the whole multitude kept silence and heard Barnabas and Paul relate what signs and wonders God had done among the Gentiles through them.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But after they were silent, James answered, saying: Men, brethren, hear me.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Simeon has related how God at the first looked down to take from the Gentiles a people for his name.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And with this agree the words of the prophets, as it is written:

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: After this I will return and build again the tabernacle of David, which has fallen down, and its ruins I will build again, and I will set it up,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: that the men that are left over may seek the Lord, and all the Gentiles on whom my name has been called,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: says the Lord who does these things known from eternity.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Wherefore I judge that we trouble not them that from among the Gentiles are turning to God,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: but that we write to them to abstain from the pollutions of idols, and from lewdness, and from what is strangled, and from blood.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: For Moses has, from ancient generations, in every city, them that preach him, being read in the synagogues every sabbath day.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Then it seemed good to the apostles and the elders with the whole church, to choose men from among themselves and send them to Antioch, with Paul and Barnabas; Judas who is called Barsabbas, and Silas, leading men among the brethren,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: having written by their hand: The apostles and the elder brethren, to the brethren who are of the Gentiles in Antioch and Syria and Cilicia, wish health.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Since we have heard that some have gone out from among us and troubled you with words, subverting your souls, to whom we gave no commandment;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: it seemed good to us, having been of one mind, to choose men and send them to you with our beloved Barnabas and Paul;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: who are men that have delivered up their lives for the name of our Lord Jesus Christ.240

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: We have sent, therefore, Judas and Silas, who will tell the same things by word.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: For it seemed good to the Holy Spirit, and us, to lay on you no greater burden than these necessary things,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: that you abstain from things sacrificed to idols, and blood, and things strangled, and lewdness; from which if you keep yourselves you will do well. Farewell.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: They therefore having been dismissed came to Antioch; and when they had gathered the multitude together they delivered the letter.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And having read it, they rejoiced at the consolation.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Judas also and Silas, who were prophets themselves, with much discourse exhorted the brethren, and strengthened them;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: but having remained for a time, they were dismissed with peace from the brethren to those that had sent them.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But Paul and Barnabas continued in Antioch, teaching and preaching, with many others also, the word of the Lord.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And after some days Paul said to Barnabas: Let us return now and look after the brethren in every city in which we preached the word of the Lord how they do.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And Barnabas wished to take with them John who is called Mark;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: but Paul thought it right not to take with them this one, who had turned away from them from Pamphylia, and had not gone with them to the work.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And there arose a sharp contention, so that they separated one from the other; and Barnabas took with him Mark and sailed to Cyprus.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But Paul chose Silas and went forth, after having been delivered to the grace of God by the brethren;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and he passed through Syria and Cilicia, strengthening the churches.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And he came down to Derbe and Lystra. And behold, a disciple was there named Timothy, son of a believing Jewess, but of a Grecian father:

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: who was well reported of by the brethren in Lystra and Iconium.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Paul desired that this man should go forth with him; and he took him and circumcised him, on account of the Jews that were in those places; for all knew his father that he was a Greek.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And as they journeyed through the cities they delivered to them, for their observance, the decrees that had been made by the apostles and

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: The churches therefore were strengthened in faith and increased in number daily.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But they passed through Phrygia and the region of Galatia, being forbidden by the Holy Spirit to speak the word in Asia;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: but having come towards Mysia, they attempted to go into Bithynia; and the Spirit of Jesus did not permit them;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and having passed by Mysia they came down to Troas.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And a vision appeared to Paul by night; a man of Macedonia stood beseeching him and saying: Come over into Macedonia and help us.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And when he had seen the vision we immediately sought to go forth into Macedonia, concluding that the Lord had called us thither to preach the gospel to them.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But sailing from Troas, we came by a straight course to Samothrace, and on the next clay to Neapolis,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and thence to Philippi, which is the first city of the region of Macedonia, a colony. And we were in that city abiding some days.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And on the sabbath day we went forth out of the gate by the river, where we supposed there was a house of prayer; and sitting down, we spoke to the women that had come together.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And a woman named Lydia, a seller of purple, of the city of Thyatira, who worshipped God, heard; whose heart the Lord opened to attend to the things spoken by Paul.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when she was baptized, and her house, she besought, saying: If you have judged me to be faithful to the Lord, come into my house and abide; and she constrained us.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But it came to pass as we went to the house of prayer that a maidservant, possessed of a soothsaying spirit, met us: who brought her owners much gain by soothsaying.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: She, following Paul and us, cried out, saying: These men are servants of God Most High, who announce to us the way of salvation.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And this she did for many days. But Paul was grieved, and, turning, said to the spirit: I charge thee in the name of Jesus Christ to come out of her; and it came out the same hour.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But her owners, seeing that the hope of their gain had gone, seized Paul and Silas and dragged them into the market before the rulers;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and bringing; them to the commanders, said: These men do greatly disturb our city, being Jews,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and announce customs which it is not allowed us to receive nor do, being Romans.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And the multitude rose up together against them; and the commanders, having torn off their garments, gave orders to beat them with rods;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and having laid many stripes upon them, they cast them into prison, charging the keeper of the prison to guard them securely:242

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: who, as he had received such charge, cast them into the inner prison, and made their feet fast in the stocks.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But about midnight Paul and Silas prayed and sung a hymn to God; and the prisoners listened to them.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And suddenly there was a great earthquake, so that the foundations of the prison were shaken: immediately, also, were all the doors opened, and the bonds of all were loosed.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But the keeper of the prison, having been roused from sleep, and seeing the doors of the prison open, drew his sword and was about to kill himself, supposing that the prisoners had fled.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But Paul called with a loud voice, saying: Do thyself no harm; for we are all here.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And having called for a light, he sprang in, and trembling, fell before Paul and Silas.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and, bringing them out, said: Sirs, what must I do to be saved?

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And they said: Believe on the Lord Jesus, and thou shalt be saved and thy house.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And they spoke to him the word of the Lord, with all that were in his house.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And he took them at that hour of the night and washed the blood from their stripes, and was baptized, himself and all his, straightway:

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and having brought them into the house, he set a table before them, and rejoiced with all his house in having believed in God.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when it was day, the commanders sent the lectors*, saying: Release those men. * lictors or rod-bearers

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And the keeper of the prison told these words to Paul: The commanders have sent that you shall be released: now, therefore, come out and go in peace.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But Paul said to them: Having beaten us publicly, uncondemned, men that are Romans, they cast us into prison; and now do they put us out secretly? Not so: but let them come and bring us out themselves.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And the lictors told these words to the commanders; and they were afraid when they heard that they were Romans;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and they came and entreated them, and leading them out, asked them to depart from the city.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But after going out from the prison they went to Lydia, and when they had seen the brethren they exhorted them and went forth.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But having passed through Amphipolis and Apollonia, they came to

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And, according to his custom, Paul went in to them, and for three sabbath days he discoursed to them from the Scriptures;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: opening and laying before them that the Christ must needs have suffered, and risen from the dead; and that this is Christ Jesus whom I preach to you.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And some of them were convinced and were allotted to Paul and Silas, of the devout Greeks also a great multitude, and of the chief women not a few.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But the Jews, filled with envy, and taking with them some evil men that were about the markets, and collecting a mob, excited a tumult in the city, and coming upon the house of Jason, sought to bring them before the people;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: but not finding them, they dragged Jason and some brethren before the rulers of the city, crying out: These that have thrown the world into confusion have come hither also;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: whom Jason has received; and these all act in opposition to the decrees of Caesar, saying that there is another king, Jesus.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And they disquieted the multitude and the rulers of the city when they heard these things;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and having taken security of Jason and the rest, they dismissed them.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But the brethren immediately sent away Paul and Silas by night to Beroea: who, on coming thither, went into the synagogue of the Jews.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: These were more nobleminded than those in Thessalonica; and they received the word with all readiness, searching the Scriptures day by day, whether these things were so.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Many of them therefore believed, also of honorable Grecian women, and of men not a few.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when the Jews of Thessalonica knew that the word of God was preached by Paul in Beroea, they came thither, exciting and disturbing the multitudes.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But immediately then the brethren sent away Paul to go as far as to the sea; and Silas and Timothy remained there.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But they that conducted Paul brought him as far as Athens; and having received commandment for Silas and Timothy, that they should come to him as soon as possible, they departed.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But while Paul waited for them in Athens, his spirit was stirred within him when he saw the city full of idols.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: He therefore reasoned in the synagogue with the Jews, and the devout persons, and in the market every day with those that happened to meet him.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But some of the Epicurean and Stoic philosophers disputed with him, and some said: What can this babbler wish to say? Others said:244 He seems to be a proclaimer of strange demons; because he preached Jesus and the resurrection.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And they took him and brought him to the Areopagus, saying: Can we know what new teaching this is that is spoken by thee?

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: for thou bringest some strange things to our ears: we desire, therefore, to know what these things may be.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Now, all the Athenians and resident strangers have leisure for nothing else than to tell or hear something new.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But Paul, standing in the midst of the Areopagus, said: Men of Athens, I look upon you as, in all respects, more religious than others.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: For in passing through, and observing the objects of your worship. I found also an altar on which had been inscribed: To AN UNKNOWN GOD. What, therefore, you ignorantly worship, this I announce to you.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: God, who made the world and all things that are in it, he being Lord of heaven and earth, dwells not in temples made with hands,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: nor is he served by human hands as if he needed anything, since he gives to all life and breath and all things;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: he also made of one every nation of men to dwell on all the face of the earth, having fixed the times before appointed, and the limits of their habitations,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: to seek God, if perhaps they would feel and find him not far from each one of us.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: For in him we live and move and are, as also some of your own poets have said: For we also his offspring are.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Therefore, being the offspring of God, we ought not to think that the godhood is like gold, or silver, or stone, the sculptured work of art and of a man’s device.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: The times, therefore, of ignorance God having overlooked, now announces to all men everywhere that they repent,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: inasmuch as he has appointed a day in which he will judge the world in righteousness in a man whom he has ordained, giving faith to all by having raised him from the dead.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But hearing of a resurrection of the dead, some mocked; others said: We will hear thee even again concerning this matter.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Thus Paul went out from the midst of them:

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: some men, however, having attached themselves to him, believed: among whom was Dionysius the Areopagite, and a woman named Damaris, and others with them.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And finding a Jew named Aquilla, born in Pontus, having lately come from Italy, and Priscilla his wife, because Claudius had commanded all Jews to depart from Rome, he went to them;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and because he was of the same trade he abode with them, and worked; for by trade they were tentmakers.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But he discoursed in the synagogue every sabbath, and persuaded Jews and Greeks.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when Silas and Timothy had come from Macedonia, Paul was wholly engaged in the word, testifying to the Jews that the Christ was Jesus.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But as they set themselves in opposition and blasphemed, he shook his clothing and said to them: Your blood be upon your head: clean I will henceforth go to the Gentiles.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And departing thence, he came into the house of one named Titus Justus, who worshipped God, whose house joined the synagogue.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But Crispus, the ruler of the synagogue, believed on the Lord with all his house; and many of the Corinthians, hearing, believed and were baptized.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But the Lord spoke through a vision in the night to Paul: Fear not, but speak and be not silent,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: because I am with thee, and , no one shall make an assault upon thee to maltreat thee, for I have much people in this city.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And he continued a year and six months, teaching among them the word of God.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when Gallio was proconsul of Achaia, the Jews, with one consent, rose up against Paul, and brought him to the tribunal,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: saying: This person induces men to worship God contrary to the law.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when Paul was about to open his mouth, Gallio said to the Jews: If, indeed, there were any wrong or wicked mischief, O Jews, I would with reason bear with you;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: but if there are questions about a word, and names, and your law, see to it yourselves: I will not be a judge of these things.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And he drove them from the tribunal.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But all took Sosthenes, the ruler of the synagogue, and beat him before the tribunal; and none of these things were a care to Gallio.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But Paul, after remaining yet many days, took leave of the brethren and sailed to Syria; and with him Priscilla and Aquila, having shorn his head in Cenchrea, for he had a vow.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And they arrived at Ephesus; and he left them there, but went himself into the synagogue and discoursed to the Jews.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And though they requested him to remain a longer time, he did not consent;246

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: but taking leave and saying: I will return to you again, if God will, he sailed from Ephesus;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and arriving at Caesarea, he went up and saluted the church, and went down to Antioch;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and having spent some time he went forth, passing in order through the country of Galatia, and Phrygia, strengthening all the disciples.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But a Jew named Apollos, born in Alexandria, an eloquent man and mighty in the Scriptures, came to Ephesus.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: He was instructed in the way of the Lord, and, being fervent in spirit, he spoke and taught accurately the things concerning Jesus, knowing only the baptism of John:

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: he also began to speak boldly in the synagogue. But after hearing him, Priscilla and Aquila took him, and explained to him more correctly the way of God.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And as he wished to go over to Achaia, the brethren encouraged him, and wrote to the disciples to receive him cordially. Who, on coming, gave much strength to the believers through his grace;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: for he with power utterly confuted the Jews publicly, showing through the Scriptures that the Christ is Jesus.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But it came to pass while Apollos was in Corinth that Paul, having passed through the upper districts, came to Ephesus and found some disciples:

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: he also said to them: Did you receive the Holy Spirit when you believed? And they said to him: No: but we did not even hear whether there is a Holy Spirit.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And he said: Into what, then, were you baptized? And they replied: Into John’s baptism.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And Paul said: John baptized with the baptism of repentance, saying to the people that they should believe on Him that was coming after him, that is, on Jesus.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And when they had heard, they were baptized into the name of the Lord Jesus;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and when Paul had laid hands on them, the Holy Spirit came on them, and they spoke with tongues and prophesied.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And all the men were about twelve.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But he entered the synagogue and spoke boldly for three months, discoursing, and persuading the things concerning the kingdom of God.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when some were hardened and believed not, and spoke evil of the way before the multitude, he withdrew from them and separated

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And this continued for two years, so that all that dwelt in Asia heard the word of the Lord, both Jews and Greeks.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Mighty deeds, also, that were unusual did God through the hands of Paul;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: so that even to the sick there were carried from his body handkerchiefs or aprons, and diseases departed from them: the evil spirits also went out.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But some also of the wandering Jewish exorcists undertook to name over those that had evil spirits the name of the Lord Jesus, saying: I adjure you by the Jesus whom Paul preaches.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And there were some, seven sons of Sceva, a Jewish chief priest, who did this.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But the evil spirit, answering, said to them: Jesus I acknowledge and Paul I know; but who are you?

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And the man in whom the evil spirit was leaped upon them, gained the mastery over them both, and prevailed against them, so that they fled from that house naked and wounded.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And this became known to all, both Jews and Greeks, that dwelt in Ephesus, and fear fell upon them all; and the name of the Lord Jesus was magnified:

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: many also of those that had believed came confessing and declaring their deeds.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And many of them that practiced magic arts brought their books together and burned them in the presence of all; and they computed the value of them, and found it fifty thousands of silver.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: So mightily the word of the Lord grew and prevailed.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when these things had been accomplished. Paul purposed in spirit, after having passed through Macedonia and Achaia, to go to Jerusalem, saying: After I have been there I must also see Rome.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And having sent into Macedonia two of them that waited on him, Timothy and Erastus, he remained for a time in Asia.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But there arose at that time no small commotion about the way.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: For one, Demetrius by name, a silversmith, by making silver shrines of Diana, brought no little gain to the artists:

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: whom he called together with those that worked in such things, and said: Men, you know that from this trade arises our wealth;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and you see and hear that not only at Ephesus, but throughout almost all Asia, this Paul has persuaded and drawn off a great multitude, saying that they are not gods that are made with hands.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And not only is this trade of ours in danger of coming into disrepute, but also the temple of the great goddess Diana will be counted as nothing; and she also, whom all Asia and the world worships, will be deposed from her majesty.248

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But having heard and having become filled with wrath, they cried out, saying: Great is Diana of the Ephesians.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And the city was filled with confusion; and they rushed with one accord into the theater, after seizing Gaius and Aristarchus, Macedonians, Paul’s fellow-travellers.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when Paul wished to go in to the people, the disciples did not permit him;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and some of the rulers of Asia also, being friendly to him, sent to him and besought him not to trust himself in the theater.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Some therefore cried out one thing and some another; for the assembly was confused, and the greater part knew not for what cause they had come together.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But out of the crowd they brought forward Alexander, the Jews putting him forward; and Alexander, waving his hand, intended to make a defense to the people.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But, perceiving that he was a Jew, all with one voice cried out for about two hours: Great is Diana of the Ephesians.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But the town-clerk, having quieted the multitude, said: Men of Ephesus, what man is there, then, that does not know that the city of the Ephesians is the templekeeper of the great Diana, and of the image that fell down from Jupiter?

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Therefore, as these things cannot be contradicted, you ought to be quiet and do nothing rashly.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: For you have brought these men who are neither robbers of temples nor blasphemers of your goddess.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: If, then, Demetrius and the artists with him have a matter against any one, court-days are kept, and there are proconsuls; let them bring charges one against the other.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But if you seek for anything further, it shall be determined in a lawful assembly.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: For we are in danger of having charges laid against us concerning this day’s tumult, there being no cause in relation to which we shall be able to give an account of this concourse.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And when he had said this, he dismissed the assembly.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But after the tumult had ceased, Paul having sent for the disciples and exhorted them, took leave, and departed to go into Macedonia.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And having passed through those regions and exhorted them with much speech, he came into Greece;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and after remaining three months, a plot having been laid for him by the Jews as he was about to sail to Syria, he resolved to return

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But there followed him, Sopater the son of Pyrrhus, a Beroean; and of the Thessalonians, Aristarchus and Secundus, and Gaius of Derbe, and Timothy; and of the Asiatics, Tychicus and Trophimus: and

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: these went before and waited for us in Troas;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: but we sailed after the days of unleavened bread from Philippi, and came to them at Troas in five days, where we spent seven days.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But on the first of the week, when we came together to break bread, Paul discoursed to them, about to depart on the morrow, and continued his speech till midnight.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And there were many lamps in the upper room where we had come together.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And a young man, named Eutychus, who sat in the window, being oppressed with deep sleep, as Paul discoursed for a longer time, was borne down by sleep, and fell down from the third story, and was taken up dead.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But Paul went down and fell upon him and embracing him said: Be not troubled; for his life is in him.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And he went up and broke bread and ate; and having talked a long time till break of day, he thus departed.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And they brought the young man alive, and were comforted not a little.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But we went in advance to the ship, and sailed to Assos, thence intending to take Paul in; for so had he arranged, intending himself to go on foot.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when he met us at Assos, we took him in and came to Mitylene;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and sailing thence, on the following day we came opposite Chios; and on the next day we arrived at Samos; and we came on the following day to Miletus.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: For Paul had determined to sail past Ephesus, that he might not spend time in Asia; for he hastened, if it was possible for him, to be in Jerusalem on the day of Pentecost.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But from Miletus he sent to Ephesus and called for the elders of the church.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And when they had come to him, he said to them: You know, from the first day on which I came into Asia. how I was with you the whole time,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: serving the Lord with all lowliness of mind, and with tears, and trials that befell me by the plots of the Jews:

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: how I shunned to declare to you nothing that is profitable, and taught you publicly and from house to house,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: testifying to Jews and also to Greeks repentance toward God, and faith that is toward our Lord Jesus Christ.250

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And now behold, bound in spirit I am going to Jerusalem, not knowing the things that will come upon me there,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: except that the Holy Spirit in every city testifies to me, saying that bonds and afflictions await me.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But I esteem of no value the life dear to myself, so that I finish my course and the ministry which I received from the Lord Jesus, fully to testify the gospel of the grace of God.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And now behold, I know that you all, among whom I have gone preaching the kingdom, will see my face no more.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Wherefore I solemnly affirm to you this day that I am clean from the blood of all;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: for I shunned not to declare to you all the counsel of God.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Take heed therefore to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit made you overseers, that you act as shepherds to the church of the Lord, which he purchased with his own blood.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: For I know that there shall come in among you, after my departure, grievous wolves, not sparing the flock;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and from among yourselves there shall arise men speaking perverse things to draw off the disciples after them.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Therefore, watch, remembering that night and day for three years I ceased not with tears to warn each one.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And now I commend you to God and to the word of his grace, who is able to build you up and give you an inheritance among all the sanctified.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: I coveted no man’s silver or gold or raiment:

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: yourselves know that to my own wants, and to those that were with me, these hands did minister.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: In all things I showed you, that thus laboring you ought to sustain the weak, and to remember the words of the Lord Jesus, for he said: It is more blessed to give than to receive

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And having said these things he kneeled down and prayed with them all.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And all wept much; and falling on Paul’s neck they kissed him,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: sorrowing most of all for the word that he had spoken that they should see his face no more. And they conducted him to the ship.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when it came to a pass that we had set sail after having departed from them, running by a straight course we came to Cos, and on the next day to Rhodes, and thence to Patara.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And finding a ship that was passing over to Phoenicia, we

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: but having come in view of Cyprus, and leaving it to the left, we sailed to Syria, and landed at Tyre: for there the ship was to put off the lading.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But finding the disciples, we remained there seven days; and these said to Paul through the Spirit that he should not go to Jerusalem.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when it came to pass that we had completed the days, we went out and departed, all conducting us with wives and children, till we were out of the city; and having knelt on the shore and prayed,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: we finished taking leave one of the other, and went on board the ship, but they returned home.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But we, having finished the voyage from Tyre, came to Ptolemais, and having saluted the brethren remained with them one day.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But on the morrow we departed and came to Caesarea, and entering the house of Philip the evangelist, who was of the seven, we abode with him.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: This man had four virgin daughters that prophesied.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But as we remained more days, there came down from Judea a prophet, named Agabus.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And coming to us, and taking Paul’s girdle, he bound his own feet and hands, and said: These things says the Holy Spirit: The man to whom this girdle belongs shall the Jews in Jerusalem thus bind, and deliver into the hands of the Gentiles.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when we heard these things, both we and they of that place besought him not to go up to Jerusalem.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And Paul answered and said: What do you effect by weeping and breaking my heart? for I am ready not only to be bound, but also to die in Jerusalem for the name of the Lord Jesus.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And as he was not persuaded, we were silent, saying: The will of the Lord be done.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But after these days we prepared for the journey, and went up to Jerusalem;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and some of the disciples from Caesarea went with us, bringing Mnason, a Cyprian, an old disciple, with whom we should lodge.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And when we came to Jerusalem, the brethren received us gladly.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But on the following day Paul went in with us to James; and all the elders were present.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And having saluted them, he related one by one each of the things that God had done among the Gentiles through his ministry.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And when they had heard, they glorified God, and said to him: Thou seest, brother, how many myriads of believers there are; and all are zealots for the law;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and they have learned concerning thee that thou teachest apostasy from Moses to all the Jews that are among the Gentiles, telling them252 not to circumcise their children, nor to walk according to the customs.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: What is it then? a multitude must by all means come together; for they will hear that thou hast come.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Do thou this that we tell thee: We have four men who have a vow upon them;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: take them with thee and purify thyself with them, and pay expenses for them that they may shave their heads; and all will know that there is nothing of the things that they have learned concerning thee; but that thou thyself also walkest, keeping the law.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But with regard to the Gentiles that have believed, we have written, after deciding that they keep themselves from what is sacrificed to idols, and from blood, and what is strangled, and from lewdness.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Then Paul, taking the men, on the following day purified himself with them, and entered into the temple, announcing that he would keep the full number of the days of purification, till an offering should be made for each one of them.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when the seven days were about to be completed, the Jews from Asia, having seen him in the temple, threw all the multitude into confusion and laid hands on him,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: crying out: Men of Israel, help; this is the man that teaches all everywhere against the people, and the law, and this place; and further, he has brought Greeks also into the temple, and has defiled this holy place.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: For they had previously seen in the city with him Trophimus the Ephesian, whom they supposed that Paul had brought into the temple.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And the whole city was moved, and there was a concourse of the people; and seizing Paul, they dragged him out of the temple, and immediately the doors were closed.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And while they were seeking to kill him, report was brought to the officer of the band that the whole of Jerusalem was in confusion;

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and he immediately took with him soldiers and centurions and ran down to them; but when they saw the officer and the soldiers, they ceased to beat Paul.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Then the officer came near and took him, and commanded him to be bound with two chains, and inquired who he was and what he had done.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But some cried one thing and some another in the multitude; and as he was not able to ascertain the certainty on account of the tumult, he commanded him to be brought into the fortress.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when he was on the steps, it happened that he was borne by

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: for the multitude of the people followed, crying out: Away with him.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And as he was about to be brought into the fortress. Paul said to the officer: May I speak to thee? He replied: Hast thou a knowledge of Greek?

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Art thou then not the Egyptian, that before these days made insurrection and led out into the wilderness the four thousand men of the assassins?

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But Paul said: I am indeed a Jewish man, a Tarsean, a citizen of no unknown city of Cilicia; and I beseech thee, permit me to speak to the people.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And when he had given permission, Paul, standing upon the steps, waved his hand to the people; and as there was much silence, he addressed them in the Hebrew tongue, saying:

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: Men, brethren and fathers, hear my present defense to you.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And when they heard that he addressed them in the Hebrew tongue, they the more kept silence. And he said:

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: I am a Jewish man, having been born in Tarsus of Cilicia, but brought up in this city, educated at the feet of Gamaliel, according to the exactness of the paternal law; being a zealot for God, as all of you are this day,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: I persecuted this way even to death, binding and delivering into prisons both men and women.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: as the chief priest, also, will testify for me, and all the presbytery; from whom also having received letters to the brethren. I was journeying to Damascus, to bring those that were there also bound to Jerusalem, that they might be punished.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But it came to pass as I was journeying and drawing near to Damascus about midday, suddenly there flashed around me a great light from heaven,

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: and I fell to the ground and heard a voice saying to me: Saul, Saul, why persecutest thou me?

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But I answered: Who art thou, Lord? And he said to me: I am Jesus the Nazarene, whom thou persecutest.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And those that were with me saw indeed the light, but understood not the voice of him that spoke to me.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But I said: What shall I do. Lord? And the Lord said to me; Arise, and go into Damascus, and there it shall be told thee of all things which it has been appointed thee to do.

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: But when I did not see on account of the glory of that light, being led by the hand by those that were with me, I came into Damascus.254

name: Acts of the Apostles
text: And one Ananias, a devout man according to the law, well reported of by all the Jews that dwelt there,

name: Acts of the Apostles
