text: because all that is in the world, the desire of the flesh and the desire of the eyes and the pride of life, is not of the Father, but is of the world

name: Epistle of James
text: And the world is passing away and the desire of it; but he that does the will of God abides for ever.

name: Epistle of James
text: Little children, it is the last time, and as you heard that antichrist comes, even now many antichrists have risen: whence we know that it is the last time.

name: Epistle of James
text: They went out from us, but were not of us; for if they had been of us, they would have remained with us; but that they might be made manifest that they are all not of us.

name: Epistle of James
text: And you have an anointing from the holy One, and know all things.

name: Epistle of James
text: I have not written to you because you know not the truth, but because you know it, and that no lie is from the truth.

name: Epistle of James
text: Who is the liar, but he that denies that Jesus is the Christ? This is the antichrist that denies the Father and the Son.

name: Epistle of James
text: Every one that denies the Son, neither has he the Father: he that confesses the Son has the Father also.426

name: Epistle of James
text: Let that which you heard from the beginning abide in you. If that abide in you which you heard from the beginning, you also shall abide in the Son and in the Father.

name: Epistle of James
text: And this is the promise that he himself promised us, the life eternal.

name: Epistle of James
text: These things I have written to you concerning them that deceive you.

name: Epistle of James
text: And you — the anointing which you received from him abides in you, and you have no need that any one teach, but as his anointing teaches you concerning all things, and is true and is no lie, even as it has taught you, abide in it.

name: Epistle of James
text: And now, little children, abide in him that when he shall be manifested we may have boldness, and not be ashamed away from him in his coming.

name: Epistle of James
text: If you know that he is righteous, you know that every one also that works righteousness has been begotten of him.

name: Epistle of James
text: John 3

name: Epistle of James
text: Behold what manner of love the Father has bestowed on us that we should be called children of God. Therefore the world knows us not, because it knew him not.

name: Epistle of James
text: Beloved, now are we children of God, and it has not yet been made manifest what we shall be. We know that when it shall be made manifest we shall be like him, because we, shall see him as he is.

name: Epistle of James
text: And every one that has this hope on him purifies himself, as he is pure.

name: Epistle of James
text: Every one that practices sin practices lawlessness also, and sin is lawlessness.

name: Epistle of James
text: And you know that he was manifested that he might take away sins, and sin is not in him.

name: Epistle of James
text: Every one that abides in him sins not: whoever sins has not seen him, neither known him.

name: Epistle of James
text: Little children, let no one deceive you. He that practices righteousness is righteous, even as he is righteous:

name: Epistle of James
text: he that practices sin is of the devil, because the devil sins from the beginning. For this purpose was the Son of God manifested, that he might destroy the works of the devil.

name: Epistle of James
text: Whoever has been begotten of God does not practice sin, because his seed abides in him; and he can not sin, because he has been begotten of God.

name: Epistle of James
text: In this the children of God are manifest and the children of the devil: whoever practices not righteousness is not of God, also he that

name: Epistle of James
text: For this is the message that you heard from the beginning, that we should love one another,

name: Epistle of James
text: not as Cain was of the wicked one and slew his brother; and for what cause did he slay him? because his works were evil, but those of his brother righteous.

name: Epistle of James
text: Wonder not, brethren, if the world hates you.

name: Epistle of James
text: We know that we have passed from death into life, because we love the brethren: he that loves not abides in death.

name: Epistle of James
text: Whoever hates his brother is a murderer, and you know that no murderer has eternal life abiding in him.

name: Epistle of James
text: In this we have known the love, because he laid down his life for us; and we ought to lay down our lives for the brethren.

name: Epistle of James
text: But whoever has this world’s goods, and sees his brother have need, and shuts up his bowels from him, how abides the love of God in him?

name: Epistle of James
text: Little children, let us not love in word, neither in tongue, but in deed and in truth.

name: Epistle of James
text: And in this we know that we are of the truth, and shall persuade our hearts before him;

name: Epistle of James
text: because if our hearts condemn us, God is greater than our heart, and knows all things.

name: Epistle of James
text: Beloved, if our heart condemn us not, we have confidence toward God,

name: Epistle of James
text: and whatever we ask we receive from him, because we keep his commandments and do the things that are pleasing in his sight.

name: Epistle of James
text: And this is his commandment, that we should believe on the name of his Son Jesus Christ, and love one another as he gave us commandment.

name: Epistle of James
text: And he that keeps his commandments abides in him and he in him; and in this we know that he abides in us, by the Spirit that he has given us.

name: Epistle of James
text: John 4

name: Epistle of James
text: Beloved, believe not every spirit, but prove the spirits, whether they are from God; because many false prophets have gone forth into the world.

name: Epistle of James
text: In this know you the Spirit of God: every spirit that confesses that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is of God,

name: Epistle of James
text: and every spirit that confesses not Jesus is not of God; and this is the spirit of antichrist, of which you have heard that it comes, and now is in the world already.

name: Epistle of James
text: You are of God, little children, and have overcome them, because greater is he that is in you than he that is in the world.428

name: Epistle of James
text: They are of the world: therefore they speak of the world, and the world hears them.

name: Epistle of James
text: We are of God: he that knows God hears us, he that is not of God hears not us. By this we know the spirit of truth and the spirit of error.

name: Epistle of James
text: Beloved, let us love one another, because love is of God, and every one that loves has been begotten of God, and knows God.

name: Epistle of James
text: He that loves not has not known God, for God is love.

name: Epistle of James
text: In this has been manifested the love of God in us, that God has sent his Son the only Begotten into the world that we might live through him.

name: Epistle of James
text: In this is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son the expiation for our sins.

name: Epistle of James
text: Beloved, if God so loved us, we also ought to love one another.

name: Epistle of James
text: No one has seen God at any time: if we love one another, God abides in us and his love is perfected in us.

name: Epistle of James
text: In this we know that we abide in him and he in us, because he has given us of his Spirit.

name: Epistle of James
text: And we have seen and do testify that the Father has sent the Son the Saviour of the world.

name: Epistle of James
text: Whoever confesses that Jesus is the Son of God, God abides in him and he in God.

name: Epistle of James
text: And we have known and have believed the love that God has in us. God is love, and he that abides in love abides in God and God in him.

name: Epistle of James
text: In this has been perfected the love with us, that we may have boldness in the day of judgment, because as he is we also are in this world.

name: Epistle of James
text: Fear is not in love, but perfect love casts out fear, because fear has punishment, but he that fears is not made perfect in love.

name: Epistle of James
text: We love, because he first loved us.

name: Epistle of James
text: If any one say: I love God, and hate his brother, he is a liar; for he that loves not his brother, whom he has seen, God, whom he has not seen, how can he love?

name: Epistle of James
text: And this commandment have we from him, that he that loves God loves his brother also.

name: Epistle of James
text: John 5

name: Epistle of James
text: Every one that believes that Jesus is the Christ, has been begotten of God; and every one that loves him that begot, loves him also that has been begotten of him.

name: Epistle of James
text: In this we know that we love the children of God, when we love God

name: Epistle of James
text: For this is the love of God, that we keep his commandments; and his commandments are not burdensome,

name: Epistle of James
text: because all that has been begotten of God overcomes the world; and this is the victory that overcomes the world, our faith.

name: Epistle of James
text: Who is he that overcomes the world but he that believes that Jesus is the Son of God?

name: Epistle of James
text: This is he that came through water and blood, Jesus Christ: not in the water only, but in the water and in the blood; and it is the Spirit that testifies, because the Spirit is the truth.

name: Epistle of James
text: For they that testify are three,

name: Epistle of James
text: the Spirit, and the water, and the blood, and the three are one.* * Testify the same thing

name: Epistle of James
text: If we receive the testimony of men, the testimony of God is greater; because this is the testimony of God that he has testified concerning his Son.

name: Epistle of James
text: He that believes on the Son of God has the testimony in himself: he that believes not God has made him a liar, because he has not believed on the testimony that God has testified concerning his Son.

name: Epistle of James
text: And this is the testimony, that God gave us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.

name: Epistle of James
text: He that has the Son has the life: he that has not the Son of God has not the life.

name: Epistle of James
text: These things have I written to you that you may know that you have eternal life, who believe on the name of the Son of God.

name: Epistle of James
text: And this is the confidence that we have towards him, that if we ask anything according to his will, he hears us.

name: Epistle of James
text: And if we know that he hears us as to whatever we ask, we know that we have the petition that we have asked of him.

name: Epistle of James
text: If any one see his brother sinning a sin not to death, he shall ask, and shall give him life, to those that sin not to death. There is a sin to death: not concerning this do I say that he should ask.

name: Epistle of James
text: All unrighteousness is sin, and there is a sin not to death.

name: Epistle of James
text: We know that every one that has been begotten of God sins not; but he that has been begotten of God keeps himself, and the wicked one touches him not.

name: Epistle of James
text: We know that we are of God, and the whole world lies in the wicked one.

name: Epistle of James
text: We know, however, that the Son of God has come, and has given us understanding, that we know him that is true; and we are in him that is true, in his Son Jesus Christ: This is the true God and life eternal.

name: Epistle of James
text: Little children, keep yourselves from idols.430 Epistle of John 2nd

name: According to John
text: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.

name: According to John
text: He was in the beginning with God.

name: According to John
text: All things came into being through him, and without him came into being not one thing that is in being.

name: According to John
text: In him is life, and the life was the light of men.

name: According to John
text: And the light shines in darkness, and the darkness comprehended it not.

name: According to John
text: There came a man, sent from God; his name was John:

name: According to John
text: this man came for a testimony, that he might testify of the light, that all through him might believe.

name: According to John
text: He was not the light, but came that he might testify of the light.

name: According to John
text: That was the true light, which, coming into the world, gives light to every man.

name: According to John
text: He was in the world, and the world came into being through him, and the world knew him not.

name: According to John
text: He came to his own country, and his own people received him not.

name: According to John
text: But as many as received him, to them gave he the right to become children of God, to those that believe on his name,

name: According to John
text: who were born not of blood, nor of the will of the flesh, nor of the will of a man, but of God.

name: According to John
text: And the Word became flesh, and tabernacled among us, and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the Only Begotten of the Father, full of grace and truth.

name: According to John
text: John testified of him and cried, saying: This was he of whom I said: He that comes after me has been advanced before me, because he was before me.

name: According to John
text: For of his fullness have we all received, and grace for grace;

name: According to John
text: for the law was given through Moses, the grace and the truth came through Jesus Christ.

name: According to John
text: No one has seen God at any time; the only begotten Son, who is in the bosom of the Father, he has made him known.

name: According to John
text: And the testimony of John is this, when the Jews of Jerusalem sent priests and Levites to ask him: Who art thou?

name: According to John
text: And he confessed and denied not, and confessed: I am not the Christ.

name: According to John
text: And they asked him: What then? Art thou Elijah? He said: I am not. Art thou the prophet? and he answered: No.

name: According to John
text: They then said to him: Who art thou? that we may give an answer

name: According to John
text: He replied: I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness: Make straight the way of the Lord, as said Isaiah the prophet.

name: According to John
text: And some had been sent from the Pharisees,

name: According to John
text: and they asked him, and said to him: Why then dost thou baptize, if thou art not the Christ, nor Elijah, nor the prophet?

name: According to John
text: John answered them, saying: I baptize in water: in the midst of you there stands whom you know not,

name: According to John
text: he that comes after me, the latchet of whose sandal I am not worthy to loose.

name: According to John
text: These things were done in Bethany beyond the Jordan, where John was baptizing.

name: According to John
text: On the next day he sees Jesus coming to him, and says: Behold, the Lamb of God, that takes away the sin of the world.

name: According to John
text: This is he of whom I said: After me comes a man who has been advanced before me, because he was before me.

name: According to John
text: And I knew him not, but that he might be manifested to Israel, therefore have I come baptizing in water.

name: According to John
text: And John testified, saying: I saw the Spirit descending, like a dove, from heaven, and it abode upon him.

name: According to John
text: And I knew him not, but he that sent me to baptize in water, he said to me: On whom thou shalt see the Spirit descending and abiding on him, this is he that baptizeth in the Holy Spirit.

name: According to John
text: And I have seen, and I have testified that this is the Son of God.

name: According to John
text: On the next day again John stood, and two of his disciples,

name: According to John
text: and looking upon Jesus as he was walking, he says: Behold, the Lamb of God!

name: According to John
text: The two disciples heard him speaking, and followed Jesus.

name: According to John
text: Jesus turned and saw them following, and said to them:

name: According to John
text: What seek you? They said to him: Rabbi (which is called, when translated, Teacher), where abidest thou?

name: According to John
text: He says to them: Come and see. They came therefore and saw where he abode, and continued with him that day: it was about the tenth hour.

name: According to John
text: It was Andrew, the brother of Simon Peter, one of the two that had heard from John and followed him:

name: According to John
text: he first finds his own brother Simon and says to him: We have found the Messiah, which is, translated, Christ.

name: According to John
text: He brought him to Jesus. Looking upon him, Jesus said: Thou art Simon the son of Joanna: thou shalt be called Cephas, which is, translated. Peter.

name: According to John
text: On the next day he wished to go forth into Galilee, and found Philip. And Jesus said to him: Follow me.

name: According to John
text: But Philip was from Bethsaida, of the city of Andrew and Peter.166

name: According to John
text: Philip finds Nathaniel, and says to him: We have found him of whom wrote Moses in the law, and the prophets, Jesus, who is of Nazareth, the son of Joseph.

name: According to John
text: Nathaniel said to him: Can any thing good come out of Nazareth? Philip says to him: Come and see.

name: According to John
text: Jesus saw Nathaniel coming to him, and said concerning him: Behold an Israelite indeed, in whom there is no guile.

name: According to John
text: Nathaniel said to him: Whence knowest thou me? Jesus answered and said to him: Before Philip called thee, whilst thou wast under the fig tree, I saw thee.

name: According to John
text: Nathaniel answered him: Rabbi, thou art the Son of God, thou art King of Israel.

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered and said to him: Because I said to thee that I saw thee under the fig tree, believest thou? Thou shalt see greater things than these.

name: According to John
text: And he said to him: Verily, verily, I say to you, you shall see heaven opened, and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man.

name: According to John
text: And on the third day a marriage took place in Cana of Galilee, and the mother of Jesus was there;

name: According to John
text: and Jesus also was called, and his disciples, to the marriage.

name: According to John
text: And they had no wine, because the wine of the marriage feast had failed. Then said the mother of Jesus to him: They have no wine.

name: According to John
text: Jesus said to her: Woman, what have I to do with thee? My hour has not yet come.

name: According to John
text: His mother said to the waiters: Whatever he says to you, do.

name: According to John
text: And according to the purification of the Jews, there were lying there six water vessels of stone, containing two or three baths each.

name: According to John
text: Jesus says to them: Fill the water vessels with water. And they filled them to the brim.

name: According to John
text: And he says to them: Draw out now, and carry to the master of the feast. And they carried it.

name: According to John
text: But when the master of the feast had tasted the water that had been made wine, and knew not whence it was, but the waiters that drew the water knew, the master of the feast called the bridegroom,

name: According to John
text: and said to him: Every man at the first sets out the good wine; and when they have become drunk, the inferior: thou hast kept the good wine till now.

name: According to John
text: This beginning of signs did Jesus in Cana of Galilee, and manifested his glory, and his disciples believed on him.

name: According to John
text: After this he went down to Capernaum, he and his mother and his

name: According to John
text: And the Passover of the Jews was near, and Jesus went up to Jerusalem.

name: According to John
text: And he found in the temple those that sold oxen, and sheep, and doves, and the moneychangers sitting;

name: According to John
text: and having made a scourge of cords, he drove all out of the temple, the sheep also and the oxen, and poured out the money of the money-changers, and overturned the tables;

name: According to John
text: and to those that sold doves he said: Take these things hence; make not my Father’s house a house of merchandise.

name: According to John
text: The disciples remembered that it is written: Zeal for thy house consumes me.

name: According to John
text: The Jews then answered and said to him: What sign showest thou to us, that thou doest these things?

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered and said to them: Destroy this temple, and in three days I will raise it up.

name: According to John
text: The Jews therefore said: Forty and six years was this temple in building, and in three days wilt thou raise it up?

name: According to John
text: But he spoke of the temple of his body.

name: According to John
text: When therefore he had risen from the dead, his disciples remembered that he had said this, and they believed the Scripture and the word that Jesus had spoken.

name: According to John
text: But when he was in Jerusalem on the Passover on the feast, many believed on his name, seeing his signs which he did;

name: According to John
text: but Jesus did not trust himself to them, because he knew all men,

name: According to John
text: and because he had no need that any one should testify concerning man; for he himself knew what was in man.

name: According to John
text: But there was a man of the Pharisees, his name was Nicodemus, a ruler of the Jews;

name: According to John
text: he came to him by night and said to him: Rabbi, we know that from God thou hast come as a teacher; for no one can do these signs that thou doest, unless God be with him.

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered and said to him: Verily, verily, I say to thee, unless a man be born again, he cannot see the kingdom of God.

name: According to John
text: Nicodemus says to him: How can a man be born when he is old? Can he enter the second time into his mother’s womb and be born?

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered: Verily, verily, I say to thee, Unless a man be born of water and the Spirit, he cannot enter into the kingdom of the heavens.

name: According to John
text: That which is born of the flesh is flesh, and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit.

name: According to John
text: Wonder not that I said to thee: You must be born again.168

name: According to John
text: The wind blows where it pleases, and the sound of it thou hearest, but thou knowest not whence it comes and whither it goes: so is every one that is born of the Spirit.

name: According to John
text: Nicodemus answered and said to him: How can these things take place?

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered and said to him: Art thou the teacher of Israel and knowest not these things?

name: According to John
text: Verily, verily, I say to thee, that which we know we speak, and that which we have seen we testify, and our testimony you receive not.

name: According to John
text: If I have told you earthly things and you believe not, how will you believe if I tell you of heavenly things?

name: According to John
text: And no one has ascended into heaven but he that came down from heaven, the Son of man, who is in heaven.

name: According to John
text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness, so must the Son of man be lifted up;

name: According to John
text: that every one that believes in him may have life eternal.

name: According to John
text: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whoever believes on him might not perish, but have life eternal.

name: According to John
text: For God sent not the Son into the world to condemn the world, hut that the world might be saved through him.

name: According to John
text: He that believes on him is not condemned: he that believes not is condemned already, because he has not believed on the name of the only begotten Son of God.

name: According to John
text: But the condemnation is this, that light has come into the world, and men loved darkness rather than light; for their works were evil.

name: According to John
text: For every one that does evil hates the light, and comes not to the light, lest his works may be reproved;

name: According to John
text: but he that does the truth comes to the light that his works may be made manifest that they are wrought in God.

name: According to John
text: After this came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judea, and there he abode with them and baptized.

name: According to John
text: But John also was baptizing in Enon near Salem, because much water was there; and they came and were baptized;

name: According to John
text: for not yet had John been cast into prison.

name: According to John
text: There arose therefore a discussion, on the part of some of the disciples of John, with a Jew, about purification.

name: According to John
text: And they came to John and said to him: Rabbi, he that was with thee beyond the Jordan, to whom thou hast testified, behold, he baptizes and all come to him.

name: According to John
text: John answered and said: A man cannot receive any thing unless it be given him from heaven.

name: According to John
text: You yourselves will testify for me that I said: I am not the Christ,

name: According to John
text: He that has the bride is the bridegroom; but the friend of the bridegroom, who stands and hears him, greatly rejoices because of the voice of the bridegroom. This my joy therefore has been fulfilled.

name: According to John
text: He must increase, but I must become less.

name: According to John
text: He that comes from above is over all: he that is of the earth is of the earth and speaks of the earth. He that comes from heaven

name: According to John
text: testifies of what he has seen and heard, and his testimony no one receives.

name: According to John
text: He that has received his testimony has attested that God is true.

name: According to John
text: For he whom God sent speaks the words of God; for not by measure does he give the Spirit.

name: According to John
text: The Father loves the Son, and has given all things into his hand.

name: According to John
text: He that believes on the Son has life eternal; he that believes not the Son shall not see life, but the wrath of God abides on him.

name: According to John
text: When therefore Jesus knew that the Pharisees had heard that Jesus was making and baptizing more disciples than John.

name: According to John
text: though Jesus himself baptized not, but his disciples baptized.

name: According to John
text: he left Judea and went away again into Galilee.

name: According to John
text: But he must needs go through Samaria.

name: According to John
text: He comes therefore to a city of Samaria called Sychar, near the place which Jacob gave to his son Joseph.

name: According to John
text: And Jacob’s well was there. Jesus then, having been wearied with the journey, sat thus on the well: it was about the sixth hour.

name: According to John
text: There comes a woman from Samaria to draw water. Jesus says to her: Give me to drink.

name: According to John
text: For his disciples had gone away into the city, to buy food,

name: According to John
text: The woman, who was a Samaritan, says to him: How dost thou, being a Jew, ask drink of me, who am a woman of Samaria?

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered and said to her: If thou hadst known the gift of God, and who he is that says to thee: Give me to drink, thou wouldst have asked of him, and he would have given thee living water.

name: According to John
text: The woman says to him: Sir, thou hast nothing to draw with, and the well is deep: whence hast thou the living water?

name: According to John
text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob, who gave us the well, and drank of it himself and his sons and his cattle?

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered and said to her: Everyone that drinks of this water shall thirst again;

name: According to John
text: but whoever shall drink of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst, but the water that I shall give him shall become in him a fountain of water springing up to life eternal.170

name: According to John
text: The woman says to him: Sir, give me this water, that I thirst not, neither come hither to draw.

name: According to John
text: He says to her: Go, call thy husband and come hither.

name: According to John
text: The woman answered and said: I have no husband, Jesus says to her: Well hast thou said: I have no husband;

name: According to John
text: for thou hast had five husbands, and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband. This thou hast spoken truly.

name: According to John
text: The woman says to him: Sir, I perceive that thou art a prophet.

name: According to John
text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain; and you say that in Jerusalem is the place where we ought to worship.

name: According to John
text: Jesus says to her: Believe me, woman, that the hour comes when neither in this mountain, nor in Jerusalem, shall you worship the Father.

name: According to John
text: You worship you know not what; we worship what we know, for salvation is of the Jews;

name: According to John
text: but the hour comes and now is, when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth; for the Father seeks such to worship him.

name: According to John
text: God is spirit; and they that worship must worship in spirit and truth.

name: According to John
text: The woman says to him: I know that Messiah comes, who is called Christ: when he has come, he will tell us all things.

name: According to John
text: Jesus says to her: I that speak to thee am he.

name: According to John
text: And on this came his disciples, and wondered that he talked with the woman: no one, however, said: What seekest thou or why talkest thou with her?

name: According to John
text: The woman therefore left her water-pot and went away into the city, and said to the men:

name: According to John
text: Come, see a man that has told me all things that I have done; is this the Christ?

name: According to John
text: They went forth from the city and came to him.

name: According to John
text: In n the meantime his disciples besought him, saying: Rabbi, eat.

name: According to John
text: But he said to them: I have food to eat that you know not of.

name: According to John
text: Then said the disciples one to another: Has any one brought him food?

name: According to John
text: Jesus says to them: My food is to do the will of him that sent me, and finish his work.

name: According to John
text: Say you a not that there are yet four months, and harvest comes? Behold, I say to you, lift up your eyes and behold the fields, that they are white for the harvest.

name: According to John
text: Already he that reaps receives reward and gathers fruit for eternal

name: According to John
text: For in this is the saying true, that there is one that sows and another that reaps.

name: According to John
text: I have sent you to reap that on which you have not labored: others have labored, and you have entered into their labor.

name: According to John
text: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him because of the word of the woman who testified that he told me all things that I had done.

name: According to John
text: When therefore the Samaritans came to him, they besought him to abide with them; and he abode; there two days.

name: According to John
text: And many more believed because of his word,

name: According to John
text: and said to the woman: We no longer believe because of thy saying; for we ourselves have heard, and know that this is in truth the Saviour of the world.

name: According to John
text: But after the two days he went forth thence into Galilee.

name: According to John
text: For Jesus himself testified that a prophet has no honor in his own country.

name: According to John
text: When therefore he came into Galilee, the Galileans received him, having seen all things that he did in Jerusalem at the feast; for they also had come to the feast.

name: According to John
text: He came then again into Cana of Galilee, where he had made the water wine. And there was in Capernaum a nobleman, whose son was sick;

name: According to John
text: he, hearing that Jesus had come out of Judea into Galilee, came to him, and besought him that he would come down and restore his son to health; for he was about to die.

name: According to John
text: Jesus therefore said to him: Unless you see signs and wonders, you will not believe.

name: According to John
text: The nobleman said to him: Sir, come down before my child die.

name: According to John
text: Jesus said to him: Go, thy son lives. The man believed the word that Jesus had spoken to him, and went.

name: According to John
text: And as he was now going down, his servants met him and told him: Thy son lives.

name: According to John
text: He then inquired of them the hour in which he began to mend: they then said to him: Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him.

name: According to John
text: The father therefore knew that it was in that hour in which Jesus had said to him: Thy son lives; and he himself believed and all his house.

name: According to John
text: This again is the second sign that Jesus did on coming out of Judea into Galilee.

name: According to John
text: After this was the feast of the Jews, and Jesus went up to Jerusalem.172

name: According to John
text: And there is in Jerusalem at the sheep gate a pool, which is called in Hebrew, Bethesda, having five porches.

name: According to John
text: In these lay a multitude of sick persons, blind, lame, withered.

name: According to John
text: But there was a man there that had been sick thirty-eight years.

name: According to John
text: Jesus saw him lying, and, knowing that he had already been sick a long time, said to him: Wilt thou be restored to health?

name: According to John
text: The sick man answered him: Sir, I have no man, that when the water is stirred he may put me into the pool; but while I am coming another goes down before me.

name: According to John
text: Jesus says to him: Arise, take up thy bed, and walk.

name: According to John
text: And the man was restored to health, and took up his bed and walked; but a sabbath was on that day.

name: According to John
text: The Jews then said to him that had been cured: It is a sabbath, and it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed.

name: According to John
text: He answered them: He that made me well said to me: Take up thy bed and walk.

name: According to John
text: They asked him: Who is the man that said to thee: Take up and walk?

name: According to John
text: But the sick man knew not who he was; for Jesus had withdrawn, as a multitude was in the place.

name: According to John
text: After this Jesus finds him in the temple; and he said to him: Behold, thou hast been restored to health: sin no more, lest something worse befall thee.

name: According to John
text: The man went away and told the Jews that it was Jesus that had made him well.

name: According to John
text: And for this reason the Jews persecuted Jesus, because he did these things on the sabbath.

name: According to John
text: But he answered them: My Father works till now, and I work.

name: According to John
text: For this reason did the Jews seek the more to kill him, because he not only broke the sabbath, but also called God his own Father, making himself equal to God.

name: According to John
text: Jesus therefore answered and said to them: Verily, verily, I say to you, The Son can do nothing of himself, but what he sees the Father do; for whatever he does, these also the Son does in like manner,

name: According to John
text: For the Father loves the Son and shows him all things that he himself does; and greater works than these will he show him, that you may wonder.

name: According to John
text: For as the Father raises the dead and makes them alive, so also the Son makes alive whom he will.

name: According to John
text: For neither does the Father judge any one, but has given all

name: According to John
text: that all may honor the Son as they honor the Father. He that honors not the Son honors not the Father who sent him.

name: According to John
text: Verily, verily, I say to you, that he that hears my word and believes on him that sent me has life eternal, and comes not into condemnation, but has passed out of death into life.

name: According to John
text: Verily, verily, I say to you, that the hour comes, and now is, when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God, and they that hear shall live.

name: According to John
text: For as the Father has life in himself, so has he given to the Son also to have life in himself.

name: According to John
text: And he has given him authority to execute judgment, because he is the Son of man.

name: According to John
text: Wonder not at this, for the hour comes in which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice,

name: According to John
text: and shall come forth, those that have done good, to the resurrection of life; those that have done evil, to the resurrection of condemnation.

name: According to John
text: I can do nothing of myself: as I hear I judge, and my judgment is righteous, because I seek not my will, but the will of him that sent me.

name: According to John
text: If I testify of myself, my testimony is not true:

name: According to John
text: there is another that testifies of me, and you know that the testimony which he testifies of me is true.

name: According to John
text: You have sent to John, and he has testified to the truth;

name: According to John
text: but I receive not testimony from man, but these things I say that you may be saved.

name: According to John
text: He was the burning and the shining light, and you were willing to rejoice for an hour in his light.

name: According to John
text: But I have testimony greater than that of John; for the works which the Father has given me to accomplish, the works themselves that I do, testify of me that the Father has sent me.

name: According to John
text: And the Father who sent me, he has testified of me: neither his voice have you heard at any time, nor his shape have you seen,

name: According to John
text: and his word you have not abiding in you, for whom he has sent, him you believe not.

name: According to John
text: You search the scriptures, because you think that in them you have eternal life, and they are they that testify of me;

name: According to John
text: and yet you will not come to me that you may have life.

name: According to John
text: I receive not glory from men,

name: According to John
text: but I know you, that you have not the love of God in you.

name: According to John
text: I have come in my Father’s name, and you receive me not: if another should come in his own name, him you would receive.174

name: According to John
text: How can you believe while receiving glory one from another, and you seek not the glory that is from the only God?

name: According to John
text: Think not that I will accuse you to the Father: there is he that accuses you, Moses, in whom you trust.

name: According to John
text: For if you had believed Moses, you would have believed me; for he wrote of me.

name: According to John
text: But if you believe not his writings, how will you believe my words?

name: According to John
text: After this Jesus went away beyond the sea of Galilee, which is the sea of Tiberias;

name: According to John
text: and a great multitude followed him because they saw the signs that he did in case of the sick.

name: According to John
text: But Jesus went up into the mountain, and there he sat with his disciples.

name: According to John
text: And the Passover, the feast of the Jews, was near.

name: According to John
text: Jesus then, lifting up his eyes and seeing that a great multitude was coming to him, said to Philip: Whence can we buy bread, that these may eat?

name: According to John
text: But this he said to try him; for he himself knew what he was about to do.

name: According to John
text: Philip answered him: Two hundred denarii worth of bread is not enough for these, that each one may take some little.

name: According to John
text: One of his disciples, Andrew, the brother of Simon Peter, says to him:

name: According to John
text: There is a lad here who has five barley loaves and two little fishes; but what are these among so many?

name: According to John
text: Jesus said: Make the men recline. And there was much grass in the place. The men therefore reclined, in number about five thousand.

name: According to John
text: Jesus therefore took the loaves, and gave thanks, and gave to those that reclined; in like manner also of the fishes as much as they wished.

name: According to John
text: But when they were filled, he said to his disciples: Gather up the broken pieces that remain, that nothing be lost.

name: According to John
text: They gathered them therefore, and filled twelve traveling-baskets with broken pieces from the five barley loaves, which remained after they had eaten.

name: According to John
text: The men therefore, seeing the sign that he had done, said: This is in truth the prophet that comes into the world.

name: According to John
text: Jesus then, knowing that they were about to come and seize him to make him king, fled again into the mountain himself alone.

name: According to John
text: and having entered a ship, were going beyond the sea to Capernaum. But darkness overtook them, and Jesus had not yet come to them:

name: According to John
text: the sea also arose, because a great wind was blowing.

name: According to John
text: Having rowed therefore about twenty-five or thirty furlongs, they see Jesus walking on the sea, and coming near the ship, and they were afraid.

name: According to John
text: But he said to them: It is I, be not afraid.

name: According to John
text: They then willingly received him into the ship, and immediately the ship was at the land to which they were going.

name: According to John
text: On the morrow the multitude that stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was no other little ship there but one, and that Jesus had not entered the ship with his disciples, but his disciples had gone away alone:

name: According to John
text: however, little ships had come from Tiberias, near the place where they ate bread when the Lord had given thanks.

name: According to John
text: When, therefore, the multitude saw that Jesus was not there, nor his disciples, they entered the little ships and came to Capernaum, seeking Jesus.

name: According to John
text: And having found him on the other side of the sea, they said to him: Rabbi, when earnest thou hither?

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered them and said: Verily, verily, I say to you, you seek me not because you saw the signs, but because you ate of the loaves and were filled.

name: According to John
text: Labor not for the food that perishes, but for the food that abides to life eternal, which the Son of man gives you; for him has God the Father attested.

name: According to John
text: They said therefore to him: What must we do that we may work the works of God?

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered and said to them: This is the work of God, that you believe on him whom he has sent.

name: According to John
text: They said then to him: What doest thou then as a sign, that we may see and believe thee; what workest thou?

name: According to John
text: Our fathers ate the manna in the wilderness, as it is written: Bread from heaven gave he them to eat.

name: According to John
text: Then said Jesus to them: Verily, verily, I say to you, Moses has not given you the bread from heaven; but my Father gives you the bread from heaven, the true.

name: According to John
text: For the bread which is God’s is he that comes down from heaven and gives life to the world.

name: According to John
text: They said therefore to him: Lord, always give us this bread.

name: According to John
text: Jesus then said to them: I am the bread of life: he that comes to me shall not hunger, and he that believes on me shall never thirst.

name: According to John
text: But I said to you that you have seen and do not believe.176

name: According to John
text: All that the Father gives me shall come to me, and him that comes to me I will not cast out;

name: According to John
text: for I have come down from heaven, not that I might do my will, but the will of him that sent me.

name: According to John
text: And this is the will of him that sent me, that I shall lose nothing of all that he has given me, but shall raise it up in the last day.

name: According to John
text: For this is the will of my Father, that whoever sees the Son and believes on him may have life eternal, and I shall raise him up in the last day.

name: According to John
text: The Jews therefore murmured concerning him, because he said: I am the bread that came down from heaven;

name: According to John
text: and they said: Is not this Jesus the son of Joseph, whose father and mother we know? How now says this man: I have come down from heaven?

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered and said to them: Murmur not among yourselves.

name: According to John
text: No one can come to me unless the Father who sent me draw him, and I will raise him up in the last day.

name: According to John
text: It is written in the prophets: And they shall all be taught of God: every one that has heard from the Father and has learned, comes to me.

name: According to John
text: Not that any one has seen the Father, but he that is from God, he has seen the Father.

name: According to John
text: Verily, verily, I say to you, he that believes has life eternal.

name: According to John
text: I am the bread of life.

name: According to John
text: Your fathers ate the manna in the wilderness and died:

name: According to John
text: this is the bread that comes down from heaven, that any one may eat of it and not die.

name: According to John
text: I am the living bread, that came down from heaven: if any one eat of my bread, he shall live forever; and the bread also that I will give for the life of the world, is my flesh.

name: According to John
text: The Jews then contended one with another, saying: How can this man give us his flesh to eat?

name: According to John
text: Jesus therefore said to them: Verily, verily, I say to you, unless you eat the flesh of the Son of man and drink his blood, you have no life in you.

name: According to John
text: He that eats my flesh and drinks my blood has life eternal, and I will raise him up in the, last day.

name: According to John
text: For my flesh is true food, and my blood is true drink.

name: According to John
text: He that eats my flesh and drinks my blood abides in me and I in him.

name: According to John
text: As the living Father sent me, and I live because of the Father, he

name: According to John
text: This is the bread that came down from heaven, not as the fathers ate and died: he that eats this bread shall live forever.

name: According to John
text: These things spoke he in the synagogue as he taught in Capernaum.

name: According to John
text: Therefore many of his disciples on hearing it said: A hard saying is this: who can hear it?

name: According to John
text: But Jesus, knowing in himself that his disciples murmured concerning this, said to them: Does this offend you?

name: According to John
text: If then you should see the Son of man ascending where he was before?

name: According to John
text: The spirit is that which makes alive; the flesh profits nothing: the words that I have spoken to you are spirit, and are life.

name: According to John
text: But there are some of you that believe not. For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not, and who it was that would deliver him up.

name: According to John
text: And he said: For this reason have I said to you that no one can come to me unless it be given him of the Father.

name: According to John
text: From this time therefore many of his disciples went back and walked no more with him.

name: According to John
text: Jesus then said to the twelve: Will you also go away?

name: According to John
text: Simon Peter answered him: Lord, to whom shall we go? The words of eternal life hast thou;

name: According to John
text: and we have believed and known that thou art the Holy One of God.

name: According to John
text: He answered them: Have I not chosen you twelve? and one of you is a devil.

name: According to John
text: But he spoke of Judas, son of Simon Tscariot; for he was about to deliver him up, being one of the twelve.

name: According to John
text: After this Jesus walked in Galilee; for he would not walk in Judea, because the Jews sought to kill him.

name: According to John
text: But the feast of the Jews, that of tabernacles, was near.

name: According to John
text: His brothers therefore said to him: Depart hence and go into Judea, that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest;

name: According to John
text: for no one does any thing in secret and desires himself to be known openly. If thou doest these things, make thyself manifest to the world.

name: According to John
text: For neither did his brothers believe on him.

name: According to John
text: Jesus says to them: My time is not yet present, but your time is always ready.

name: According to John
text: The world cannot hate you, but me it hates, because I testify of it that its works are evil.178

name: According to John
text: Do you go up to the feast: I go not up to this feast, because my time has not yet fully come.

name: According to John
text: Having said these things, he abode in Galilee.

name: According to John
text: But when his brothers had gone up to the feast, then he himself also went up, not openly, but in secret.

name: According to John
text: The Jews then sought for him at the feast, and said: Where is he?

name: According to John
text: And there was much murmuring concerning him among the multitude; some said: He is a good man: others said: No, but he deceives the multitude.

name: According to John
text: No one, however, spoke boldly concerning him, for fear of the Jews.

name: According to John
text: But now at the middle of the festival Jesus went up into the, temple and taught.

name: According to John
text: The Jews therefore were astonished, saying: How knows this man letters, not having learned?

name: According to John
text: Jesus then answered them and said: My teaching is not mine, but his that sent me:

name: According to John
text: if any one will do his will he shall know of the teaching, whether it is of God, or I speak of myself.

name: According to John
text: He that speaks of himself seeks his own glory: he that seeks the glory of him that sent him, he is true, and unrighteousness is not in him.

name: According to John
text: Has not Moses given you the law? and none of you does the law. Why do you seek to kill me?

name: According to John
text: The multitude answered: Thou hast a demon: who seekest to kill thee?

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered and said to them: One work I have done and you all wonder.

name: According to John
text: Moses has given you circumcision, not that it is of Moses, but of the fathers, and on the sabbath day you circumcise a man.

name: According to John
text: If a man receives circumcision on the sabbath, that the law of Moses may not be broken, are you angry with me because I restored the entire man to health on the sabbath?

name: According to John
text: Judge not, according to appearance, but judge righteous judgment.

name: According to John
text: Then said some of those of Jerusalem: Is not this he whom they seek to kill?

name: According to John
text: And lo, he speaks boldly, and they say nothing to him. Have the rulers then certainly known that this is the Christ?

name: According to John
text: However, we know this man, whence he is; but when the Christ comes, no one knows whence he is.

name: According to John
text: Jesus therefore cried out in the temple, teaching and saying: You both know me, and you know whence I am; and I have not come of

name: According to John
text: I know him, because I am from him and he sent me.

name: According to John
text: They therefore sought to take him, and no one laid his hand on him, because his hour had not yet come.

name: According to John
text: But many of the multitude believed on him, and said: When Christ comes, will he do more signs than these that this man does?

name: According to John
text: The Pharisees heard the multitude murmuring these things concerning him, and the chief priests and the Pharisees sent attendants that they might take him.

name: According to John
text: Therefore said Jesus: Yet a little while I am with you, and I go to him that sent me.

name: According to John
text: You shall seek me and shall not find me, and where I am you cannot come.

name: According to John
text: The Jews therefore said one to another: Whither does this man intend to go, that we shall not find him? Does he intend to go among the dispersion of the Greeks and teach the Greeks?

name: According to John
text: What means this word that he spoke: You shall seek me and shall not find me, and where I am, you cannot come?

name: According to John
text: But on the last day, the great day of the feast, Jesus stood and cried, saying: If any one thirst, let him come and drink.

name: According to John
text: He that believes on me, as the scripture said, out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water.

name: According to John
text: But this he spoke of the Spirit which those that believe on him were about to receive; for the Spirit was not yet, because Jesus had not yet been glorified.

name: According to John
text: Some of the multitude therefore, hearing these words, said: This is in truth the prophet;

name: According to John
text: others said: This is the Christ; others said: Does the Christ then come out of Galilee?

name: According to John
text: Has not the scripture said that the Christ comes of the posterity of David, and from Bethlehem, the town where David was?

name: According to John
text: There was therefore a division among the multitude, because of him;

name: According to John
text: but some of them wished to take him; no one, however, laid hands on him.

name: According to John
text: The attendants therefore came to the chief priests and Pharisees; and they said to them: Why did you not bring him?

name: According to John
text: The attendants answered: Never man so spoke, as this man speaks.

name: According to John
text: The Pharisees answered them: Are you also deceived?

name: According to John
text: Has any one of the rulers believed on him, or of the Pharisees?

name: According to John
text: But the multitude, that knows not the law, are cursed.

name: According to John
text: Nicodemus, being one of them, says to them:180

name: According to John
text: Does our law condemn the man unless it first hear from him and know what he does?

name: According to John
text: They answered and said to him: Art thou also of Galilee? Search and see that out of Galilee a prophet arises not. [John 7:53 – 8:11 is not found in the Sinaiticus. Anderson includes instead two versions or these verses – the first from codex D and the second a different account supposed by Griesbach to be a very probable omission.

name: According to John
text: And they went each one to his own house.

name: According to John
text: :1 But Jesus went into the mount of Olives.

name: According to John
text: And early in the morning he comes again into the temple, and all the people came to him.

name: According to John
text: And the scribes and the Pharisees bring a woman taken in sin, and having placed her in the midst.

name: According to John
text: the priests say to him, tempting him, that they may have an accusation against him: Teacher, this woman has been taken in adultery, in the very act.

name: According to John
text: Now, Moses in the law commanded us to stone such: but now what sayest thou?

name: According to John
text: But Jesus stooped down and with his finger wrote on the ground.

name: According to John
text: But as they continued asking, he lifted himself up and said to them: Let him that is without sin among you be the first to throw a stone at her.

name: According to John
text: And he again stooped down and with his finger wrote on the ground.

name: According to John
text: And each one of the Jews went out, beginning from the elder, so that all went out; and he was left alone, and the woman being in the midst. 10 And Jesus lifted himself up and said to the woman: Where are they? Has no one condemned thee?

name: According to John
text: And she said to him: No one, sir. And he said: Neither do I condemn thee; go, from this time sin no more.

name: According to John
text: :1 But Jesus went into the mount of Olives.

name: According to John
text: And early in the morning he came again into the temple, and all the people came to him, and he sat down and taught them.

name: According to John
text: And the scribes and the Pharisees bring to him a woman taken in adultery, and having placed her in the midst

name: According to John
text: they say to him: Teacher, this woman was taken in adultery, in

name: According to John
text: Now, in the law Moses commanded that such should be stoned: thou therefore, what sayest thou?

name: According to John
text: But this they said tempting him, that they might have to accuse him. But Jesus stooped down and with his finger wrote on the ground.

name: According to John
text: And as they continued asking him, he lifted himself up and said to them: He that is without sin among you, let him be the first to throw the stone at her.

name: According to John
text: And again he stooped down and wrote on the ground.

name: According to John
text: But they having heard, and being convicted by their conscience, went out one by one, beginning from the elder to the last; and Jesus was left alone, and the woman standing in the midst.

name: According to John
text: But Jesus lifted himself up, and seeing no one but the woman, said to her: Woman, where are, those thy accusers? Has no one condemned thee?

name: According to John
text: She said: No one, sir. And Jesus said to her: Neither do I condemn thee: go and sin no more.]

name: According to John
text: Again therefore Jesus spoke to them, saying: I am the Light of the world: he that follows me shall not walk in darkness, but shall have the light of life.

name: According to John
text: The Pharisees therefore said to him: Thou testifiest of thyself: thy testimony is not true.

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered and said to them: Though I testify of myself, my testimony is true, for I know whence I came and whither I go: you know not whence I come or whither I go.

name: According to John
text: You judge according to the flesh; I judge no one.

name: According to John
text: And even if I judge, my judgment is true, because I am not alone, but I and he that sent me.

name: According to John
text: And even in your law it is written that the testimony of two men is true.

name: According to John
text: I am one testifying of myself, and the Father who sent me testifies of me.

name: According to John
text: They said therefore to him: Where is thy Father? Jesus answered: You know neither me nor my Father: if you had known me, you would have known my Father also.

name: According to John
text: These words spoke he in the treasury while teaching in the temple; and no one took him, because his hour had not yet come.

name: According to John
text: He therefore said again to them: I go away, and you shall seek me, and in your sin you shall die: whither I go you cannot come.

name: According to John
text: The Jews then said: Will he kill himself, because he says: Whither I go you cannot come?

name: According to John
text: And he said to them: You are from beneath, I am from above: you are of this world, I am not of this world.182

name: According to John
text: Therefore said I to you that you shall die in your sins; for if you believe not that I am he, you shall die in your sins.

name: According to John
text: They said therefore to him: Who art thou? Jesus said to them: Altogether that which I also say to you.

name: According to John
text: I have many things to say and to judge of you; but he that sent me is true, and what I have heard from him, these things I speak unto the world.

name: According to John
text: They knew not that he spoke to them of the Father.

name: According to John
text: Then said Jesus: When you shall have, lifted up the Son of man, then you shall know that I am he, and that I do nothing of myself, but as the Father has taught me, I speak these things.

name: According to John
text: And he that sent me is with me: he has not left me alone, for I do always the things that are pleasing to him.

name: According to John
text: While he was speaking these things many believed on him.

name: According to John
text: Jesus then said to the Jews that believed on him: If you abide in my word, you are my disciples in truth,

name: According to John
text: and you shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you free.

name: According to John
text: They answered to him: We are Abraham’s posterity, and have never been in bondage to any one; how sayest thou: You shall become free?

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered them: Verily, verily, I say to you, that every one that does sin is a servant of sin.

name: According to John
text: But the servant abides not in the house forever: the Son abides forever.

name: According to John
text: If, then, the Son shall make you free, you shall be free indeed.

name: According to John
text: I know that you are Abraham’s posterity; but you seek to kill me, because my word has no place in you.

name: According to John
text: I speak what things I have seen with my Father, and you then do what things you have heard from your father.

name: According to John
text: They answered and said to him: Abraham is our father. Jesus says to them: If you were the children of Abraham, you would do the works of Abraham;

name: According to John
text: but now you seek to kill me, a man that has spoken to you the truth, which I heard from God: this Abraham did not.

name: According to John
text: You do the works of your fathers. They said to him: We have not been born of lewdness; we have one Father, God.

name: According to John
text: Jesus said to them: If God were your Father, you would love me; for I came forth from God and have come hither: nor indeed have I come of myself, but he sent me.

name: According to John
text: Why know you not my speech? because you cannot hear my word.

name: According to John
text: You are of your father, the devil, and the desires of your father you will do. He was a murderer from the beginning, and has not stood in the truth, because there is no truth in him. When he speaks what is

name: According to John
text: But because I tell you the truth, you believe me not.

name: According to John
text: Which of you convinces me of sin? If I speak the truth, why do you not believe me?

name: According to John
text: He that is of God hears the words of God; for this reason you hear not, because you are not of God.

name: According to John
text: The Jews answered and said to him: Do we not well say that thou art a Samaritan, and hast a demon?

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered: I have not a demon, but I honor my Father, and you dishonor me.

name: According to John
text: But I seek not my glory: there is that seeks and judges.

name: According to John
text: Verily, verily, I say to you, if any one keep my word, he shall never see death.

name: According to John
text: The Jews said to him: Now we know that thou hast a demon. Abraham is dead, and the prophets; and thou sayest: If any one keep my word, he shall never taste of death:

name: According to John
text: art thou greater than our father Abraham, who is dead? And the prophets are dead: whom makest thou thyself?

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered: If I glorify myself, my glory is nothing; it is my Father that glorifies me, of whom you say that he is your God;

name: According to John
text: and yet you have not known him, but I know him. If I should say that I do not know him, I should be a liar like you; but I know him, and his word I keep.

name: According to John
text: Abraham, your father, rejoiced that he could see my day, and he saw it and was glad.

name: According to John
text: The Jews then said to him: Thou art not yet fifty years old, and hast thou seen Abraham?

name: According to John
text: Jesus said to them: Verily, verily, I say to you, before Abraham came into being, I am.

name: According to John
text: They therefore took up stones to throw at him; but Jesus hid himself and went out of the temple.

name: According to John
text: And passing by he saw a man blind from his birth.

name: According to John
text: And his disciples asked him, saying: Rabbi, who sinned, this man or his parents, that he was born blind?

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered: Neither this man sinned nor his parents, but that the works of God might be manifested in him.

name: According to John
text: We must work the works of him that sent us while it is day: there comes night, when no man can work.

name: According to John
text: While I am in the world, I am the Light of the world.

name: According to John
text: He said these things, and spat on the ground, and made clay of the spittle, and anointed his eyes with the clay,184

name: According to John
text: and said to him: Go wash in the pool of Siloam, which is, translated. Sent. He went therefore and washed, and came seeing.

name: According to John
text: The neighbors therefore, and those that had seen him before, that he was a beggar, said: Is not this he that sat and begged?

name: According to John
text: Others said that this is he; others said: No, but he is like him. He said: I am he.

name: According to John
text: They therefore said to him: How were thy eyes opened?

name: According to John
text: He answered: The man that is called Jesus made clay and anointed my eyes, and said to me: Go to Siloam and wash. Having gone therefore and washed, I received sight.

name: According to John
text: They said to him: Where is he? He says: I know not.

name: According to John
text: They bring to the Pharisees him that was formerly blind.

name: According to John
text: And it was a sabbath on the day in which Jesus made clay and opened his eyes.

name: According to John
text: Again therefore the Pharisees also asked him how he had received sight. He said to them: He put clay upon my eyes and I washed and do see.

name: According to John
text: Some of the Pharisees therefore said: This man is not from God, for he keeps not the sabbath. Others said: How can a man a sinner do such signs? And there was a division among them.

name: According to John
text: They say therefore to the blind man again: What sayest thou of him, because he has opened thy eyes? He said: He is a prophet.

name: According to John
text: The Jews therefore did not believe concerning him, that he was blind and had received sight, till they had called the parents of him that had received sight,

name: According to John
text: and asked them, saying: Is this your son, of whom you say that he was born blind? How, then, does he now see?

name: According to John
text: His parents therefore answered and said: We know that this is our son, and that he was born blind;

name: According to John
text: but how he now sees we know not, or who opened his eyes we know not: ask him; he is of age: he shall speak for himself

name: According to John
text: These things said his parents because they feared the Jews; for the Jews had already agreed that if any one should confess him to be Christ, he should be put out of the synagogue.

name: According to John
text: For this reason his parents said that he is of age, ask him.

name: According to John
text: They therefore a second time called the man that had been blind, and said to him: Give glory to God: we know that this man is a sinner.

name: According to John
text: He then answered: If he is a sinner, I know not: one thing I know, that, being blind, I now see.

name: According to John
text: They said therefore to him: What did he for thee? How opened he thy eyes?

name: According to John
text: He answered them: I have told you already, and you did not hear:

name: According to John
text: They reviled him and said: Thou art a disciple of that man, but we are Moses’ disciples:

name: According to John
text: we know that God spoke to Moses, but this man, we know not whence he is.

name: According to John
text: The man answered and said to them: Why, in this is that which is wonderful, that you know not whence he is, and yet he has opened my eyes.

name: According to John
text: We know that God hears not sinners, but if any one be a worshiper of God and do his will, him he hears.

name: According to John
text: Never was it heard that any one opened the eyes of one that had been born blind:

name: According to John
text: if this man were not of God, he could do nothing.

name: According to John
text: They answered and said to him: Thou wast altogether born in sins, and dost thou teach us? And they cast him out.

name: According to John
text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out, and he found him and said: Dost thou believe on the Son of man?

name: According to John
text: He answered and said: And who is he, Lord, that I may believe on him?

name: According to John
text: Jesus said to him: Thou hast both seen him, and he it is that talks with thee.

name: According to John
text: He said, Lord, I believe; and he worshiped him.

name: According to John
text: And Jesus said: For judgment have I come into this world, that those that see not may see, and that those that see may become blind.

name: According to John
text: Some of the Pharisees that were with him heard, and said to him: Are we also blind?

name: According to John
text: Jesus said to them: If you were blind, you would not have sin; but now you say: We see: your sin remains.

name: According to John
text: Verily, verily, I say to you, he that enters not through the door into the sheepfold, but goes up by some other way, he is a thief and a robber:

name: According to John
text: but he that enters through the door is the shepherd of the sheep.

name: According to John
text: To him the porter opens, and the sheep hear his voice, and he calls his own sheep by name and leads them out.

name: According to John
text: When he puts forth all of his own sheep, he goes before them, and the sheep follow him, because they know his voice;

name: According to John
text: but a stranger they will not follow, but flee from him, because they know not the voice of strangers.

name: According to John
text: This parable spoke Jesus to them; but they knew not what things they were that he spoke to them.

name: According to John
text: Jesus therefore said: Verily, verily, I say to you: I am the door of the sheep.186

name: According to John
text: All as many as have come are thieves and robbers, but the sheep did not hear them.

name: According to John
text: I am the door: through me if any man enter in, he shall be saved, and shall go in and out, and find pasture.

name: According to John
text: The thief comes not but that he may steal and kill and destroy: I have come that they may have life, and have it abundantly.

name: According to John
text: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep:

name: According to John
text: he that is a hireling and not a shepherd, to whom the sheep do not belong, sees the wolf coming and leaves the sheep and flees, and the wolf seizes and scatters them,

name: According to John
text: because he is a hireling, and cares not for the sheep.

name: According to John
text: I am the good shepherd, and know mine, and mine know me,

name: According to John
text: as the Father knows me and I know the Father; and I lay down my life for the sheep.

name: According to John
text: And other sheep I have, which are not of this fold: them also must I bring, and they shall hear my voice, and there shall be one fold, one shepherd.

name: According to John
text: For this reason my Father loves me, because I lay down my life, that I may take it again.

name: According to John
text: No one takes it from me, but I lay it down of myself. Authority have I to lay it down, and authority have I to take it again: this commandment I received from my Father.

name: According to John
text: There arose again a division among the Jews because of these words.

name: According to John
text: Therefore many of them said: He has a demon and is mad; why hear him?

name: According to John
text: Others said: These words are not of one that has a demon: can a demon open the eyes of the blind?

name: According to John
text: But the feast of dedication was held in Jerusalem; it was winter;

name: According to John
text: and Jesus was walking in the temple, in Solomon’s porch.

name: According to John
text: The Jews therefore came around him and said to him: How long dost thou keep us in suspense? If thou art the Christ, tell us plainly.

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered: I have told you, and you do not believe: the works

name: According to John
text: that I do in my Father’s name, these testify of me;

name: According to John
text: but you believe not, because you are not of my sheep.

name: According to John
text: My sheep hear my voice, and I know them, and they follow me,

name: According to John
text: and I give them eternal life, and they shall never perish, and no one shall snatch them out of my hand.

name: According to John
text: What the Father has given to me is greater than all, and no one can snatch them out of the Father’s hand.

name: According to John
text: I and the Father are one.

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered them: Many good works have I shown you from the Father; for what one of these do you stone me?

name: According to John
text: The Jews answered him: For a good work we stone thee not, but for blasphemy, and because thou, being man, makest thyself God.

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered them: Is it not written in your law, I said: You are gods?

name: According to John
text: If he called them gods, to whom the word of God came, and the Scripture cannot be broken:

name: According to John
text: of him whom the Father sanctified and sent into the world, say you: Thou blasphemest; because I said: I am the Son of God?

name: According to John
text: If I do not the works of my Father, believe me not;

name: According to John
text: but if I do, although you believe not me, believe the works, that you may know and acknowledge that the Father is in me and I in the Father.

name: According to John
text: They then sought to take him, and he went forth from their hand.

name: According to John
text: And he went away again beyond the Jordan into the place where John was first baptizing, and abode there.

name: According to John
text: And many came to him and said: John indeed did no sign, but all things whatever John said of this man were true.

name: According to John
text: And many believed on him there.

name: According to John
text: And it was Mary that anointed the Lord with ointment, and wiped his feet with her hair, whose brother Lazarus was sick.

name: According to John
text: The sisters therefore sent to him, saying: Lord, behold, he whom thou lovest is sick.

name: According to John
text: But Jesus hearing it, said: This sickness is not to death, but for the glory of God, that the Son of God may be glorified through it.

name: According to John
text: Now, Jesus loved Martha and her sister and Lazarus.

name: According to John
text: When therefore he had heard that he was sick, then indeed he abode two days in the place where he was:

name: According to John
text: then after this he says to the disciples: Let us go into Judea again.

name: According to John
text: The disciples say to him: Rabbi, the Jews just now sought to stone thee, and goest thou thither again?

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered: Are there not twelve hours of the day? If any one walk in the day, he stumbles not, because he sees the light of the world:

name: According to John
text: if any one walk in the night, he stumbles, because the light is not in him.

name: According to John
text: These things said he, and after this he says to them: Our friend Lazarus has fallen asleep; but I go that I may awake him.188

name: According to John
text: Then the disciples said to him: Lord, if he has fallen asleep, he shall be saved.

name: According to John
text: Jesus, however, had spoken of his death; but they supposed that he spoke of the rest of sleep.

name: According to John
text: Therefore Jesus then said to them plainly: Lazarus is dead;

name: According to John
text: and I rejoice for your sakes, in order that you may believe, that I was not there; but let us go to him.

name: According to John
text: Thomas, who is called Didymus, then said to his fellow-disciples: Let I us also go, that we may die with him.

name: According to John
text: Jesus came therefore and found that he had been four days in the tomb.

name: According to John
text: But Bethany was near Jerusalem, about fifteen furlongs off.

name: According to John
text: And many of the Jews had come to Martha and Mary and their friends, to comfort them concerning their brother.

name: According to John
text: Martha therefore, when she heard that Jesus was coming, met him; but Mary sat in the house.

name: According to John
text: Martha therefore said to Jesus: Lord, if thou hadst been here, my brother would not have died.

name: According to John
text: And now I know that whatever things thou shalt ask of God, God will give thee.

name: According to John
text: Jesus says to her: Thy brother shall rise.

name: According to John
text: Martha says to him: I know that he will rise in the resurrection, in the last day.

name: According to John
text: Jesus said to her: I am the resurrection and the life; he that believes on me, though he were dead, he shall live,

name: According to John
text: and whoever lives and believes on me shall never die: believest thou this?

name: According to John
text: She says to him: Yes, Lord: I have believed that thou art the Christ, the Son of God, he that comes into the world.

name: According to John
text: And after saying this she went away and called Mary her sister secretly, saying: The Teacher is present, and calls for thee.

name: According to John
text: When she heard, she rose quickly and came to him;

name: According to John
