text: but Jesus had not yet come into the village, but was in the place where Martha had met him.

name: According to John
text: Therefore the Jews that were with her in the house, and were comforting her, seeing Mary, that she rose up quickly and went out, followed her, supposing that she was going to the tomb, that she might weep there.

name: According to John
text: Mary therefore, when she came where Jesus was, seeing him, fell at his feet, saying to him: Lord, if thou hadst been here, my brother would not have died.

name: According to John
text: Jesus therefore, when he saw her weeping and the Jews that came

name: According to John
text: and said: Where have you laid him? They say to him: Lord, come and see.

name: According to John
text: Jesus wept.

name: According to John
text: Therefore said the Jews: See how he loved him.

name: According to John
text: But some of them said: Could not this man, that opened the eyes of the blind man, have caused that even this man should not die?

name: According to John
text: Jesus therefore, again greatly moved within himself, comes to the tomb; but it was a cave, and a stone lay upon it.

name: According to John
text: Jesus says: Take away the stone. Martha, the sister of him that had died, says to him: Lord, the smell is now offensive; for he has been dead four days.

name: According to John
text: Jesus says to her: Did I not tell thee that if thou wouldst believe thou shouldst see the glory of God?

name: According to John
text: They therefore took away the stone; but Jesus lifted up his eyes and said: Father, I thank thee that thou hast heard me.

name: According to John
text: But I knew that thou always hearest me; but yet, on account of the multitude that stands around, I said it, that they may believe that thou didst send me.

name: According to John
text: And having said these things, he cried with a loud voice: Lazarus, come forth.

name: According to John
text: And he that had been dead came forth, bound hands and feet with swathing bands; and his face was bound around with a handkerchief. Jesus says to them: Loose him, and let him go.

name: According to John
text: Many therefore of the Jews, that had come to Mary and had seen what he did, believed on him;

name: According to John
text: but some of them went away to the Pharisees and told them what Jesus had done.

name: According to John
text: Therefore the chief priests and the Pharisees brought together the Sanhedrim, and said: What do we, for this man does many signs?

name: According to John
text: If we let him alone thus, all will believe on him; and the Romans will come and take away both our place and nation.

name: According to John
text: But a certain one of them, Caiaphas, being chief priest that year, said to them: You know nothing,

name: According to John
text: neither do you consider that it is profitable for us that one man die for the people and not that the whole nation perish.

name: According to John
text: But this he spoke not of himself, but, being chief priest that year, he prophesied that Jesus was about to die for the nation;

name: According to John
text: and not for the nation only, but that he might gather into one the children of God also, that were scattered abroad.

name: According to John
text: From that day therefore they took counsel to kill him.

name: According to John
text: Jesus then no longer walked openly among the Jews; but went away thence into the country near the wilderness, to a city called Ephraim; and there he abode with his disciples.190

name: According to John
text: But the passover of the Jews was near, and many went up from the country to Jerusalem before the passover, that they might purify themselves.

name: According to John
text: They therefore sought Jesus and said among themselves while standing in the temple: What think you, that he will not come to the feast?

name: According to John
text: But the chief priests and the Pharisees had given commandments that, if any knew where he was, he should make it known, in order that they might take him.

name: According to John
text: Jesus therefore, six days before the passover, came to Bethany, where Lazarus was, whom Jesus raised from the dead.

name: According to John
text: They therefore made him a supper there, and Martha served, but Lazarus was one of those that reclined at table with him.

name: According to John
text: Then Mary took a pound of the ointment of pure nard, very costly, and anointed the feet of Jesus, and wiped his feet with her hair; and the house was filled with the perfume of the ointment.

name: According to John
text: But Judas Iscariot, one of his disciples, he that was about to deliver him up, says:

name: According to John
text: Why was this ointment not sold for three hundred denarii, and given to the poor?

name: According to John
text: But this he said, not because he cared for the poor, but because he was a thief, and having the bag he carried what was thrown in.

name: According to John
text: Jesus therefore said: Let her alone; she bought it that she might keep it to the day of my burial.

name: According to John
text: For the poor you have always with you, but me you have not always.

name: According to John
text: The great multitude of the Jews therefore knew that he was there, and came not because of Jesus only, but that they might see Lazarus also, whom he raised from the dead.

name: According to John
text: But the chief priests had determined that they would kill Lazarus also,

name: According to John
text: because many of the Jews, on account of him, went away and believed on Jesus.

name: According to John
text: On the next day a great multitude that had come to the feast, hearing that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem.

name: According to John
text: took branches of palm-trees and went forth to meet him, and cried: Hosanna, blessed is he that comes in the name of the Lord, and blessed is the King of Israel.

name: According to John
text: But Jesus, finding a young ass, sat upon it, as it is written:

name: According to John
text: Fear not, daughter of Zion: behold, thy King comes sitting upon

name: According to John
text: These things his disciples knew not at first, but when Jesus had been glorified, then they remembered that these things were written of him, and that they had done these things for him.

name: According to John
text: The multitude that was with him therefore testified that he had called Lazarus from the tomb, and raised him from the dead.

name: According to John
text: For this reason also the multitude met him, because they heard that he had done this sign.

name: According to John
text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves: You see that you profit nothing: behold, the world has gone after him.

name: According to John
text: But of those that went up to worship at the feast, there were some Greeks:

name: According to John
text: these therefore came to Philip, who was of Bethsaida of Galilee, and asked him, saying: Sir, we wish to see Jesus.

name: According to John
text: Philip comes and tells Andrew: Andrew and Philip come and tell Jesus.

name: According to John
text: But Jesus answered them, saying: The hour has come that the Son of man should be glorified.

name: According to John
text: Verily, verily, I say to you, unless a grain of wheat fall into the ground and die, itself abides alone; but if it die, it brings forth much fruit.

name: According to John
text: He that loves his life shall lose it, and he that hates his life in this world shall keep it to life eternal.

name: According to John
text: If any one serve me, let him follow me, and where I am, there shall my servant also be: if any one serve me him will my Father honor.

name: According to John
text: Now is my soul troubled, and what; shall I say? Father, save me from this hour. But for this cause came I to this hour.

name: According to John
text: Father, glorify thy name. There came therefore a voice from heaven: I have glorified it, and will glorify it again.

name: According to John
text: Therefore the multitude that stood by, hearing it, said that it thundered: others said: An angel has spoken to him.

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered and said: Not for my sake came this voice, but for yours.

name: According to John
text: Now is the judgment of this world: now shall the prince of this world be cast out,

name: According to John
text: and I, when I shall have been lifted up from the earth, will draw all men to myself.

name: According to John
text: But this he said, signifying by what kind of death he was about to die.

name: According to John
text: Then the multitude answered him: We have heard out of the law that the Christ abides forever, and how sayest thou that the Son of man must be lifted up? Who is this, the Son of man?192

name: According to John
text: Jesus therefore said to them: Yet a little while the light is among you. Walk while you have the light, that darkness overtake you not; and he that walks in darkness knows not whither he goes.

name: According to John
text: While you have the light, believe on the light, that you may become sons of light. These things spoke Jesus and went away and hid himself from them.

name: According to John
text: But though he had done so many signs before them, they believed not on him.

name: According to John
text: that the word of Isaiah the prophet might be fulfilled, which he spoke: Lord, who of us has believed what is heard? and to whom has the arm of the Lord been revealed?

name: According to John
text: For this reason they could not believe, because Isaiah said again:

name: According to John
text: He has blinded their eyes and hardened their hearts, lest they should see with their eyes, and understand with their heart, and should turn and I should give them health.

name: According to John
text: These things said Isaiah, because he saw his glory, and spoke of him.

name: According to John
text: Yet however, of the rulers, many believed on him, but because of the Pharisees they did not confess, lest they should be put out of the synagogue;

name: According to John
text: for they loved the glory of men more than the glory of God.

name: According to John
text: But Jesus cried and said: He that believes on me believes not on me, but on him that sent me.

name: According to John
text: and he that sees me sees him that sent me.

name: According to John
text: I have come a light into the world, that whoever believes on me may not abide in darkness.

name: According to John
text: And if any one hear my words and keep them not, I judge him not; for I came not to judge the world, but to save the world.

name: According to John
text: He that rejects me and receives not my words, has that which judges him: the word that I have spoken, that shall judge him in the last day.

name: According to John
text: For I have not spoken of myself, but the Father who sent me, he himself has given me commandment what I should say and what I should speak.

name: According to John
text: And I know that his commandment is life eternal. What things therefore I speak, as the Father said to me, so I speak.

name: According to John
text: But before the feast of passover, Jesus, knowing that his hour had come that he should go out of this world to the Father, having loved his own that were in the world, he loved them to the end.

name: According to John
text: And when supper had ended, as the devil had already put into the

name: According to John
text: Jesus, knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands, and that he had come forth from God and was going to God,

name: According to John
text: rises from supper and lays aside his garments; and having taken a towel, he girded himself:

name: According to John
text: then he poured water into the basin, and began to wash the feet of the disciples, and to wipe them with the towel with which he was girded.

name: According to John
text: He then comes to Simon Peter; he says to him: Lord, dost thou wash my feet?

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered and said to him: What I am doing thou knowest not now, but thou shalt know after this.

name: According to John
text: Peter says to him: Thou shalt never wash my feet. Jesus answered him: Unless I wash thee, thou hast no part with me.

name: According to John
text: Simon Peter says to him: Lord, not my feet only, but also my hands and my head.

name: According to John
text: Jesus says to him: He that has bathed has no need to wash his hands and head, but is wholly clean; and you are clean, but not all.

name: According to John
text: For he knew him that would deliver him up; for this reason he said: Not all of you are clean.

name: According to John
text: When therefore he had washed their feet and had taken his garments, and reclined again at table, he said to them: Do you know what I have done for you?

name: According to John
text: You call me: Teacher and Lord, and you say well, for I am.

name: According to John
text: If, then, I, the Lord and the Teacher, have washed your feet, you also ought to wash the feet of one another;

name: According to John
text: for I have given you an example, that you also should do as I have done to you.

name: According to John
text: Verily, verily, I say to you, a servant is not greater than his lord, nor is an apostle greater than he that sent him.

name: According to John
text: If you know these things, blessed are you if you do them.

name: According to John
text: I speak not of you all; I know whom I have chosen; but that the scripture might be fulfilled: He that eats bread with me has lifted up his heel against me.

name: According to John
text: Even now I tell you before it comes to pass, that when it shall have come to pass you may believe that I am he.

name: According to John
text: Verily, verily, I say to you, he that receives whom I shall send receives me, and he that receives me receives him that sent me.

name: According to John
text: After saying these things, Jesus was troubled in spirit, and testified and said: Verily, verily, I say to you, that one of you shall deliver me up.

name: According to John
text: The disciples looked one at another, doubting concerning whom he spoke.

name: According to John
text: One of his disciples, whom Jesus loved, was reclining in the bosom of Jesus:194

name: According to John
text: Simon Peter then nods to this one and says to him: Tell who it is of whom he speaks.

name: According to John
text: Therefore he, leaning back thus on the breast of Jesus, says to him: Lord, who is it?

name: According to John
text: Jesus answers: He it is for whom I shall dip the morsel and give it to him. Therefore, having dipped the morsel, he takes it and gives it to Judas, son of Simon Iscariot.

name: According to John
text: And after the morsel, then Satan entered into him. Jesus therefore says to him: What thou doest, do quickly.

name: According to John
text: But no one of those reclining at table knew for what purpose he said this to him;

name: According to John
text: for some supposed, because Judas had the bag, that Jesus said to him: Buy the things of which we have need for the feast, or that he should give something to the poor.

name: According to John
text: Having therefore received the morsel, he went out Immediately; and it was night.

name: According to John
text: When therefore he had gone out, Jesus said: Now is the Son of man glorified, and God is glorified in him.

name: According to John
text: If God is glorified in him. God also will glorify him in himself, and he will immediately glorify him.

name: According to John
text: Little children, yet a little while am I with you: you shall seek me, and as I said to the Jews, that where I am you cannot come, to you also I say it now.

name: According to John
text: A new commandment I give to you, that you love one another; as I have loved you, that you also love one another.

name: According to John
text: In this shall all men know that you are my disciples, if you have love one for another.

name: According to John
text: Simon Peter says to him: Lord. whither goest thou? Jesus answered: Whither I go, thou canst not follow me now, but thou shalt follow me hereafter.

name: According to John
text: Peter says to him: Lord, why can I not follow thee now? I will lay down my life for thee.

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered: Wilt thou lay down thy life for me? Verily, verily, I say to thee, a cock shall not crow till thou hast denied me three times.

name: According to John
text: Let not your hearts be troubled: believe on God, believe also on me.

name: According to John
text: In my Father’s house are many mansions; if not so, I would have told you; for I am going to prepare a place for you.

name: According to John
text: And when I shall have gone and prepared a place for you, I will come again, and take you to myself, that where I am you also may be.

name: According to John
text: Thomas says to him: Lord, we know not whither thou goest, and how know we the way?

name: According to John
text: Jesus says to him: I am he way, and the truth, and the life: no one comes to the Father but through me. 7 If you have known me, you shall know my Father also; and even now you know him and lave seen him.

name: According to John
text: Philip says to him: Lord, show us the Father, and it is enough for us.

name: According to John
text: Jesus says to him: So long a time am I with you, and hast thou not known me, Philip? He that has seen me has seen the Father: how sayest thou: show us the Father?

name: According to John
text: Believest thou not that I am in the Father and the Father is in me? The words that I say to you I speak not of myself: the Father, who abides in me, does the works.

name: According to John
text: Believe me that I am in the Father and the Father in me: if not, believe because of the works themselves.

name: According to John
text: Verily, verily, I say to you, he that believes on me, the works that I do he also shall do, and greater works than these shall he do because I go to the Father.

name: According to John
text: And whatever you shall ask in my name, this will I do, that the Father may be glorified in the Son.

name: According to John
text: If you ask any thing in my name. I will do it.

name: According to John
text: If you love me, you will keep my commandments.

name: According to John
text: And I will entreat the Father, and anther Advocate will he give you, that he may be with you for ever,

name: According to John
text: the Spirit of truth, whom the world cannot receive, because it sees* him not, neither knows him: you know him, because he abides with you and shall be in you. * Discerns or acknowledges him not

name: According to John
text: I will not leave you orphans; I am coming to you.

name: According to John
text: Yet a little while and the world sees me no more; but you shall see me; because I live and you shall live.

name: According to John
text: In that day you shall know that I am in my Father and you in me and I in you.

name: According to John
text: He that has my commandments and keeps them, he it is that loves me; and he that loves me shall be loved by my Father, and I will love him and will manifest myself to him.

name: According to John
text: Judas, not Iscariot, says to him: Lord, and how is it that thou will manifest thyself to us, and not to the world?

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered and said to him: If any one love me, he will keep my word, and my Father will love him, and we will come to him and make our abode with him.

name: According to John
text: He that loves me not keeps not my words; and the word that you hear is not mine, but the Father’s that sent me.196

name: According to John
text: These things have I spoken to you while abiding with you;

name: According to John
text: but the Advocate, the Holy Spirit whom the Father will send in my name, he shall teach you all things, and shall bring to your remembrance all things that I have said to you.

name: According to John
text: Peace I leave you, my peace I give you: not as the world gives, give I to you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.

name: According to John
text: You heard that I said to you: I go away and come to you. If you loved me, you would rejoice because I go to the Father, for the Father is greater than I.

name: According to John
text: And now I have told you before it comes to pass, that when it comes to pass you may believe.

name: According to John
text: No longer will I talk much with you; for the prince of the world comes, and has nothing in me,

name: According to John
text: but that the world may know that I love the Father, and as the Father gave me commandment, so I do. Arise, let us go hence.

name: According to John
text: I am the true vine, and my Father is the vinedresser.

name: According to John
text: Every branch in me that bears not fruit he takes away, and every one that bears fruit, he cleanses, that it may bear more fruit.

name: According to John
text: You are now clean, because of the word that I have spoken to you:

name: According to John
text: abide in me, and I in you. As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself, unless it abide in the vine, so neither can you, unless you abide in me.

name: According to John
text: I am the vine, you the branches. He that abides in me and I in him, he bears much fruit; for without me you can do nothing.

name: According to John
text: If any one abide not in me, he is cast out as the branch and withers, and they gather it and throw it into the fire, and it is burned.

name: According to John
text: If you abide in me and my words abide in you, ask whatever you will, and it shall be done for you.

name: According to John
text: In this is my Father glorified, that you bear much fruit and become my disciples.

name: According to John
text: As the Father has loved me, I also have loved you: abide in my love.

name: According to John
text: If you keep my commandments, you shall abide in my love, as I have kept my Father’s commandments and abide in his love.

name: According to John
text: These things I have spoken to you that my joy may be in you and your joy may be fulfilled.

name: According to John
text: My commandment is this, that you love one another as I have loved you.

name: According to John
text: Greater love has no one than this, that he lay down his life for his friends.

name: According to John
text: I no longer call you servants, because the servant knows not what his lord does; but I have called you friends, because An all things that I have heard from my Father I have made known to you.

name: According to John
text: You have not chosen me, but I have chosen you, and appointed you that you may go and bring forth fruit, and that your fruit should remain, that whatever you ask the Father in my name he may give you.

name: According to John
text: These things I command you, that you love one another.

name: According to John
text: If the world hates you, you know that it has hated me first.

name: According to John
text: If you were of the world, the world would love its own; but because you are not of the world, but I have chosen you out of the world, therefore the world hates you.

name: According to John
text: Remember the word that I spoke to you: The servant is not greater than his lord. If they have persecuted me, they will persecute you also: if they have kept my word, they will keep yours also.

name: According to John
text: But all these things will they do to you on account of my name, because they know not him that sent me.

name: According to John
text: If I had not come and spoken to them, they would not have had sin; but now they have no excuse for their sin.

name: According to John
text: He that hates me hates my Father also.

name: According to John
text: If I had not done among them the works that no other did, they would have had no sin; but now they have both seen and hated both me and my Father.

name: According to John
text: But that the word might be fulfilled which is written in their law: They hated me without a cause.

name: According to John
text: When the Advocate has come, whom I will send you from the Father, the Spirit of truth that proceeds from the Father, he shall testify of me;

name: According to John
text: and you also shall testify, because you have been with me from the beginning.

name: According to John
text: These things have I spoken to you that you may not be offended.

name: According to John
text: They will put you out of the synagogues: indeed, the hour comes that every one that kills you will think that he offers service to God.

name: According to John
text: And these things will they do because they have not known the Father nor me.

name: According to John
text: But these things I have spoken to you that when the hour comes you may remember them, that I told you. And these things I told you not from the beginning, because I was with you.

name: According to John
text: But now I go to him that sent me, and no one of you asks me: Whither goest thou?

name: According to John
text: And yet, because I have told you these things, sorrow has filled your heart.198

name: According to John
text: But I tell you the truth, it is profitable for you that I go away. For if I go not away, the Advocate will not come to you; but if I go, I will send him to you.

name: According to John
text: And when he comes, he will convince the world of sin, and of righteousness, and of judgment.

name: According to John
text: Of sin indeed, because they believe not on me;

name: According to John
text: but of righteousness, because I go to the Father and you see me no more;

name: According to John
text: but of judgment, because the prince of this world is judged.

name: According to John
text: I have yet many things to say to you, but you cannot bear them now;

name: According to John
text: but when he has come, the Spirit of truth, he shall guide you in all the truth; for he shall not speak of himself, but whatever he hears he shall speak, and he shall announce to you things to come.

name: According to John
text: He shall glorify me, for he shall take of mine and announce it to you.

name: According to John
text: All things whatever the Father has are mine: therefore I said that he takes of mine and announces to you.

name: According to John
text: A little while, and you see me no more, and again a little while, and you shall see me.

name: According to John
text: Some of his disciples therefore said one to another: What is this that he says to us: A little while, and you see me not, and again a little while, and you shall see me? and that 1 go to the Father?

name: According to John
text: They said therefore: This, what is it that he says, The little while? We know not what he says.

name: According to John
text: Jesus knew that they desired to ask him, and he said to them: Concerning this do you inquire among yourselves because I said: A little while, and you see me not, and again a little while, and you shall see me?

name: According to John
text: Verily, verily, I say to you, that you shall weep and lament, but the world shall rejoice: you shall be sorrowful, but your sorrow shall become joy.

name: According to John
text: The wife, when she is in labor, has sorrow, because her hour has come; but when she has brought forth the child, she no longer remembers the affliction for joy that a man has been born into the world.

name: According to John
text: And you therefore now indeed have sorrow; but I shall see you again, and your heart shall rejoice, and your joy no one takes from you.

name: According to John
text: And in that day, of me you shall ask nothing. Verily, verily, I say to you, if you ask anything of the Father, he will give it to you in my name.

name: According to John
text: Till now you have asked nothing in my name: ask, and you shall

name: According to John
text: These things I have spoken to you in parables: the hour comes when I will no longer speak to you in parables, but will tell you plainly concerning the Father.

name: According to John
text: In that day you shall ask in my name, and 1 say not to you that I will beseech the Father for you;

name: According to John
text: for the Father himself loves you, because you have loved me, and have believed that I came forth from God.

name: According to John
text: I came forth from the Father, and have come into the world: again I leave the world and go to the Father.

name: According to John
text: His disciples say: Behold, now thou speakest plainly, and utterest no parable.

name: According to John
text: Now we know that thou knowest all things, and hast no need that any one should ask thee: in this we believe that thou earnest forth from God.

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered them: Do you now believe?

name: According to John
text: Behold, the hour comes, and has come, that you shall be scattered each one to his own and leave me alone; and yet I am not alone, for the Father is with me.

name: According to John
text: These things I have spoken to you that in me you may have peace. In the world you have affliction; but take courage, I have overcome the world.

name: According to John
text: These things spoke Jesus; and, lifting his eyes to heaven, he said: Father, the hour has come: glorify thy Son, that the Son may glorify thee,

name: According to John
text: as thou hast given him authority over all flesh, that to all that thou hast given him he may give them life eternal.

name: According to John
text: But eternal life is this, that they may know thee, the only true God, and Jesus Christ, whom thou hast sent.

name: According to John
text: I have glorified thee on the earth, having finished the work that thou gavest me to do;

name: According to John
text: and now, Father, glorify thou me with thyself with the glory that I had with thee before the world was.

name: According to John
text: I have manifested thy name to the men whom thou gavest me out of the world. Thine they were, and thou gavest them to me, and they have kept thy word;

name: According to John
text: now they know that all things whatever thou hast given me are from thee;

name: According to John
text: for the words that thou gavest me I have given them, and they have received them, and have known in truth that I came forth from thee, and have believed that thou didst send me.

name: According to John
text: I pray for them; I pray not for the world, but for those that thou hast given me, for they are thine,200

name: According to John
text: and all mine are thine, and thine are mine, and I have been glorified in them.

name: According to John
text: And I am no longer in the world, and these are in the world, and I come to thee. Holy Father, keep them in my name that thou hast given me, that they may be one, as we.

name: According to John
text: When I was with them I kept them in thy name that thou hast given me, and I have guarded them, and no one of them is lost but the son of perdition, that the Scripture may be fulfilled.

name: According to John
text: But now I come to thee, and these things I speak in the world, that they may have my joy fulfilled in themselves.

name: According to John
text: I have given them thy word, and the world has hated them, because they are not of the world as I am not of the world.

name: According to John
text: I pray not that thou take them out of the world, but that thou keep them from the evil one.

name: According to John
text: They are not of the world, as I am not of the world.

name: According to John
text: Sanctify them in the truth: thy word is truth.

name: According to John
text: As thou didst send me into the world, I sent them into the world;

name: According to John
text: and for them I sanctify myself, that they also may be sanctified in the truth.

name: According to John
text: But not for these only do I pray, but also for those that believe on me through their word,

name: According to John
text: that they all may be one, as thou. Father, art in me and I in thee, that they also may be in us, that the world may believe that thou didst send me.

name: According to John
text: And the glory that thou hast given me I have given them, that they may be one as we are one:

name: According to John
text: I in them and thou in me, that they may be perfected into one, that the world may know that thou hast sent me and hast loved them as thou hast loved me.

name: According to John
text: Father, as to what thou hast given me, I would that they also be with me where I am, that they may see my glory, which thou hast given me because thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world.

name: According to John
text: Righteous Father, though the world has not known thee, yet I have known thee, and these have known that thou didst send me;

name: According to John
text: and I have made known to them thy name, and will make it known, that the love with which thou hast loved me may be in them and I in them.

name: According to John
text: Having said these things, Jesus went forth with his disciples beyond the brook of Cedar, where was a garden, into which he entered,

name: According to John
text: But Judas, also, who delivered him up, knew the place, because Jesus had often gone thither in company with his disciples.

name: According to John
text: Judas therefore, having received the band, the attendants from the chief priests and from the Pharisees, comes thither with torches and lamps and weapons.

name: According to John
text: Jesus therefore, knowing all things that were coming upon him, went forth and said to them: Whom seek you?

name: According to John
text: They answered him: Jesus the Nazarene. Jesus says to them: I am he. But Judas also, who delivered him up, stood with them.

name: According to John
text: When therefore he said to them: I am he, they went back and fell on the ground.

name: According to John
text: Again therefore he asked them: Whom seek you? And they said: Jesus the Nazarene.

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered: I told you that I am he: if then ye seek me, let these go away.

name: According to John
text: That the word might be fulfilled which he spoke: Of those that thou hast given me I have lost none.

name: According to John
text: Simon Peter therefore, having a sword, drew it and struck the servant of the chief priest, and cut off his right ear; and the name of the servant was Malchus.

name: According to John
text: Jesus then said to Peter: Put the sword into the sheath. The cup that the Father has given me, shall I not drink it?

name: According to John
text: Therefore the band and the officer and the attendants of the Jews took Jesus and bound him,

name: According to John
text: and led him to Annas first; for he was father-in-law of Caiaphas who was chief priest that year.

name: According to John
text: and it was Caiaphas that advised the Jews that it was profitable that one man should die for the people.

name: According to John
text: But there followed Jesus, Simon Peter and another disciple. And that disciple was acquainted with the chief priest, and went with Jesus into the court of the chief priest,

name: According to John
text: but Peter stood at the gate without. Then the other disciple, the acquaintance of the chief priest, went in and spoke to the doorkeeper, and brought Peter in.

name: According to John
text: Then the maidservant that kept the door says to Peter: Art not thou also of the disciples of this man? He says: I am not.

name: According to John
text: But the servants and the attendants, having made a fire of coals, for it was cold, were standing and warming them selves; and Peter also was standing with them and warming himself.

name: According to John
text: Then the chief priest asked Jesus concerning his disciples and concerning his teaching.

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered him: I have spoken plainly to the world: I have always taught in a synagogue and in the temple, where all the Jews come together, and in secret have I spoken nothing.202

name: According to John
text: Why dost thou ask me? Ask those that have heard what I spoke to them: behold, these know what I said.

name: According to John
text: But when he had spoken this, one of the attendants that stood by struck Jesus with his open hand, saying: Answerest thou the chief priest thus?

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered him: If I have spoken evil, testify of the evil; but if well, why smitest thou me?

name: According to John
text: Annas then sent him, bound, to Caiaphas the chief priest.

name: According to John
text: But Simon Peter was standing and warming himself. They then said to him: Art not thou also of his disciples? He denied and said: I am not.

name: According to John
text: One of the servants of the chief priest, being a relative of him whose ear Peter had cut off, says: Did I not see thee in the garden with him?

name: According to John
text: Again therefore Peter denied; and immediately a cock crew.

name: According to John
text: Then they lead Jesus from Caiaphas to the pretorium; and it was early morn. And they went not into the pretorium, that they might not be defiled, but that they might eat the passover.

name: According to John
text: Pilate therefore came forth to them and said: What accusation bring you against this man?

name: According to John
text: They answered and said to him: If this man had not done evil, we would not have delivered him to thee.

name: According to John
text: Pilate therefore said to them: Take you him and judge him according to your law. The Jews then said to him: It is not lawful for us to put any one to death:

name: According to John
text: that the word of Jesus might be fulfilled, which he spoke signifying by what kind of death he was about to die.

name: According to John
text: Then Pilate entered the pretorium again, and called Jesus and said to him: Art thou the King of the Jews?

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered: Sayest thou this of thyself, or did others tell thee of me?

name: According to John
text: Pilate answered: Am I a Jew? Thy nation and the chief priests delivered thee to me: what hast thou done?

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered: My kingdom is not of this world. If my kingdom were of this world my servants would fight, that might not be delivered to the Jews; but now my kingdom is not hence,

name: According to John
text: Pilate then said to him: Art thou not then a king? Jesus answered: Thou sayest, for I am a king. To this end was I born, and to this end have I come into the world, that I might testify to the truth: every one that is of the truth hears my voice.

name: According to John
text: Pilate says to him: What is truth? And having said this. he went out again to the Jews, and said to them: I find no fault in him.

name: According to John
text: But you have a custom that I release to you one at the passover:

name: According to John
text: They then cried out again, saying: Not this man, but Barabbas. But Barabbas was a robber.

name: According to John
text: Pilate therefore then took Jesus and scourged him.

name: According to John
text: And the soldiers plaited a crown of thorns and put it on his head, and threw a purple garment around him,

name: According to John
text: and came to him and said: Hail, King of the Jews; and they struck him with the open hand.

name: According to John
text: Pilate again came forth and said to them, Behold, I bring him forth to you, that you may know that I find no fault.

name: According to John
text: Jesus therefore came forth wearing the crown of thorns and purple garment. And he says to them: Behold the man.

name: According to John
text: Therefore when the chief priests and the attendants saw him, they cried out: Crucify, crucify. Pilate says to them: Take you him and crucify him; for I find no fault in him.

name: According to John
text: The Jews answered: We have a law, and according to the law he ought to die, because he made himself the Son of God.

name: According to John
text: Thereupon when Pilate heard this word, he was the more afraid,

name: According to John
text: and went into the pretorium again, and said to Jesus: Whence art thou? But Jesus gave him no answer.

name: According to John
text: Pilate says to him: Speakest thou not to me? Knowest thou not that I have authority to release thee and authority to crucify thee?

name: According to John
text: Jesus answered: Thou couldst have had no authority against me, unless it had been given thee from above: therefore he that delivered me to thee has the greater sin.

name: According to John
text: After this Pilate sought to release him; but the Jews cried out, saying: If thou release this man, thou art not a friend of Caesar: every one that makes himself king speaks against Caesar.

name: According to John
text: Then Pilate, after hearing these words, brought Jesus forth, and sat on the judgment-seat in a place called The Pavement, but in Hebrew, Gabbatha.

name: According to John
text: And it was the preparation of the passover: it was about the sixth hour. And he says to the Jews: Behold your king.

name: According to John
text: They therefore cried out: Away with him, away with him, crucify him. Pilate says to them: Shall I crucify your king? The chief priests answered: We have no king but Caesar.

name: According to John
text: Then therefore he delivered him to them to be crucified. They therefore took Jesus;

name: According to John
text: and bearing the cross for himself, he went forth to a place called the place of a skull, which is called in Hebrew Golgotha,

name: According to John
text: where they crucified him, and with him two others, on this side and on that, but Jesus in the midst.204

name: According to John
text: But Pilate wrote a title and put it on the cross; and it was written: JESUS THE NAZARENE, THE KING OF THE JEWS.

name: According to John
text: Many of the Jews therefore read this title, because the place where Jesus was crucified was near the city; and it was written in Hebrew, in Latin, in Greek.

name: According to John
text: The chief priests of the Jews then said to, Pilate: Write not: The king of the Jews, but that he said: I am the king of the Jews.

name: According to John
text: Pilate answered: What I have written, I have written.

name: According to John
text: The soldiers therefore, when they had crucified Jesus, took his garments, and made four parts, for each soldier a part, and his coat. But the coat was without seam, woven from the top throughout.

name: According to John
text: They said therefore one to another: Let us not rend it, but cast lots for it, whose it shall be. That the scripture might be fulfilled: They divided my garments among them, and on my raiment they cast lots. These things therefore the soldiers did.

name: According to John
text: But there stood by the cross of Jesus his mother and his mother’s sister, Mary the wife of Cleopas, and Mary Magdalene.

name: According to John
text: Jesus therefore seeing his mother, and the disciple whom he loved standing by, says to his mother: Woman, behold thy son.

name: According to John
text: Then he says to the disciple: Behold thy mother. And from that hour the disciple took her to his own home.

name: According to John
text: After this, Jesus, knowing that all things had been already finished, that the scripture might be fulfilled, says: I thirst.

name: According to John
text: There lay a vessel full of vinegar: having therefore put a sponge full of vinegar on hyssop, they put it to his mouth.

name: According to John
text: When therefore he had received the vinegar, he said: It is finished; and having bowed his head, he gave up the spirit.

name: According to John
text: The Jews therefore, because it was the preparation, that the bodies might not remain on the cross during the sabbath, for that sabbath was a great day, besought Pilate that their legs might be broken, and that they might be taken away.

name: According to John
text: Then came the soldiers and broke the legs of the first, and of the other that was crucified with him;

name: According to John
text: but coming to Jesus, when they saw him already dead, they broke not his legs;

name: According to John
text: but one of the soldiers with a spear pierced his side, and immediately there came forth blood and water.

name: According to John
text: And he that saw it has testified, and his testimony is true, and he knows that he speaks what is true, that you also may believe.

name: According to John
text: For these things took place that the scripture might be fulfilled: A bone of him shall not be broken.

name: According to John
text: And again another scripture says: They shall look on him whom

name: According to John
text: But after these things Joseph, who was of Arimathea, being a disciple of Jesus, but secretly for fear of the Jews, besought Pilate that he might take away the body of Jesus; and Pilate gave permission. They came therefore and took him away.

name: According to John
text: But Nicodemus also came, he that had come to him by night at the first, bringing a mixture of myrrh and aloes, about a hundred pounds.

name: According to John
text: They therefore took the body of Jesus, and bound it in linen cloths with the spices, as is the custom of the Jews to prepare for burial.

name: According to John
text: But there was, in the place where he had been crucified, a garden, and in the garden a new sepulcher, in which no one had ever yet been laid.

name: According to John
text: There then because of the preparation of the Jews, for the sepulcher was near, laid they Jesus.

name: According to John
text: But on the first of the week, Mary Magdalene comes to the sepulcher early, it being yet dark, and sees the stone taken away from the sepulcher.

name: According to John
text: She therefore runs and comes to Simon Peter, and to the other disciple whom Jesus loved, and says to them: They have taken away the Lord out of the sepulcher, and we know not where they have laid him.

name: According to John
text: Thereupon Peter went forth and the other disciple, and came to the sepulcher.

name: According to John
text: But the two ran together; and the other disciple outran Peter, and came first to the sepulcher;

name: According to John
text: and having stooped down, he saw the linen cloths lying: however he went not in.

name: According to John
text: Then comes Simon Peter following him; and he went into the sepulcher, and saw the linen cloths lying,

name: According to John
text: and the handkerchief, which was on his head, not lying with the linen cloths, but folded up in a place by itself.

name: According to John
text: Therefore, the other disciple also that came first to the sepulcher then went in, and saw and believed;

name: According to John
text: for they not yet knew the scripture, that he must rise from the dead.

name: According to John
text: The disciples then went away again to their homes.

name: According to John
text: But Mary stood without at the sepulcher weeping. Then as she wept, she stooped down and looked into the sepulcher,

name: According to John
text: and saw two angels in white, sitting, one at the head and one at the feet, where the body of Jesus had lain.

name: According to John
text: They say to her: Woman, why weepest thou? She says to them: They have taken away my Lord, and I know not where they have laid206 him. Having said these things, she turned back, and saw Jesus standing, and knew not that it was Jesus.

name: According to John
text: Jesus says to her: Woman, why weepest thou? Whom seekest thou? She, supposing that he was the gardener, says to him: Sir, if thou hast borne him away, tell me where thou hast laid him, and I will take him away.

name: According to John
text: Jesus said to her: Mary. She turned and said to him in Hebrew: Rabboni, which is called, Teacher.

name: According to John
text: Jesus says to her: Touch me not; for I have not yet ascended to my Father; but go to my brethren and say to them: I ascend to my Father and your Father, and to my God and your God.

name: According to John
text: Mary Magdalene comes and tells the disciples: I have seen the Lord; and that he had said these things to her.

name: According to John
text: When therefore evening had come on that day, the first of the week, and the doors had been closed where the disciples were for fear of the Jews, Jesus came and stood in the midst, and said to them: Peace to you.

name: According to John
text: And having said this, he showed them his hands and his side. Thereupon the disciples rejoiced when they saw the Lord.

name: According to John
text: He then said to them again: Peace to you; as the Father has sent me, I also send you.

name: According to John
text: And having said this, he breathed on them and said to them: Receive the Holy Spirit.

name: According to John
text: Whosesoever sins you forgive, they are forgiven them; whosesoever sins you retain, they are retained.

name: According to John
text: But Thomas, who is called Didymus, one of the twelve, was not with them when Jesus came.

name: According to John
text: The other disciples therefore said to him: We have seen the Lord. But he said to them: Unless I see in his hands the print of the nails, and put my finger into the place of the nails, and put my hand into his side, I will not believe.

name: According to John
text: And after eight days again his disciples were within, and Thomas with them. Jesus came, the doors having been shut, and stood in the midst, and said: Peace to you.

name: According to John
text: Then he says to Thomas: Reach hither thy finger, and behold my hands, and reach thy hand, and put it into my side, and be not faithless, but believing.

name: According to John
text: Thomas answered and said to him: My Lord and my God.

name: According to John
text: Jesus says to him: Because thou hast seen me, thou hast believed: blessed are they that, though not seeing, have yet believed.

name: According to John
text: Many other signs truly did Jesus in the presence of his disciples, which are not written in this book;

name: According to John
text: but these are written that you may believe that Jesus is the Christ,

name: According to John
text: After these things Jesus manifested himself to the disciples at the sea of Tiberias: and he manifested himself thus.

name: According to John
text: There were together Simon Peter, and Thomas who is called Didymus, and Nathaniel who was from Cana of Galilee, and the sons of Zebedee, and two others of his disciples.

name: According to John
text: Simon Peter says to them: I go a fishing. They say to him: We also are going with thee. They went out and entered the ship, and on that night they caught nothing.

name: According to John
text: But the morning having now come, Jesus stood on the shore: the disciples, however, knew not that it was Jesus.

name: According to John
text: Jesus therefore says to them: Children, have you any thing to eat? (beside bread). They answered him: No.

name: According to John
text: He says to them: Cast the net on the right side of the ship, and you shall find. They cast therefore, and were no longer able to draw it because of the multitude of fishes.

name: According to John
text: That disciple whom Jesus loved therefore said to Peter: It is the Lord. Simon Peter therefore, hearing that it was the Lord, girded on his upper garment, for he was naked,* and threw himself into the sea; * Had on only an undergarment

name: According to John
text: but the other disciples came with the ship (for they were not far from the land, but about two hundred cubits off), dragging the net of fishes.

name: According to John
text: Therefore when they had come to the land, they saw a fire of coals lying, and fish lying on it, and bread.

name: According to John
text: Jesus says to them: Bring of the fish that you have just now taken.

name: According to John
text: Simon Peter came up and drew the net to land, full of great fishes, a hundred and fifty-three: and though there were so many, the net was not rent.

name: According to John
text: Jesus says to them: Come and breakfast. But no one of the disciples ventured to ask him: Who art thou? knowing that it was the Lord.

name: According to John
text: Jesus comes and takes the bread and gives it to them, and the fish in like manner.

name: According to John
text: This was now the third time on which Jesus had manifested himself to the disciples, after he had risen from the dead.

name: According to John
text: Therefore, when they had breakfasted, Jesus says to Simon Peter: Simon, son of Jonah, lovest thou me more than these? He says to him: Yes, Lord, thou knowest that I love thee. He says to him: Feed my lambs.208

name: According to John
text: He says to him again a second time: Simon, son of Jonah, lovest thou me? He says to him: Yes, Lord, thou knowest that I love thee. He says to him: Be a shepherd to my sheep.

name: According to John
text: He says to him the third time: Simon, son of Jonah, lovest thou me? Peter was grieved because he had said to him the third time: Lovest thou me? And he says to him: Lord, thou knowest all things; thou knowest that I love thee. He says to him: Feed my sheep.

name: According to John
text: Verily, verily, I say to you, when thou wast young thou didst gird thyself and walk whither thou wouldst; but when thou shalt become old, thou shalt stretch forth thy hands, and another shall gird thee, and carry thee whither thou wouldst not.

name: According to John
text: But this he spoke signifying by what kind of death he should glorify God. And having said this, he says to him: Follow me.

name: According to John
text: Peter turned and saw the disciple that Jesus loved following, who also reclined at supper on his breast and said: Lord, who is he that delivers thee up?

name: According to John
text: Peter therefore, seeing this man, says to Jesus: Lord, but what shall this man do?

name: According to John
text: Jesus says to him: If I will that he remain till I come, what is that to thee? Follow thou me.

name: According to John
text: Therefore went this saying, forth among the brethren, that that disciple should not die; and yet Jesus did not say to him: Thou shalt not die, but: If I will that he remain till I come.

name: According to John
text: This is the disciple that testifies of these things, and that wrote The Acts of the Apostles

name: Epistle of Jude
text: Jude, a servant of Christ Jesus, but brother of James, to the called that are beloved in God the Father, and kept for Jesus Christ.

name: Epistle of Jude
text: Mercy to you and peace and love be multiplied.

name: Epistle of Jude
text: Beloved, giving all diligence to write to you concerning this common salvation, I found it necessary to write to you, exhorting you to contend for the faith once delivered to the saints.

name: Epistle of Jude
text: For some men have come in by stealth, who have long ago been written of beforehand for this condemnation; ungodly men, turning the grace of our God into lasciviousness, and denying our only Master and Lord, Jesus Christ.

name: Epistle of Jude
text: But I wish to put you in remembrance, though you already know all things, that the Lord, after having saved the people from the land of Egypt, the second time destroyed those that believed not:

name: Epistle of Jude
text: angels also that kept not their first estate, but left their own habitation, he has kept in eternal chains under darkness for the judgment of the great day:

name: Epistle of Jude
text: how Sodom and Gomorrah and the cities about them, giving themselves over to lewdness in like manner with these men, and having gone after other flesh, are set forth as an example, suffering the punishment of eternal fire.

name: Epistle of Jude
text: Yet still in like manner these dreamers also defile indeed the flesh, but despise dominion, and speak evil of dignities.

name: Epistle of Jude
text: But Michael the archangel, when contending with the devil he disputed about the body of Moses, dared not to bring a railing accusation, but said: The Lord rebuke thee.

name: Epistle of Jude
text: But these speak evil of whatever things indeed they know not, but whatever things they understand naturally as the irrational animals, in these they corrupt themselves.

name: Epistle of Jude
text: Alas for them, for in the way of Cain they have walked, and in the error of Balaam they have rushed headlong for hire, and in the contradiction of Corah have they perished.

name: Epistle of Jude
text: These are they that are rocks in your love-feasts, feasting with you without fear, feeding themselves; clouds without water, driven rapidly by winds; late autumnal trees without fruit, twice dead, torn up by the roots;

name: Epistle of Jude
text: raging waves of the sea foaming up their own shame; wandering stars, for whom the blackness of darkness has been kept forever.

name: Epistle of Jude
text: But of these also prophesied Enoch, the seventh from Adam, saying: Behold, the Lord came in his holy myriads,

name: Epistle of Jude
text: to execute judgment against all, and to convince all that are ungodly, and of all the hard things which ungodly sinners have spoken against him.

name: Epistle of Jude
text: These are murmurers, complainers, walking according to their own desires, and their mouth speaks great swelling words, admiring persons for profit’s sake.

name: Epistle of Jude
text: But you, beloved, be mindful of the words that were spoken before by the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ,

name: Epistle of Jude
text: that they said that at the last time there shall be scoffers walking according to their own desires in ungodliness.

name: Epistle of Jude
text: These are they that separate, psychical, not having spirit.

name: Epistle of Jude
text: But you, beloved, building yourselves up on your most holy faith, praying in the Holy Spirit,

name: Epistle of Jude
text: keep yourselves in the love of God, looking for the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ to eternal life.

name: Epistle of Jude
text: And some, indeed, reprove when they contend;

name: Epistle of Jude
text: but others save, snatching them out of the fire; and on others have compassion in a spirit of fear, hating even the garment that is spotted by the flesh.

name: Epistle of Jude
text: But to him that is able to keep you without falling, and to set you in the presence of his glory blameless in exceeding joy;

name: Epistle of Jude
text: to the only God our Saviour, through Jesus Christ our Lord, be glory, majesty, might and authority before every age, both now and throughout all the ages: amen.436

name: According to Luke
text: Since many have undertaken to draw up a narrative of the matters that have been fully accomplished among us,

name: According to Luke
text: as those, who, from the beginning became eyewitnesses and ministers of the word, delivered them to us,

name: According to Luke
text: it seemed good to me also, after having accurately traced all things from the first, to write them in order for thee, most noble Theophilus,

name: According to Luke
text: that thou mightst know the certainty of the words concerning which thou hast been instructed.

name: According to Luke
text: There was in the days of Herod king of Judea a priest, named Zachariah, of the class of Abijah, and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron, and her name was Elizebeth.

name: According to Luke
text: And they were both righteous before God, walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless.

name: According to Luke
text: And they had no child, because Elizebeth was barren, and both were advanced in their days.

name: According to Luke
text: But it came to pass while he acted as priest, in the order of his class, before God,

name: According to Luke
text: according to the custom of the priesthood his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord;

name: According to Luke
text: and all the multitude of the people were praying without at the hour of incense.

name: According to Luke
text: And there appeared to him an angel of the Lord, standing on the right side of the altar of incense.

name: According to Luke
text: And Zachariah was troubled when he saw him, and fear fell upon him.

name: According to Luke
text: But the angel said to him: Fear not, Zachariah, for thy prayer is heard, and thy wife Elizebeth shall bear thee a son; and thou shalt call his name John;

name: According to Luke
text: and thou shalt have joy and gladness, and many shall rejoice at his birth.

name: According to Luke
text: For he shall be great before the Lord, and wine and strong drink he shall by no means drink, and he shall be filled with the Holy Spirit even from his mother’s womb;

name: According to Luke
text: and many of the sons of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God;

name: According to Luke
text: and he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elijah, to turn the hearts of fathers to children, and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just, to make ready for the Lord a people prepared.

name: According to Luke
text: And Zachariah said to the angel: By what means shall 1 know this?

name: According to Luke
text: And the angel answered and said to him: I am Gabriel that stand in the presence of God, and I am sent to speak to thee, and bring thee these good tidings.

name: According to Luke
text: And behold, thou shalt be dumb and not able to speak, till the day in which these things shall be accomplished, because thou didst not believe my words, which shall be fulfilled in their time.

name: According to Luke
text: And the people were waiting for Zachariah, and wondered that he stayed so long in the temple.

name: According to Luke
text: But when he came out he was not able to speak to them; and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple; and he made signs to them, and remained speechless.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass when the days of his service were completed, he departed to his house.

name: According to Luke
text: And after those days his wife Elizebeth conceived, and hid herself five months, saying:

name: According to Luke
text: Thus has the Lord dealt with me in the days in which he looked on me to take away my reproach among men.

name: According to Luke
text: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God to a city of Galilee, named Nazareth,

name: According to Luke
text: to a virgin betrothed to a man, whose name was Joseph, of the house of David; and the name of the virgin was Mary.

name: According to Luke
text: And coming in to her, the angel said: Hail, highly favored, the Lord is with thee.

name: According to Luke
text: But she was troubled at the word, and was reasoning what manner of salutation this could be.

name: According to Luke
text: And the angel said to her: Fear not, Mary; for thou hast found favor with God.

name: According to Luke
text: And behold, thou shalt conceive in the womb and bear a son, and thou shalt call his name Jesus.

name: According to Luke
text: He shall be great, and Son of the Highest shall he be called; and the Lord God shall give him the throne of David his father,

name: According to Luke
text: and he shall reign over the house of Jacob forever, and of his kingdom there shall be no end.

name: According to Luke
text: But Mary said to the angel: How shall this be, seeing I know not a man?

name: According to Luke
text: And the angel answered and said to her: The Holy Spirit shall come upon thee, and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee: wherefore also the holy one that is born shall be called the Son of God.

name: According to Luke
text: And behold, thy relative Elizebeth, she also has conceived a son in her old age; and this is the sixth month with her that is called barren:

name: According to Luke
text: for no word from God shall be impossible.

name: According to Luke
text: And Mary said: Behold the handmaid of the Lord: let it be done for me according to thy word. And the angel departed from her.106

name: According to Luke
text: And Mary arose in those days and went into the mountainous country with haste to a city of Judah,

name: According to Luke
text: and entered the house of Zachariah, and saluted Elizebeth.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass when Elizebeth heard the salutation of Mary, the babe in her womb leaped. And Elizebeth was filled with the Holy Spirit,

name: According to Luke
text: and spoke out with a loud cry, and said: Blessed art thou among women, and blessed is the fruit of thy womb.

name: According to Luke
text: And whence is this to me that the mother of my Lord should come, to me?

name: According to Luke
text: For behold, as the voice of thy salutation came into my ears, the babe in my womb leaped with joy.

name: According to Luke
text: And blessed is she who believed that there shall be a fulfillment of the things spoken to her from the Lord.

name: According to Luke
text: And Mary said: My soul magnifies the Lord,

name: According to Luke
text: and my spirit rejoiced in God my Saviour,

name: According to Luke
text: because he looked upon the lowly condition of his handmaid. For behold, from this time shall all generations call me blessed,

name: According to Luke
text: because the mighty One has done great things for me. And holy is his name;

name: According to Luke
text: and his mercy is from generation to generation on them that fear him.

name: According to Luke
text: He has shown might with his arm; he has scattered the proud in the understanding of their heart:

name: According to Luke
text: he has cast down the mighty from thrones, and exalted the lowly:

name: According to Luke
text: the poor has he filled with good things and the rich has he sent empty away.

name: According to Luke
text: He has helped Israel his servant, by remembering mercy,

name: According to Luke
text: , to Abraham and to his posterity forever.

name: According to Luke
text: And Mary remained with her about three months, and returned to her house.

name: According to Luke
text: But the time for Elizebeth to bring forth was completed, and she bore a son.

name: According to Luke
text: And her neighbors and relatives heard that the Lord had magnified his mercy to her and they rejoiced with her.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass on the eighth day that they came to circumcise the child, and they called it by the name of its father, Zachariah.

name: According to Luke
text: And its mother answered and said: No; but it shall be called John.

name: According to Luke
text: And they said to her: There is no one of thy kindred that is called by this name.

name: According to Luke
text: And having asked for a writing tablet, he wrote, saying: His name is John. And they all wondered.

name: According to Luke
text: But his mouth was immediately opened and his tongue loosed, and he spoke, blessing God.

name: According to Luke
text: And fear came on all that dwelt about them; and all these things were much talked of in all the mountainous country of Judea;

name: According to Luke
text: and all that heard laid them up in their heart, saying: What then will this child be? for the hand of the Lord was with him.

name: According to Luke
text: And Zachariah his father was filled with the Holy Spirit, and prophesied, saying:

name: According to Luke
text: Blessed be the Lord, the God of Israel, because he has visited and redeemed his people;

name: According to Luke
text: and has raised up for us, in the house of David his servant, a horn of salvation,

name: According to Luke
text: as he spoke through the mouth of his holy prophets of ancient times,

name: According to Luke
text: salvation from our enemies, and from the hand of all that hate us,

name: According to Luke
text: to show mercy to our fathers, and to remember his holy covenant,

name: According to Luke
text: the oath that he swore to Abraham our father, to grant to us

name: According to Luke
text: that being delivered from the hand of enemies we might serve him without fear,

name: According to Luke
text: in holiness and righteousness before him all our days.

name: According to Luke
text: And thou also, O child, shalt be called prophet of the Highest; for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways,

name: According to Luke
text: to give to his people the knowledge of salvation in remission of their sins,

name: According to Luke
text: through the tender mercies of our God, in which the dawn from on high has visited us,

name: According to Luke
text: to give light to them that sit in darkness and the shadow of death, to guide our feet into the way of peace.

name: According to Luke
text: And the child grew and became strong in spirit, and was in the deserts till the day of his manifestation to Israel.

name: According to Luke
text: But it came to pass in those days, there went out a decree from Caesar Augustus, that all the habitable land should be enrolled.

name: According to Luke
text: This enrollment took place first when Cyrenius was governor of Syria.

name: According to Luke
text: And all went to be enrolled, each one to his own city.

name: According to Luke
text: And Joseph also went up from Galilee, out of the city of Nazareth, into Judea, to the city of David, which is called Bethlehem, because he was of the house and family of David,108

name: According to Luke
text: to be enrolled with Mary who was betrothed to him, being with child.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass while they were there, the days for her to bring forth were completed;

name: According to Luke
text: and she brought forth her son the firstborn, and swathed him, and laid him in a stall, because there was no place for them in the inn.

name: According to Luke
text: And there were in the same country shepherds living in the fields, and keeping guard over their flock during the watches of the night.

name: According to Luke
text: And an angel of the Lord stood by them, and the glory of the Lord shone round about them, and they were afraid with great fear.

name: According to Luke
text: And the angel said to them: Fear not; for behold, I bring you glad tidings of great joy, which shall be for all the people;

name: According to Luke
text: for there is born to you this day, in the city of David, a Saviour, who is Christ the Lord.

name: According to Luke
text: And this shall be a sign to you: you shall find a babe swathed in a stall.

name: According to Luke
text: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God and saying:

name: According to Luke
text: Glory to God in the highest, and on earth peace among men of his good pleasure.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass when the angels had gone away from them into heaven, the shepherds said one to another: Let us go now to Bethlehem, and see this thing that has come to pass, which the Lord has made known to us.

name: According to Luke
text: And they came in haste, and found both Mary and Joseph, and the babe lying in the stall.

name: According to Luke
text: And when they had seen it, they made known concerning this thing that had been told them of this child.

name: According to Luke
text: And all that heard were astonished at the things told to them by the shepherds.

name: According to Luke
text: But Mary kept all these words, pondering them in her heart.

name: According to Luke
text: And the shepherds returned, glorifying and praising God for all things that they had heard and seen as it had been told to them.

name: According to Luke
text: And when eight days had been completed for circumcising him, his name was also called Jesus, as it had been called by the angel before he had been conceived in the womb.

name: According to Luke
text: And when the days of their purification had been completed, according to the law of Moses, they brought him up to Jerusalem to present him to the Lord,

name: According to Luke
text: as it is written in the law of the Lord: Every male that opens the womb shall be called holy to the Lord;

name: According to Luke
text: and to offer a sacrifice according to what is said in the law of the

name: According to Luke
text: And behold, there was a man in Jerusalem, whose name was Simeon; and this man was just and devout, waiting for the consolation of Israel, and the Holy Spirit was upon him:

name: According to Luke
text: and it had been revealed to him by the Holy Spirit that he should not see, death, before he had seen the Lord’s anointed.

name: According to Luke
text: And he came in the Spirit into the temple; and when the parents brought in the child Jesus that they might do for him according to the custom of the law,

name: According to Luke
text: he also took him into his arms, and blessed God and said:

name: According to Luke
text: Now, Lord, lettest thou thy servant depart in peace, according to thy word, 30 for my eyes have seen thy salvation,

name: According to Luke
text: which thou hast prepared before the face of all the people,

name: According to Luke
text: a light for a revelation to the Gentiles, and the glory of thy people Israel.

name: According to Luke
text: And his father and his mother were wondering at the things spoken concerning him.

name: According to Luke
text: And Simeon blessed them and said to Mary his mother: Behold, this is set for the fall and rise of many in Israel, and for a sign to be spoken against.

name: According to Luke
text: And a sword shall pass through thy soul also that thoughts may be revealed out of many hearts.

name: According to Luke
text: There was also Anna a prophetess, a daughter of Phanuel, of the tribe of Asher: she was advanced in many days, having lived with a husband seven years from her virginity,

name: According to Luke
text: and she was a widow till eighty-four years, who departed not from the temple, serving day and night with fastings and prayers.

name: According to Luke
text: And coming in at the same hour, she gave thanks to God, and spoke of him to all that looked for the redemption of Jerusalem.

name: According to Luke
text: And when they had accomplished all things according to the law of the Lord, they returned to Galilee to their own city Nazareth.

name: According to Luke
text: And the child grew and became strong, being filled with wisdom, and the grace of God was upon him.

name: According to Luke
text: And his parents went yearly to Jerusalem at the feast of passover.

name: According to Luke
text: And when he was twelve years of age, they having gone up according to the custom of the feast,

name: According to Luke
text: and having completed the days, on their return the child Jesus remained in Jerusalem, and his parents knew it not.

name: According to Luke
text: But supposing that he was in the company, they went a day’s journey, and sought for him among the relatives and the acquaintances,

name: According to Luke
text: and not finding him, they returned to Jerusalem seeking for him.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass after three days they found him in the temple, sitting in the midst of the teachers, both hearing them and asking them questions;110

name: According to Luke
text: and all that heard him were astonished at his understanding and answers.

name: According to Luke
text: And when they saw him they were amazed, and his mother said to him: Child, why hast thou dealt with us thus? Behold, thy father and I have sought thee, sorrowing.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: Why is it that you sought me? Did you not know that I must be about my Father’s business?

name: According to Luke
text: And they understood not the word that he spoke to them.

name: According to Luke
text: And he went down with them and came to Nazareth, and was subject to them. And his mother kept all the words in her heart.

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus increased in wisdom and age, and in favor with God and men.

name: According to Luke
text: But in the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar, Pontius Pilate being governor of Judea, and Herod tetrarch of Galilee, and Philip his brother tetrarch of Iturea and of the region of Trachonitis, and Lysanias tetrarch of Abilene,

name: According to Luke
text: in the days of the chief priest Annas and of Caiaphas, the word of God came to John the son of Zachariah in the wilderness;

name: According to Luke
text: and he came into all the region round about the Jordan, preaching the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins,

name: According to Luke
text: as it is written in the book of the words of Isaiah the prophet: The voice of one crying in the wilderness: Prepare the way of the Lord, make his paths straight:

name: According to Luke
text: every ravine shall be filled, and every mountain and hill shall be brought low, and the crooked places shall be made straight, and the rough ways smooth,

name: According to Luke
text: and all flesh shall see the salvation of God.

name: According to Luke
text: He said therefore to the multitudes that came out to be baptized by him: Brood of vipers, who warned you to flee from the coming wrath?

name: According to Luke
text: Bring forth then fruits worthy of repentance, and begin not to say within yourselves: We have Abraham as a father; for I say to you that God is able from these stones to raise up children for Abraham.

name: According to Luke
text: And now also the ax is lying at the root of the trees: every tree therefore that brings not forth good fruit is cut down and thrown into the fire.

name: According to Luke
text: And the multitudes asked him, saying: What then shall we do?

name: According to Luke
text: And he answered and said to them: He that has two coats let him give to him that has none, and he that has food let him do in like manner.

name: According to Luke
text: And publicans also came to be baptized, and said to him: Teacher,

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: Exact no more than that which has been appointed to you.

name: According to Luke
text: And soldiers also asked, saying: What shall we also do? And he said to them: Do violence to no one, accuse no one falsely, and be content with your wages.

name: According to Luke
text: But while the people were in expectation, and all were reasoning in their hearts concerning John, whether he were the Christ or not,

name: According to Luke
text: John answered, saying to them all: I indeed baptize you in water; but there comes he that is mightier than I, the strap of whose sandals I am not worthy to loose; he shall baptize you in the Holy Spirit and fire:

name: According to Luke
text: whose winnowing-shovel is in his hand to thoroughly cleanse his threshing-floor, and gather the grain into his granary; but the chaff he will burn up with unquenchable fire.

name: According to Luke
text: With many other exhortations then indeed preached he the gospel to the people;

name: According to Luke
text: but Herod the tetrarch being reproached by him concerning Herodias the wife of his brother, and concerning all the wicked things which Herod had done,

name: According to Luke
text: added this also to them all; he shut up John in prison.

name: According to Luke
text: But it came to pass that while all the people were baptized, Jesus also having been baptized, and praying, the heaven was opened,

name: According to Luke
