text: and the Holy Spirit came down, in a bodily form like a dove, upon him, and a voice came from heaven: Thou art my beloved Son, in thee I am well pleased,

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus himself was, when he began his ministry, about thirty years old, being, as was supposed, the son of Joseph, son of Heli,

name: According to Luke
text: son of Matthat, son of Levi, son: of Malchi, son of Jannai, son of Joseph,

name: According to Luke
text: son of Mattithiah, son: of Amos, son of Nahum, son of Esli, son of Naggai,

name: According to Luke
text: son of Maath, son of Mattithiah, son of Shimei, son of Joseph, son of Joda,

name: According to Luke
text: son of Jonan, son of Rhesa, son of Zerubbabel, son of Shealtiel, son of Neri,

name: According to Luke
text: son of Malchi, son of Addi, son of Cosam, son of Elmaam, son of Er,

name: According to Luke
text: son of Jesus, son of Eliezer, son of Jorim, son of Matthat, son of Levi,

name: According to Luke
text: son of Symeon, son of Judah, son of Joseph, son of Jonam, son of Eliakim,

name: According to Luke
text: son of Melea, son of Menna, son of Mattatha, son of Nathan, son of David,112

name: According to Luke
text: son of Jesse, son of Obed, son of Boaz, son of Salmon, son of Nahshon,

name: According to Luke
text: son of Aminadab, son of Admin, son of Ami, son of Hezron, son of Pharez, son of Judah,

name: According to Luke
text: son of Jacob, son of Isaac, son of Abraham, son of Terah, son of Nahor,

name: According to Luke
text: son of Serug, son of Reu, son of Peleg, son of Heber, son of Shelah,

name: According to Luke
text: son of Kenan, son of Arphaxad, son of Shem, son of Noah, son of Lamech,

name: According to Luke
text: son of Methusaleh, son of Enoch, son of Jared, son of Mahalaleel, son of Kenan,

name: According to Luke
text: son of Enos, son of Seth, son of Adam, son of God.

name: According to Luke
text: But Jesus, full of the Holy Spirit, returned from the Jordan, and was led in the Spirit into the wilderness forty days, tempted by the devil. And he ate nothing in those days, and when they were ended he was hungry.

name: According to Luke
text: And the devil said to him: If thou art the Son of God, speak to this stone that it may become bread.

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus answered to him: It is written that not by bread alone shall man live.

name: According to Luke
text: And having led him up, he showed him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time.

name: According to Luke
text: And the devil said to him: To thee will I give all this authority and the glory of them, for to me it is delivered; and to whomever I will I give it:

name: According to Luke
text: if therefore thou wilt worship before me, all shall be thine.

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus answered and said to him: It is written: Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God, and him only shalt thou serve,

name: According to Luke
text: And he brought him to Jerusalem, and set him on the wing of the temple, and said to him: If thou art the Son of God, cast thyself down hence;

name: According to Luke
text: for it is written that he shall give his angels charge concerning thee to guard thee safely;

name: According to Luke
text: and in their hands they shall take thee up, lest perhaps thou strike thy foot against a stone.

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus answered and said to him: It is said: Thou shalt not put the Lord thy God to the proof.

name: According to Luke
text: And when the devil had ended all the temptation he departed from

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus returned in the power of the Spirit into Galilee; and a fame concerning him went forth through all that surrounding country.

name: According to Luke
text: And he taught in their synagogues, glorified by all.

name: According to Luke
text: And he came to Nazareth, where he had been brought up, and went, according to his custom, into the synagogue on the sabbath day, and stood up to read.

name: According to Luke
text: And there was given to him the book of the prophet Isaiah; and having unrolled the book he found the place where it is written:

name: According to Luke
text: The Spirit of the Lord is upon me, because he has anointed me to preach the gospel to the poor; he has sent me

name: According to Luke
text: to preach deliverance to the captives and recovering of sight to the blind; to set at liberty the bruised, to preach the acceptable year of the Lord.

name: According to Luke
text: And having rolled up the book and given it back to the attendant, he sat down; and the eyes of all in the synagogue were fixed upon him.

name: According to Luke
text: And he began to say to them: This day is fulfilled this Scripture in your ears.

name: According to Luke
text: And all applauded him and wondered at the words of grace that proceeded out of his mouth, and said: Is not this the son of Joseph?

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: You will surely speak this parable to me: Physician, heal thyself; whatever things we heard were done in Capernaum, do also here in thy country.

name: According to Luke
text: But he said: Verily I say to you, that no prophet is accepted in his own country.

name: According to Luke
text: And I tell you in truth that there were many widows in Israel in the days of Elijah, when the heaven was shut up for three years and six months, when there came a great famine on the whole land:

name: According to Luke
text: and to no one of them was Elijah sent but to Sarepta of Sidon, to a woman a widow.

name: According to Luke
text: And there were many lepers in Israel in the days of Elisha the prophet, and no one of them was cleansed but Naaman the Syrian.

name: According to Luke
text: And all in the synagogue, on hearing these things, were filled with anger,

name: According to Luke
text: and rose up and thrust him out of the city, and brought him to the brow of the mount on which their city was built, so as to cast him down headlong;

name: According to Luke
text: but passing through the midst of them, he went away.

name: According to Luke
text: And he came down to Capernaum, a city of Galilee, and taught them on the sabbaths;

name: According to Luke
text: and they were amazed at his teaching, for his word was with authority.114

name: According to Luke
text: And in the synagogue there was a man that had a spirit of an unclean demon, and he cried out with a great voice:

name: According to Luke
text: Aha, what have we to do with thee, Jesus the Nazarene? Hast thou come to destroy us? I know thee who thou art, the holy one of God.

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus rebuked him, saying: Be silent and come out of him. And the demon threw him into the midst and came out of him, and hurt him in no way.

name: According to Luke
text: And amazement came upon all, and they spoke one to another, saying: What a word is this, that with authority and power he commands the unclean spirits, and they come out?

name: According to Luke
text: And there went forth a rumor concerning him into every place of the surrounding country.

name: According to Luke
text: And rising up from the synagogue, he entered into the house of Simon. And Simon’s mother-in-law was confined with a great fever; and they besought him for her.

name: According to Luke
text: And standing over her he rebuked the fever, and it left her; and she immediately rose and ministered to them.

name: According to Luke
text: But when the sun had gone down, all, as many as had any sick with various diseases, brought them to him; and he laid his hands on each one of them and cured them.

name: According to Luke
text: And demons also went forth from many, crying out and saying: Thou art the Son of God. And rebuking them, he permitted them not to speak, for they knew that he was the Christ.

name: According to Luke
text: But when it was day he went out and departed to a desert place; and the multitudes sought for him: and they came to him, and endeavored to detain him that he might not go away from them.

name: According to Luke
text: But he said to them: I must preach the kingdom of God to the other cities also, because for this was I sent.

name: According to Luke
text: And he preached in the synagogues of Galilee.

name: According to Luke
text: But it came to pass while the multitude pressed upon him and heard the word of God, he was standing by the lake of Gennesaret,

name: According to Luke
text: and saw two ships standing by the lake; but the fishermen had gone out of them and had washed the nets.

name: According to Luke
text: And entering into one of the ships, which was Simon’s, he asked him to put out a little from the land; and sitting down in the ship he taught the multitudes.

name: According to Luke
text: But when he ceased speaking, he said to Simon: Put out into the deep, and let down your nets for a draught.

name: According to Luke
text: And Simon answered and said: Master, through the whole night have we toiled and taken nothing; yet at thy word I will let down the

name: According to Luke
text: And when they had done this, they enclosed a great number of fishes; and their nets began to break.

name: According to Luke
text: And they made signs to the partners in the other ship that they should come and help them; and they came, and filled both ships, so that they began to sink.

name: According to Luke
text: But Simon Peter, seeing it, fell at the knees of Jesus, saying: Depart from me, for I am a sinful man, O Lord.

name: According to Luke
text: For amazement had seized on him and all that were with him, at the draught of fishes that they had taken;

name: According to Luke
text: and in like manner also on James and John, sons of Zebedee, who were partners with Simon. And Jesus said to Simon: Fear not: from this time thou shalt catch men.

name: According to Luke
text: And they drew the ships to land, left all and followed him.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass while he was in one of the cities, behold, a man full of leprosy; and seeing Jesus, he fell on his face and besought him, saying: Lord, if thou wilt, thou canst make me clean.

name: According to Luke
text: And he, stretched forth his hand and touched him, saying: I will; be clean. And immediately the leprosy departed from him.

name: According to Luke
text: And he charged him to tell no one; but go, show thyself to the priest, and offer for thy cleansing as Moses commanded, for a testimony to them.

name: According to Luke
text: But the more there went abroad the report concerning him; and many multitudes came together to hear, and to be cured of their infirmities.

name: According to Luke
text: But he withdrew into the deserts, and prayed.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass on one of the days that he was teaching, and there were sitting Pharisees and teachers of the law, who had come out of every village of Galilee and Judea, and from Jerusalem; and the power of the Lord was present that he might heal.

name: According to Luke
text: And behold, men bringing on a bed a man who was a paralytic; and they sought to bring him in and lay him before him.

name: According to Luke
text: And not finding by what way they could bring him in be cause of the multitude, they went up on the housetop, and through the tiling let him down with the bed into the midst before Jesus.

name: According to Luke
text: And seeing their faith he said: Man, thy sins are forgiven thee.

name: According to Luke
text: And the scribes and the Pharisees began to reason, saying: Who is this that speaks blasphemies? Who is able to forgive sins but God alone?

name: According to Luke
text: But Jesus perceiving their reasonings, answered and said to them: Why reason in your hearts?

name: According to Luke
text: Which is easier, to say: Thy sins are forgiven thee, or to say: Arise and walk?116

name: According to Luke
text: But that you may know that the Son of man has authority on earth to forgive sins, he said to the paralytic: I say to thee, Rise, and take up thy bed, and go to thy house.

name: According to Luke
text: And he immediately rose up before them, took up that on which he had lain, and went away to his house glorifying God.

name: According to Luke
text: And astonishment seized on them all; and they glorified God, and were filled with fear, saying: We have seen strange things today.

name: According to Luke
text: And after these things he went out, and saw a publican named Levi sitting at the custom-house, and said to him: Follow me.

name: According to Luke
text: And leaving all, he arose and followed him.

name: According to Luke
text: And Levi made him a great feast in his house; and there was a great multitude of publicans and others who were reclining at table with them.

name: According to Luke
text: And the Pharisees and their scribes murmured against his disciples, saying: Why do you eat and drink with publicans and sinners?

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus answered and said to them: They that have health have no need of a physician, but they that are sick;

name: According to Luke
text: I have not come to call righteous men, but sinners, to repentance.

name: According to Luke
text: And they said to him: The disciples of John fast often and make prayers; likewise also those of the Pharisees; but thine eat and drink.

name: According to Luke
text: But Jesus said to them: Can you make the sons of the bridechamber fast, while the bridegroom is with them?

name: According to Luke
text: But days will come; and when the bridegroom shall have been taken away from them, then shall they fast in those days.

name: According to Luke
text: And he spoke also a parable to them: No one tears a piece from a new garment and puts it on an old garment; otherwise, both the new makes a rent, and the piece that is from the new agrees not with the old.

name: According to Luke
text: And no one puts new wine into old bottles; otherwise, the new wine bursts the bottles, and itself is spilled, and the bottles perish;

name: According to Luke
text: but new wine must be put into new bottles.

name: According to Luke
text: And no one after drinking old, desires new; for he says: The old is good.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass, on the first sabbath after the second day of the feast, that he went through the fields of grain, and his disciples pulled the ears of grain and ate, rubbing them in their hands.

name: According to Luke
text: But some of the Pharisees said: Why do you that which it is not lawful to do on the sabbath?

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus answered and said to them: Have you not read this that David did, when he was hungry, himself and those that were with

name: According to Luke
text: How he entered into the house of God, and took the loaves of the presence, and ate and gave also to those that were with him, which it is not lawful to eat but for the priests alone?

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: The Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass on another sabbath that he went into the synagogue and taught. And a man was there, and his right hand was withered.

name: According to Luke
text: And the scribes and Pharisees watched him if he would cure on the sabbath, that they might find an accusation against him.

name: According to Luke
text: But he knew their thoughts; and he said to the man that had the withered hand: Rise and stand in the midst. And he arose and stood.

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus said to them: I ask you if it is lawful on the sabbath to do good or to do evil, to save life or to destroy.

name: According to Luke
text: And looking around on them all, he said to him: Stretch forth thy hand. And he did so, and his hand was restored.

name: According to Luke
text: But they were filled with madness, and conferred one with another what they should do to Jesus.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass in these days that he went into the mountain to pray; and he spent the night in prayer to God.

name: According to Luke
text: And when day had come, he called to him his disciples, and having chosen from among them twelve, whom he also named apostles,

name: According to Luke
text: Simon, whom he also named Peter, and Andrew his brother, and James and John, and Philip and Bartholomew,

name: According to Luke
text: and Matthew and Thomas, and James son of Alphaeus, and Simon who is called Zealot,

name: According to Luke
text: and Judas brother of James, and Judas Iscariot who became a traitor;

name: According to Luke
text: and having come down with them he stood in a plain; and a great multitude of his disciples, and a great number of the people from all Judea and Jerusalem, and the seacoast of Tyre and Sidon, who had come to hear him and to be cured of their diseases;

name: According to Luke
text: and those oppressed by unclean spirits were cured;

name: According to Luke
text: and all the multitude sought to touch him, for power went forth from him and cured all.

name: According to Luke
text: And he lifted up his eyes upon his disciples and said: Blessed are you poor, for yours is the kingdom of God.

name: According to Luke
text: Blessed are you that hunger now, for you shall be filled. Blessed are you that weep now, for you shall laugh.

name: According to Luke
text: Blessed are you when men shall hate you, and when they shall shut you out from their society, and shall reproach you, and cast your name out as evil for the sake of the Son of man.

name: According to Luke
text: Rejoice in that day and leap for joy; for behold, your reward is great in heaven; for so did their fathers to the prophets.

name: According to Luke
text: But alas for you that are rich, for you have your consolation in full.118

name: According to Luke
text: Alas for you that are filled now, for you shall be hungry. Alas for you that laugh now, for you shall mourn and weep.

name: According to Luke
text: Alas when all men shall speak well of you; for so did their fathers to the false prophets.

name: According to Luke
text: But I say to you that hear: Love your enemies: do good to them that hate you,

name: According to Luke
text: bless them that curse you; pray for them that insult you.

name: According to Luke
text: To him that smites thee on the cheek offer the other also; and from him that takes from thee thy mantle, thy coat also withhold not.

name: According to Luke
text: Give to every one that asks of thee; and from him that takes away thy goods ask them not again.

name: According to Luke
text: And as you would that men should do to you, do you also to them in like manner.

name: According to Luke
text: And if you love them that love you, what thanks have you? for sinners love those that love them.

name: According to Luke
text: For if you do good to those that do good to you, what thanks have you? even sinners do the same.

name: According to Luke
text: And if you lend to those of whom you hope to receive, what thanks have you? even sinners lend to sinners that they may receive the same.

name: According to Luke
text: But love your enemies and do good and lend, hoping for nothing in return; and your reward shall be great, and you shall be sons of the Highest; for he is kind to the unthankful and the evil.

name: According to Luke
text: Become merciful, as your Father is merciful.

name: According to Luke
text: And judge not, and you shall not be judged; and condemn not, and you shall not be condemned. Release, and you shall be released;

name: According to Luke
text: give, and it shall be given to you; good measure, pressed down, shaken together, running over, shall they give into your lap; for with what measure you measure it shall be measured to you again.

name: According to Luke
text: And he spoke also a parable to them: Can a blind man lead a blind man? will not both fall into a pit?

name: According to Luke
text: A disciple is not above the teacher; but every one thoroughly instructed shall be as his teacher.

name: According to Luke
text: And why beholdest thou l the splinter that is in thy brother’s eye, but considerest not the beam that is in thy own eye?

name: According to Luke
text: How canst thou say to thy brother: Brother, let me pull out the splinter that is in thy eye, thyself not beholding the beam in thy eye? Hypocrite, pull first the beam out of thy eye, and then thou shalt see clearly to pull out the splinter that is in thy brother’s eye.

name: According to Luke
text: For there is no good tree that produces corrupt fruit; nor again a corrupt tree that produces good fruit.

name: According to Luke
text: For every tree is known by its own fruit; for not from thorns

name: According to Luke
text: The good man, out of the good treasure of his heart, brings forth that which is good; and the evil man, out of the evil treasury, brings forth that which is evil. For out of the abundance of the heart his mouth speaks.

name: According to Luke
text: But why call me: Lord, Lord, and do not the things that I say?

name: According to Luke
text: Every one that comes to me and hears my words and does them, I will show you to whom he is like.

name: According to Luke
text: He is like a man building a house, who dug and deepened, and laid a foundation on the rock; and when a flood came, the stream dashed against that house, and had not strength to shake it; because it was well built.

name: According to Luke
text: But he that hears and does not, is like a man that without a foundation built a house on the earth, against which the stream dashed, and it immediately fell in heaps; and the ruin of that house was great.

name: According to Luke
text: After he had finished all his sayings in the ears of the people, he entered into Capernaum.

name: According to Luke
text: And a certain centurion’s servant that was dear to him, being sick, was about to die.

name: According to Luke
text: But hearing of Jesus, he sent to him elders of the Jews, asking him that he would come and save his servant.

name: According to Luke
text: And they came to Jesus and asked him earnestly, saying: He is worthy for whom thou shalt do this:

name: According to Luke
text: for he loves our nation, and has himself built for us the synagogue.

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus went with them. But when he was now not far from the house, the centurion sent friends, saying: Lord, trouble not thyself; for I am hot worthy that thou shouldst come in under my roof;

name: According to Luke
text: wherefore neither thought I myself worthy to come to thee; but say in a word, and let my servant be restored to health.

name: According to Luke
text: For I am a man placed under authority, having soldiers under me; and I say to this one: Go, and he goes; and to another: Come, and he comes; and to my servant: Do this, and he does it.

name: According to Luke
text: And when Jesus heard these things he was astonished at him; and turning, he said to the multitude that followed him: I say to you, not even in Israel have I found so great faith.

name: According to Luke
text: And those that had been sent returned to the house and found the servant well.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass on the following day he went to a city called Nain; and there went with him many of his disciples and a great multitude.120

name: According to Luke
text: And when he came near the gate of the city, behold, there was carried out dead an only-born son of his mother, and she was a widow; and a great multitude of the city was with her.

name: According to Luke
text: And seeing her, the Lord had pity on her, and said to her: Weep not.

name: According to Luke
text: And coming forward he touched the bier; and those that bore it stopped; and he said: Young man, I say to thee. Arise.

name: According to Luke
text: And the dead man sat up and began to speak; and he gave him to his mother.

name: According to Luke
text: And fear seized them all, and they glorified God, saying: A great prophet has risen among us; and, God has visited his people.

name: According to Luke
text: And this saying concerning him went forth into the whole of Judea, and all the region round about.

name: According to Luke
text: And his disciples told John of all these things.

name: According to Luke
text: And having called some two of his disciples, John sent to the Lord, saying: Art thou he that comes, or look we for another?

name: According to Luke
text: And coming to him the men said: John the Baptist has sent us to thee, saying: Art thou he that comes, or look we for another?

name: According to Luke
text: In that hour he cured many of diseases and scourges and evil spirits, and to many blind he gave to see.

name: According to Luke
text: And he answered and said to them: Go tell John what things you have seen and heard, that the blind receive sight, the lame walk, lepers are cleansed, the deaf hear, the dead are raised, the poor have the gospel preached to them;

name: According to Luke
text: and blessed is he whoever is not offended at me.

name: According to Luke
text: But when the messengers of John had departed, he began to say to the multitudes concerning John: What went you out into the wilderness to see? a reed shaken by the wind?

name: According to Luke
text: But what went you out to see? a man clothed in soft raiment? Behold, they that wear soft clothing and live in luxury are in kings’ houses.

name: According to Luke
text: But what went you out to see? a prophet? Yes, I say to you, and more than a prophet.

name: According to Luke
text: This is he of whom it is written: Behold, I send my messenger before thy face who shall prepare thy way before thee.

name: According to Luke
text: I say to you, among those born of women there is no prophet greater than John; but the least in the kingdom of God is greater than he.

name: According to Luke
text: And all the people that heard and the publicans justified God, having been baptized with the baptism of John;

name: According to Luke
text: but the Pharisees and the lawyers rejected the counsel of God against themselves, not having been baptized by him.

name: According to Luke
text: To what then shall I liken the men of this generation, and to what

name: According to Luke
text: They are like children that sit in the market and call one to another, saying: We piped to you and you did not dance, we mourned and you did not lament.

name: According to Luke
text: For John the Baptist came neither eating bread nor drinking wine, and you say: He has a demon.

name: According to Luke
text: The Son of man has come eating and drinking, and you say: Behold, a man, a glutton and a winebibber, a friend of publicans and sinners.

name: According to Luke
text: And yet wisdom is justified on the part of all her children.

name: According to Luke
text: And some one of the Pharisees asked him to eat with him; and he went into the house of the Pharisee, and reclined at table.

name: According to Luke
text: And behold, a woman, who was in the city, a sinner, and had learned that he reclined at table in the house of the Pharisee, brought an alabaster box of ointment,

name: According to Luke
text: and stood behind at his feet weeping, and began to moisten his feet with her tears, and wiped them with the hair of her head, and kissed his feet, and anointed them with the ointment.

name: According to Luke
text: But the Pharisee that had invited him seeing it, spoke within himself, saying: This man, if he were a prophet, would have known who and what manner of woman this is that touches him, that she is a sinner.

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus answered and said to him: Simon, I have something to say to thee. He replied: Teacher, say on.

name: According to Luke
text: A certain creditor had two debtors: the one owed him five hundred denarii, the other, fifty.

name: According to Luke
text: As they had nothing to pay, he forgave them both. Which of them then would love him the more?

name: According to Luke
text: Simon answered and said: I suppose that he to whom he forgave the more. He said to him: Thou hast rightly judged.

name: According to Luke
text: And turning to the woman, he said to Simon: Seest thou this woman? I entered thy house; water for my feet thou gavest not; but she with her tears has moistened my feet, and with her hair has wiped them.

name: According to Luke
text: A kiss thou gavest me not; but she from the time I came in has not ceased to kiss my feet.

name: According to Luke
text: With oil my head thou didst not anoint; but she with ointment has anointed my feet.

name: According to Luke
text: Wherefore, I say to thee, her sins which are many are forgiven, because she loved much; but he to whom little is forgiven, loves little.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to her: Thy sins are forgiven.

name: According to Luke
text: And they that reclined at table began to say within themselves: Who is this that also forgives sins?

name: According to Luke
text: But he said to the woman: Thy faith has saved thee, go in peace.122

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass afterward that he went through every city and village, preaching and telling the glad tidings of the kingdom of God; and the twelve were with him,

name: According to Luke
text: and some women who had been cured of evil spirits and diseases; Mary called Magdalene, out of whom had gone seven demons,

name: According to Luke
text: and Joanna wife of Chuza, Herod’s steward, and Susanna, and many others, who ministered to him of their goods.

name: According to Luke
text: But as a great multitude had come together, and they were coming to him from every city, he spoke by a parable:

name: According to Luke
text: The sower went forth to sow his seed. And as he sowed, some fell by the way, and was trod down, and the birds of heaven ate it up;

name: According to Luke
text: and other fell upon the rock, and springing up it withered because it had no moisture;

name: According to Luke
text: and other fell in the midst of thorns, and the thorns grew with it and choked it;

name: According to Luke
text: and other fell on the good ground, and springing up it produced fruit a hundredfold. Saying these things, he cried: He that has ears to hear, let him hear.

name: According to Luke
text: And his disciples asked him what the parable might be.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said: To you is given to know the mysteries of the kingdom of God; but to the rest in parables; that seeing they may not see, and hearing they may not understand.

name: According to Luke
text: But the parable is this: The seed is the word of God.

name: According to Luke
text: And they by the way are they that hear; then comes the devil and takes away the word from their heart, lest having believed they should be saved.

name: According to Luke
text: And they on the rock are they who when they hear, receive the word with joy; and these have no root, who believe for a time, and in time of temptation apostatize.

name: According to Luke
text: But that which fell among thorns, are they that hear, and, going forth, are choked by the cares and riches and pleasures of life, and bring no fruit to perfection.

name: According to Luke
text: But that on the good ground, are they that in a good and honest heart having heard the word keep it, and bring forth fruit in patience.

name: According to Luke
text: But no one after lighting a lamp covers it with a vessel or puts it under a bed, but puts it on a lampstand, that they who come in may see the light.

name: According to Luke
text: For there is nothing concealed that shall not become manifest, neither hid which shall not be known and come into open view.

name: According to Luke
text: Take heed therefore how you hear; for whoever has, to him shall be given; and whoever has not, even that which he seems to have

name: According to Luke
text: And his mother and his brothers were coming to him, and were not able to approach him because of the multitude.

name: According to Luke
text: And it was told him: Thy mother and thy brothers stand without desiring to see thee.

name: According to Luke
text: But he answered and said to them: My mother and my brothers are they that hear the word of God and do it.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass on one of the days that he himself entered a ship, and his disciples; and he said to them: Let us go over to the other side of the lake; and they put to sea.

name: According to Luke
text: But as they were sailing he fell asleep; and a squall of wind came down on the lake, and they were filled and were in danger.

name: According to Luke
text: And coming forward, they waked him, saying: Master, Master, we perish. But he awoke and rebuked the wind and the raging of the water; and they ceased, and there was a calm.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: Where is your faith? But being afraid they were astonished, saying one to another: Who then is this, that he commands both the winds and the water, and they obey him?

name: According to Luke
text: And they sailed down to the country of the Gergesenes, which is opposite to Galilee.

name: According to Luke
text: And when he had come forth to land, there met him from the city a man that had demons; and for a long time he wore no clothing, and abode not in a house, but in the tombs.

name: According to Luke
text: But seeing Jesus, he cried out and fell before him, and with a loud voice said: What have I to do with thee, Jesus, Son of God Most High? I beseech thee, torment me not.

name: According to Luke
text: For he commanded the unclean spirit to come out of the man; for at many times it had seized him, and he was bound with chains and fetters, being imprisoned; and breaking the bonds he was driven by the demon into the deserts.

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus asked him, saying: What is thy name? And he said: Legion, for many demons had entered into him.

name: According to Luke
text: And they besought him that he would not command them to go away into the abyss.

name: According to Luke
text: But there was a herd of many swine feeding in the mountain; and they besought him that he would permit them to enter into them. And he permitted them.

name: According to Luke
text: And the demons having come out of the man entered into the swine; and the herd rushed down the steep into the lake and were choked.

name: According to Luke
text: But those who fed them, seeing what had been done, fled and told it in the city and in the country.

name: According to Luke
text: And they came out to see what had been done, and came to Jesus, and found the man, out of whom the demons had gone, sitting,124 clothed and in his right mind, at the feet of Jesus; and they were afraid.

name: According to Luke
text: And those that saw told them how the possessed with demons had been saved.

name: According to Luke
text: And all the multitude of the surrounding country of the Gergesenes asked him to depart from them; for they were seized with great fear; and he entered a ship and returned.

name: According to Luke
text: And the man out of whom the demons had gone besought him, that he might be with him; but he sent him away, saying:

name: According to Luke
text: Return to thy house, and tell how great things God has done for thee. And he departed, proclaiming throughout the whole city how great things Jesus had done for him.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass when Jesus had returned, the multitude received him gladly; for all were looking for him.

name: According to Luke
text: And behold, there came a man whose name was Jairus, and he was a ruler of the synagogue; and falling at the feet of Jesus, he besought him to come into his house,

name: According to Luke
text: for he had a daughter, an only child, about twelve years old, and she was dying. But as he was going, the multitudes thronged him.

name: According to Luke
text: And a woman, who had had an issue of blood for twelve years, who had spent her whole living on physicians and could be cured by none,

name: According to Luke
text: came behind and touched the fringe of his mantle; and immediately the flow of her blood stopped.

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus said: Who is it that touched me? And as all denied, Peter and those with him said: Master, the multitudes press on thee and crowd about thee.

name: According to Luke
text: But Jesus said: Some one touched me; for I perceived power going forth from me.

name: According to Luke
text: And the woman, seeing that she had not escaped notice, came trembling, and having fallen before him told before all the people for what cause she had touched him, and how she had been immediately restored to health.

name: According to Luke
text: But he said to her: Daughter, thy faith has saved thee; go in peace.

name: According to Luke
text: While he was yet speaking, there comes some one from the house of the ruler of the synagogue, saying: Thy daughter is dead: trouble the Teacher no more.

name: According to Luke
text: But Jesus hearing it answered him: Fear not; only believe, and she shall be saved.

name: According to Luke
text: And when he had come to the house, he permitted no one to go in with him but Peter and John and James, and the father and the mother of the child.

name: According to Luke
text: And all wept, and lamented her. But he said: Weep not: she is not

name: According to Luke
text: And they derided him, knowing that she was dead.

name: According to Luke
text: And taking her by the hand, he called, saying: Child, awake.

name: According to Luke
text: And her spirit returned, and she immediately arose; and he commanded that food should be given to her.

name: According to Luke
text: And her parents were astonished; but he charged them to tell no one what had been done.

name: According to Luke
text: And having called together the twelve, he gave them power and authority over all the demons, and to cure diseases.

name: According to Luke
text: And he sent them to preach the kingdom of God, and to heal,

name: According to Luke
text: and said to them: Take nothing for the journey, neither staff, nor bag, nor bread, nor silver, nor have two coats apiece.

name: According to Luke
text: And whatever house you enter, there abide, and thence depart.

name: According to Luke
text: And as many as may not receive you, when going out from that city shake off even the dust from your feet for a testimony against them.

name: According to Luke
text: And they went out and passed through every village, preaching the gospel and curing everywhere.

name: According to Luke
text: But Herod the tetrarch heard of all things that were done, and was perplexed because it was said by some that John had risen from the dead,

name: According to Luke
text: and by some that Elijah had appeared, and by others that a prophet, some one of the ancients, had risen.

name: According to Luke
text: But Herod said: John I beheaded; but who is this of whom I hear such things? And he sought to see him.

name: According to Luke
text: And the apostles returned and told him all things that they had done. And he took them with him and withdrew privately to a city called Bethsaida.

name: According to Luke
text: But the multitudes knew it and followed him; and he received them and spoke to them of the kingdom of God, and healed those that had need of healing.

name: According to Luke
text: But the day began to decline; and the twelve came and said to him: Send the multitude away, that they may go into the villages and country round about, and lodge and find food; for we are here in a desert place.

name: According to Luke
text: But he said to them: Do you give them to eat. They replied: We have not more than five loaves and two fishes, unless we should go and buy food for all this people.

name: According to Luke
text: And they were about five thousand men. But he said to his disciples: Make them recline in table-parties of fifty each.

name: According to Luke
text: And they did so, and made them all recline.126

name: According to Luke
text: And taking the five loaves and the two fishes, he looked up to heaven, blessed them and broke, and gave to the disciples to set before the multitude.

name: According to Luke
text: And all ate and were filled; and there was taken up what remained to them of broken pieces, twelve traveling-baskets.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass as he was praying alone, the disciples were with him; and he asked them, saying: Who do the multitude say that I am?

name: According to Luke
text: And they answered and said; John the Baptist; and others, Elijah; and others, that a prophet, some one of the ancients, has risen.

name: According to Luke
text: But he said to them: But who say you that I am? And Peter answered and said: The Christ of God.

name: According to Luke
text: And charging them strictly, he commanded them to tell this to no one,

name: According to Luke
text: saying that the Son of man must suffer many things, and be rejected by the elders and chief priests and scribes, and be put to death, and rise the third day.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to all: If any one will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross daily, and follow me.

name: According to Luke
text: For whoever will save his life, shall lose it; but whoever may lose his life for my sake, he shall save it.

name: According to Luke
text: For what is a man profited if he gain the whole world, but destroy himself or be lost?

name: According to Luke
text: For whoever shall have been ashamed of me and my words, of him shall the Son of man be ashamed, when he shall come in his glory, and that of the Father, and of the holy angels.

name: According to Luke
text: But I tell you truly, there are some of these standing here that shall not taste of death till they shall have seen the kingdom of God.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass about eight days after these sayings, that he took Peter and John and James, and went up into a mountain to pray.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass as he prayed that the appearance of his face was changed, and his clothing was white and glittering.

name: According to Luke
text: And behold, two men conversed with him, who were Moses and Elijah;

name: According to Luke
text: who appearing in glory spoke of his departure, which he was about to accomplish in Jerusalem.

name: According to Luke
text: But Peter and those with him were heavy with sleep; but keeping awake they saw his glory and the two men that stood with him.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass as they were separated from him Peter said to Jesus: Master, it is good that we are here, and let us make three tents, one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elijah, not

name: According to Luke
text: And as he spoke these things there came a cloud and overshadowed them; and they were afraid as they entered the cloud.

name: According to Luke
text: And a voice came from the cloud, saying: This is my Son, the elect; hear him.

name: According to Luke
text: And when the voice had passed, Jesus was found alone. And they kept silence, and told no one, in those days, any of the things that they had seen.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass on the next day, when they had come down from the mountain, a great multitude met him.

name: According to Luke
text: And behold, a man from the multitude cried, saying: Teacher, I beseech thee, look upon my son, for he is my only born;

name: According to Luke
text: and lo, a spirit seizes him, and suddenly cries out, and convulses him so that he foams, and after bruising him hardly departs from him.

name: According to Luke
text: And I requested thy disciples that they would cast him out; and they were not able.

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus answered and said: O generation faithless and perverse, how long shall I be with you, and bear with you? Bring thy son hither.

name: According to Luke
text: But while he was yet coming, the demon threw him down and convulsed him; and Jesus rebuked the unclean spirit, and restored the child to health, and gave him again to his father.

name: According to Luke
text: And all were amazed at the majesty of God. But while all were wondering at all things that he did, he said to his disciples:

name: According to Luke
text: Put you into your ears these words; for the Son of man is about to be delivered into the hands of men.

name: According to Luke
text: But they comprehended not this saying, and it was concealed from them that they could not perceive it; and they were afraid to ask him concerning this saying.

name: According to Luke
text: And there arose a reasoning among them as to which of them was greatest.

name: According to Luke
text: But Jesus, knowing the reasoning of their heart, took a little child and set it by him,

name: According to Luke
text: and said to them: Whoever shall receive this child in my name receives me; and whoever shall receive me, receives him that sent me; for he that is least among you all, he is great.

name: According to Luke
text: And John answered and said: Master, we saw one casting out demons in thy name, and we forbade him, because he follows not with us.

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus said to him: Forbid not, for he that is not against us is for us.

name: According to Luke
text: But it came to pass as the days of his being received up were completing, he steadfastly fixed his face to go to Jerusalem,

name: According to Luke
text: and sent messengers before his face. And they went and entered a city of the Samaritans, so as to make ready for him;128

name: According to Luke
text: and they received him not, because his face was going to Jerusalem.

name: According to Luke
text: And the disciples James and John, seeing it, said: Lord, wilt thou that we command fire to come down from heaven, and consume them?

name: According to Luke
text: But he turned and rebuked them.

name: According to Luke
text: And they went to another village.

name: According to Luke
text: And as they were going on the way, some one said to him: I will follow thee wherever thou goest.

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus said to him: The foxes have dens, and the birds of the heavens have roosts, but the Son of man has not where he may lay his head.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to another: Follow me. He replied: Permit me first to go and bury my father.

name: According to Luke
text: But he said to him: Let the dead bury their own dead: but go thou and proclaim the kingdom of God.

name: According to Luke
text: And another also said: I will follow thee, Lord; but first permit me to take leave of those at my house.

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus said to him: No one that puts his hand to the plow and looks back is fit for the kingdom of God.

name: According to Luke
text: But after these things the Lord appointed seventy others also, and sent them two and two before his face into every city and place whither he himself was about to come.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: The harvest indeed is great, but the laborers are few: pray therefore the Lord of the harvest that he send laborers into his harvest.

name: According to Luke
text: Go; behold, I send you forth as lambs in the midst of wolves.

name: According to Luke
text: Carry no purse, no bag, no sandals: salute no one by the way.

name: According to Luke
text: Whatever house you enter, first say: Peace to this house.

name: According to Luke
text: And if a son of peace be there, your peace shall rest upon it; but if not, it shall return upon you.

name: According to Luke
text: And abide in the same house, eating and drinking such things as they have; for the laborer is worthy of his hire. Go not from house to house.

name: According to Luke
text: And whatever city you enter and they receive you, eat what is set before you,

name: According to Luke
text: and cure those in it that are sick, and say to them: The kingdom of God has come near to you,

name: According to Luke
text: But whatever city you enter, and they receive you not, go out into

name: According to Luke
text: Even the dust of your city that cleaves to us on our feet we wipe off against you: yet know this that the kingdom of God is near.

name: According to Luke
text: And I say to you that it shall be more tolerable for Sodom in that day than for that city.

name: According to Luke
text: Alas for thee, Chorazin; alas for thee, Bethsaida; for if the mighty works which have been done in you had been done in Tyre and Sidon, they would have repented long ago, sitting in sackcloth and ashes.

name: According to Luke
text: Furthermore, it shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon in the judgment, than for you.

name: According to Luke
text: And thou, Capernaum, shalt thou be exalted to heaven? Thou shalt be brought down to hades.

name: According to Luke
text: He that hears you hears me; and he that rejects you rejects me; and he that rejects me rejects him that sent me.

name: According to Luke
text: And the seventy returned with joy, saying: Lord, even the demons are subjected to us in thy name.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: I beheld Satan like lightning from heaven fallen.

name: According to Luke
text: Behold, I have given you authority to tread on serpents and scorpions, and over all the power of the enemy, and nothing shall in any way hurt you.

name: According to Luke
text: Yet in this rejoice not, that the spirits are subjected to you; but rejoice that your names are written in the heavens.

name: According to Luke
text: In that hour he rejoiced in the Holy Spirit and said: I give thee thanks, Father, Lord of heaven and of earth, because thou hast concealed these things from the wise and prudent, and hast revealed them to babes; yes, Father, for so it seemed good in thy sight.

name: According to Luke
text: And turning to the disciples, he said: All things have been delivered to me by my Father, and no one knows who the Son is but the Father, and who the Father is but the Son, and he to whomever the Son will reveal him.

name: According to Luke
text: And turning to the disciples he said privately: Blessed are the eyes that see what you see.

name: According to Luke
text: For I say to you that many prophets and kings desired to see what you see, and did not see, and to hear what you hear, and did not hear.

name: According to Luke
text: And behold, a lawyer stood up tempting him, saying: Teacher, what shall I do to inherit eternal life?

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to him: What is written in the law? How readest thou?

name: According to Luke
text: And he answered and said: Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with thy whole heart, and with thy whole soul, and with thy whole strength, and with thy whole mind, and thy neighbor as thyself.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to him: Thou hast rightly answered: do this, and thou shalt live.130

name: According to Luke
text: But he, willing to justify himself, said to Jesus: And who is my neighbor?

name: According to Luke
text: Jesus replying said: A man went down from Jerusalem to Jericho, and fell among robbers, who stripped him and wounded him, and went away, leaving him half dead.

name: According to Luke
text: And by chance a priest went down on that road, and seeing him, passed by on the other side.

name: According to Luke
text: And in like manner also a Levite, having come to the place, went and looked on and passed by on the other side.

name: According to Luke
text: But a Samaritan on a journey came opposite to him, and seeing him, was moved with pity;

name: According to Luke
text: and going to him, he bound up his wounds, pouring on oil and wine; and setting him on his own beast, took him to an inn and took care of him.

name: According to Luke
text: And on the morrow, taking out two denarii, he gave them to the innkeeper and said: Take care of him, and whatever thou spendest more. I on my return will repay thee.

name: According to Luke
text: Which of these three, thinkest thou, was neighbor to him that fell among the robbers?

name: According to Luke
text: He replied: He that showed mercy to him. And Jesus said to him: Go, and do thou in like manner.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass as they journeyed that he went into a certain village; and a certain woman named Martha received him into her house.

name: According to Luke
text: And she had a sister called Mary, who also sat at the feet of the Lord and heard his word.

name: According to Luke
text: But Martha was perplexed about much service; and she stood by him and said: Lord, carest thou not that my sister has left me to serve alone? Bid her therefore that she help me.

name: According to Luke
text: But the Lord answered and said to her: Martha, Martha, thou art anxious and troubled about many things;

name: According to Luke
text: of one however there is need; for Mary has chosen the good part, which shall not be taken away from her.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass as he was in a certain place praying, when he had ceased, some one of his disciples said to him: Lord, teach us to pray, as John also taught his disciples.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: Whenever you pray, say: Father, thy name be hallowed: thy kingdom come:

name: According to Luke
text: give us day by day our needful bread;

name: According to Luke
text: and forgive us our sins, for we also forgive every one indebted to

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: Which of you shall have a friend, and shall go to him at midnight and say to him: Friend, lend me three loaves,

name: According to Luke
text: because a friend of mine has come from a journey to me, and I have not what I may set before him.

name: According to Luke
text: And he from within shall answer and say: Trouble me not; the door is now closed, and my children with me are in bed: I cannot rise to give thee.

name: According to Luke
text: I say to you, though he will not give him, having risen because he is his friend, yet because of his importunity he will rise and give him as many as he needs.

name: According to Luke
text: And I say to you: Ask, and it shall be given to you; seek, and you shall find; knock, and it shall be opened to you.

name: According to Luke
text: For every one that asks receives, and he that seeks finds, and to him that knocks it shall be opened.

name: According to Luke
text: But should a son ask bread of any one of you that is a father, would he give him a stone? or also a fish, would he for a fish give him a serpent?

name: According to Luke
text: or should he also ask an egg, would he give him a scorpion?

name: According to Luke
text: If therefore you being evil know how to give good gifts to your children, how much more will the Father who is from heaven give the Holy Spirit to those that ask him.

name: According to Luke
text: And he was casting out a demon, and it was dumb; but it came to pass when the demon had gone out the dumb man spoke. And the multitudes wondered;

name: According to Luke
text: but some of them said: By Beelzebub, the prince of the demons, he casts out the demons.

name: According to Luke
text: And others tempting sought of him a sign from heaven.

name: According to Luke
text: But he knowing their thoughts said to them: Every kingdom divided against itself is made desolate, and house falls against house.

name: According to Luke
text: And if Satan also has been divided against himself, how shall his kingdom stand? for you say, that I cast out the demons by Beelzebub.

name: According to Luke
text: But if I cast out the demons by Beelzebub, by whom do your sons cast them out? Therefore they shall be your judges.

name: According to Luke
text: But if I by the finger of God cast out the demons, then has the kingdom of God already come upon you.

name: According to Luke
text: When the strong man armed keeps guard over his palace, his goods are in peace.

name: According to Luke
text: But when a stronger than he comes upon him and overcomes him, he takes away all his armor in which he has trusted, and distributes his spoils.

name: According to Luke
text: He that is not with me is against me, and he that gathers not with me scatters*. * lit. “scatters me” in Sinaiticus, according to Ehrman.132

name: According to Luke
text: When the unclean spirit has gone out of the man, he goes through dry places seeking rest, and finding none, he says: I will return to my house whence I came.

name: According to Luke
text: And he comes and finds it swept and set in order.

name: According to Luke
text: Then he goes and takes with him seven other spirits more wicked than himself; and entering in, they dwell there; and the last state of that man becomes worse than the first.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass as he said these things, a woman from the multitude lifted up her voice and said to him: Blessed is the womb that bore thee, and the breasts that thou didst suck.

name: According to Luke
text: But he said: Yes rather, blessed are they that hear the word of God and keep it.

name: According to Luke
text: And while the multitudes crowded together, he began to say: This generation is an evil generation: it seeks a sign, and no sign shall be given to it but the sign of Jonah.

name: According to Luke
text: For as Jonah was a sign to the Ninevites, so shall the Son of man also be to this generation.

name: According to Luke
text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with the men of this generation and condemn them; for she came from the ends of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon; and behold, something greater than Solomon is here.

name: According to Luke
text: The men of Nineveh shall stand up in the judgment with this generation and condemn it; for they repented at the preaching of Jonah, and behold, something greater than Jonah is here.

name: According to Luke
text: No one after lighting a lamp puts it in a secret place, nor under the measure, but upon the lamp-stand, that those who come in may see the light.

name: According to Luke
text: The lamp of the body is thy eye. When thy eye is simple, thy whole body also is full of light; but whenever it is evil, thy body also is full of darkness.

name: According to Luke
text: Take heed therefore lest the light that is in thee is darkness.

name: According to Luke
text: If thus thy whole body is full of light, having no part dark, the whole shall be full of light, as when the lamp by its brightness gives thee light.

name: According to Luke
text: But while he spoke, a Pharisee asked him to dine with him; and he went in and reclined at table.

name: According to Luke
text: And the Pharisee seeing it wondered that he had not first immersed himself before dinner.

name: According to Luke
text: But the Lord said to him: Now, you Pharisees make clean the outside of the cup and the dish, but your inward part is full of extortion and wickedness.

name: According to Luke
text: Senseless men; did not he that made the outside make the inside

name: According to Luke
text: But give the contents as charity, and behold, all things are clean to you.

name: According to Luke
text: But alas for you Pharisees, for you pay tithes of mint and rue and every herb, and pass by the judgment and the love of God: these ought you to have done and not leave those undone.

name: According to Luke
text: Alas for you Pharisees, for you love the chief seat in the synagogues and salutations in the markets.

name: According to Luke
text: Alas for you, for you are as graves that appear not, and the men that walk over them know it not.

name: According to Luke
text: And some one of the lawyers answering said to him: Teacher, saying these things, thou reproachest us also.

name: According to Luke
text: He replied: Alas for you lawyers also, for you burden men with burdens hard to be borne, and yourselves touch not the burdens with one of your fingers.

name: According to Luke
text: Alas for you, for you build the sepulchers of the prophets, and your fathers killed them.

name: According to Luke
text: Therefore you are witnesses and you consent to the deeds of your fathers, for they indeed killed them, but you build.

name: According to Luke
text: Wherefore also the wisdom of God said: I will send to them prophets and apostles, and of them they will kill and persecute,

name: According to Luke
text: that the blood of all the prophets, which has been shed from the foundation of the world, may be required of this generation;

name: According to Luke
text: from the blood of Abel to the blood of Zachariah, who perished between the altar and the house: yes, I say to you, it shall be required of this generation.

name: According to Luke
text: Alas for you lawyers, for you have taken away the key of knowledge: you went not in yourselves, and those that were entering you hindered.

name: According to Luke
text: And when he had gone out thence the scribes and the Pharisees began to be very angry, and to press him to speak of many things,

name: According to Luke
text: lying in wait to catch something I from his mouth.

name: According to Luke
text: In the meantime, when myriads of the multitude had come together, so that they trod one upon another, he began to say to his disciples first: Beware you of the leaven of the Pharisees, which is hypocrisy.

name: According to Luke
text: But nothing is concealed which shall not be revealed, and hid which shall not be made known.

name: According to Luke
text: Wherefore, whatever things you have said in darkness, shall be heard in the light, and what you have spoken in the ear in closets, shall be proclaimed on the housetops.

name: According to Luke
text: But I say to you, my friends, be not afraid of them that kill the body, and after this have no more that they can do.134

name: According to Luke
text: But I will show you whom you shall fear: Fear him who after he has killed has authority to cast into hell. Yes, I say to you, fear him.

name: According to Luke
text: Are not five sparrows sold for two farthings? And yet not one of them is forgotten before God.

name: According to Luke
text: But even the hairs of your head are all numbered. Fear not: you are of more value than many sparrows.

name: According to Luke
text: But I say to you: Whoever confesses me before men, him also shall the Son of man confess before the angels of God;

name: According to Luke
text: but he that denies me before men shall be denied before the angels of God.

name: According to Luke
text: And every one that shall speak a word against the Son of man, it shall be forgiven him; but to him that blasphemes against the Holy Spirit it shall not be forgiven.

name: According to Luke
text: But when they bring you before synagogues, and rulers, and authorities, be not anxious how or what you shall answer in defense or what you shall say;

name: According to Luke
text: for the Holy Spirit shall teach you in the same hour what things you ought to say.

name: According to Luke
text: But someone from the multitude said to him: Teacher, speak to my brother that he divide with me the inheritance.

name: According to Luke
text: But he said to him: Man, who appointed me a judge or a divider over you?

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: Take heed and beware of all covetousness, for no one has his life in the abundance of the things which he possesses.

name: According to Luke
text: And he spoke a parable to them, saying: The ground of a certain rich man brought forth abundantly.

name: According to Luke
text: And he reasoned within himself, saying: What shall I do, for I have not where I shall gather in my fruits?

name: According to Luke
text: And he said: This will I do; I will pull down my barns and build greater, and there will I gather in all my produce and my good things;

name: According to Luke
text: and I will say to my soul: Soul, thou hast many good things laid up for many years: rest, eat, drink, be merry.

name: According to Luke
text: But God said to him: Senseless man, this night shall they require thy soul of thee: but the things that thou hast prepared, whose shall they be?

name: According to Luke
text: So is he that lays up treasure for himself and is not rich toward God.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to his disciples: Therefore, I say to you, be not anxious for your life what you shall eat, neither for your body what you shall put on.

name: According to Luke
text: Consider the ravens, that they neither sow nor reap, which have neither storehouse nor granary, and yet God feeds them: how much better you are than the birds.

name: According to Luke
text: But which of you by being anxious can add to his age one cubit?

name: According to Luke
text: If then you can do not even the least, why are you anxious about the rest?

name: According to Luke
text: Consider the lilies, how they neither spin nor weave; yet I say to you, not even Solomon in all his glory was clothed like one of these.

name: According to Luke
text: And if God so clothes the grass that to-day is in the field, and tomorrow is thrown into the oven, how much more will he clothe you, O you of little faith.

name: According to Luke
text: And you, seek not what you shall eat and what you shall drink, and be not of doubtful mind;

name: According to Luke
text: for all these things the nations of the world seek after; but your Father knows that you need these.

name: According to Luke
text: But seek his kingdom, and these things shall be given you in addition.

name: According to Luke
text: Fear not, little flock; for it is your Father’s good pleasure to give you the kingdom.

name: According to Luke
text: Sell your possessions and give charity: make for yourselves purses that grow not old, a treasury unfailing in the heavens, where no thief comes near, neither moth corrupts.

name: According to Luke
text: For where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.

name: According to Luke
text: Let your loins be girded and your lamps burning;

name: According to Luke
text: and be you like men awaiting their lord, when he shall return from the marriage, that when he comes and knocks they may immediately open to him.

name: According to Luke
text: Blessed are those servants, whom the lord when he comes shall find watching: verily I say to you that he will gird himself and make them recline at table, and coming forth he will serve them.

name: According to Luke
text: And if in the second, and if in the third watch, he shall come and find them so, blessed are they.

name: According to Luke
text: But know this, that if the master of the house had known at what hour the thief would come, he would not have permitted his house to be broken through.

name: According to Luke
text: And you, be ready, for at an hour at which you think not the Son of man comes.

name: According to Luke
text: But Peter said to him: Lord, to us dost thou speak this parable or also to all?

name: According to Luke
text: And the Lord said: Who then is the faithful steward, the prudent, whom the lord shall appoint over his company of servants to give the measure of food in season?

name: According to Luke
text: Blessed is that servant, whom his lord on coming shall find so doing.136

name: According to Luke
text: Truly I say to you that he will set him over all his goods.

name: According to Luke
text: But if that servant shall say in his heart: My lord delays to come, and shall begin to smite the menservants and the maidservants, to eat also and to drink and to be drunken:

name: According to Luke
text: the lord of that servant will come in a day that he looks not for, and at an hour that he knows not, and will cut him asunder, and appoint his portion with the unfaithful.

name: According to Luke
text: But that servant that knew his lord’s will, and did not prepare or do according to his will, shall be beaten with many stripes;

name: According to Luke
text: but he that knew not, and did things worthy of stripes, shall be beaten with few. And every one to whom much has been given, of him much shall be required, and to whom much has been committed, of him will they ask the more.

name: According to Luke
text: A fire came I to throw upon the earth, and what would I if it were already kindled?

name: According to Luke
text: A baptism have I to be baptized with, and how am I in pain till it be accomplished.

name: According to Luke
text: Think you that I came to give peace on earth? I tell you no, but rather division.

name: According to Luke
text: For there shall be, from this time, five in one house divided; three against two and two against three

name: According to Luke
text: shall they be divided, father against son and son against father; mother against daughter and daughter against mother; mother-in- law against daughter-in-law, and daughter-in-law against mother-in- law.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said also to the multitudes: When you see a cloud rising in the west, immediately you say that a shower is coming, and so it comes to pass;

name: According to Luke
text: and when you see the south wind blowing, you say that there will be heat, and it comes to pass.

name: According to Luke
text: Hypocrites, you know how to judge of the face of the earth and of the heaven, but how do you not judge of this time?

name: According to Luke
text: And why also do you not of yourselves judge that which is right?

name: According to Luke
text: For as thou goest with thy opponent-at-law to the ruler, on the way endeavor to be delivered from him, lest perhaps he drag thee to the judge, and the judge deliver thee to the collector, and the collector throw thee into prison.

name: According to Luke
text: I tell thee, thou shalt not come out thence till thou shalt have paid even the last farthing.

name: According to Luke
text: And he answered and said to them: Think you that these Galileans had become sinners above all the Galileans because they suffered such things?

name: According to Luke
text: I tell you no; but unless you repent, you shall all in like manner perish.

name: According to Luke
text: Or those eighteen, on whom fell the tower in Siloam and killed them, think you that they had become debtors above all the men that dwell in Jerusalem?

name: According to Luke
text: I tell you no; but unless you repent, you shall all in like manner perish.

name: According to Luke
text: And he spoke this parable: A certain man had a fig-tree planted in his vineyard, and he came seeking fruit on it, and found none.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to the vinedresser: Behold, for three years I come seeking fruit on this fig-tree and find none: cut it down; why also spoils it the ground?

name: According to Luke
text: But he answered and said to him: Sir, let it alone this year also, till I shall dig about it and throw in manure;

name: According to Luke
text: and if afterward it produce fruit; but if not, thou shalt cut it down.

name: According to Luke
text: And he was teaching in one of the synagogues on the Sabbath.

name: According to Luke
text: And behold, a woman that had had a spirit of infirmity eighteen years; and she was bowed together and was not able to lift herself up at all.

name: According to Luke
text: And seeing her, Jesus called to her and said to her: Woman, thou art loosed from thy infirmity;

name: According to Luke
text: and he laid his hands on her; and she immediately stood erect, and glorified God.

name: According to Luke
text: But the ruler of the synagogue answered, being angry because Jesus had cured on the sabbath, and said to the multitude: There are six days in which work ought to be done: on them therefore come and be cured, and not on the sabbath day.

name: According to Luke
text: But the Lord answered him and said: Hypocrites, does not each one of you on the sabbath loose his ox or his ass from the stall and lead him away and give him water?

name: According to Luke
text: But this woman, who is a daughter of Abraham, whom Satan has bound lo, eighteen years, ought she not to be loosed from this bond on the sabbath day?

name: According to Luke
text: And when he had said these things, all his adversaries were ashamed, and all the multitude rejoiced for all the glorious things that had been done by him.

name: According to Luke
text: He said therefore: To what is the kingdom of God like, and to what shall I liken it?

name: According to Luke
text: It is like a grain of mustard that a man took and threw into his garden; and it grew and became a tree, and the birds of the heaven roosted in its branches.138

name: According to Luke
text: And again he said: To what shall I liken the kingdom of God?

name: According to Luke
text: It is like leaven, which a woman took and hid in three measures of flour, till the whole was leavened.

name: According to Luke
text: And he passed through the cities and villages teaching and making the journey to Jerusalem.

name: According to Luke
text: And some one said to him: Lord, are they few that are saved? But he said to them:

name: According to Luke
text: Strive to enter in through the strait gate; for many, I say to you, will seek to enter in and shall not be able.

name: According to Luke
text: From whatever time the master of the house shall have risen up and closed the door and you shall have begun to stand without and to knock at the door, saying: Lord, open to us, and he shall answer and say to you: I know you not whence you are:

name: According to Luke
text: then shall you begin to say: We have eaten and drunk in thy presence, and in our streets hast thou taught.

name: According to Luke
text: And he will say: I tell you, I know you not whence you are: depart from me, all workers of iniquity.

name: According to Luke
text: There shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth, when you shall see Abraham and Isaac and Jacob and all the prophets in the kingdom of God, but yourselves cast out.

name: According to Luke
text: And they shall come from east and west and north and south, and shall recline at table in the kingdom of God.

name: According to Luke
text: And behold, there are last that shall be first, and there are first that shall be last.

name: According to Luke
text: At that hour came to him some Pharisees, saying to him: Get out and depart hence, for Herod will kill thee.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: Go and tell this fox: Behold, I cast out demons and perfect cures today and tomorrow, and on the third day I make an end.

name: According to Luke
text: But I must journey today and to-morrow and the day following; for it is not possible that a prophet perish out of Jerusalem.

name: According to Luke
text: Jerusalem, Jerusalem, that killest the prophets and stonest them that are sent to thee, how often have I desired to gather thy children together as a hen her young under her wings, and you refused.

name: According to Luke
text: Behold, your house is left to you. I say to you that you shall not see me till the time come when you shall say: Blessed is he that comes in the name of the Lord.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass that he entered on a sabbath into the house of some one of the chief men of the Pharisees to eat bread, and they were watching him.

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus answered and spoke to the lawyers and Pharisees, saying: Is it lawful to cure on the sabbath, or not? But they were silent.

name: According to Luke
text: And he took him and restored him to health and let him go.

name: According to Luke
text: And answering, he said to them: Shall a son or ox of any one of you fall into a pit and will he not immediately draw him out on the sabbath day?

name: According to Luke
text: And they were not able to answer him to these things.

name: According to Luke
text: But when he observed how they chose out the chief places, he spoke a parable to those that were called saying to them:

name: According to Luke
text: When thou art called by any one to a marriage, do not recline on the chief place, lest a more honorable than thou may have been called by him,

name: According to Luke
text: and he that called thee and him shall come and say to thee: Give this man place, and then thou begin with shame to occupy the last place.

name: According to Luke
text: But when thou art called, go and recline on the last place; that when he that called thee come, he shall say to thee: Friend, go up higher: then shalt thou have honor in the presence of those that recline with thee.

name: According to Luke
text: For every one that exalts himself shall be humbled, and he that humbles himself shall be exalted.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said also to him that had called him: When thou wouldst make a dinner or a supper, call not thy friends, nor thy brothers, nor thy relatives, nor rich neighbors, lest they also call thee in turn, and a recompense be made thee.

name: According to Luke
text: But when thou wouldst make a feast, call the poor, the maimed, the lame, the blind,

name: According to Luke
text: and thou shalt be blessed: for they cannot recompense thee; but thou shalt have recompense in the resurrection of the just.

name: According to Luke
text: And some one of those that reclined with him, hearing these things, said to him: Blessed is he that eats bread in the kingdom of God.

name: According to Luke
text: But he said to him: A certain man made a great supper and called many;

name: According to Luke
text: and sent his servant at the hour of supper to say to those that had been called: Come, for it is now prepared.

name: According to Luke
text: And they all with one consent began to make excuse. The first said to him: I have bought a field, and I must 1 needs go and see it: I pray thee, have me excused.

name: According to Luke
text: And another said: I have bought five yoke of oxen, and I am going to prove them: I pray thee, have me excused.

name: According to Luke
text: And another said: I have married a wife and therefore I cannot come.140

name: According to Luke
text: And the servant came back and reported these things to his lord. Then the master of the house, being angry, said to his servant: Go out quickly into the streets and lanes of the city, and the poor and maimed and blind and lame bring in hither.

name: According to Luke
text: And the servant said: Lord, what thou didst command has been done, and yet there is room.

name: According to Luke
text: And the lord said to the servant: Go out into the roads and hedges; and compel them to come in, that my house may be full;

name: According to Luke
text: for I say: to you that not one of those men that have been called shall taste of my supper.

name: According to Luke
text: And many multitudes journeyed with him; and he turned and said to them:

name: According to Luke
text: If any one comes to me and hates not his father and mother, and wife and children, and brothers and sisters, and even his own life also, he cannot be my disciple.

name: According to Luke
text: Whoever does not bear his cross and come after me cannot be my disciple.

name: According to Luke
text: For what one of you intending to build a tower sits not down first and counts the cost, if he has enough to finish it?

name: According to Luke
text: lest perhaps, after he has laid the foundation and is not able to finish, all that see begin to deride him,

name: According to Luke
text: saying: This man began to build and was not able to finish.

name: According to Luke
