text: Or what king going to engage in battle with another king, will not sit down first and deliberate whether he is able with ten thousand to meet him that comes against him with twenty thousand?

name: According to Luke
text: But if not, while he is yet far off, he sends an embassy and asks conditions of peace.

name: According to Luke
text: So then, no one of you that forsakes not all that he has can be my disciple.

name: According to Luke
text: Salt then is good; but if the salt become tasteless, by what means shall it be seasoned?

name: According to Luke
text: It is fit neither for earth nor for manure: they cast it out. He that has ears, let him hear.

name: According to Luke
text: And all the publicans and the sinners were drawing near to him to hear him.

name: According to Luke
text: And both the Pharisees and the scribes murmured, saying: This man receives sinners and eats with them.

name: According to Luke
text: But he spoke to them this parable, saying:

name: According to Luke
text: What man of you, that has a hundred sheep, and loses one of them, does not leave the ninety-nine in the wilderness, and go after that

name: According to Luke
text: And when he finds it, he lays it on his shoulder rejoicing;

name: According to Luke
text: and having come home, he calls together the friends and the neighbors, saying to them: Rejoice with me, for I have found my sheep that was lost.

name: According to Luke
text: I say to you that so there shall be joy in heaven over one sinner that repents, more than over ninety-nine righteous who have no need of repentance.

name: According to Luke
text: Or what woman having ten drachmas, if she lose one drachma, does not light a lamp and sweep the house and seek carefully till she find it?

name: According to Luke
text: And when she has found it, she calls together the friends and neighbors, saying: Rejoice with me, for I have found the drachma that I lost.

name: According to Luke
text: So, I say to you, there arises joy in the presence of the angels of God over one sinner that repents.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said: A certain man had two sons.

name: According to Luke
text: And the younger of them said to the father: Father, give me the part of the estate that falls to me. And he divided to them the living.

name: According to Luke
text: And not many days after, the younger son gathered all together and went from home into a distant country, and there wasted his estate by riotous living.

name: According to Luke
text: But when he had spent all, there arose a great famine throughout that land, and he began to be in want.

name: According to Luke
text: And he went and joined himself to one of the citizens of that country, and he sent him into his fields to feed swine;

name: According to Luke
text: and he desired to fill his belly with the pods that the swine did eat; and no one gave to him.

name: According to Luke
text: But having come to himself, he said: How many hired servants of my father have bread enough and to spare; but I am perishing here with hunger.

name: According to Luke
text: I will arise and go to my father and say to him: Father, I have sinned against heaven and in thy sight;

name: According to Luke
text: no longer am I worthy to be called thy son: make me as one of thy hired servants.

name: According to Luke
text: And he arose and came to his father. And while he was yet a great way off, his father saw him and had pity on him; and running, he fell upon his neck and kissed him.

name: According to Luke
text: And the son said to him: Father, I have sinned against heaven and in thy sight; no longer am I worthy to be called thy son.

name: According to Luke
text: But the father said to his servants: Bring forth the best robe and put it on him, and put a ring on his hand, and sandals on his feet;

name: According to Luke
text: and bring the fatted calf, kill, and let us eat and be merry;

name: According to Luke
text: for this, my son, was dead and lives again, was lost and is found. And they began to be merry.142

name: According to Luke
text: But his older son was in the field; and when he came and drew near to the house, he heard music and dancing;

name: According to Luke
text: and calling to him one of the servants, he inquired what these things meant.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to him: Thy brother has come, and thy father has killed the fatted calf, because he has received him in health.

name: According to Luke
text: But he was angry, and would not go in; and his father came out and entreated him.

name: According to Luke
text: But he answered and said to the father: Behold, so many years do I serve thee, and at no time have I transgressed thy commandment; and yet to me thou hast at no time given a kid that I might make merry with my friends;

name: According to Luke
text: but when thy son, this that has eaten up thy living with harlots, came, thou didst kill for him the fatted calf.

name: According to Luke
text: But he said to him: Son, thou art always with me, and all mine is thine;

name: According to Luke
text: but to make merry and to be glad was needful, for this thy brother was dead and lives again; was lost and is found.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said also to the disciples: There was a certain rich man who had a steward, and he was accused to him of wasting his goods.

name: According to Luke
text: And he called him and said to him: What is this that I hear of thee? Give an account of thy stewardship; for thou canst no longer act as steward.

name: According to Luke
text: And the steward said within himself: What shall I do? for my lord takes from me the stewardship. To dig I am not able, to beg I am ashamed.

name: According to Luke
text: I have found what I shall do, that when I am put out of the stewardship they may receive me into their houses.

name: According to Luke
text: And calling to him each one of his lord’s debtors, he said to the first: How much owest thou my lord?

name: According to Luke
text: He said: A hundred baths of oil. And he said to him: Take back thy note, and sit down quickly and write fifty.

name: According to Luke
text: Then he said to another: And how much owest thou? And he said: A hundred homers of wheat. He says to him: Take back thy note, and write eighty.

name: According to Luke
text: And the lord commended the unjust steward, because he had acted prudently; for the children of this age are, in reference to their generation, wiser than the children of light.

name: According to Luke
text: And I say to you: Make to yourselves friends of the mammon of unrighteousness, that when it fails they may receive you into the

name: According to Luke
text: He that is faithful in very little is faithful also in much, and he that is unjust in very little is unjust also in much.

name: According to Luke
text: If then you have not been faithful in the unrighteous mammon, who will entrust to you the true riches?

name: According to Luke
text: And if you have not been faithful in that which is another’s, who will give to you that which is your own?

name: According to Luke
text: No servant can serve two masters; for either he will hate the one and love the other; or he will hold the one and despise the other. You cannot serve God and mammon.

name: According to Luke
text: And the Pharisees, who were lovers of money, heard all these things, and scoffed at him.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: You are they that justify yourselves before men, but God knows your hearts; for that which is highly esteemed among men is an abomination in the sight of God.

name: According to Luke
text: The law and the prophets preached till John; from that time the kingdom of God is preached, and every one enters it by force.

name: According to Luke
text: But it is easier for heaven and earth to pass away, than for one point of the law to fall.

name: According to Luke
text: Every one that puts away his wife and marries another commits adultery, and he that marries her that is put away from a husband commits adultery.

name: According to Luke
text: But there was a certain rich man, and he was clothed in purple and fine linen, feasting splendidly every day.

name: According to Luke
text: And a certain poor man named Lazarus had been laid at his gate, full of sores,

name: According to Luke
text: and desiring to be fed with that which fell from the rich man’s table: moreover, even the dogs came and licked his sores.

name: According to Luke
text: But it came to pass that the poor man died and was carried by angels to Abraham’s bosom; and the rich man also died and was buried.

name: According to Luke
text: And in hades he lifted up his eyes, being in torments, and saw Abraham afar off and Lazarus in his bosom.

name: According to Luke
text: And he cried and said: Father Abraham, have mercy on me, and send Lazarus that he may dip the tip of his finger in water and cool my tongue, for I am tormented in this flame.

name: According to Luke
text: But Abraham said: Son, remember that thou in thy lifetime receivedst thy good things, and Lazarus likewise evil things; but now here he is comforted and thou art tormented.

name: According to Luke
text: And in all these regions between us and you a great chasm is fixed, so that they that would pass hence to you cannot, neither can they pass thence to us.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said: I pray thee then, father, that thou wouldst send him to my father’s house;144

name: According to Luke
text: for I have five brothers: that he may earnestly testify to them, lest they themselves also come to this place of torment.

name: According to Luke
text: But Abraham said to him: They have Moses and the prophets: let them hear them.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said: No, father Abraham; but if one from the dead should go to them, they will repent.

name: According to Luke
text: But he said to him: If they hear not Moses and the prophets, neither will they be persuaded though one should rise from the dead.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to his disciples: It is impossible that offenses come not; but alas for him through whom they come:

name: According to Luke
text: it were better for him that an upper millstone were hung about his neck and he thrown into the sea, than that he should offend one of these little ones.

name: According to Luke
text: Take heed to yourselves. If thy brother sin, rebuke him; and if he repent, forgive him.

name: According to Luke
text: And if he sin against thee seven times in a day, and seven times turn to thee, saying: I repent, thou shalt forgive him.

name: According to Luke
text: And the apostles said to the Lord: Increase our faith.

name: According to Luke
text: But the Lord said: If you have faith as a grain of mustard, you might say to this sycamine tree: Be uprooted and be planted in the sea, and it would obey you.

name: According to Luke
text: But which of you in having a servant plowing or feeding a flock, will say to him when he comes from the field: Come immediately and recline at table?

name: According to Luke
text: But will he not say to him: Make ready my supper, and gird thyself and serve me till I eat and drink, and after this thou shalt eat and drink?

name: According to Luke
text: Does he thank the servant because he did the things that were commanded?

name: According to Luke
text: So also you, when you shall have done all things that are commanded you, say that we are unprofitable servants; we have done what we ought to have done.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass as he journeyed to Jerusalem, he also went through the midst of Samaria and Galilee.

name: According to Luke
text: And as he entered a certain village there met him ten leprous men, who stood afar off;

name: According to Luke
text: and they lifted up their voices, saying: Jesus, Master, have mercy on us.

name: According to Luke
text: And seeing, he said to them: Go, show yourselves to the priests. And it came to pass as they went they were cleansed.

name: According to Luke
text: And one of them, seeing that he was healed, returned, with a loud

name: According to Luke
text: and fell on his face at his feet, giving him thanks; and he was a Samaritan.

name: According to Luke
text: But Jesus answered and said: Were not the ten cleansed? Where are the nine?

name: According to Luke
text: Were there not found returning to give glory to God but this one of another race?

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to him: Arise and go: thy faith has saved thee.

name: According to Luke
text: And having been asked by the Pharisees when the kingdom of God would come, he answered them and said: The kingdom of God comes not with observation;

name: According to Luke
text: neither shall they say: Lo, here or there; for behold, the kingdom of God is among you.

name: According to Luke
text: But he said to his disciples: Days will come when you shall desire to see one of the days of the Son of man, and shall not see it.

name: According to Luke
text: And they shall say to you: Lo here, lo there: go not after them nor follow them.

name: According to Luke
text: For as the lightning flashing out from one place under heaven shines to the other place under heaven, so shall the Son of man be in his day.

name: According to Luke
text: But first must he suffer many things, and be rejected by this generation.

name: According to Luke
text: And as it was in the days of Noah, so shall it be also in the days of the Son of man.

name: According to Luke
text: They were eating, they were drinking, they were marrying, they were giving in marriage till the day on which Noah entered the ark, and the flood came and destroyed all.

name: According to Luke
text: Likewise as it was in the days of Lot: they were eating, they were drinking, they were buying, they were selling, they were planting, they were building;

name: According to Luke
text: but on the day in which Lot went out of Sodom, there rained fire and brimstone from heaven and destroyed all.

name: According to Luke
text: So shall it be in the day in which the Son of man is revealed.

name: According to Luke
text: In that day he that shall be on the housetop, and his goods in the house, let him not come down to take them away; and he that is in the field let him likewise not turn back.

name: According to Luke
text: Remember Lot’s wife.

name: According to Luke
text: Whoever shall seek to gain his life shall lose it: and whoever shall lose it shall save it alive.

name: According to Luke
text: I say to you, on that night there shall be two men in one bed: one shall be taken and the other left:

name: According to Luke
text: there shall be two women grinding together: the one shall be taken, but the other left.146

name: According to Luke
text: And they answer and say to him: Where, Lord? And he said to them: Where the body is, there also will the eagles be gathered together.

name: According to Luke
text: And he spoke a parable to them to this end, that they ought always to pray and not grow weary,

name: According to Luke
text: saying: There was in a city a judge that feared not God, and regarded not man.

name: According to Luke
text: And there was a widow in that city, and she came to him, saying: Avenge me, on my opponent-at-law.

name: According to Luke
text: And he would not for a time; but afterward he said within himself: Though I fear not God, neither regard man,

name: According to Luke
text: yet, because this widow gives me trouble, I will avenge her, lest coming continually she weary me.

name: According to Luke
text: And the Lord said: Hear what the unjust judge says;

name: According to Luke
text: and will not God avenge his elect who cry to him day and night, and does he bear long towards them?

name: According to Luke
text: I say to you that he will avenge them speedily. Nevertheless will the Son of man, when he comes, find the faith on the earth?

name: According to Luke
text: And he spoke also this parable to some that trusted in themselves that they were righteous, and despised others:

name: According to Luke
text: Two men went up into the temple to pray, the one a Pharisee and the other a publican.

name: According to Luke
text: The Pharisee stood and prayed thus: God, I thank thee that I am not as the rest of men, extortioners, unjust, adulterers, or even as this publican.

name: According to Luke
text: I fast twice in the week, I pay tithes of all that I possess.

name: According to Luke
text: But the publican, standing far off, would not lift even his eyes to heaven, but smote upon his breast, saying: God, be merciful to me the sinner.

name: According to Luke
text: I say to you, this man went down to his house justified rather indeed than the other; for every one that exalts himself shall be humbled, but he that humbles himself shall be exalted.

name: According to Luke
text: And they brought to him also their infants that he might touch them; but the disciples, seeing, rebuked them.

name: According to Luke
text: But Jesus called them to him, saying: Let the little children come to me and forbid them not; for to such belongs the kingdom of God.

name: According to Luke
text: Verily I say to you, whoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child, shall not enter into it.

name: According to Luke
text: And a ruler asked him, saying: Good Teacher, what shall I do to

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus said to him: Why callest thou me good? None is good but one, God.

name: According to Luke
text: Thou knowest the commandments: Thou shalt not commit adultery. Thou shalt not kill, Thou shalt not steal, Thou shalt not bear false testimony, Honor thy father and thy mother.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said: All these have I kept from youth.

name: According to Luke
text: But Jesus, hearing, said to him: Yet lackest thou one thing: sell all that thou hast, and distribute to the poor and thou shalt have treasure in the heavens, and come follow me.

name: According to Luke
text: But hearing these things, he became very sad; for he was very rich.

name: According to Luke
text: But seeing him, Jesus said: How hardly do they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God:

name: According to Luke
text: for it is easier for a camel to go in through the eye of a needle, than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God.

name: According to Luke
text: And they that heard said: Who then can be saved?

name: According to Luke
text: But he said: Things impossible with men are possible with God.

name: According to Luke
text: And Peter said: Behold, we have left our own and followed thee.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: Verily I say to you, there is no one that has left house, or wife, or brothers, or parents, or children for the sake of the kingdom of God,

name: According to Luke
text: who shall not receive many times more in this time, and in the age to come, eternal life.

name: According to Luke
text: And taking the twelve aside, he said to them: Behold, we are going up to Jerusalem, and all things that are written by the prophets in reference to the Son of man shall be accomplished;

name: According to Luke
text: for he shall be delivered to the Gentiles, and shall be derided and outraged and spit upon;

name: According to Luke
text: and they shall scourge and kill him, and the third clay he shall rise.

name: According to Luke
text: And they understood none of these things; and this saying was concealed from them; and they knew not the things that were spoken.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass as he drew near to Jericho, a blind man sat by the road begging.

name: According to Luke
text: And hearing the multitude pass by, he inquired what this meant.

name: According to Luke
text: And they told him that Jesus the Nazarene was passing by.

name: According to Luke
text: And he cried out, saying: Jesus, son of David, have mercy on me.

name: According to Luke
text: But those that went before rebuked him that he should be silent; but much more did he cry: Son of David, have mercy on me.

name: According to Luke
text: But Jesus stood and commanded him to be brought to him. And when he had come near he asked him:

name: According to Luke
text: What wilt thou that I shall do for thee? And he said: Lord, that I may receive sight.148

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus said to him: Receive sight: thy faith has saved thee.

name: According to Luke
text: And he immediately received sight, and followed him, glorifying God. And all the people, seeing it, gave praise to God.

name: According to Luke
text: And he entered and passed through Jericho.

name: According to Luke
text: And behold, a man named Zacchaeus, and he was chief publican, and was rich;

name: According to Luke
text: and he sought to see Jesus, who he was, and could not from the multitude, for in stature he was small.

name: According to Luke
text: And running before, he went up into a sycamore, that he might see him, for he was about to pass that way.

name: According to Luke
text: And when he came to the place, Jesus looked up and said to him: Zacchaeus, make haste and come down; for I must abide to-day at thy house.

name: According to Luke
text: And he hastened and came down, and received him joyfully.

name: According to Luke
text: And seeing it, they all murmured, saying: He has gone in to be guest with a sinful man.

name: According to Luke
text: And Zacchaeus stood and said to the Lord: Behold, the half of my goods, Lord, I give to the poor; and if from any one I have taken any thing by false accusation, I repay fourfold.

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus said to him: This day has salvation come to this house, inasmuch as he also is a son of Abraham;

name: According to Luke
text: for the Son of man has come to seek and save the lost.

name: According to Luke
text: And as they heard these things he also spoke a parable, because he was near Jerusalem and they thought that the kingdom of God would immediately appear.

name: According to Luke
text: He said, therefore: A nobleman went into a distant country, to receive for himself a kingdom, and return.

name: According to Luke
text: And he called his ten servants and gave to them ten pounds, and said to them: Engage in trade till I come.

name: According to Luke
text: But his citizens hated him, and sent an embassy after him, saying: We are not willing that this man shall reign over us.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass when he had returned, having received the kingdom, he also ordered that those servants to whom he had given the money should be called to him, that he might know what each had gained by trading.

name: According to Luke
text: And the first came to him, saying: Lord, thy pound has gained ten pounds.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to him: Well done, good servant; because, thou hast been faithful in very little, have authority over ten cities.

name: According to Luke
text: And the second came, saying: Thy pound, lord, has made five

name: According to Luke
text: And he said also to him: Be thou also over five cities.

name: According to Luke
text: And the other came, saying: Lord, behold thy pound, which I have had laid away in a napkin;

name: According to Luke
text: for I feared thee, because thou art a hard man: thou takest up what thou didst not deposit, and reapest what thou didst not sow.

name: According to Luke
text: He says to him: Out of thy own mouth will I judge thee, wicked servant. Thou knowest that I am a hard man, taking up what I did not deposit, and reaping what I did not sow.

name: According to Luke
text: And why gavest thou not my money to the bank? and I on coming could have collected my own with interest.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to those that stood by: Take from him the pound and give to him that has the ten pounds.

name: According to Luke
text: And they said to him: Lord, he has ten pounds.

name: According to Luke
text: I say to you: To every one that has shall be given, but from him that has not, even that which he has shall be taken away.

name: According to Luke
text: But these my enemies, that were not willing that I should reign over them, bring hither and slay them before me.

name: According to Luke
text: And having said these things, he went before, going up to Jerusalem.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass when he came near to Bethphage and Bethany, at the mount of Olives, he sent two of the disciples,

name: According to Luke
text: saying: Go into the village opposite, in which, on entering, you shall find a colt tied, on which no one of men ever sat: loose and bring him.

name: According to Luke
text: And if any one ask you: Why loose him? say thus; that the Lord has need of him.

name: According to Luke
text: And those that were sent went and found as he had said to them.

name: According to Luke
text: And as they were loosing the colt, its owners said to them: Why loose the colt?

name: According to Luke
text: and they said: Because the Lord has need of him.

name: According to Luke
text: And they brought him to Jesus, and having thrown their mantles upon the colt, they set Jesus upon him.

name: According to Luke
text: And as he went they spread their mantles in the road.

name: According to Luke
text: But as he was drawing near now to the descent of the mount of Olives, the whole multitude of the disciples began joyfully to praise God with a loud voice for all the mighty deeds which they had seen,

name: According to Luke
text: saying: Blessed be the King in the name of the Lord: in heaven peace, and glory in the highest.

name: According to Luke
text: And some of the Pharisees from the multitude said to him: Teacher, rebuke thy disciples.

name: According to Luke
text: And he answered and said: I say to you, that if these should be silent, the stones would cry out.

name: According to Luke
text: And when he drew near, beholding the city, he wept over it,150

name: According to Luke
text: saying: If thou hadst known, even thou, even in this thy day, the things for thy peace; but now they are hid from thy eyes.

name: According to Luke
text: For days will come upon thee, and thy enemies shall cast up a mound about thee; and encircle thee round about, and shut thee up on every side;

name: According to Luke
text: and level thee with the ground and thy children within thee; and will not leave within thee a stone upon a stone, because thou knewest not the time of thy visitation.

name: According to Luke
text: And entering into the temple he began to cast out those that sold,

name: According to Luke
text: saying to them: It is written: And my house shall be called a house of prayer, but you have made it a den of robbers.

name: According to Luke
text: And he was teaching daily in the temple; and the chief priests and the scribes and the chief men of the people sought to destroy him,

name: According to Luke
text: and found not what they could do; for all the people hung listening upon him.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass on one of the days, as he was teaching the people in the temple, and preaching the gospel, the priests and the scribes, with the elders, came upon him.

name: According to Luke
text: and spoke, saying to him: Tell us, by what authority doest thou these things, or who is he that gave thee this authority?

name: According to Luke
text: But he answered and said to them: I also will ask you a word, and tell me:

name: According to Luke
text: The baptism of John, of heaven was it, or of men?

name: According to Luke
text: And they reasoned among themselves, saying: If we say: Of heaven, he will reply: Why did you not believe him?

name: According to Luke
text: But if we say: Of men, all the people will stone us; for they are persuaded that John was a prophet.

name: According to Luke
text: And they answered that they knew not whence.

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus said to them: Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things.

name: According to Luke
text: And he began to speak to the people this parable. A man planted a vineyard and let it out to vinedressers, and went abroad for a long time.

name: According to Luke
text: And at the season he sent to the vinedressers a servant, that they might give him of the fruit of the vineyard; but the vinedressers scourged him and sent him forth empty.

name: According to Luke
text: And he also sent another servant; but they scourged that one also, and having dishonored him, sent him forth empty.

name: According to Luke
text: And he also sent a third; but they wounded this one also and cast

name: According to Luke
text: And the lord of the vineyard said: What shall I do? I will send my beloved son: perhaps they will reverence him.

name: According to Luke
text: But seeing him, the vinedressers reasoned one with another, saying: This is the heir: let us kill him, that the inheritance may become ours.

name: According to Luke
text: And they cast him out of the vineyard and killed him. What then will the lord of the vineyard do to them?

name: According to Luke
text: He will come and destroy these vinedressers, and give the vineyard to others. And hearing, they said: May it not be.

name: According to Luke
text: But he looked on them and said: What then is this that is written? A stone that the builders rejected, this became the head of the corner.

name: According to Luke
text: Every one that falls on that stone shall be broken; but on whomever it shall fall, it will grind him to dust.

name: According to Luke
text: And the scribes and the chief priests sought to lay their hands on him at the same hour, and were afraid of the people; for they knew that against them he had spoken this parable.

name: According to Luke
text: And watching closely, they sent spies that feigned themselves to be just, that they might lay hold on a word of his, so that they could deliver him up to the power and authority of the governor.

name: According to Luke
text: And they asked him, saying: Teacher, we know that thou speakest and teachest rightly, and acceptest not a person, but teachest the way of God in truth:

name: According to Luke
text: is it lawful for us to give tribute to Caesar or not?

name: According to Luke
text: But perceiving their craftiness, he said to them:

name: According to Luke
text: Show me a denarius. Whose image and superscription has it? They said: Caesar’s.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: Therefore render to Caesar the things that are Caesar’s, and to God the things that are God’s.

name: According to Luke
text: And they were not able to lay hold of his speech in the presence of the people; and being astonished at his answer, they were silent.

name: According to Luke
text: And some of the Sadducees, who deny that there is a resurrection, came and asked him a question,

name: According to Luke
text: saying: Teacher, Moses wrote for us, if any one’s brother die having a wife, and he be without children, that his brother shall take his wife and raise up offspring for his brother.

name: According to Luke
text: There were then seven brothers. And the first took a wife and died without children;

name: According to Luke
text: and the second

name: According to Luke
text: and the third took her, and in like manner also the seven left no children and died.

name: According to Luke
text: At last the woman also died.

name: According to Luke
text: The woman then in the resurrection, of which of them shall she be the wife? For the seven had her as a wife.152

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus said to them: The sons of this age marry and are given in marriage,

name: According to Luke
text: but they that shall be counted worthy to obtain that age and the resurrection from the dead, neither marry nor are given in marriage:

name: According to Luke
text: nor indeed can they die any more, for they are like the angels, and are sons of God, being sons of the resurrection.

name: According to Luke
text: But that the dead are raised, even Moses has made known at the Bush, since he calls the Lord the God of Abraham, and the God of Isaac, and the God of Jacob;

name: According to Luke
text: and he is not a God of the dead, but of the living; for all live to him.

name: According to Luke
text: And some of the scribes answered and said: Teacher, thou hast well said.

name: According to Luke
text: For no one again ventured to ask him another question.

name: According to Luke
text: But he said to them: How say they that Christ is David’s son,

name: According to Luke
text: for David himself says in the book of Psalms: The Lord said to my Lord: Sit at my right hand

name: According to Luke
text: till I make thy enemies thy footstool?

name: According to Luke
text: David then calls him Lord; and how is he his son?

name: According to Luke
text: But as all the people were hearing, he said to the disciples:

name: According to Luke
text: Beware of the scribes that delight to walk about in robes, and love salutations in the markets, and first seats in the synagogues, and first places at suppers;

name: According to Luke
text: who eat up the houses of widows, and for a pretext make long prayers: these shall receive greater condemnation.

name: According to Luke
text: And looking up, he saw the rich throwing their gifts into the treasury.

name: According to Luke
text: And he saw a widow, a needy one, throw in thither two mites,

name: According to Luke
text: and he said: Truly I say to you that this poor widow has thrown in more than they all;

name: According to Luke
text: for all these out of their abundance have thrown in among the gifts, but she out of her poverty has thrown in all the living that she had.

name: According to Luke
text: And as some were speaking of the temple that it was adorned with goodly stones and offerings, he said:

name: According to Luke
text: As to these things that you see, days will come in which there shall not be left a stone upon a stone, that shall not be thrown down.

name: According to Luke
text: And they asked him, saying: Teacher, when then shall these things be? and what the sign when these things shall be accomplished?

name: According to Luke
text: And he said: Take heed that you be not deceived; for many will come in my name, saying: I am he, and the time is at hand: go not

name: According to Luke
text: But when you hear of wars and tumults, be not alarmed; for these things must take place first, but not immediately the end.

name: According to Luke
text: Then he said to them: Nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom:

name: According to Luke
text: great earthquakes also shall there be, and in places famines and pestilences, fearful sights also shall there be, and great signs from heaven.

name: According to Luke
text: But before all these they shall lay their hands on you and persecute you, delivering you up to the synagogues and prisons, being brought before kings and governors for the sake of my name:

name: According to Luke
text: it shall turn out to you for testimony.

name: According to Luke
text: Resolve therefore in your hearts that you meditate not beforehand to make a defense;

name: According to Luke
text: for I will give you a mouth and wisdom, which all your adversaries shall not be able to resist or gainsay.

name: According to Luke
text: But you shall be delivered up both by parents and brothers and relatives and friends, and some of you they shall put to death,

name: According to Luke
text: and you shall be hated by all because of my name.

name: According to Luke
text: And yet a hair from your head shall not be lost:

name: According to Luke
text: in your endurance preserve your souls.

name: According to Luke
text: But when you see Jerusalem encompassed by armies, then know that the desolation of it is near.

name: According to Luke
text: Then let those in Judea flee to the mountains, and those in the midst of it go out, and those in the country not enter into it;

name: According to Luke
text: for days of vengeance are these for the fulfilling of all things that are written.

name: According to Luke
text: Alas for them that are with child and them that give suck in those days; for there shall be great distress on the land and wrath on this people;

name: According to Luke
text: and they shall fall by the edge of the sword, and shall be led away captive into all nations, and Jerusalem shall be trod down by Gentiles, till the times of the Gentiles shall have been fulfilled.

name: According to Luke
text: And there shall be signs in the sun and the moon and the stars, and on earth distress of nations in perplexity at the roaring of the sea and the waves,

name: According to Luke
text: men failing in heart for fear and expectation of things coming on the habitable land; for the powers of the heavens shall be shaken.

name: According to Luke
text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming on a cloud with power and great glory.

name: According to Luke
text: But when these things begin to take place, look up and lift up your heads, because your redemption draws near.

name: According to Luke
text: And he spoke a parable to them: See the fig-tree and all the trees:154

name: According to Luke
text: when they now put forth leaves, seeing it you know of yourselves that summer is now near.

name: According to Luke
text: So also you, when you see these things coming to pass, know that the kingdom of God is near.

name: According to Luke
text: Verily I say to you: This generation shall not pass away till all these things shall have been accomplished.

name: According to Luke
text: Heaven and earth shall pass away, but my words shall not pass away.

name: According to Luke
text: But take heed to yourselves lest perhaps your hearts become heavy with surfeiting, and drunkenness, and the anxieties of life, and that day come upon you suddenly

name: According to Luke
text: like a snare; for it shall come upon all that dwell on the face of all the land.

name: According to Luke
text: But watch at every time, praying that you may have strength to escape all these things that are about to take place, and to stand before the Son of man.

name: According to Luke
text: And he was teaching in the temple during the day, but he went out and spent the night in the mount of Olives.

name: According to Luke
text: And all the people came early to him in the temple to hear him.

name: According to Luke
text: But the feast of unleavened bread, which is called passover, drew near;

name: According to Luke
text: and the chief priests and scribes sought how they might destroy him; for they feared the people.

name: According to Luke
text: But Satan entered into Judas called Iscariot, who was of the number of the twelve;

name: According to Luke
text: and he went away and conferred with the chief priests and captains how he might deliver him up to them.

name: According to Luke
text: And they were glad, and agreed to give him money;

name: According to Luke
text: and he consented, and sought an opportunity to deliver him up to them in the absence of the multitude

name: According to Luke
text: And the day of unleavened bread came, on which the passover must be killed;

name: According to Luke
text: and he sent Peter and John, saying: Go and prepare for us the passover, that we may eat.

name: According to Luke
text: And they said to him: Where wilt thou that we make ready?

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: Behold, after you have gone into the city, there shall meet you a man carrying a pitcher of water; follow him into the house that he enters;

name: According to Luke
text: and you shall say to the master of the house: The Teacher says to thee: Where is the guest-chamber where I may eat the passover with

name: According to Luke
text: And he will show you a large upper room furnished: there make ready.

name: According to Luke
text: And they went and found as he had said to them, and prepared the passover.

name: According to Luke
text: And when the hour had come, he reclined at table, and the apostles with him.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: With desire have I desired to eat this passover with you before I suffer;

name: According to Luke
text: for I say to you that I will no more eat it till it is fulfilled in the kingdom of God.

name: According to Luke
text: And having taken a cup and given thanks, he said: Take this and divide it among yourselves;

name: According to Luke
text: for I say to you that I will not drink henceforth of the fruit of the vine till the kingdom of God shall have corner

name: According to Luke
text: And having taken bread and given thanks, he broke and gave to them, saying: This is my body, that is given for you: this do in remembrance of me.

name: According to Luke
text: And the cup in like manner, after he had supped, saying: This cup is the new covenant in my blood, that is poured out for you.

name: According to Luke
text: But behold, the hand of him that delivers me up is with me on the table.

name: According to Luke
text: For indeed the Son of man goes according to that which is determined, but alas for that man by whom he is delivered up.

name: According to Luke
text: And they began to inquire among themselves which of them it might be that was about to do this thing.

name: According to Luke
text: And there had been also a contention among them as to which of them was thought to be greatest.

name: According to Luke
text: But he said to them: The kings of the nations exercise lordship over them, and they that have authority over them are called benefactors:

name: According to Luke
text: you however shall not be so, but he that is the greatest among you, let him become as the youngest, and he that leads as he that serves.

name: According to Luke
text: For which is greater, he that reclines at table or he that serves? Is not he that reclines at table? But I in the midst of you am as he that serves.

name: According to Luke
text: But you are they that have continued steadily with me in my trials.

name: According to Luke
text: And I appoint to you as my Father has appointed to me a kingdom,

name: According to Luke
text: that you may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom, and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel.

name: According to Luke
text: Simon, Simon, behold, Satan has greatly desired you that he may sift you as wheat;

name: According to Luke
text: but I have prayed for thee, that thy faith fail not. And thou, when thou hast turned to me, strengthen thy brethren.156

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to him: Lord, with thee I am ready to go both to prison and to death.

name: According to Luke
text: But he said: I say to thee, Peter, a cock shall not crow this day, till thou shalt have three times denied that thou knowest me.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: When I sent you forth without purse and bag and sandals, needed you any thing? They said: Nothing.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: But now, he that has a purse, let him take it; in like manner, also a bag; and he that has no sword, let him sell his garment and buy.

name: According to Luke
text: For I say to you that this that is written must be fulfilled in me; this: And with the lawless was he numbered; for that concerning me has an end.

name: According to Luke
text: And they said: Lord, behold, here are two swords. And he said to them: It is enough.

name: According to Luke
text: And going out, he went according to custom to the mount of Olives; and the disciples also followed him.

name: According to Luke
text: And when he had come to the place he said to them: Pray that you enter not into temptation.

name: According to Luke
text: And he withdrew from them about a stone’s throw, and kneeling down he prayed,

name: According to Luke
text: saying: Father, if thou art willing to remove this cup from me; yet, not my will, but thine, be done.

name: According to Luke
text: And there appeared to him an angel from heaven, strengthening him.

name: According to Luke
text: And being in an agony, he prayed more earnestly. And his sweat became like great drops of blood falling to the ground.

name: According to Luke
text: And he arose from prayer, came to the disciples, and found them sleeping because of grief,

name: According to Luke
text: and said to them: Why sleep? arise and pray, that you may not enter into temptation.

name: According to Luke
text: While he was yet speaking, behold, a multitude, and he that was called Judas, one of the twelve, went before them, and came near to Jesus to kiss him.

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus said to him: Judas, dost thou deliver up the Son of man with a kiss?

name: According to Luke
text: But they about him, seeing what would be, said: Lord, shall we smite with the sword?

name: According to Luke
text: And some one of them struck the servant of the chief priest and cut off his right ear.

name: According to Luke
text: But Jesus answered and said: Let me alone till this, and he touched his ear and healed him.

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus said to the chief priests and captains of the temple and elders that had come to him: As against a robber you have come

name: According to Luke
text: while I was with you a daily in the temple, you stretched not forth your hands against me. But this is your hour, and the authority of darkness.

name: According to Luke
text: And they took him, and led and brought him into the house of the chief priest; but Peter followed at a distance.

name: According to Luke
text: And after they had kindled a fire in the midst of the court, and were sitting together, Peter sat in the midst of them.

name: According to Luke
text: And a maidservant saw him sitting at the fire, and, looking earnestly on him, said: This man also was with him.

name: According to Luke
text: But he denied him, saying: Woman, I know him not.

name: According to Luke
text: And after a little another saw him and said: Thou also art of them. But Peter said: Man, I am not.

name: According to Luke
text: And after an interval of about one hour some other confidently affirmed, saying: Of a truth this man also was with him; for he is a Galilean.

name: According to Luke
text: But Peter said: Man, I know not what thou sayest. And immediately, while he was yet speaking, a cock crew;

name: According to Luke
text: and the Lord turned and looked upon Peter; and Peter remembered the word of the Lord, as he had said to him: Before a cock shall have crowed this day, thou shalt deny me three times.

name: According to Luke
text: And he went out and wept bitterly.

name: According to Luke
text: And the men that held him derided him, striking him;

name: According to Luke
text: and having blindfolded him, they asked, saying: Prophesy: who is he that struck thee?

name: According to Luke
text: And many other things did they blasphemously say to him.

name: According to Luke
text: And when it was day, there came together the eldership of the people, chief priests also and scribes, and they led him away to their Sanhedrim, saying: If thou art the Christ, tell us.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: If I tell you, you will not believe;

name: According to Luke
text: and if I ask, you will not answer.

name: According to Luke
text: But from this time shall the Son of man be sitting on the right hand of the power of God.

name: According to Luke
text: And they all said: Thou art then the Son of God? He said to them: You say it, for I am.

name: According to Luke
text: And they said: What further need have we of testimony? For we ourselves have heard from his mouth.

name: According to Luke
text: And the whole number of them rose and led him to Pilate.

name: According to Luke
text: And they began to accuse him, saying: We found this man turning our nation away, and forbidding to pay tribute to Caesar, and saying that he himself is Christ a king.158

name: According to Luke
text: And Pilate asked him, saying: Art thou the King of the Jews? And he answered and said to him: Thou sayest.

name: According to Luke
text: But Pilate said to the chief priests and the multitudes: I find no fault in this man.

name: According to Luke
text: But they were vehement, saying: He excites the people, teaching throughout the whole of Judea, even beginning from Galilee, to this place.

name: According to Luke
text: But Pilate, hearing, inquired if the man were a Galilean;

name: According to Luke
text: and learning that he was from Herod’s jurisdiction, he sent him up to Herod, who was also in Jerusalem in those days.

name: According to Luke
text: And Herod, when he saw Jesus, was exceeding glad; for he had for a long time desired to see him, because he had heard of him, and hoped to see some sign done by him.

name: According to Luke
text: And he questioned him with many words; but he answered him nothing.

name: According to Luke
text: And the chief priests and the scribes stood, vehemently accusing him.

name: According to Luke
text: But Herod also, with his men of war having set him at naught and mocked him, put on him a splendid robe and sent him back to Pilate.

name: According to Luke
text: And on the same day Herod and Pilate became friends to each other; for before they had been at enmity between themselves.

name: According to Luke
text: But Pilate, having called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people,

name: According to Luke
text: said to them: You have brought to me this man as turning the people away; and behold, I, having examined him in your presence, have found in this man no fault as to the things which you charge against him.

name: According to Luke
text: No, nor even Herod; for he has sent him back to us; and behold, nothing worthy of death has been done by him.

name: According to Luke
text: I will therefore chastise and release him.

name: According to Luke
text: But they cried out all at once, saying: Away with this man, and release to us Barabbas:

name: According to Luke
text: who for a certain insurrection made in the city and for murder had been cast into prison.

name: According to Luke
text: Again, however, Pilate called to them, wishing to release Jesus.

name: According to Luke
text: But they cried against it, saying: Crucify, crucify him.

name: According to Luke
text: But the third time spoke he to them: Why, what evil has he done? No cause of death have I found in him: I will therefore chastise and release him.

name: According to Luke
text: But they were urgent with loud cries, demanding that he should be crucified; and their cries prevailed.

name: According to Luke
text: And he released him that for insurrection and murder had been cast into prison, whom they chose; but Jesus he delivered up to their will.

name: According to Luke
text: And as they led him away, laying hold on Simon a certain Cyrenian, as he came from the country, they laid on him the cross that he might bear it after Jesus.

name: According to Luke
text: And there followed him a great multitude of the people, and of women that bewailed and lamented him.

name: According to Luke
text: But Jesus turned to them and said: Daughters of Jerusalem, weep not for me; but weep for yourselves and for your children;

name: According to Luke
text: for behold, there are coming days in which they shall say: Blessed are the barren, and the wombs that never bore, and the breasts that did not give suck.

name: According to Luke
text: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains: Fall on us, and to the hills: Cover us;

name: According to Luke
text: for if they do these things in the green tree, what shall be done in the dry?

name: According to Luke
text: And there were led others also, two evildoers, to be crucified with him.

name: According to Luke
text: And when they came to the place that is called Skull, there they crucified him and the evildoers, one on the right and the other on the left.

name: According to Luke
text: But Jesus said: Father, forgive them; for they know not what they do. And dividing his clothing among them, they cast lots.

name: According to Luke
text: And the people stood looking on; but the rulers scoffed, saying: Others he saved, let him save himself, if he is the Christ, the chosen of God.

name: According to Luke
text: And the soldiers also derided him, coming to him, offering him vinegar,

name: According to Luke
text: and saying: If thou art the King of the Jews, save thyself.

name: According to Luke
text: And there was also a superscription over him: THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS.

name: According to Luke
text: And one of the evildoers that were hanged reviled him: Art not thou the Christ? save thyself and us.

name: According to Luke
text: But the other, answering, rebuked him and said: Dost not even thou fear God, seeing that thou art in the same condemnation?

name: According to Luke
text: And we indeed justly, for we are receiving the due reward of what we have done; but this man has done nothing amiss.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said: Jesus, remember me when thou comest in thy kingdom.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to him: Verily I say to thee, this day thou shalt be with me in Paradise.

name: According to Luke
text: And it was now about the sixth hour, and darkness came over the whole land till the ninth hour,160

name: According to Luke
text: the sun having failed; and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst.

name: According to Luke
text: And Jesus cried with a loud voice, and said: Father, into thy hands I commit my spirit. And having said this, he expired.

name: According to Luke
text: And the centurion, seeing what had taken place, glorified God, saying: Certainly this man was righteous.

name: According to Luke
text: And all the multitudes that had come together to that scene, having looked upon the things that were done, returned, smiting their breasts.

name: According to Luke
text: And all his acquaintance, and women that had followed him from Galilee, stood at a distance, looking upon these things.

name: According to Luke
text: And behold, a man named Joseph, who was a counselor, also a good and righteous man,

name: According to Luke
text: he had not consented to their counsel and deed of Arimathea, a city of the Jews, who looked for the kingdom of God:

name: According to Luke
text: this man came to Pilate and asked for the body of Jesus;

name: According to Luke
text: and having taken it down, he wrapped it in linen, and laid it in a sepulcher hewed in rock, where no one had yet lain.

name: According to Luke
text: And it was the day of the preparation, and the sabbath was beginning.

name: According to Luke
text: And women that had come up with him out of Galilee followed and observed the sepulcher, and how his body was laid;

name: According to Luke
text: and having returned, they prepared spices and ointments; and they rested indeed on the sabbath, according to the commandment.

name: According to Luke
text: But on the first of the week, very early in the morning, they came to the sepulcher, bringing the spices that they had prepared.

name: According to Luke
text: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulcher;

name: According to Luke
text: but entering, they found not the body of the Lord Jesus.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass as they were perplexed about this, behold, two men stood by them in bright clothing

name: According to Luke
text: and the women being afraid and bowing their faces to the earth the angels said to them: Why seek among the dead for him that lives?

name: According to Luke
text: He is not here, but has risen. Remember how he spoke to you while he was yet in Galilee,

name: According to Luke
text: saying of the Son of man that he must be delivered into the hands of sinful men, and be crucified, and rise on the third day.

name: According to Luke
text: And they remembered his words,

name: According to Luke
text: and returned from the sepulcher and told all these things to the eleven and to all the rest.

name: According to Luke
text: And they were Mary Magdalene and Joanna and Mary the mother

name: According to Luke
text: And these words appeared in their sight as idle tales, and they believed them not.

name: According to Luke
text: But Peter arose and ran to the sepulcher, and stooping down, he saw the linen clothes lying by themselves; and he departed, wondering in himself at that which had come to pass.

name: According to Luke
text: And behold, two of them were going on the same day to a village named Emmaus, distant from Jerusalem sixty furlongs;

name: According to Luke
text: and they were conversing one with another about all these things that had happened.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass while they were conversing and discussing, Jesus himself came near and went with them;

name: According to Luke
text: but their eyes were held so that they did not know him.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: What matters are these that you interchange one with another as you walk? And they stood still with countenances sad.

name: According to Luke
text: But one, whose name was Cleopas, answering, said to him: Dost thou only dwell as a stranger in Jerusalem and hast not known the things that have come to pass in it in these days?

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: What things? And they said to him: The things concerning Jesus the Nazarene, who became a man, a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people,

name: According to Luke
text: and how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him up to the condemnation of death and crucified him.

name: According to Luke
text: But we were hoping that it had been he that was about to redeem Israel. Yet even with all this, this is the third day since these things were done.

name: According to Luke
text: But also some women of our company astonished us; having been early at the sepulcher,

name: According to Luke
text: and not finding his body, they came, saying that they had also seen a vision of angels, who said that he was alive.

name: According to Luke
text: And some of those with us went to the sepulcher, and found it so even as the women had said, but him they saw not.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: O without understanding, and slow of heart to believe in all things that the prophets have spoken.

name: According to Luke
text: Was it not needful that the Christ should suffer these things and enter into his glory?

name: According to Luke
text: And beginning from Moses and from all the prophets, he explained to them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself.

name: According to Luke
text: And they drew near to the village whither they were going, and he made a show of going further;

name: According to Luke
text: and they constrained him, saying: Abide with us; for it is toward evening, and the day has now declined. And he went in to abide with them.162

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass as he reclined at table with them, he took bread, blessed and broke and gave to them;

name: According to Luke
text: but their eyes were opened, and they recognized him; and he vanished out of their sight.

name: According to Luke
text: And they said one to another: Was not our heart burning within us, as he spoke to us on the way, as he opened to us the scriptures?

name: According to Luke
text: And they rose up the same hour and returned to Jerusalem, and found the eleven and those with them collected together,

name: According to Luke
text: saying that the Lord has certainly risen and has appeared to Simon.

name: According to Luke
text: And they told what had taken place on the way, and how he was made known to them in the breaking of bread.

name: According to Luke
text: But while they were talking of these things, he himself stood in the midst of them.

name: According to Luke
text: And being terrified and becoming fearful, they thought that they saw a spirit.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: Why are you troubled, and why do thoughts arise in your hearts?

name: According to Luke
text: See my hands and my feet, that it is I myself: handle me and see; for a spirit has not flesh and bones as you see me have.

name: According to Luke
text: And when he had said this, he showed them his hands and his feet.

name: According to Luke
text: But while they believed not for joy, and wondered, he said to them: Have you anything here to eat?

name: According to Luke
text: And they gave him a piece of broiled fish;

name: According to Luke
text: and he took it and ate in their presence.

name: According to Luke
text: And he said to them: These are my words, which I spoke to you while I was yet with you, that all things that are written in the law of Moses and the prophets and the psalms concerning me must be fulfilled.

name: According to Luke
text: Then opened he their understanding, that they might understand the scriptures;

name: According to Luke
text: and he said to them: Thus it is written, that the Christ should suffer and rise from the dead on the third day,

name: According to Luke
text: and that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations, beginning at Jerusalem.

name: According to Luke
text: You are witnesses of these things.

name: According to Luke
text: And I send the promise of my Father upon you; but do you continue in the city, till you be clothed with power from on high.

name: According to Luke
text: And he led them out as far as Bethany, and having lifted up his hands, he blessed them.

name: According to Luke
text: And it came to pass, as he blessed them, he was separated from

name: According to Luke
text: And they returned to Jerusalem with great joy,

name: According to Luke
text: and were continually in the temple praising God.

name: According to Mark
text: The beginning of the gospel of Jesus Christ,

name: According to Mark
text: As it is written in Isaiah the prophet: Behold, I send my messenger before thy face, who shall prepare thy way:

name: According to Mark
text: The voice of one crying in the wilderness: Make ready the way of the Lord, make his paths straight.

name: According to Mark
text: It was John who baptized in the wilderness and preached the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins.

name: According to Mark
text: And there went out to him all the country of Judea and all they of Jerusalem and were baptized by him in the river Jordan, confessing their sins.

name: According to Mark
text: And John was clothed with camel’s hair and a girdle of leather around his loins, and he ate locusts and wild honey.

name: According to Mark
text: And he preached, saying: After me comes he that is mightier than I, the strap of whose sandals I am not worthy to stoop down and loose.

name: According to Mark
text: I have baptized you in water, but he shall baptize you in the Holy Spirit.

name: According to Mark
text: And it came to pass in those days that Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee and was baptized in the Jordan by John.

name: According to Mark
text: And immediately going up out of the water he saw the heavens rent, and the Spirit like a dove coming down upon him.

name: According to Mark
text: And there was a voice from the heavens: Thou art my beloved Son, in thee I am well pleased.

name: According to Mark
text: And immediately the Spirit drives him into the wilderness.

name: According to Mark
text: And he was in the wilderness forty days tempted by Satan; and he was with the wild beasts, and the angels ministered to him.

name: According to Mark
text: But after John was delivered up, Jesus came into Galilee, preaching the gospel of God,

name: According to Mark
text: that the time is fulfilled and the kingdom of God is at hand: Repent and believe in the gospel.

name: According to Mark
text: And passing along by the sea of Galilee, he saw Simon and Andrew the brother of Simon throwing a net about in the sea; for they were fishers.

name: According to Mark
text: And Jesus said to them: Come after me, and I will make you become fishers of men.

name: According to Mark
text: And immediately leaving the nets they followed him.

name: According to Mark
text: And going forward a little he saw James the son of Zebedee and John his brother, who were also in the ship mending the nets.

name: According to Mark
text: And he immediately called them; and leaving their father Zebedee in the ship with the hired servants they went away after him.70

name: According to Mark
text: And they entered into Capernaum; and immediately, on the sabbath, he taught in the synagogue.

name: According to Mark
text: And they were astonished at his teaching; for he taught them as having authority, and not as the scribes.

name: According to Mark
text: And immediately there was in their synagogue a man with an unclean spirit; and he cried out,

name: According to Mark
text: Saying: What have we to do with thee, Jesus the Nazarene? thou hast come to destroy us. We know thee who thou art, the Holy One of God.

name: According to Mark
text: And Jesus rebuked him: Be silent, and come out of him.

name: According to Mark
text: And the unclean spirit threw him into convulsions, and having cried out with a loud voice came out of him.

name: According to Mark
text: And all were amazed, so that they inquired one of another, saying: What means this? A new teaching according to authority: he also commands the unclean spirits, and they obey him.

name: According to Mark
text: And his fame immediately went forth everywhere into the whole surrounding country of Galilee.

name: According to Mark
text: And immediately on going out of the synagogue, they came into the house of Simon and Andrew with James and John.

name: According to Mark
text: And the mother-in-law of Simon lay ill of a fever and they immediately tell him of her.

name: According to Mark
text: And he came to her and raised her up, taking her by the hand. And the fever left her, and she ministered to them.

name: According to Mark
text: But after evening had come, when the sun went down, they brought to him all that were sick, and those possessed with demons;

name: According to Mark
text: And the whole city was collected together at the door.

name: According to Mark
text: And he cured many that were sick with various diseases, and cast out many demons, and permitted not the demons to speak, because they knew him.

name: According to Mark
text: And very early while yet night, he rose up and went out, and went away to a desert place, and there prayed.

name: According to Mark
text: And Simon and they that were with him followed after him.

name: According to Mark
text: And found him, and said to him: All seek for thee.

name: According to Mark
text: And he said to them: Let us go elsewhere to the next towns, that I may preach there also; for to this end came I forth.

name: According to Mark
text: And he went through the whole of Galilee, preaching in their synagogues, and casting out demons.

name: According to Mark
text: And there came to him a leper, entreating him and kneeling, saying to him: If thou wilt, thou canst make me clean.

name: According to Mark
text: And moved with pity he stretched forth his hand and touched him and said: I will; be clean.

name: According to Mark
text: And the leprosy immediately departed from him, and he was

name: According to Mark
text: And after charging him in a threatening manner, he immediately sent him forth,

name: According to Mark
text: and said to him: See that thou say nothing to any one, but go, show thyself to the priest, and offer for thy cleansing the things that Moses commanded, for a testimony to them.

name: According to Mark
text: But he went out and began to proclaim it much, and publish the matter abroad, so that he could no longer openly enter into a city, but was without in desert places; and they came to him from every quarter.

name: According to Mark
text: And entering again into Capernaum after some days, it was reported that he was in a house.

name: According to Mark
text: And many came together, so that the house could no longer contain them, nor the space about the door; and he spoke the word to them.

name: According to Mark
text: And they came bringing to him a palsied man borne by four.

name: According to Mark
text: And not being able to bring him near to him on account of the multitude, they took off the roof where he was, and digging through, they let down the bed on which the palsied man lay.

name: According to Mark
text: And Jesus seeing their faith says to the palsied man: Son, thy sins are forgiven.

name: According to Mark
text: But some of the scribes were sitting there and reasoning in their hearts:

name: According to Mark
text: Why speaks this man thus? He blasphemes: who can forgive sins but one, God?

name: According to Mark
text: And Jesus immediately perceiving by his spirit that they thus reasoned in themselves, said to them: Why reason these things in your hearts?

name: According to Mark
text: Which is easier, to say to the palsied man: Thy sins are forgiven, or to say: Rise and take up thy bed and go?

name: According to Mark
text: But that you may know that the Son of man on earth has authority to forgive sins, he says to the palsied man:

name: According to Mark
text: I say to thee, rise, take up thy bed and go to thy house.

name: According to Mark
text: And he arose and immediately taking up his bed, he went out before all, so that they all were astonished, and glorified. God, saying: Thus never saw we.

name: According to Mark
text: And he went forth again to the sea; and all the multitude came to him, and he taught them

name: According to Mark
text: And passing by he saw Levi the son of Alphaeus sitting at the customs-house, and said to him: Follow me And he rose up and followed him.

name: According to Mark
text: And it came to pass that he was reclining at table in his house, and many publicans and sinners reclined at table with Jesus and his disciples; for there were many, and there followed him,72

name: According to Mark
text: also the scribes of the Pharisees. And seeing that he ate with the publicans and sinners, they said to his disciples: Why does he eat and drink with the publicans and sinners?

name: According to Mark
text: And hearing it Jesus says to them: They that are in health have no need of a physician, but they that are sick: I came not to call righteous men, but sinners.

name: According to Mark
text: And the disciples of John and the Pharisees were fasting. And they come and say to him: Why do the disciples of John and the disciples of the Pharisees fast, but thy disciples fast not?

name: According to Mark
text: And Jesus said to them: Can the sons of the bride-chamber fast while the bridegroom is with them? As long as they have the bridegroom with them, they can not fast.

name: According to Mark
text: But days will come when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them, and then shall they fast in that day.

name: According to Mark
text: No one sews a piece of unfulled cloth on an old garment: otherwise, that which fills up takes from it, the new from the old, and a worse rent is made.

name: According to Mark
text: And no one puts new wine into old bottles: otherwise, the wine bursts the bottles, and the wine and bottles are lost.

name: According to Mark
text: And it came to pass that he was going on the sabbath through the fields of grain; and his disciples began to go on the way pulling the ears of grain.

name: According to Mark
text: And the Pharisees said to him: See, why are they doing on the sabbath that which is not lawful?

name: According to Mark
text: And he said to them: Did you never read what David did, when he had need and was hungry, he and those who were with him?

name: According to Mark
text: how he entered into the house of God, in the days of Abiathar the chief priest, and ate the loaves of the presence, which it is not lawful to eat but for the priests, and gave to those also that were with him?

name: According to Mark
text: And he said to them: The sabbath was made for man, and not man for the sabbath:

name: According to Mark
text: So then the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath.

name: According to Mark
text: And he entered again into a synagogue; and a man was there that had a withered hand;

name: According to Mark
text: And they watched him if he would cure him on the sabbath, that they might accuse him.

name: According to Mark
text: And he says to the man that had the withered hand: Rise and come into the midst.

name: According to Mark
text: And he says to them: Is it lawful on the sabbath to do good or to do

name: According to Mark
text: And looking around on them with anger, being grieved at the hardness of their heart, he says to the man: Stretch forth the hand. And he stretched it forth, and his hand was restored to health.

name: According to Mark
text: And the Pharisees went out immediately with the Herodians, and took counsel against him, that they might destroy him.

name: According to Mark
text: And Jesus withdrew with his disciples to the sea; and a great multitude followed from Galilee and from Judea,

name: According to Mark
text: And from Jerusalem and from Idumea and beyond the Jordan and about Tyre and Sidon, a great multitude, hearing what things he did, came to him.

name: According to Mark
text: And he spoke to his disciples that a small ship should wait upon him because of the multitude, that they might not throng him;

name: According to Mark
text: For he cured many, so that they fell upon him, that they might touch him, as many as had scourges.

name: According to Mark
text: And the unclean spirits, when they saw him, fell down before him and cried out, saying: Thou art the Son of God.

name: According to Mark
text: And he charged their minds that they should not make him known.

name: According to Mark
text: And he went up into the mountain, and called to him whom he would; and they came to him.

name: According to Mark
text: And he appointed twelve that they might be with him, and that he might send them forth to preach,

name: According to Mark
text: and to have authority to cast out the demons.

name: According to Mark
text: And he appointed the twelve; and Simon he surnamed Peter.

name: According to Mark
text: And James the son of Zebedee and John the brother of James; and these he surnamed Boanerges, which is sons of thunder;

name: According to Mark
text: And Andrew, and Philip, and Bartholomew, and Matthew, and Thomas, and James the son of Alphaeus, and Thaddaeus, and Simon the Canaanite,

name: According to Mark
text: and Judas Iscariot, who also delivered him up, and he came into a house;

name: According to Mark
text: And a multitude again came together, so that they were able not even to eat bread.

name: According to Mark
text: And his relatives hearing it came forth to take him; for they said: He is beside himself.

name: According to Mark
text: And the scribes that came down from Jerusalem said: He has Beelzebub, and by the prince of the demons he casts out the demons.

name: According to Mark
text: And he called them to him and spoke to them in parables: How can Satan cast out Satan?

name: According to Mark
text: And if a kingdom be divided against itself, that kingdom can not stand.

name: According to Mark
text: And if a house be divided against itself, that house can not stand.74

name: According to Mark
text: And if Satan rise up against himself, he is divided; and he can not stand, but has an end.

name: According to Mark
text: But no one is able, on entering into the house of the strong man, to seize upon his instruments, unless he first bind the strong man, and then he will plunder his house.

name: According to Mark
text: Verily I say to you that all shall be forgiven the sons of men, the sins and the blasphemies, whatever things they shall blasphemously utter;

name: According to Mark
text: But whoever shall blaspheme against the Holy Spirit, has forgiveness never, but is guilty of an eternal sin.

name: According to Mark
text: Because they said: He has an unclean spirit.

name: According to Mark
text: And his mother and his brothers came, and standing without sent to him calling him.

name: According to Mark
text: And a multitude sat about him; and they said to him: Behold, thy mother, and thy brothers, and thy sisters without seek thee.

name: According to Mark
text: And he answered and said to them: Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?

name: According to Mark
text: And looking around on those sitting round about him, he says: Behold my mother and my brothers.

name: According to Mark
text: Whoever shall have done the will of God, this is my brother and sister and mother.

name: According to Mark
text: And again he began to teach by the sea. And there came together to him a very great multitude, so that he entered into a ship and sat in the sea, and the whole multitude was by the sea on the land.

name: According to Mark
text: And he taught them many things in parables, and said to them in his teaching:

name: According to Mark
text: Hear; Behold, the sower went forth to sow.

name: According to Mark
text: And it came to pass while he sowed some fell by the way, and the birds came and ate it up.

name: According to Mark
text: And other fell on the rocky place, where it had not much earth; and it immediately sprung up because it had not depth of earth;

name: According to Mark
text: And when the sun had risen, it was scorched; and because it had no root it withered.

name: According to Mark
text: And other fell among thorns, and the thorns grew up and choked it and it produced no fruit.

name: According to Mark
text: And others fell on good ground and yielded fruit, growing up and increasing, and produced to thirty and to sixty and to a hundred.

name: According to Mark
text: And he said: He that has ears to hear, let him hear.

name: According to Mark
text: And when he was alone, those about him with the twelve asked

name: According to Mark
text: And he said to them: To you is given the mystery of the kingdom of God but to them that are without all things are done in parables;

name: According to Mark
text: that seeing they may see and may not perceive; and hearing they may hear and not understand; lest perhaps they should turn and it; should be forgiven them.

name: According to Mark
text: And he says to them: Know you not this parable, and how will you know all parables?

name: According to Mark
text: The sower sows the word.

name: According to Mark
text: But these are they that are by the way side where the word is sown; and when they hear, Satan immediately comes and takes away the word that is sown in them.

name: According to Mark
text: And these are they in like manner that were sown on the rocky places; who when they hear the word immediately with joy receive it;

name: According to Mark
text: And yet they have no root in themselves, but endure for a time: then when affliction or persecution arises because of the word they immediately take offense.

name: According to Mark
text: And others are they that were sown over the thorns: these are they that hear the word,

name: According to Mark
text: And the cares of the age, and the deceitfulness of riches, and the desires about other things entering in choke the word, and it becomes unfruitful.

name: According to Mark
