text: And they that were sown on good ground are those who hear the word and receive it, and bring forth fruit in thirties, and in sixties, and in hundreds.

name: According to Mark
text: And he said to them: Is a lamp brought that it may be put under the measure or under the bed? Is it not brought that it may be put on the lampstand?

name: According to Mark
text: For there is nothing hid, unless that it may be made manifest: nor was any thing concealed, but that it might come into open view.

name: According to Mark
text: If any one has ears to hear, let him hear.

name: According to Mark
text: And he said to them: Take heed what you hear. With what measure you measure it shall be measured to you, and more shall be given to you.

name: According to Mark
text: For he that has, to him shall be given; and he that has not, even that which he has shall be taken from him.

name: According to Mark
text: And he said: So is the kingdom of God, as if a man should sow seed upon the earth,

name: According to Mark
text: And should sleep and awake night and day, and the seed should spring up and grow, he knows not how.

name: According to Mark
text: The earth of its own accord brings forth fruit, first the blade, then the ear, then the full grain in the ear.

name: According to Mark
text: But when the fruit shall have presented itself, immediately he sends forth the sickle, because the harvest is ready.76

name: According to Mark
text: And he said: How shall we liken the kingdom of God, or with what parable shall we set it forth?

name: According to Mark
text: It is like a grain of mustard, which, when it is sown on the earth, is less than all the seeds that are on the earth;

name: According to Mark
text: And yet when it is sown, it springs up and becomes greater than all garden-plants, and; makes great branches, so that the birds of heaven can lodge under its shadow.

name: According to Mark
text: And with many such parables spoke he the word to them, as they were able to hear;

name: According to Mark
text: But without a parable spoke he not to them; but privately he explained all things to his disciples.

name: According to Mark
text: And on that day when it was evening he says to them: Let us pass over to the other side.

name: According to Mark
text: And leaving the multitude they took him as he was in the ship, and there were also other ships with him.

name: According to Mark
text: And there came a great storm of wind, and the waves beat into the ship, so that the ship was now full.

name: According to Mark
text: And he was sleeping in the prow on the boat-cushion; and they awoke him and said to him: Teacher, carest thou not that we perish?

name: According to Mark
text: And he awoke and rebuked the wind and said to the sea: Peace be still. And the wind ceased, and there was a great calm.

name: According to Mark
text: And he said to them: Why are you so fearful? How have you no faith?

name: According to Mark
text: And they were afraid with great fear, and said one to another: Who then is this, that even the wind and the sea obey him?

name: According to Mark
text: And they came to the other side of the sea to the, country of the Gadarenes.

name: According to Mark
text: And when he had come out of the ship, immediately there met him a man from the tombs with an unclean spirit,

name: According to Mark
text: Who had his dwelling among the tombs; and not even with a chain was any one any longer able to bind him,

name: According to Mark
text: Because he had often been bound with fetters and chains, and the chains had been pulled asunder by him and the fetters had been broken; and no one was able to subdue him;

name: According to Mark
text: And always night and day among the tombs and in the mountains he was crying out and cutting himself with stones.

name: According to Mark
text: And seeing Jesus at a distance he ran and worshipped him;

name: According to Mark
text: and crying out with a loud voice, he said: What have I to do with thee, Jesus, Son of God most high? I adjure thee by God, that thou torment me not.

name: According to Mark
text: And he asked him: What is thy name? And he said to him: My name is legion, for we are many.

name: According to Mark
text: And they besought him much that he would not send them out of the country.

name: According to Mark
text: But there was there near the mountain a great herd of swine feeding;

name: According to Mark
text: And they besought him, saying: Send us to the swine that we may enter into them.

name: According to Mark
text: And he permitted them. And the unclean spirits came out and entered into the swine; and the herd, about two thousand, rushed down the steep into the sea, and were choked in the sea.

name: According to Mark
text: And those who fed them fled, and told it in the city and in the country; and they came I to see what it was that had been done.

name: According to Mark
text: And they come to Jesus and see him that had the demon, sitting, clothed and in his right mind, him that had had the legion, and they were afraid.

name: According to Mark
text: And they that had seen told them how it had happened to the demon and concerning the swine.

name: According to Mark
text: And they began to beseech him to depart from their borders.

name: According to Mark
text: And as he was entering the ship, he that had been possessed with the demon besought him that he might be with him.

name: According to Mark
text: And he permitted him not, but said to him: Go to thy house to thy own, and tell them what things the Lord has done for thee, and has had mercy on thee.

name: According to Mark
text: And he went away, and began to proclaim in Decapolis what things Jesus had done for him; and all were astonished.

name: According to Mark
text: And when Jesus had again passed over in the ship to the other side, a great multitude came together to him, and he was by the sea.

name: According to Mark
text: And there comes one of the rulers of the synagogue, named Jairus; and seeing him he falls at his feet,

name: According to Mark
text: and beseeches him much, saying: My little daughter is at the point of death, I pray that thou wouldst come and lay thy hand on her, that she may be saved and live.

name: According to Mark
text: And he went away with him; and a great multitude followed him, and they pressed upon him.

name: According to Mark
text: And a woman that had had an issue of blood for twelve years,

name: According to Mark
text: And had suffered many things under many physicians, and had spent all that she had, and was in no way benefited, but rather grew worse.

name: According to Mark
text: Hearing of the things concerning Jesus, came behind in the multitude, and touched his clothes;

name: According to Mark
text: For she said: If I may touch even his clothes, I shall be saved.

name: According to Mark
text: And immediately the fountain of her blood dried up, and she knew in her body that she was restored to health from that scourge.78

name: According to Mark
text: And Jesus immediately perceiving in himself that power had gone forth from him, turned about in the multitude and said: Who touched my clothes?

name: According to Mark
text: And his disciples said to him: Seest thou the multitude thronging thee and sayest thou: Who touched me?

name: According to Mark
text: And he looked around to see her that had done this.

name: According to Mark
text: But the woman being afraid and trembling, knowing what had been done for her, came and fell before him and told him all the truth.

name: According to Mark
text: And he said to her: Daughter, thy faith has saved thee: go in peace, and be well of thy scourge.

name: According to Mark
text: While he was yet speaking there came some from the house of the ruler of the synagogue, saying: Thy daughter is dead, why trouble the Teacher further?

name: According to Mark
text: But Jesus, disregarding the word that was spoken, said to the ruler of the synagogue: Fear not, only believe.

name: According to Mark
text: And he permitted no one to follow with him but Peter, and James, and John the brother of James.

name: According to Mark
text: And they come to the house of the ruler of the synagogue; and he sees a tumult, and those who wept and bewailed much;

name: According to Mark
text: And entering in he says to them: Why make a tumult and weep? The child is not dead, but sleeps.

name: According to Mark
text: And they derided him. But he, having put them all out, takes the father of the child, and the mother, and those with him, and goes in where the child was.

name: According to Mark
text: And he took the child by the hand and said to her: Talitha kumi, which is translated: Maiden, I say to thee, arise.

name: According to Mark
text: And the maiden immediately rose up and walked; for she was twelve years old. And they were immediately astonished with great astonishment.

name: According to Mark
text: And he charged them much that no one should know this and commanded that there should be given her to eat.

name: According to Mark
text: And he went out thence, and came into his own country; and his disciples followed him.

name: According to Mark
text: And when the sabbath had come he began to teach in the synagogue; and many hearing were astonished, saying: Whence has this man these things, and what the wisdom that is given to this man? and are such mighty deeds done through his hands?

name: According to Mark
text: Is not this the carpenter, the son of Mary, and brother of James and Joses and Judah and Simon? And are not his sisters here with us?

name: According to Mark
text: And Jesus said to them: A prophet is not without honor, unless in his own country, and among his relatives, and in his own house.

name: According to Mark
text: And he was able to do no mighty work there, except that he laid his hands on a few sick persons and cured them.

name: According to Mark
text: And he wondered because of their unbelief. And he went about the villages round about teaching.

name: According to Mark
text: And he called to him the twelve, and began to send them forth two and two; and gave them authority over unclean spirits;

name: According to Mark
text: And charged them to take nothing for the journey but a staff only; no bread, no bag, no brass in the girdle,

name: According to Mark
text: But be shod with sandals: and put not on two coats.

name: According to Mark
text: And he said to them: Wherever you enter a house, there abide till you go forth thence.

name: According to Mark
text: And whatever place shall not have received you nor heard you, when you go out thence, shake off the dust that is under your feet, for a testimony against them.

name: According to Mark
text: And they went forth and preached that men should repent;

name: According to Mark
text: and they cast out many demons, and anointed with oil many sick and cured them.

name: According to Mark
text: And Herod the king heard, for his name had become known, and said: John the Baptist has risen from the dead, and for this reason the powers are active within him.

name: According to Mark
text: But others said: It is Elijah; but others said: He is a prophet like one of the prophets.

name: According to Mark
text: But Herod, when he heard, said: John whom I beheaded, he has risen.

name: According to Mark
text: For Herod himself had sent and taken John, and bound him in prison because of Herodias the wife of his brother Philip, for he had married her.

name: According to Mark
text: For John said to Herod: It is not lawful for thee to have thy brother’s wife.

name: According to Mark
text: And Herodias was angry with him, and desired to kill him, and was not able.

name: According to Mark
text: For Herod feared John, knowing him to be a righteous and holy man, and he kept him in safety, and hearing him he was much perplexed, and heard him with pleasure.

name: According to Mark
text: And a suitable time having come, when Herod on his birthday had made a supper for his great men, and the officers of thousands, and the first men of Galilee;

name: According to Mark
text: and the daughter of the same Herodias having come in and danced, she pleased Herod and those that reclined with him at table; and the king said to the maiden: Ask of me whatever thou wilt, and I will give thee.80

name: According to Mark
text: And he swore to her: Whatever thou shalt ask I will give thee to the half of my kingdom.

name: According to Mark
text: And she went out and said to her mother: What shall I ask? And she said: The head of John the Baptist.

name: According to Mark
text: And coming in immediately with haste to the king, she asked, saying: I will that thou at once give me in a dish the head of John the Baptist.

name: According to Mark
text: And the king though he became very sad, because of the oaths and; those that reclined at table with him would not reject her.

name: According to Mark
text: And the king immediately sent an executioner and ordered to bring his head.

name: According to Mark
text: And he went and beheaded him in the prison, and brought his head in a dish, and gave it to the maiden; and the maiden gave it to her mother.

name: According to Mark
text: And his disciples heard it and came and took away his corpse, and laid him in a sepulcher.

name: According to Mark
text: And the apostles came together to Jesus, and told him all things that they had done and taught.

name: According to Mark
text: And he says to them: Do you yourselves come apart to a desert place, and rest a little. For many were coming and going, and they had leisure not even to eat.

name: According to Mark
text: And they went away by ship to a desert place apart.

name: According to Mark
text: And many saw them going and knew them, and ran thither on foot from all the cities, and outwent them.

name: According to Mark
text: And coming out he saw a great multitude, and was moved with pity for them, because they were as sheep that had no shepherd, and began to teach them many things.

name: According to Mark
text: And as much time had already passed, his disciples came and said: The place is desert, and already much time is spent:

name: According to Mark
text: dismiss them, that they may go into the country and villages round about and buy for themselves what they may eat.

name: According to Mark
text: But he answered and said to them: Do you give them to eat. And they say to him: Shall we go and buy two hundred denarii worth of bread, and give them to eat?

name: According to Mark
text: But he says to them: How many loaves have you? Go, see. And having learned they say: Five and two fishes.

name: According to Mark
text: And he ordered them that all should recline by table-parties on the green grass.

name: According to Mark
text: And they reclined in oblong squares, by hundreds and by fifties.

name: According to Mark
text: And having taken the five loaves and the two fishes, he looked up to heaven and blessed; and broke the loaves, and gave to the disciples to set before them; and the two fishes he divided among all.

name: According to Mark
text: And they took up of the broken pieces twelve provision-baskets full, and of the fishes.

name: According to Mark
text: And those that had eaten the loaves were five thousand men.

name: According to Mark
text: And he immediately constrained his disciples to enter the ship, and go before him to the other side to Bethsaida till he himself should send away the multitude.

name: According to Mark
text: And having sent them away he went into the mountain to pray.

name: According to Mark
text: And when evening had come, the ship was in the midst of the sea, and himself alone on the land.

name: According to Mark
text: And seeing them toiling in rowing, for the wind was against them, about the fourth watch of the night he came to them walking on the sea. And he intended to pass by them.

name: According to Mark
text: But seeing him walking on the sea they thought that it was a specter, and cried out;

name: According to Mark
text: for they all saw him and were alarmed. But he immediately talked with them, and said to them: Take courage, it is I, be not afraid.

name: According to Mark
text: And he went up to them into the ship and the wind ceased. And they were greatly astonished in themselves beyond measure.

name: According to Mark
text: For they had not learned by means of the loaves, but their heart was hardened.

name: According to Mark
text: And when they had passed over to the land they came to Gennesaret, and drew to shore.

name: According to Mark
text: And when they had come out of the ship, they immediately knew him,

name: According to Mark
text: And ran about that whole country, and began to carry the sick about in beds where they heard that he was.

name: According to Mark
text: And wherever he went into villages, or cities, or the country, they laid the sick in the markets, and besought him that they might touch even the fringe of his mantle; and as many as touched him were saved.

name: According to Mark
text: And there came together to him the Pharisees and some of the scribes that had come from Jerusalem.

name: According to Mark
text: And seeing some of his disciples that they ate bread with common, that is, with unwashed hands,

name: According to Mark
text: for the Pharisees and all the Jews, unless they wash their hands often, eat not. Holding the tradition of the elders;

name: According to Mark
text: And when they come from market, unless they immerse themselves, they eat not; and there are many other things that they received to hold, the immersion of cups and pitchers and brazen vessels:82

name: According to Mark
text: And the Pharisees and the scribes asked him: Why walk not thy disciples according to the tradition of the elders, but eat bread with common hands?

name: According to Mark
text: And he said to them: Well did Isaiah prophesy of you hypocrites, as it is written. This people honor me with their lips, but their heart is far distant from me;

name: According to Mark
text: but in vain do they offer reverence to me, teaching teachings the commandments of men.

name: According to Mark
text: Leaving the commandment of God you hold the tradition of men.

name: According to Mark
text: And he said to them: Well do you set aside the commandment of God, that you may keep your tradition.

name: According to Mark
text: For Moses said: Honor thy father and thy mother, and: He that curses father or mother let him surely die.

name: According to Mark
text: But you say: If a man shall say to his father or mother: That, by whatever thou mightest receive aid from me, is corban, which is a gift.

name: According to Mark
text: You no longer permit him to do any thing for his father or mother,

name: According to Mark
text: Making the word of God of no effect by your tradition which you have delivered. And many things like these you do.

name: According to Mark
text: And again calling the multitude to him he said to them: Hear me, all of you, and understand.

name: According to Mark
text: There is nothing from without a man, that entering into him can defile him; but the things that proceed from a man are they that defile a man.

name: According to Mark
text: And when he had entered the house apart from the multitude, his disciples asked him about the parable.

name: According to Mark
text: And he said to them: So even you are without understanding? Do you not perceive that nothing from without by entering into a man can defile him?

name: According to Mark
text: because it goes not into his heart, but into his belly, and is cast out into the sink, making all meats clean.

name: According to Mark
text: But he said: That which proceeds from a man, that defiles a man.

name: According to Mark
text: For from within, out of the heart of men, proceed evil thoughts, lewdness, thefts, murders,

name: According to Mark
text: Adulteries, covetousness, wicked counsels, deceit, wantonness, an evil eye, blasphemy, haughtiness, folly:

name: According to Mark
text: All these wicked things proceed from within, and defile a man.

name: According to Mark
text: But he arose and went away thence into the borders of Tyre. And entering a house he desired that no one should know it, and was not able to escape notice;

name: According to Mark
text: But a woman, whose little daughter had an unclean spirit,

name: According to Mark
text: The woman was a Greek, a Syrophenician by nation; and she asked him to cast the demon out of her daughter.

name: According to Mark
text: And he said to her: Let the children first be filled; for it is not good to take the children’s bread and throw it to the little dogs.

name: According to Mark
text: But she answered and said to him: Yes, Lord; and yet the little dogs under the table eat of the children’s crumbs.

name: According to Mark
text: And he said to her: Because of this saying go, the demon has gone out of thy daughter.

name: According to Mark
text: And she went away to her house, and found the little child lying on the bed, and the demon gone out.

name: According to Mark
text: And again going forth out of the borders of Tyre, he came through Sidon to the sea of Galilee, through the midst of the borders of Decapolis.

name: According to Mark
text: And they bring to him one deaf and that spoke with difficulty; and they beseech him to lay his hand on him.

name: According to Mark
text: And taking him aside from the multitude, he put his fingers into his ears, and spit, and touched his tongue.

name: According to Mark
text: and looking up to heaven he sighed, and said to him: Ephphatha, which is, Be opened.

name: According to Mark
text: And his ears were opened, and the string of his tongue was immediately loosed, and he spoke plainly.

name: According to Mark
text: And he charged them to tell no one; but as much as he charged them, the more abundantly they proclaimed it.

name: According to Mark
text: And they were exceedingly amazed, saying: He has done all things well: he makes both the deaf to hear and the dumb to speak,

name: According to Mark
text: In those days, the multitude again being great, and they having nothing to eat, he called his disciples to him and said to them:

name: According to Mark
text: I have pity on the multitude, because they have now continued with me three days, and have nothing to eat.

name: According to Mark
text: And if I send them away to their homes fasting, they will faint on the way; and some of them have come from far.

name: According to Mark
text: And his disciples answered him: Whence shall any one be able to satisfy these with bread here in the wilderness?

name: According to Mark
text: And he asked them: How many loaves have you? They said: Seven.

name: According to Mark
text: And he commanded the multitude to recline on the ground; and taking the seven loaves, he gave thanks, broke, and gave to his disciples to set before them; and they set them before the multitude.

name: According to Mark
text: And they had a few little fishes; and he blessed and set them before them.

name: According to Mark
text: And they ate and were satisfied, and took up what remained of the broken pieces, seven provision-baskets.84

name: According to Mark
text: And they were about four thousand; and he sent them away.

name: According to Mark
text: And immediately entering the ship with his disciples, he came into the regions of Dalmanutha.

name: According to Mark
text: And the Pharisees came out and began to dispute with him, seeking from him a sign from heaven, tempting him.

name: According to Mark
text: And sighing deeply in his spirit, he said: Why does this generation seek for a sign? Verily I say to you: No sign shall be given to this generation.

name: According to Mark
text: And leaving them he again embarked, and went to the other side.

name: According to Mark
text: And they had forgotten to take bread, and except one loaf they had nothing with them in the ship.

name: According to Mark
text: And he charged them, saying: Take heed, beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the leaven of Herod.

name: According to Mark
text: And they reasoned one with another: Because we have no bread.

name: According to Mark
text: And perceiving it he said to them: Why reason because you have no bread? Do you not yet perceive, neither understand? Have you your heart yet hardened?

name: According to Mark
text: Having eyes see you not, and having ears hear you not, and do you not remember,

name: According to Mark
text: when I broke the five loaves among the five thousand, and how many traveling-baskets full of broken pieces you took up? They say to him: Twelve.

name: According to Mark
text: When the seven also among the four thousand, how many provision-baskets full of broken pieces did you take up? And they say: Seven.

name: According to Mark
text: And he said to them: Do you not yet understand?

name: According to Mark
text: And they come to Bethsaida And they bring to him a blind man, and beseech him to touch him.

name: According to Mark
text: And taking the blind man by the hand, he brought him out of the village; and having spit on his eyes, he laid his hands on him, and asked him if he saw anything.

name: According to Mark
text: And he looked up and said: I behold men, for I perceive them as trees walking.

name: According to Mark
text: Then he again laid his hands on his eyes; and he saw clearly and was restored, and beheld all things distinctly.

name: According to Mark
text: And he sent him away to his house, saying: Go not into the village.

name: According to Mark
text: And Jesus and his disciples went forth into the villages of Caesarea Philippi; and on the way he asked his disciples, saying to them: Who do men say that I am?

name: According to Mark
text: They answered him, saying: John the Baptist, and others, Elijah, but others, One of the prophets.

name: According to Mark
text: And he asked them: But you, who say you that I am? Peter

name: According to Mark
text: And he charged them to tell no one concerning him.

name: According to Mark
text: And he began to teach them that the Son of man must suffer many things, and be rejected by the elders, and the chief priests, and the scribes, and be put to death, and rise after three days.

name: According to Mark
text: And he uttered this saying plainly. And Peter took him and began to rebuke him.

name: According to Mark
text: But turning and looking on his disciples he rebuked Peter and said: Get behind me, Satan, for thou thinkest not the things of God, but the things of men.

name: According to Mark
text: And calling the multitude to him with his disciples, he said to them: Whoever will follow after me, let him deny himself and take up his cross, and follow me.

name: According to Mark
text: For whoever will save his life shall lose it; but whoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel’s, shall save it.

name: According to Mark
text: For what shall it profit a man to gain the whole world and to lose his life?

name: According to Mark
text: For what would a man give as a ransom for his life?

name: According to Mark
text: For whoever shall have been ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation, the Son of man shall also be ashamed of him, when, he shall come in the glory of his Father with the holy angels.

name: According to Mark
text: And he said to them: Verily I say to you that there are some of those standing here, who shall not taste of death, till they see the kingdom of God coming in power.

name: According to Mark
text: And after six days Jesus took with him Peter, and James, and John, and led them up into a high mountain apart by themselves; and he was transfigured before them;

name: According to Mark
text: And his clothing became shining, very white, as no fuller on earth can whiten.

name: According to Mark
text: And there appeared to them Elijah with Moses; and they were conversing with Jesus.

name: According to Mark
text: And Peter answering said to Jesus: Rabbi, it is good that we are here, and let us make three tents, one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elijah.

name: According to Mark
text: For he knew not what he should answer; for they were greatly afraid.

name: According to Mark
text: And there came a cloud overshadowing them; and there came a voice from the cloud: This is my beloved Son, hear him.

name: According to Mark
text: And suddenly looking around they no longer saw any one but Jesus alone with themselves.86

name: According to Mark
text: And as they were coming down from the mountain, he charged them that they should tell no one what things they had seen, unless when the Son of man should have risen from the dead.

name: According to Mark
text: And they kept the saying among themselves, inquiring what to rise from the dead is.

name: According to Mark
text: And they asked him, saying: Why say the Pharisees and the scribes that Elijah must first come?

name: According to Mark
text: And he said to them: Elijah coming first restores all things. And how is it written of the Son of man? that he must suffer many things, and be set at naught.

name: According to Mark
text: But I say to you that Elijah also has come, and they have done to him what things they wished, as it is written of him.

name: According to Mark
text: And coming to the disciples, they saw a great multitude about them, and scribes disputing with them.

name: According to Mark
text: And immediately all the multitude seeing him were greatly amazed, and running to him saluted him.

name: According to Mark
text: And he asked them: Why are you disputing with them?

name: According to Mark
text: And one from the multitude answered him: Teacher, I brought to thee my son that has a dumb spirit.

name: According to Mark
text: And wherever he seizes him he throws him down; and he foams and gnashes with his teeth and pines away; and I spoke to thy disciples that they would cast him out, and they were not able.

name: According to Mark
text: And he answered and said to them: O faithless generation, how long shall I be with you? how long shall I bear with you? Bring him to me.

name: According to Mark
text: And they brought him to him. And when he saw him, the spirit immediately threw him into convulsions, and he fell upon the ground, and rolled foaming.

name: According to Mark
text: And he asked his father: How long is it since this came on him? He replied: From a child;

name: According to Mark
text: And he has often thrown him into the fire and into the water, to destroy him; but if in any way thou canst, have pity on us and help us.

name: According to Mark
text: But Jesus said to him: What is this “If thou canst”? All things are possible to him that believes.

name: According to Mark
text: The father of the child immediately crying out said: I believe; help thou my unbelief.

name: According to Mark
text: But Jesus, seeing that the multitude was running together, rebuked the unclean spirit, saying to him: Dumb and deaf spirit, I charge thee, come out of him, and enter no more into him.

name: According to Mark
text: And after crying out and throwing him into strong convulsions he came out; and he became like one dead, so that many said: He is dead.

name: According to Mark
text: And when he came into the house, his disciples asked him privately: Why were we not able to cast him out?

name: According to Mark
text: And he said to them: This kind can come out by nothing but by prayer.

name: According to Mark
text: And going out thence they passed along through Galilee, and he wished that no one should know it;

name: According to Mark
text: For he taught his disciples and said to them that the Son of man is to be delivered into the hands of men, and they will kill him, and when he has been killed he will rise after three days.

name: According to Mark
text: But they understood not the saying, and were afraid to ask him.

name: According to Mark
text: And they came into Capernaum. And when he was in the house he asked them: About what were you disputing on the way?

name: According to Mark
text: But they were silent; for they had disputed one with another on the way who was greatest.

name: According to Mark
text: And he sat down and called the twelve, and said to them: If any one will be first, he shall be last of all and minister of all.

name: According to Mark
text: And he took a little child and set him in the midst of them, and took him in his arms and said to them:

name: According to Mark
text: Whoever shall receive one of these little children in my name, receives me; and whoever shall receive me, receives not me, but him that sent me.

name: According to Mark
text: John said to him: Teacher, we saw one casting out demons in thy name, and he follows not us; and we forbade him, because he follows not us.

name: According to Mark
text: But Jesus said: Forbid him not; for there is no one who shall do a mighty deed in my name, and be able hastily to speak evil of me;

name: According to Mark
text: For he that is not against us, is for us.

name: According to Mark
text: For whoever shall give you a cup of water to drink in my name, because you are Christ’s, verily I say to you, he shall not lose his reward.

name: According to Mark
text: And whoever shall offend one of these little ones that believe, it were better for him if an upper millstone were hung about his neck, and he were thrown into the sea.

name: According to Mark
text: And if thy hand offend thee, cut it off: it is better for thee to enter into life maimed, than having two hands to go away into hell, into the unquenchable fire.

name: According to Mark
text: And if thy foot offend thee, cut it off: it is better for thee to enter into life lame, than having two feet to be thrown into hell.

name: According to Mark
text: And if thy eye offend thee, pull it out: it is better for thee to enter into the kingdom of God with one eye, than having two eyes to be thrown into hell,

name: According to Mark
text: Where their worm dies not and the fire is not quenched.88

name: According to Mark
text: For every one shall be salted with fire.

name: According to Mark
text: Salt is good; but if the salt become saltless, by what means will you season it? Have salt in yourselves, and be at peace one with another.

name: According to Mark
text: And rising up he came thence into the borders of Judea and beyond the Jordan; and multitudes came together again to him; and as he was accustomed he again taught them.

name: According to Mark
text: And the Pharisees came and asked him if it is lawful for a man to put away his wife, tempting him.

name: According to Mark
text: But answering he said to them: What did Moses command you?

name: According to Mark
text: They replied: Moses permitted to write a bill of divorce and put her away.

name: According to Mark
text: But Jesus said to them: Because of the hardness of your heart he wrote for you this commandment.

name: According to Mark
text: But from the beginning of creation, male and female made he them;

name: According to Mark
text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and his mother,

name: According to Mark
text: And the two shall be one flesh: so no longer are they two, but one flesh.

name: According to Mark
text: What therefore God has joined together, let not man put asunder.

name: According to Mark
text: And in the house the disciples again asked him about this matter.

name: According to Mark
text: And he said to them: Whoever puts away his wife and marries another commits adultery against her;

name: According to Mark
text: And if she puts away her husband and marries another, she commits adultery.

name: According to Mark
text: And they brought to him little children that he might touch them. But the disciples rebuked those that brought them.

name: According to Mark
text: And Jesus seeing it was displeased, and said to them: Let the little children come to me; forbid them not; for to such belongs the kingdom of God.

name: According to Mark
text: Verily I say to you: Whoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child, shall in no way enter into it.

name: According to Mark
text: And he took them in his arms and blessed them much, putting his hands upon them.

name: According to Mark
text: And as he went forth into the road, one ran to him, and kneeling to him asked him: Good teacher, what shall I do that I may inherit eternal life?

name: According to Mark
text: But Jesus said to him: Why callest thou me good? None is good but one, God.

name: According to Mark
text: Thou knowest the commandments: Thou shalt not commit bear false testimony. Thou shalt not defraud, Honor thy father and thy mother.

name: According to Mark
text: And he said to him: Teacher, all these have I kept from my youth.

name: According to Mark
text: And Jesus looking upon him loved him, and said to him: One thing thou lackest: go, sell whatever thou hast, and give to the poor, and thou shalt have treasure in heaven, and come follow me.

name: According to Mark
text: But becoming sad at that saying he went away sorrowful; for he had great possessions.

name: According to Mark
text: And looking around, Jesus says to his disciples: How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God.

name: According to Mark
text: And the disciples were amazed at his words. But Jesus again answering says to them: Children, how hard it is to enter into the kingdom of God:

name: According to Mark
text: it is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle, than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God.

name: According to Mark
text: But they were more amazed, saying among themselves: Who then can be saved?

name: According to Mark
text: Looking on them, Jesus says: With men, impossible, but not with God; for all things are possible with God.

name: According to Mark
text: Peter began to say to him: Behold, we have left all things and followed thee.

name: According to Mark
text: Jesus replied: Verily I say to you, there is no one that has left house, or brothers, or sisters, or mother, or father, or children, or lands, for my sake and for the sake of the gospel,

name: According to Mark
text: But he shall receive a hundred fold now at this time, houses, and brothers, and sisters, and mothers, and children, and land with persecutions, and in the age to come eternal life.

name: According to Mark
text: But many first shall be last, and last first.

name: According to Mark
text: And they were in the road going up to Jerusalem; and Jesus was going before them, and they were amazed; and as they followed they were afraid. And taking the twelve aside again he began to tell them the things that were about to befall him:

name: According to Mark
text: Behold, we are going up to Jerusalem, and the Son of man shall be delivered to the chief of priests and the scribes, and they will condemn him to death, and deliver him to the Gentiles,

name: According to Mark
text: And they shall mock him, and spit upon him, and scourge him, and put him to death, and after three days he shall rise.

name: According to Mark
text: And there came to him James and John, the sons of Zebedee, saying to him: Teacher, we wish that thou wouldst do for us whatever we ask of thee.

name: According to Mark
text: And he said to them: What will you that I should do for you?

name: According to Mark
text: And they said to him: Grant to us that we may sit, one on thy right hand and the other on thy left, in thy glory.90

name: According to Mark
text: But Jesus said to them: You know not what you ask. Are you able to drink the cup that I drink, or be baptized with the baptism with which I am baptized?

name: According to Mark
text: They said to him: We are able. Jesus said to them: The cup that I drink you shall drink, and with the baptism with which I am baptized you shall be baptized;

name: According to Mark
text: but to sit on my right hand or on my left is not mine to give, but it shall be given to those for whom it has been prepared.

name: According to Mark
text: And when the ten heard they began to be displeased with James and John.

name: According to Mark
text: And calling them to him, Jesus says to them: You know that those who are accounted to rule the Gentiles exercise lordship over them, and their great men exercise authority over them.

name: According to Mark
text: Not so however is it among you; but whoever will become great among you, shall be your minister,

name: According to Mark
text: And whoever of you will become first, shall be servant of all.

name: According to Mark
text: For the Son of man came not to be ministered to, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.

name: According to Mark
text: And they come to Jericho. And as he went out from Jericho with his disciples and a great multitude, Bartimaeus, the son of Timaeus, a blind beggar, was sitting by the road.

name: According to Mark
text: And hearing that it was Jesus the Nazarene, he began to cry out and say: Son of David, Jesus, have mercy on me.

name: According to Mark
text: And many rebuked him that he should be silent; but he cried much more: Son of David, have mercy on me.

name: According to Mark
text: And Jesus stood and said: Call him. And they called the blind man, saying to him: Take courage, rise, he calls thee.

name: According to Mark
text: And throwing aside the mantle, he sprang up and came to Jesus.

name: According to Mark
text: And answering him, Jesus said: What wilt thou that I shall do for thee? And the blind man said to him: Rabboni, that I may receive sight.

name: According to Mark
text: Jesus said to him: Go, thy faith has saved thee. And he immediately received sight, and followed him in the way.

name: According to Mark
text: And when they drew near to Jerusalem, and to Bethany at the mount of Olives, he sent two of his disciples

name: According to Mark
text: And said to them: Go into the village that is opposite to you, and, immediately on entering it, you shall find a colt tied, on which no man has ever yet sat: loose and bring him.

name: According to Mark
text: And if any one say to you: Why do you this? say: The Lord has need of him, and he will immediately send him hither again.

name: According to Mark
text: And they went and found the colt tied at the door without at the

name: According to Mark
text: And some of those standing there said to them: What do you loosing the colt?

name: According to Mark
text: And they answered them as Jesus’ had said; and they gave them permission.

name: According to Mark
text: And they brought the colt to Jesus, and threw their clothes upon him, and he sat on him.

name: According to Mark
text: And many spread their mantles in the road, but others, bundles of straw, having cut them from the fields.

name: According to Mark
text: And those that went before, and those that followed, cried: Hosanna, blessed is he that comes in the name of the Lord:

name: According to Mark
text: blessed is the coming kingdom of our father David: Hosanna in the highest.

name: According to Mark
text: And he went into Jerusalem into the temple; and having looked around on all things, the hour being now late, he went out to Bethany with the twelve.

name: According to Mark
text: And, on the morrow, as they came out from Bethany, he was hungry.

name: According to Mark
text: And seeing a fig-tree at a distance having leaves, he came if perhaps he might find anything on it; and when he came to it he found nothing but leaves; for it was not the season for figs.

name: According to Mark
text: And answering he said to it: No more for ever may any one eat fruit from thee. And his disciples heard him.

name: According to Mark
text: And they came to Jerusalem. And entering into the temple he began to drive out those that sold and those that bought in the temple, and he overturned the tables of the money-changers, and the seats of those that sold doves,

name: According to Mark
text: And permitted no one to carry a vessel through the temple;

name: According to Mark
text: and taught and said to them: Is it not written that my house shall be called a house of prayer for all nations? But you have made it a den of robbers.

name: According to Mark
text: And the chief priests and the scribes heard, and sought how they might destroy him; for they feared him, for all the multitude were astonished at his teaching.

name: According to Mark
text: And when it became late he went forth out of the city.

name: According to Mark
text: And as they passed by in the morning they saw the fig-tree withered from the roots.

name: According to Mark
text: And Peter calling it to mind said to him: Rabbi, See, the fig-tree that thou cursedst has withered.

name: According to Mark
text: And Jesus answered and said to them: Have faith in God.

name: According to Mark
text: Verily I say to you that whoever shall say to this mountain: Be taken up and thrown into the sea, and shall not doubt in his heart, but shall believe that what he says shall take place, it shall be done for him.92

name: According to Mark
text: Wherefore I say to you, all things whatever you pray for and ask, believe that you receive, and you shall have them.

name: According to Mark
text: And when you stand praying, forgive if you have any thing against any one, that your Father who is in the heavens may forgive you your offenses.

name: According to Mark
text: And they came again into Jerusalem. And as he was walking in the temple, there came to him the chief priests and the scribes and the elders,

name: According to Mark
text: and said to him: By what authority doest thou these things? Or who gave thee this authority that thou shouldst do these things?

name: According to Mark
text: But Jesus said to them: I will ask you one word, and answer me, and I will tell you by what authority I do these, things.

name: According to Mark
text: The baptism of John, was it of heaven or of men? Answer me.

name: According to Mark
text: And they reasoned among themselves, saying: If we say: Of heaven, he will reply: Why then did you not believe him?

name: According to Mark
text: but shall we say: Of men, they feared the people; for all held John that he was a prophet indeed.

name: According to Mark
text: And they answered Jesus and said: We know not. And Jesus said to them: Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things.

name: According to Mark
text: And he began to speak to them in parables. A man planted a vineyard, and put a hedge about it, and dug an under winevat and built a tower, and let it out to vinedressers and went into another country.

name: According to Mark
text: And at the time he sent to the vinedressers a servant, that he might receive from the vinedressers of the fruits of the vineyard.

name: According to Mark
text: And they took him and scourged him, and sent him away empty.

name: According to Mark
text: And again he sent to them another servant; and they wounded him in the head and dishonored him.

name: According to Mark
text: And he sent another; and him they killed, and many others, scourging some, and killing some.

name: According to Mark
text: Yet one had he, a son beloved: he sent him to them last, saying: They will reverence my son.

name: According to Mark
text: But those vinedressers said among themselves: This is the heir: come, let us kill him, and the inheritance shall be ours.

name: According to Mark
text: And they took him and killed him, and cast him out of the vineyard.

name: According to Mark
text: What will the lord of the vineyard do? He will come and destroy the vinedressers, and give the vineyard to others.

name: According to Mark
text: Have you not read this scripture? A stone that the builders rejected, this became the head of the corner:

name: According to Mark
text: And they sought to lay hold on him and feared the multitude: for they knew that he had Spoken the parable against them. And leaving him they went away.

name: According to Mark
text: And they send to him some of the Pharisees and of the Herodians, that they may entrap him in a word.

name: According to Mark
text: And they come and say to him: Teacher, we know that thou art true, and thou carest for no one; for thou lookest not on the person of men, but teachest the way of God in truth. Is it lawful to give tribute to Caesar or not? Must we give or not give?

name: According to Mark
text: But he, perceiving their hypocrisy, said to them: Why tempt me? Bring me a denarius that I may see it.

name: According to Mark
text: They brought it. And he said to them: Whose image is this, and the superscription? They said to him: Caesar’s.

name: According to Mark
text: And Jesus said to them: Return to Caesar the things that are Caesar’s, and to God the things that are God’s. And they were astonished at him.

name: According to Mark
text: And the Sadducees, who say that there is no resurrection, came to him, and questioned him, saying:

name: According to Mark
text: Teacher, Moses wrote for us that, if any one’s brother die, and leave a wife, and leave no child, his brother shall take his wife, and raise up offspring for his brother.

name: According to Mark
text: There were seven brothers; and the first took a wife, and dying left no offspring.

name: According to Mark
text: And the second took her, and died leaving no offspring; and the third in like manner;

name: According to Mark
text: and the seven left no offspring. Last of all the woman also died.

name: According to Mark
text: In the resurrection, when they rise, of which of them shall she be the wife? For the seven had her as a wife.

name: According to Mark
text: Jesus said to them: Do you not therefore err, not knowing the scriptures, nor the power of God?

name: According to Mark
text: For when they rise from the dead, they neither marry nor are given in marriage, but are as angels in the heavens.

name: According to Mark
text: But concerning the dead, that they do rise. Have you not read in the book of Moses, at the Bush, how God spoke to him, saying: I am the God of Abraham and the God of Isaac and the God of Jacob?

name: According to Mark
text: He is not the God of the dead, but of the living. You greatly err.

name: According to Mark
text: And one of the scribes came forward as he had heard them disputing, and seeing that he had answered them well, he asked him: Which is the first commandment of all?

name: According to Mark
text: Jesus answered him: The first is: Hear, O Israel, the Lord our God is one Lord;

name: According to Mark
text: and thou shalt love the Lord thy God with thy whole heart, and with thy whole soul, and with thy whole mind, and with thy whole strength.94

name: According to Mark
text: The second is this: Thou shalt love thy neighbor as thyself. There is no other commandment greater than these.

name: According to Mark
text: And the scribe said to him: Teacher, in truth hast thou well said that there is One, and there is no other beside him.

name: According to Mark
text: And to love him with the whole heart, and with the whole understanding, and with the whole strength, and to love one’s neighbor as himself is more than all whole burnt-offerings and sacrifices.

name: According to Mark
text: And Jesus, seeing him that he had answered with understanding, said to him: Not far art thou from the kingdom of God. And no one any more ventured to ask him a question.

name: According to Mark
text: And Jesus answered and said, while teaching in the temple: How say the scribes that Christ is the son of David?

name: According to Mark
text: David himself said in the Holy Spirit: The Lord said to my Lord: Sit at my right hand till I make thy enemies thy footstool.

name: According to Mark
text: David himself calls him Lord; and whence is he his son? And the great multitude heard him with pleasure.

name: According to Mark
text: And in his teaching he said; Beware of the scribes, who delight to walk about in robes, and love salutations in the markets,

name: According to Mark
text: And the first seats in the synagogues, and the first reclining places at suppers:

name: According to Mark
text: Who eat up widow’s houses and for a pretext make long prayers: these shall receive greater condemnation.

name: According to Mark
text: And as he sat opposite the treasury, he was observing how the multitude threw money into the treasury; and many rich men threw in much;

name: According to Mark
text: And there came one poor widow and threw in two mites, which make a farthing.

name: According to Mark
text: And calling his disciples to him, he said to them: Verily I say to you that this poor widow has thrown in more than all that are throwing into the treasury;

name: According to Mark
text: For all have thrown in out of their abundance; but she out of her poverty has thrown in all that she had, her whole living.

name: According to Mark
text: And as he was going out of the temple, one of his disciples said to him: Teacher, see what manner of stones, and what manner of buildings.

name: According to Mark
text: And Jesus said to him: Seest thou these great buildings? There shall not be left a stone upon a stone that shall not be thrown down.

name: According to Mark
text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives opposite to the temple. Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately:

name: According to Mark
text: Tell us, when shall these things be? And what the sign when all

name: According to Mark
text: And Jesus began to say to them: See that no one deceive you.

name: According to Mark
text: Many shall come in my name, saying: I am he, and shall deceive many.

name: According to Mark
text: But when you hear of wars and rumors of wars, be not troubled: they must take place, but not yet the end.

name: According to Mark
text: For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: there shall be earthquakes in various places, there shall be famines.

name: According to Mark
text: These are the beginning of pains. But see you to yourselves: they shall deliver you up to councils, and in synagogues you shall be beaten, and before governors and kings shall you stand for my sake, for a testimony to them.

name: According to Mark
text: And among all nations shall the gospel first be preached.

name: According to Mark
text: And when they lead you delivering you up, be not anxious beforehand what you shall speak; but whatever shall be given you in that hour, this speak; for you are not the speakers, but the Holy Spirit.

name: According to Mark
text: And brother shall deliver up brother to death, and the father the child, and children shall rise up against parents and cause them to be put to death.

name: According to Mark
text: And you shall be hated by all because of my name; but he that endures to the end, he shall be saved.

name: According to Mark
text: But when you see the abomination of desolation standing where it ought not (let the reader understand), then let those in Judea flee to the mountains:

name: According to Mark
text: And he that is on the housetop let him not come down nor go in to take any thing from his house:

name: According to Mark
text: And he that is in the field let him not turn back to take his mantle.

name: According to Mark
text: But alas for them that are with child, and them that give suck in those days.

name: According to Mark
text: But pray that it may not take place in winter.

name: According to Mark
text: For those days shall be affliction, such as has not been from the beginning of the creation, which God created, till now, and shall not be.

name: According to Mark
text: And unless the Lord had shortened the days, no flesh would have been saved; but because of the elect whom he has chosen he has shortened the days.

name: According to Mark
text: And then, if any one say to you: Lo, here is Christ, lo there; believe not.

name: According to Mark
text: But false Christs, and false prophets shall arise, and shall do signs and wonders in order to deceive, if possible, the elect.

name: According to Mark
text: But do you beware: I have told you all things beforehand.

name: According to Mark
text: But in those days after that affliction the sun shall be darkened, and the moon shall not give her light,96

name: According to Mark
text: And the stars shall fall from heaven, and the powers which are in the heavens shall be shaken.

name: According to Mark
text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in clouds with great power and glory.

name: According to Mark
text: And then shall he send the angels and gather the elect from the four winds, from the end of earth to the end of heaven.

name: According to Mark
text: But learn the parable from the fig-tree. When its branch has now become tender and put forth leaves, you know that summer is near:

name: According to Mark
text: So also you, when you see these things taking place, know that it is near, at the doors.

name: According to Mark
text: Verily I say to you that this generation shall not pass away, till all these things shall have been accomplished.

name: According to Mark
text: Heaven and earth shall pass away, but my words shall not pass away.

name: According to Mark
text: But of that day or the hour no one knows, neither the angels in heaven, nor the Son, but the Father.

name: According to Mark
text: Beware, watch; for you know not when the time is.

name: According to Mark
text: As a man, going to another country, left his house, and gave to his servants authority, to each one his work, and commanded the doorkeeper to watch.

name: According to Mark
text: Watch therefore; for you know not when the lord of the house comes, whether in the evening, or at midnight, or at cock-crowing, or in the morning:

name: According to Mark
text: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping.

name: According to Mark
text: But what I say to you, I say to all. Watch.

name: According to Mark
text: But after two days came the passover and the unleavened bread; and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft and put him to death;

name: According to Mark
text: For they said: Not on the feast, lest there be a tumult of the people.

name: According to Mark
text: And while he was in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper, as he reclined at table there came a woman having an alabaster box of ointment of pure spikenard, very costly: after breaking the box she poured it on his head.

name: According to Mark
text: But some expressed displeasure among themselves: Why was this waste of the ointment made?

name: According to Mark
text: For this ointment could have been sold for more than three hundred denarii and given to the poor; and they murmured against her.

name: According to Mark
text: But Jesus said: Let her alone: why give her trouble? a good work

name: According to Mark
text: For the poor you have always with you, and when you will you can do them good; but me you have not always.

name: According to Mark
text: What she could she has done: she has come beforehand to anoint my body for the burial.

name: According to Mark
text: And verily I say to you, wherever the gospel shall be preached in the whole world, this also that she has done shall be told for a memorial of her.

name: According to Mark
text: And Judas Iscariot, who was one of the twelve, went away to the chief priests that he might deliver him up to them.

name: According to Mark
text: And when they heard it they were glad, and promised to give him money; and he sought how he might conveniently deliver him up.

name: According to Mark
text: And on the first day of unleavened bread, when they killed the passover, his disciples say to him: Where wilt thou that we go and make ready that thou mayest eat the passover?

name: According to Mark
text: And he sends two of his disciples and says to them: Go into the city, and there shall meet you a man carrying a pitcher of water; follow him,

name: According to Mark
text: and wherever he enters, say to the master of the house that the Teacher says: Where is my guest-chamber where I may eat the passover with my disciples?

name: According to Mark
text: And he will show you a large upper room furnished, ready: there prepare for us.

name: According to Mark
text: And the disciples went out, and came into the city, and found as he had said to them, and made ready the passover.

name: According to Mark
text: And when it was evening he comes with the twelve.

name: According to Mark
text: And as they reclined at table and ate, Jesus said: Verily I say to you that one of you shall deliver me up, he that eats with me.

name: According to Mark
text: They began to be sad and to say to him one by one: Is it I?

name: According to Mark
text: But he said to them: one of the twelve, he that dips with me into the dish.

name: According to Mark
text: For the Son of man goes, as it is written of him; but alas for that man by whom the Son of man is delivered up: good were it for that man if he had not been born.

name: According to Mark
text: And as they ate, having taken bread and blessed, he broke and gave to them and said: Take: this is my body.

name: According to Mark
text: And having taken the cup and given thanks, he gave to them; and they all drank of it.

name: According to Mark
text: And he said to them: This is my blood of the covenant, which is poured out for many.

name: According to Mark
text: Verily I say to you that I will no more drink of the fruit of the vine, till that day when I drink it new in the kingdom of God.

name: According to Mark
text: And they sung a hymn and went out into the mount of Olives.

name: According to Mark
text: And Jesus says to them: You all shall be offended; for it is written: I will smite the shepherd, and the sheep shall be scattered.98

name: According to Mark
text: But after I have risen I will go before you into Galilee.

name: According to Mark
text: But Peter said to him: Though all should be offended, yet not I.

name: According to Mark
text: And Jesus says to him: Verily I say to thee that thou, this day, on this night, before a cock shall have crowed twice, thou shalt deny me three times.

name: According to Mark
text: But he said with vehemence: Though it should be necessary for me to die with thee, I will in no way deny thee. And in like manner also said they all.

name: According to Mark
text: And they come to a place, the name of which is Gethsemane; and he says to his disciples: Sit here till I pray.

name: According to Mark
text: And he took with him Peter and James and John, and began to be greatly amazed and in anguish,

name: According to Mark
text: And said to them: My soul is encompassed with sorrow even to death: remain here and watch.

name: According to Mark
text: And going forward a little he fell on the ground, and prayed that if it was possible the hour might pass away from him;

name: According to Mark
text: And he said: Abba, Father, all things are possible for thee; remove this cup from me: yet not what I will, but what thou.

name: According to Mark
text: And he comes and finds them sleeping, and says to Peter: Simon, sleepest thou? hadst thou not strength to watch one hour?

name: According to Mark
text: Watch and pray, lest you enter into I temptation. The spirit indeed is willing, but the flesh is weak.

name: According to Mark
text: And again he went away and prayed, saying the same word.

name: According to Mark
text: And he returned and found them sleeping again; for their eyes were heavy; and they knew not what they should answer him.

name: According to Mark
text: And he comes the third time and says to them: Sleep the remaining time, and rest; it is enough; the hour has come: behold, the Son of man is delivered into the hands of sinners.

name: According to Mark
text: Rise, let us go: behold, he that delivers me up is at hand.

name: According to Mark
text: And immediately while he was yet speaking, comes Judas Iscariot, one of the twelve, and with him a multitude with swords and clubs, from the chief priests and the scribes and elders.

name: According to Mark
text: But he that delivered him up had given them a sign, saying: Whomever I shall kiss, he it is: hold him fast, and lead him away securely.

name: According to Mark
text: And when he had come he immediately came forward and said to him: Rabbi, and kissed him;

name: According to Mark
text: And they laid hands on him and held him fast.

name: According to Mark
text: But some one of those standing by drew a sword, and smote the servant of the chief priest, and cut off his ear.

name: According to Mark
text: And Jesus answered and said to them: As against a robber you

name: According to Mark
text: Daily was I with you in the temple teaching, and you did not lay hold on me; but that the scriptures might be fulfilled.

name: According to Mark
text: And all left him and fled.

name: According to Mark
text: And one, a young man, followed him, having a linen cloth thrown around his naked body; and they laid hold of him;

name: According to Mark
text: But he left the linen cloth and fled naked.

name: According to Mark
text: And they led Jesus away to the chief priests; and all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes came together.

name: According to Mark
text: And Peter followed him at a distance, till within the court of the chief priests; and he was sitting with the attendants, and warming himself at the fire.

name: According to Mark
text: And the chief priests and the whole Sanhedrim sought testimony against Jesus, to put him to death, and found none;

name: According to Mark
text: For many testified falsely against him, and their testimony did not agree.

name: According to Mark
text: And some arose and testified falsely against him, saying:

name: According to Mark
text: We heard him say that I will destroy this temple that is made with hands, and in three days build another made without hands.

name: According to Mark
text: And not even thus did their testimony agree.

name: According to Mark
text: And the chief priest arose in the midst and asked Jesus, saying: Answerest thou nothing? What do these testify against thee?

name: According to Mark
text: But he was silent and answered nothing. Again the chief priest asked him and said to him: Art thou the Christ, the Son of the Blessed?

name: According to Mark
text: And Jesus said: I am; and you shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of Power, and coming with the clouds of heaven.

name: According to Mark
text: And the chief priest rent his clothes and said: What further need have we of witnesses?

name: According to Mark
text: You have heard the blasphemy: what think you? And they all condemned him to be worthy of death.

name: According to Mark
text: And some began to spit upon him, and to cover his face, and to strike him with the fist, and say to him: Prophesy; and the attendants, striking him with the open hand, took him into custody.

name: According to Mark
text: And while Peter was below in the court, there came one of the maidservants of the chief priest,

name: According to Mark
text: And seeing Peter warming himself, she looked on him and said: Thou also wast with Jesus the Nazarene.

name: According to Mark
text: But he denied, saying: I neither know nor understand what thou sayest. And he went forth without into the entrance, and a cock crew.

name: According to Mark
text: And the maidservant saw him and began again to say to those standing by: This man is of them.

name: According to Mark
text: But he again denied. And after a little while again they that stood by said to Peter: Truly thou art of them; for thou art a Galilean.100

name: According to Mark
text: But he began to call down curses on himself, and to swear: I know not this man of whom you speak.

name: According to Mark
text: And immediately a second time a cock crew. And Peter remembered the word as Jesus spoke to him: Before a cock shall have crowed twice, thou shalt deny me three times. And when he thought on it he wept.

name: According to Mark
text: And immediately in the morning, the chief priests, with the elders and the scribes, and the whole Sanhedrim having prepared counsel, bound Jesus and led him away, and delivered him to Pilate.

name: According to Mark
text: And Pilate asked him: Art thou the King of the Jews? And he answered and said to him: Thou sayest.

name: According to Mark
text: And the chief priests accused him of many things.

name: According to Mark
text: And Pilate again asked him: Answerest thou nothing? See of how many things they accuse thee,

name: According to Mark
text: But Jesus no longer answered any thing: so that Pilate wondered.

name: According to Mark
text: But at every feast he released to them one prisoner whom they chose.

name: According to Mark
text: And there was one called Barabbas bound with the insurgents who, in the insurrection, had committed murder.

name: According to Mark
text: And the multitude coming up began to ask that he would do as he was accustomed to do for them.

name: According to Mark
text: And Pilate answered them, saying: Will you that I release to you the King of the Jews?

name: According to Mark
text: For he knew that because of envy the chief priests had delivered him up.

name: According to Mark
text: But the chief priests instigated the multitude that he should rather release Barabbas to them.

name: According to Mark
text: And Pilate again answered and said to them: What then will you that I shall do with him whom you call King of the Jews?

name: According to Mark
text: They again cried out: Crucify him.

name: According to Mark
text: But Pilate said to them: Why, what evil has he done? But they cried out vehemently: Crucify him.

name: According to Mark
text: And Pilate, willing to satisfy the multitude, released to them Barabbas, and delivered Jesus, after he had scourged him, to be crucified.

name: According to Mark
text: And the soldiers led him away within the court, which is the Pretorium, and called together the whole band.

name: According to Mark
text: And they clothed him in purple, and having plaited a crown of thorns they put it on him:

name: According to Mark
text: And they struck his head with a reed, and spit upon him, and bowing the knees they worshipped him.

name: According to Mark
text: And when they had derided him, they took off from him the purple, and put on him his own clothes. And they led him out to crucify him,

name: According to Mark
text: And they impressed one, Simon a Cyrenian, as he passed by coming from the country, the father of Alexander and Rufus, to bear his cross.

name: According to Mark
text: And they bring him to the place Golgotha, which is, when translated, the place of a skull.

name: According to Mark
text: And they gave him wine mingled with myrrh; but he did not receive it.

name: According to Mark
text: And they crucified him, and divided his garments among them, casting a lot on them what each should take.

name: According to Mark
text: And it was the third hour, and they crucified him.

name: According to Mark
text: And the superscription of his accusation written on him was, THE KING OF THE JEWS.

name: According to Mark
text: And with him they crucify two robbers, one on his right and one on his left.

name: According to Mark
text: And they that passed by reviled him, wagging their heads and saying: Aha, thou that destroyest the temple and buildest it in three days,

name: According to Mark
text: Save thyself by coming down from the cross.

name: According to Mark
text: In like manner also the chief priests deriding among themselves with the scribes said: Others he saved, himself he cannot save.

name: According to Mark
text: Christ the King of Israel, let him now come down from the cross, that we may see and believe. And they that were crucified with him reproached him.

name: According to Mark
text: And when the sixth hour had come, there came a darkness over the whole land till the ninth hour.

name: According to Mark
text: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice: Eloi, Eloi, lema sabachthanei, which is, translated: My God, my God, why hast thou forsaken me?

name: According to Mark
text: And some of those that stood by, hearing it, said: Lo, he calls for Elijah.

name: According to Mark
text: But someone ran and filled a sponge with vinegar, and putting it on a reed, gave him to drink, saying: Wait, let us see if Elijah is coming to take him down.

name: According to Mark
text: But Jesus having uttered a loud cry expired.

name: According to Mark
text: And the veil of the temple was rent in two from top to bottom.

name: According to Mark
text: And the centurion that stood by opposite to him, seeing that he thus expired, said: Truly this man was the Son of God.102

name: According to Mark
text: And there were women also looking on from a distance, among whom were Mary Magdalene, and Mary the mother of James the younger, and the mother of Jesus, and Salome;

name: According to Mark
text: Who, when he was in Galilee, followed him and ministered to him; and many others came up with him to Jerusalem.

name: According to Mark
text: And evening having now come, because it was the preparation, which is sabbath-eve,

name: According to Mark
text: Came Joseph who was of Arimathea, an honorable counselor, who also himself was looking for the kingdom of God, and went in boldly to Pilate, and asked for the body of Jesus.

name: According to Mark
text: But Pilate wondered if he were already dead; and calling to him the centurion, he inquired if he had been dead any time;

name: According to Mark
text: And learning from the centurion, he gave the corpse to Joseph.

name: According to Mark
text: And he bought linen, took him down, wrapped him in the linen, and laid him in a sepulcher that had been hewed out of a rock, and rolled a stone to the door of the sepulcher.

name: According to Mark
text: And Mary Magdalene, and Mary the mother of Jesus saw where he was laid. Mark 16a

name: According to Mark
text: And when the sabbath had passed, Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of James, and Salome bought spices, that they might come and anoint him.

name: According to Mark
text: And very early on the first of the week they came to the sepulcher, the sun having risen.

name: According to Mark
text: And they said among themselves: Who shall roll away for us the stone from the door of the sepulcher?

name: According to Mark
text: And looking up they see that the stone had been rolled away; for it was very great.

name: According to Mark
text: And they entered the sepulcher and saw a young man, sitting at the right side, clothed in a white robe; and they were amazed.

name: According to Mark
text: But he says to them: Be not amazed. You seek Jesus the Nazarene who was crucified; he has risen, he is not here: see the place where they laid him.

name: According to Mark
text: But go, tell his disciples, especially Peter, that he goes before you into Galilee: there you shall see him, as he said to you.

name: According to Mark
text: And going out they fled from the sepulcher; for trembling and astonishment had seized them; and they said nothing to any one, for they were afraid. Note: According to Tischendorf, the remaining twelve verses were not learned reader can see the proof as given by Tischendorf. See, also, The Longer Recension of Mark According to the American Standard Version (1901) Mark 16b

name: According to Mark
text: . Now when he was risen early on the first day of the week, he appeared first to Mary Magdalene, from whom he had cast out seven demons.

name: According to Mark
text: . She went and told them that had been with him, as they mourned and wept.

name: According to Mark
text: . And they, when they heard that he was alive, and had been seen of her, disbelieved.

name: According to Mark
text: . And after these things he was manifested in another form unto two of them, as they walked, on their way into the country.

name: According to Mark
text: . And they went away and told it unto the rest: neither believed they them.

name: According to Mark
text: . And afterward he was manifested unto the eleven themselves as they sat at meat; and he upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart, because they believed not them that had seen him after he was risen.

name: According to Mark
text: . And he said unto them, Go ye into all the world, and preach the gospel to the whole creation.

name: According to Mark
text: . He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved; but he that disbelieveth shall be condemned.

name: According to Mark
text: . And these signs shall accompany them that believe: in my name shall they cast out demons; they shall speak with new tongues;

name: According to Mark
text: . they shall take up serpents, and if they drink any deadly thing, it shall in no wise hurt them; they shall lay hands on the sick, and they shall recover.

name: According to Mark
text: . So then the Lord Jesus, after he had spoken unto them, was received up into heaven, and sat down at the right hand of God.

name: According to Mark
text: . And they went forth, and preached everywhere, the Lord working with them, and confirming the word by the signs that followed. Amen.104

name: According to Matthew
text: The book of the genealogy of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of Abraham.

name: According to Matthew
text: Abraham begot Isaac: Isaac begot Jacob: Jacob begot Judah and his brothers:

name: According to Matthew
text: Judah begot Pharez and Zerah of Tamar: Pharez begot Hezron: Hezron begot Ram:

name: According to Matthew
text: Ram begot Amminadab: Amminadab begot Nashon: Nashon begot Salmon:

name: According to Matthew
text: Salmon begot Boaz of Rahab: Boaz begot Obed of Ruth: Obed begot Jesse:

name: According to Matthew
text: Jesse begot David the king. David begot Solomon of the wife of Uriah:

name: According to Matthew
text: Solomon begot Rehoboam: Rehoboam begot Abijah: Abijah begot Asa:

name: According to Matthew
text: Asa begot Jehosaphat: Jehosaphat begot Jehoram: Jehoram begot Uzziah:

name: According to Matthew
text: Uzziah begot Jotham: Jotham begot Ahaz: Ahaz begot Hezekiah:

name: According to Matthew
text: Hezekiah begot Manasseh: Manasseh begot Amon: Amon begot Josiah:

name: According to Matthew
text: Josiah begot Jeconiah and his brothers about the time of the removal to Babylon.

name: According to Matthew
text: But after the removal to Babylon, Jeconiah begot Shealtiel: Shealtiel begot Zerubbabel:

name: According to Matthew
text: Zerubbabel begot Abihud: Abihud begot Eliakim: Eliakim begot Azor:

name: According to Matthew
text: Azor begot Zadoc: Zadoc begot Achim: Achim begot Eliud:

name: According to Matthew
text: Eliud begot Eleazar: Eleazar begot Matthan: Matthan begot Jacob:

name: According to Matthew
text: Jacob begot Joseph the husband of Mary, of whom was born Jesus who is called Christ.

name: According to Matthew
text: So all the generations from Abraham till David, are fourteen generations; and from David till the removal to Babylon, are fourteen generations; and from the removal to Babylon till Christ, are fourteen generations.

name: According to Matthew
text: But the birth of Jesus Christ was thus: After his mother Mary had been betrothed to Joseph, before they came together, she was found with child of the Holy Spirit.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Joseph her husband, being just and not willing to make her an example, intended to put her away privately.

name: According to Matthew
