text: But while he thought of these things, behold, an angel of the Lord take to thee Mary thy wife; for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Spirit.

name: According to Matthew
text: And she shall bear a son, and thou shalt call his name Jesus; for he shall save his people from their sins.

name: According to Matthew
text: And all this was done, that it might be fulfilled that was spoken by the Lord through the prophet, saying:

name: According to Matthew
text: Behold, the virgin shall be with child, and shall bear a son, and they shall call his name Immanuel, which is, when translated, God with us.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Joseph arose from his sleep, and did as the angel of the Lord had commanded him, and took to him his wife; and knew her not till she had brought forth a son; and he called his name Jesus.

name: According to Matthew
text: But after Jesus had been born in Bethlehem of Judea, in the days of Herod the king, behold, Magi from the east came to Jerusalem,

name: According to Matthew
text: saying: Where is he that has been born king of the Jews? For we saw his star at its rising, and have come to worship him.

name: According to Matthew
text: And hearing it, king Herod was alarmed, and all Jerusalem with him.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he assembled all the chief priests and scribes of the people, and inquired of them where the Christ should be born.

name: According to Matthew
text: And they said to him: In Bethlehem of Judea; for thus it is written by the prophet:

name: According to Matthew
text: And thou, Bethlehem, land of Judah, art by no means the least among the princes of Judah; for out of thee shall come a Governor, who shall rule my people Israel.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then Herod having secretly called the Magi, inquired of them strictly the time at which the star appeared;

name: According to Matthew
text: and sending them to Bethlehem, said: Go, make strict inquiry for the young child: and when you have found him, bring me word, that I also may go and worship him.

name: According to Matthew
text: And after hearing the king, they departed; and lo, the star which they had seen at its rising, went before them, till it came and stood over where the young child was.

name: According to Matthew
text: And when they saw the star, they rejoiced with very great joy.

name: According to Matthew
text: And coming into the house, they saw the young child with Mary his mother; and falling down they worshipped him; and having opened their treasures they offered to him gifts, gold, and frankincense, and myrrh.

name: According to Matthew
text: And having been warned in a dream not to return to Herod, they withdrew into their own country by another way.

name: According to Matthew
text: But after they had withdrawn, behold, an angel of the Lord appeared to Joseph in a dream, saying: Arise, and take the young16 child and his mother, and flee into Egypt, and be there till I bring thee word; for Herod is about to seek for the young child, to destroy him.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he arose and took the young child and his mother, by night, and withdrew into Egypt,

name: According to Matthew
text: and was there till the death of Herod: that it might be fulfilled that was spoken by the Lord through the prophet, saying: Out of Egypt I called my Son.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then Herod, seeing that he had been deceived by the Magi, was greatly enraged; and, having sent out, he slew all the male children that were in Bethlehem, and in all its borders, from the age of two years and under, according to the time which he had strictly inquired of the Magi.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken through Jeremiah the prophet, saying:

name: According to Matthew
text: A voice was heard in Ramah, wailing and great mourning: Rachel weeping for her children; and she would not be comforted because they are no more.

name: According to Matthew
text: But after Herod had died, behold, an angel of the Lord appeared in a dream to Joseph in Egypt,

name: According to Matthew
text: saying: Arise, and take the young child and his mother, and go into the land of Israel; for they are dead that sought the young child’s life.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he arose and took the young child and his mother, and came into the land of Israel.

name: According to Matthew
text: But hearing that Archelaus reigned in Judea, in place of his father Herod, he was afraid to go thither; but being warned in a dream, he withdrew into the regions of Galilee,

name: According to Matthew
text: and came and dwelt in a city called Nazareth, that it might be fulfilled that was spoken through the prophets: He shall be called a Nazarene.

name: According to Matthew
text: But in those days came John the Baptist, preaching in the wilderness of Judea,

name: According to Matthew
text: saying: Repent, for the kingdom of the heavens is at hand.

name: According to Matthew
text: For this is he that was spoken of through Isaiah the prophet, saying: The voice of one crying in the wilderness. Prepare the way of the Lord, make his paths straight.

name: According to Matthew
text: But the same John had his clothing of camel’s hair, and a girdle of leather around his loins, and his food was locusts and wild honey.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then went out to him Jerusalem, and all Judea, and all the region round about the Jordan,

name: According to Matthew
text: But seeing many of the Pharisees and Sadducees coming to his baptism, he said to them: Brood of vipers, who warned you to flee from the coming wrath?

name: According to Matthew
text: Bring forth therefore fruit worthy of repentance,

name: According to Matthew
text: and think not to say within yourselves: We have Abraham for a father; for I say to you that God is able of these stones to raise up children for Abraham.

name: According to Matthew
text: And now the ax is lying at the root of the trees: every tree, therefore, that brings not forth good fruit is cut down, and thrown into the fire.

name: According to Matthew
text: I indeed baptize you in water in order to repentance; but he that comes after me is mightier than I, whose sandals I am not worthy to carry: he will baptize you in the Holy Spirit and in fire:

name: According to Matthew
text: whose winnowing shovel is in his hand, and he will thoroughly cleanse his threshing floor, and gather his grain into the granary; but the chaff he will burn up with unquenchable fire.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then came Jesus from Galilee to the Jordan to John, to be baptized by him.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he forbade him, saying: I have need to be baptized by thee, and comest thou to me?

name: According to Matthew
text: But Jesus answered and said to him: Permit it now; for thus it becomes us to fulfill every righteous act. Then he permitted him.

name: According to Matthew
text: And having been baptized, Jesus immediately went up from the water; and lo, the heavens were opened, and he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove and coming upon him.

name: According to Matthew
text: And lo, a voice from the heavens, saying: This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then was Jesus led up by the Spirit into the wilderness, to be tempted by the devil.

name: According to Matthew
text: And having fasted forty days and forty nights, he was afterward hungry.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the tempter came and said to him: If thou art the Son of God, command that these stones become bread.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he answered and said: It is written: Not by bread alone shall man live, but by every word that comes forth through the mouth of God.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then the devil took him into the holy city, and set him on the wing of the temple.

name: According to Matthew
text: and said to him: If thou art the Son of God, cast thyself down; for it is written: He will give his angels charge concerning thee, and in their hands they shall take thee up, lest thou strike thy foot against a stone.18

name: According to Matthew
text: Jesus said to him: Again it is written: Thou shalt not put the Lord thy God to the proof.

name: According to Matthew
text: Again, the devil took him to a very high mountain, and showed him all the kingdoms of the world, and the glory of them,

name: According to Matthew
text: and said to him: All these will I give thee, if thou wilt fall down and worship me.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then Jesus says to him: Get hence, Satan; for it is written: The Lord thy God thou shalt worship, and him only shalt thou serve

name: According to Matthew
text: Then the devil left him; and, behold, angels came and ministered to him.

name: According to Matthew
text: But when he had heard that John was delivered up, he withdrew into Galilee;

name: According to Matthew
text: and leaving Nazareth, he came and dwelt in Capernaum, which is on the sea, in the borders of Zebulon and Naphtali;

name: According to Matthew
text: that it might be fulfilled that was spoken through Isaiah the prophet, saying:

name: According to Matthew
text: The land of Zebulon, and the land of Naphtali, toward the sea, beyond the Jordan, Galilee of the Gentiles;

name: According to Matthew
text: the people that sat in darkness saw great light; and upon those who sat in the region and shadow of death light arose.

name: According to Matthew
text: From that time Jesus began to preach and to say: Repent, for the kingdom of the heavens is at hand.

name: According to Matthew
text: And walking by the sea of Galilee, he saw two brothers, Simon who is called Peter, and Andrew his brother, throwing a net into the sea, for they were fishers.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he said to them: Come after me, and I will make you fishers of men.

name: According to Matthew
text: And they immediately left their nets and followed him.

name: According to Matthew
text: And going on thence, he saw other two brothers, James the son of Zebedee, and John his brother, in the ship with Zebedee their father, mending their nets; and he called them.

name: According to Matthew
text: And immediately leaving the ship and their father, they followed him.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he went about in the whole of Galilee, teaching in their synagogues, and preaching the gospel of the kingdom, and curing every disease and every malady among the people.

name: According to Matthew
text: And his fame went abroad into the whole of Syria; and they brought to him all that were sick with various diseases, and that were afflicted with torments, and those possessed with demons, and lunatics, and paralytics; and he cured them.

name: According to Matthew
text: And there followed him many multitudes from Galilee, and Decapolis, and Jerusalem, and Judea, and from beyond the Jordan.

name: According to Matthew
text: But seeing the multitudes, he went up into the mountain; and when he had sat down, his disciples came to him;

name: According to Matthew
text: and he opened his mouth and taught them, saying:

name: According to Matthew
text: Blessed are the poor in spirit; for theirs is the kingdom of the heavens.

name: According to Matthew
text: Blessed are the meek; for they shall inherit the earth.

name: According to Matthew
text: Blessed are they that mourn; for they shall be comforted.

name: According to Matthew
text: Blessed are they that hunger and thirst for righteousness; for they shall be filled.

name: According to Matthew
text: Blessed are the merciful; for they shall receive mercy.

name: According to Matthew
text: Blessed are the pure in heart; for they shall see God.

name: According to Matthew
text: Blessed are the peacemakers; for they shall be called sons of God.

name: According to Matthew
text: Blessed are they that are persecuted for righteousness’ sake; for theirs is the kingdom of the heavens.

name: According to Matthew
text: Blessed are you when they shall reproach you, and persecute you, and say every evil thing against you falsely for my sake.

name: According to Matthew
text: Rejoice, and be exceeding glad; for great is your reward in the heavens; for so persecuted they the prophets that were before you.

name: According to Matthew
text: You are the salt of the earth; but if the salt shall have become tasteless, by what means shall it be salted? It is then good for nothing but, after being cast out, to be trod upon by men.

name: According to Matthew
text: You are the light of the world. A city that lies upon a mountain cannot be hid:

name: According to Matthew
text: neither do men light a lamp and put it under the measure, but on the lampstand, and it gives light to all that are in the house.

name: According to Matthew
text: So let your light shine before men, that they may see your good works, and glorify your Father who is in the heavens.

name: According to Matthew
text: Think not that I have come to destroy the law or the prophets: I have not come to destroy, but to fulfill.

name: According to Matthew
text: For verily I say to you, till heaven and earth pass away, one yod or one point shall in no way pass from the law, till all be accomplished.

name: According to Matthew
text: Whoever therefore shall make void one of the least of these commandments, and shall teach men so, shall be called least in the kingdom of the heavens; but whoever shall do and teach, he shall be called great in the kingdom of the heavens,

name: According to Matthew
text: For I say to you, that unless your righteousness shall be more abundant than that of the scribes and Pharisees, you can by no means enter into the kingdom of the heavens.

name: According to Matthew
text: You have heard that it was said to the ancients: Thou shalt not kill; and whoever shall kill shall be liable to the judgment.

name: According to Matthew
text: But I say to you, that whoever is angry with his brother shall be liable to the judgment; and whoever shall say to his brother.20 Worthless fellow, shall be liable to the Sanhedrim; but whoever shall say: Thou fool, shall be liable to be cast into hellfire.

name: According to Matthew
text: If therefore thou bring thy gift to the altar, and there remember that thy brother has anything against thee,

name: According to Matthew
text: leave there thy gift before the altar, and go, first be reconciled to thy brother, and then come and offer thy gift.

name: According to Matthew
text: Agree with thy opponent-at-law quickly, while thou art on the road with him, lest perhaps the opponent-at-law deliver thee to the judge, and the judge to the officer, and thou be cast into prison.

name: According to Matthew
text: Verily I say to thee, thou shalt not come out thence, till thou shalt have paid the last farthing.

name: According to Matthew
text: You have heard that it was said: Thou shalt not commit adultery.

name: According to Matthew
text: But I say to you, That every one that looks on a woman to cherish desire, has already committed adultery with her in his heart.

name: According to Matthew
text: But if thy right eye ensnares thee, pull it out, and throw it from thee; for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members perish, and not that thy whole body be thrown into hell.

name: According to Matthew
text: And if thy right hand ensnares thee, cut it off, and throw it from thee; for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members perish, and not that thy whole body go away into hell.

name: According to Matthew
text: And it has been said: Whoever shall put away his wife, let him give her a bill of divorce.

name: According to Matthew
text: But I say to you, that whoever shalt put away his wife, unless on account of lewdness, causes her to commit adultery; and whoever shall marry her that is put away commits adultery.

name: According to Matthew
text: Again: you have heard that it was said to the ancients: Thou shalt not swear falsely, but shalt pay to the Lord thy oaths.

name: According to Matthew
text: But I say to you, Swear not at all; neither by heaven, for it is the throne of God;

name: According to Matthew
text: nor by the earth, for it is his footstool; nor by Jerusalem, for it is the city of the great King:

name: According to Matthew
text: neither shalt thou swear by thy head, for thou canst not make one hair white or black.

name: According to Matthew
text: But let your word be yes, yes; no, no; and that which is more than these is of the evil one.

name: According to Matthew
text: You have heard that it was said: Eye for eye, and tooth for tooth.

name: According to Matthew
text: But I say to you, that you resist not the injurious; but whoever shall smite thee on the right cheek, turn to him the other also.

name: According to Matthew
text: And to him that will go to law with thee, and take away thy coat, give up thy mantle also.

name: According to Matthew
text: And whoever will impress thee to go one mile, go with him two.

name: According to Matthew
text: Give to him that asks of thee, and from him that would borrow of

name: According to Matthew
text: You have heard that it was said: Thou shalt love thy neighbor, and hate thy enemy.

name: According to Matthew
text: But I say to you. Love your enemies, and pray for them that persecute you;

name: According to Matthew
text: that you may become sons of your Father who is in the heavens; for he makes his sun to rise on the evil and the good, and sends his rain on the just and the unjust.

name: According to Matthew
text: For if you love them that love you, what reward have you? Do not even the publicans the same?

name: According to Matthew
text: And if you salute your brethren only, what do you more? Do not even the heathen the same?

name: According to Matthew
text: Be you therefore perfect as your heavenly Father is perfect.

name: According to Matthew
text: But take heed that you do not your righteousness before men, to be seen by them: other wise you have no reward with your Father who is in the heavens.

name: According to Matthew
text: When therefore thou wouldst do a charitable deed, do not sound a trumpet before thee, as the hypocrites do in the synagogues, and in the streets, that they may be glorified by men. Verily I say to you: They have their reward in full.

name: According to Matthew
text: But when thou doest a charitable deed, let not thy left hand know what thy right hand does;

name: According to Matthew
text: that thy charitable deed may be in secret; and thy Father who sees in secret will reward thee.

name: According to Matthew
text: And when you pray, you shall not be as the hypocrites; for they love to pray standing in the synagogues, and in the corners of the streets, that they may be seen by men. Verily I say to you: They have their reward in full.

name: According to Matthew
text: But thou, when thou prayest, go into thy closet; and having closed thy door, pray to thy Father who is in secret; and thy Father who sees in secret will reward thee.

name: According to Matthew
text: But when you pray, use not vain repetitions as the heathens; for they think that they shall be heard for their much speaking.

name: According to Matthew
text: Be not therefore like them; for your Father knows what things you have need of before you ask him.

name: According to Matthew
text: In this way therefore pray you: Our Father who art in the heavens: hallowed be thy name.

name: According to Matthew
text: Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done as in heaven also on earth.

name: According to Matthew
text: Give us this day our needful bread.

name: According to Matthew
text: And forgive us our debts, as we also have forgiven our debtors;

name: According to Matthew
text: and lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from the evil one.22

name: According to Matthew
text: For if you forgive men their offenses, your heavenly Father will also forgive you;

name: According to Matthew
text: but if you for give not men, neither will your Father forgive your offenses.

name: According to Matthew
text: And when you fast, be not as the hypocrites, of a sad countenance; for they disfigure their faces, that they may appear to men to fast. Verily I say to you, They have their reward in full.

name: According to Matthew
text: But do thou, when fasting, anoint thy head, and wash thy face,

name: According to Matthew
text: that thou appear not to men to fast, but to thy Father who is in secret; and thy Father who sees in secret will reward thee.

name: According to Matthew
text: Lay not up for yourselves treasures on the earth, where moth and rust consume, and where thieves break through and steal;

name: According to Matthew
text: but lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven, where neither moth nor rust consumes, and where thieves do not break through nor steal.

name: According to Matthew
text: For where thy treasure is, there will thy heart be also.

name: According to Matthew
text: The lamp of the body is the eye. If thy eye be simple thy whole body shall be full of light;

name: According to Matthew
text: but if thy eye be evil thy whole body shall be full of darkness. If then the light that is in thee is darkness, how great that darkness.

name: According to Matthew
text: No one can serve two masters; for either he will hate the one and love the other or he will hold to the one and despise the other. You cannot serve God and Mammon.

name: According to Matthew
text: For this reason I say to you: Be not anxious for your life what you shall eat, nor for your body what you shall put on. Is not the life more than the food, and the body than the clothing?

name: According to Matthew
text: Look at the birds of heaven, that they sow not, neither do they reap, nor gather into granaries; and yet your heavenly Father feeds them: are you not much better than they?

name: According to Matthew
text: But which of you, by being anxious, can add one cubit to his age?

name: According to Matthew
text: And why are you anxious about clothing? Consider the lilies of the field, how they grow: they toil not, nor do they spin.

name: According to Matthew
text: But I say to you, that even Solomon in all his glory was not clothed as one of these.

name: According to Matthew
text: Now if God so clothes the herb of the field, which today is, and tomorrow is thrown into the oven, will he not much more clothe you, O you of little faith?

name: According to Matthew
text: Then, be not anxious, saying: What shall we eat, or what shall we drink, or with what shall we be clothed?

name: According to Matthew
text: For after all these things do the Gentiles seek; for your heavenly Father knows that you need all these.

name: According to Matthew
text: But seek first his kingdom and righteousness, and all these shall be given you in addition.

name: According to Matthew
text: Be not therefore anxious for the morrow; for the morrow shall be

name: According to Matthew
text: Judge not that you be not judged.

name: According to Matthew
text: For with what judgment you judge, you shall be judged, and with what measure you measure, it shall be measured to you.

name: According to Matthew
text: And why beholdest thou the splinter that is in thy brother’s eye, but considerest not the beam that is in thy own eye?

name: According to Matthew
text: Or how wilt thou say to thy brother: Let me pull the splinter out of thy eye, and behold, the beam is in thy own eye.

name: According to Matthew
text: Hypocrite, pull first the beam out of thy own eye, and then thou shalt see clearly to pull the splinter out of thy brother’s eye.

name: According to Matthew
text: Give not that which is holy to dogs, neither throw your pearls before swine, less they trample them with their feet, and turn and tear you.

name: According to Matthew
text: Ask, and it shall be given you: seek, and you shall find: knock, and it shall be opened to you.

name: According to Matthew
text: For every one that asks receives; and he that seeks finds; and to him that knocks it shall be opened.

name: According to Matthew
text: Or what man is there of you, of whom should his son ask bread, will he give him a stone?

name: According to Matthew
text: or if he should also ask a fish, will he give him a serpent?

name: According to Matthew
text: If then you being evil know how to give good gifts to your children, how much more will your Father who is in the heavens give good gifts to those who ask him?

name: According to Matthew
text: All things therefore whatever you would that men should do to you, even so do you to them; for this is the law and the prophets.

name: According to Matthew
text: Enter in through the strait gate; for wide the gate and broad the way that leads to destruction; and many are they that go in through it;

name: According to Matthew
text: for strait is the gate, and narrow the way that leads to life, and few are they that find it.

name: According to Matthew
text: Beware of false prophets, who come to you in sheep’s clothing, but within are ravenous wolves.

name: According to Matthew
text: By their fruits you shall know them. Do men gather grapes from thorns, or figs from thistles?

name: According to Matthew
text: So every good tree produces goodly fruit; but the corrupt tree produces evil fruit.

name: According to Matthew
text: A good tree cannot produce evil fruit; neither can a corrupt tree produce goodly fruit.

name: According to Matthew
text: Every tree that does not produce goodly fruit is cut down and thrown into the fire.

name: According to Matthew
text: Therefore, by their fruits you shall know them.24

name: According to Matthew
text: Not every one that says to me, Lord, Lord, shall enter into the kingdom of the heavens, but he that does the will of my Father who is in the heavens.

name: According to Matthew
text: Many will say to me in that day, Lord, Lord, did we not prophesy by thy name, and by thy name cast out demons, and by thy name do many mighty works?

name: According to Matthew
text: And then will I confess to them, I never knew you: depart from me, you that work iniquity.

name: According to Matthew
text: Every one therefore that hears these words of mine and does them, shall be likened to a wise man, who built his house on the rock.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the rain descended, and the floods came, and the winds blew, and they beat upon that house, and it fell not; for it was founded on the rock.

name: According to Matthew
text: And every one that hears these words of mine, and does them not, shall be likened to a foolish man who built his house upon the sand.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the rain descended, and the floods came, and the winds blew, and they beat upon that house, and it fell; and great was its fall.

name: According to Matthew
text: And it came to pass when Jesus had finished these words, the multitudes were astonished at his teaching;

name: According to Matthew
text: for he taught them as having authority and not as their scribes.

name: According to Matthew
text: And when he had come down from the mountain, many multitudes followed him.

name: According to Matthew
text: And behold, a leper came and worshipped him, saying: Lord, if thou wilt, thou canst make me clean.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he stretched forth his hand and touched him, saying: I will, be clean. And immediately his leprosy was cleansed.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus said to him: See that thou tell no one; but go, show thyself to the priest, and offer the gift that Moses commanded, for a testimony to them.

name: According to Matthew
text: And when he had entered into Capernaum, there came to him a centurion beseeching him,

name: According to Matthew
text: and saying: Lord, my servant lies in my house palsied, fearfully tormented.

name: According to Matthew
text: He says to him: I will come and cure him.

name: According to Matthew
text: But the centurion answering said: Lord, I am not worthy that thou shouldest come under my roof; but speak only in a word, and my servant shall be restored to health.

name: According to Matthew
text: For I am a man under authority, having soldiers under me; and I say to this one: Go, and he goes; and to another: Come, and he

name: According to Matthew
text: And hearing it Jesus was filled with admiration, and said to those that followed: Verily I say to you, not even in Israel have I found so great faith.

name: According to Matthew
text: But I say to you, that many shall come from the east and the west, and shall recline at tables with Abraham and Isaac and Jacob in the kingdom of the heavens;

name: According to Matthew
text: but the sons of the kingdom shall go forth into the darkness that is without: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus said to the centurion: Go; as thou hast believed, be it done for thee. And the servant was restored to health in that hour.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus came into the house of Peter, and saw his mother-in- law lying and ill of a fever.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he touched her hand, and the fever left her; and she arose and ministered to him.

name: According to Matthew
text: But when evening had come, they brought to him many possessed with demons; and he cast out the spirits with a word, and cured all that were sick,

name: According to Matthew
text: that it might be fulfilled that was spoken through Isaiah the prophet, saying: Himself took our infirmities and bore our diseases.

name: According to Matthew
text: But Jesus seeing many multitudes about him, gave orders to depart to the other side.

name: According to Matthew
text: And a scribe came and said to him: Teacher, I will follow thee wherever thou goest.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus said to him: The foxes have dens, and the birds of the heaven have roosts, but the Son of man has not where he may lay his head.

name: According to Matthew
text: And another of his disciples said to him: Lord, permit me first to go and bury my father.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he said to him: Follow me, and let the dead bury their own dead.

name: According to Matthew
text: And after he had entered the ship, his disciples followed him.

name: According to Matthew
text: And behold, a great tempest arose in the sea, so that the ship was covered by the waves; but he was sleeping.

name: According to Matthew
text: And they came and awoke him, saying: Lord, save, we perish.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he says to them: Why are you fearful, O you of little faith? Then he arose and rebuked the winds and the sea, and there was a great calm.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the men were astonished, saying: What manner of man is this, that even the winds and the sea obey him?

name: According to Matthew
text: And when he had come to the other side, into the country of the Gadarenes, there met him two men possessed with demons, coming out of the tombs, very fierce, so that no one could pass by that way.

name: According to Matthew
text: And behold, they cried out, saying: What have we to do with thee, Son of God? Hast thou come hither before the time, to torment us?26

name: According to Matthew
text: And there was, at a distance from them, a herd of many swine feeding.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the demons besought him saying: If thou dost cast us out, send us into the herd of swine.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he said to them: Go. And they came out, and went away into the swine; and behold, the whole herd rushed down the steep into the sea, and died in the waters.

name: According to Matthew
text: But those who fed them fled, and going away into the city told all things, and what had happened to those possessed with the demons.

name: According to Matthew
text: And behold, the whole city came out to meet Jesus; and seeing him they besought that he would depart from their borders;

name: According to Matthew
text: And he entered a ship and passed over, and came into his own city.

name: According to Matthew
text: And behold, they brought to him a palsied man lying on a bed. And Jesus seeing their faith, said to the palsied man: Take courage, son, thy sins are for given.

name: According to Matthew
text: And behold, some of the scribes said within themselves: This man blasphemes.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus perceiving their thoughts, said: Why think you evil in your hearts?

name: According to Matthew
text: For which is easier, to say: Thy sins are forgiven; or to say: Arise and walk?

name: According to Matthew
text: But that you may know that the Son of man on earth has authority to forgive sins, then he says to the palsied man: Arise, take up thy bed, and go to thy house.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he arose and went away to his house.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the multitudes saw and were afraid, and glorified God who had given such authority to men.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus passing by thence saw a man, called Matthew, sitting at the customhouse, and said to him: Follow me. And he arose and followed him.

name: According to Matthew
text: And it came to pass that, as he reclined at tables in the house, behold, many publicans and sinners came and reclined at table with Jesus and his disciples,

name: According to Matthew
text: And the Pharisees seeing it said to his disciples: Why does your teacher eat with the publicans and sinners?

name: According to Matthew
text: But hearing it he said: Those who are in health have no need of a physician, but those who are sick.

name: According to Matthew
text: But go and learn what “I desire mercy and not sacrifice” means. For I came not to call righteous men, but sinners.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then came to him the disciples of John, saying: Why do we and

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus said to them: Can the sons of the bride chamber mourn while the bride groom is with them? But days will come when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them, and then will they fast.

name: According to Matthew
text: No one puts a piece of unfulled cloth on an old garment; for that which fills it up takes from the garment, and a worse rent is made.

name: According to Matthew
text: Neither do they put new wine into old bottles; otherwise, the bottles break, and the wine runs out, and the bottles perish; but they put new wine into new bottles, and both are preserved together.

name: According to Matthew
text: While he was speaking these things to them, behold, a ruler came in and worshipped him, saying: My daughter just now died; but come and lay thy hand on her, and she shall live.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus arose and followed him, and so did his disciples.

name: According to Matthew
text: And behold, a woman, that had had an issue of blood for twelve years, came behind and touched the fringe of his mantle;

name: According to Matthew
text: for she said within herself: If I may only touch his mantle, I shall be saved.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he turned and saw her and said: Daughter, take courage; thy faith has saved thee. And the woman was saved from that hour.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus entered the house of the ruler and saw the pipers and the multitude making a noise, and said:

name: According to Matthew
text: Withdraw, for the maid is not dead, but sleeps. And they derided him.

name: According to Matthew
text: But when the multitude had been put out, he went in and took her hand, and the maid arose.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the fame of this went forth into that whole land.

name: According to Matthew
text: And as Jesus was passing by thence, two blind men followed him, crying out and saying: Have mercy on us, Son of David.

name: According to Matthew
text: And after he had come into the house, the blind men came to him; and Jesus said to them: Believe you that I am able to do this? They said to him: Yes, Lord.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then he touched their eyes, saying: According to your faith be it done to you.

name: According to Matthew
text: And their eyes were opened. And Jesus charged them in a threatening manner, saying: See that no one know it.

name: According to Matthew
text: But they went out and published him abroad in all that land.

name: According to Matthew
text: But as they were going out, behold, they brought to him a man dumb possessed with a demon.

name: According to Matthew
text: And after the demon had been cast out, the dumb man spoke. And the multitudes were astonished, saying: Never did it appear thus in Israel.

name: According to Matthew
text: But the Pharisees said: By the prince of the demons casts he out the demons.28

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus went about all the cities and the villages, teaching in their synagogues, and preaching the gospel of the kingdom, and curing every disease and every infirmity.

name: According to Matthew
text: But seeing the multitudes he was moved with pity for them, because they were troubled and scattered as sheep that had no shepherd.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then said he to his disciples: The harvest indeed is great, but the laborers few:

name: According to Matthew
text: pray therefore the Lord of the harvest that he send forth laborers into his harvest.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he called to him his twelve disciples, and gave them authority over unclean spirits so that they could cast them out, and cure every disease and every infirmity.

name: According to Matthew
text: But the names of the twelve apostles are these: the first, Simon, who is called Peter, and Andrew his brother; and James the son of Zebedee, and John his brother;

name: According to Matthew
text: Philip and Bartholomew, Thomas and Matthew the publican; James the son of Alphaeus, and Lebbeus;

name: According to Matthew
text: Simon the Canaanite, and Judas Iscariot who also delivered him up.

name: According to Matthew
text: These twelve Jesus sent forth after he had charged them, saying: Into the road to the Gentiles go not, and into a city of the Samaritans enter not;

name: According to Matthew
text: but go rather to the lost sheep of the house of Israel.

name: According to Matthew
text: And as you go, preach saying: The kingdom of the heavens is at hand.

name: According to Matthew
text: Cure the sick, raise the dead, cleanse the lepers, cast out the demons: freely you received, freely give.

name: According to Matthew
text: Provide not gold, neither silver, nor brass in your girdles;

name: According to Matthew
text: no bag for the journey, neither two coats, nor sandals, nor a staff; for the laborer is worthy of his support.

name: According to Matthew
text: Into whatever city or village you enter, inquire who in it is worthy; and there abide till you go forth.

name: According to Matthew
text: And when you enter a house, salute it.

name: According to Matthew
text: And if the house be worthy, let your peace come upon it; but if it be not worthy, let your peace return to you.

name: According to Matthew
text: And whoever shall not receive you, nor hear your words, when you go out of that house or city, shake off the dust from your feet.

name: According to Matthew
text: Verily, I say to you, it shall be more tolerable for the land of

name: According to Matthew
text: Behold, I send you forth as sheep in the midst of wolves: be come therefore wise as serpents, and guileless as doves.

name: According to Matthew
text: But beware of men; for they will deliver you up to councils, and in their synagogues they will scourge you;

name: According to Matthew
text: and before governors also and kings shall you be brought for my sake, for a testimony to them and the Gentiles.

name: According to Matthew
text: But when they deliver you up, be not anxious how or what you shall speak; for there shall be given you in that hour what you shall speak;

name: According to Matthew
text: for you are not the speakers, but it is the Spirit of my Father that speaks in you.

name: According to Matthew
text: And brother shall deliver up brother to death, and the father the child; and children shall rise up against parents and cause them to be put to death.

name: According to Matthew
text: And you shall be hated by all because of my name; but he that endures to the end shall be saved.

name: According to Matthew
text: But when they persecute you in this city, flee into the other for verily I say to you, you shall not have made the circuit of the cities of Israel, till the Son of man shall have come.

name: According to Matthew
text: A disciple is not above the teacher, nor a servant above his lord.

name: According to Matthew
text: It is enough for the disciple that he become as his teacher, and the servant as his lord. If they have surnamed the master of the house Beelzebub, how much more those of his household.

name: According to Matthew
text: Be not then afraid of them; for nothing is concealed that shall not be revealed, and hid that shall not be known.

name: According to Matthew
text: What I tell you in darkness, speak in the light; and what you hear in the ear, proclaim on the housetops.

name: According to Matthew
text: And be not afraid of them that kill the body, but are not able to kill the soul; but rather fear him who is able to destroy both soul and body in hell.

name: According to Matthew
text: Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing? And yet not one of them shall fall to the ground without your Father.

name: According to Matthew
text: But even the hairs of your head are all numbered.

name: According to Matthew
text: Fear not therefore: you are of more value than many sparrows.

name: According to Matthew
text: Every one therefore that shall confess me before men, him will I also confess before my Father who is in the heavens.

name: According to Matthew
text: But whoever shall deny me before men, him will I also deny before my Father who is in the heavens.

name: According to Matthew
text: Think not that I came to send peace on the earth, I came not to send peace, but a sword.

name: According to Matthew
text: For I came to set a man in opposition to his father, and a daughter to her mother, and a daughter-in-law to her mother-in-law;

name: According to Matthew
text: and a man’s enemies shall be those of his household.30

name: According to Matthew
text: He that loves father or mother more than me, is not worthy of me, and he that loves son or daughter more than me, is not worthy of me;

name: According to Matthew
text: and he that does not take his cross and follow after me, is not worthy of me.

name: According to Matthew
text: He that finds his life shall lose it, and he that loses his life for my sake shall find it.

name: According to Matthew
text: He that receives you receives me, and he that receives me receives him that sent me.

name: According to Matthew
text: He that receives a prophet because he is a prophet, shall receive a prophet’s reward; and he that receives a righteous man because he is a righteous man, shall receive a righteous man’s reward.

name: According to Matthew
text: And whoever shall give one of these little ones only a cup of cold water to drink, because he is a disciple, verily I say to you, he shall not lose his reward.

name: According to Matthew
text: And it came to pass when Jesus had made an end of commanding his twelve disciples, he departed thence to teach and to preach in their cities.

name: According to Matthew
text: But John, having heard in prison of the works of Christ, sent by his disciples,

name: According to Matthew
text: and said to him: Art thou he that comes, or look we for another?

name: According to Matthew
text: And answering. Jesus said to them: Go and tell John what things you hear and see;

name: According to Matthew
text: the blind receive sight and the lame walk, lepers are cleansed and the deaf hear, and the dead are raised, and the poor have the gospel preached to them;

name: According to Matthew
text: and blessed is he whoever shall not be offended at me.

name: According to Matthew
text: But as these were going away, Jesus began to say to the multitudes concerning John: What went you out into the wilderness to see? a reed shaken by the wind?

name: According to Matthew
text: But what went you out to see? a man clothed ill soft raiment? Behold, they that wear soft clothing are in kings’ houses.

name: According to Matthew
text: But why did you go out? To see a prophet? Yes, I say to you, and more than a prophet.

name: According to Matthew
text: This is he of whom it is written: Behold, I send my messenger before thy face, who shall prepare thy way before thee.

name: According to Matthew
text: Verily I say to you, among those born of women there has not arisen a greater than John the Baptist; but the least in the kingdom of the heavens is greater than he.

name: According to Matthew
text: But from the days of John the Baptist till now, the kingdom of the heavens is taken by force, and men of force seize upon it eagerly.

name: According to Matthew
text: and if you will receive it, he is Elijah that was to come.

name: According to Matthew
text: He that has ears, let him hear.

name: According to Matthew
text: But to what shall I liken this generation? It is like children sit ting in the markets, who call to the others,

name: According to Matthew
text: and say: We piped to you, and you did not dance: we wailed, and you did not lament.

name: According to Matthew
text: For John came neither eating nor drinking, and they say: He has a demon.

name: According to Matthew
text: The Son of man has come eating and drinking, and they say: Behold, a man, a glutton and a winebibber, a friend of publicans and sinners. And yet Wisdom is justified by her works.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then he began to upbraid the cities in which most of his mighty works had been done, because they repented not.

name: According to Matthew
text: Alas for thee, Chorazin; Alas for thee, Bethsaida; for if the mighty works which have been done in you, had been done in Tyre and Sidon, they would have repented long ago in sackcloth and ashes.

name: According to Matthew
text: Further more I say to you, it shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon in the day of judgment than for you.

name: According to Matthew
text: And thou, Capernaum, shalt thou be exalted to heaven? Thou shalt be brought down to Hades; for if the mighty works which have been done in thee had been done in Sodom, it would have remained to this day.

name: According to Matthew
text: Furthermore I say to you, It shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom in the day of judgment than for thee.

name: According to Matthew
text: At that time Jesus answered and said: I thank thee. Father, Lord of heaven and of earth, that thou hart hid these things from the wise and prudent, and hast revealed them to babes:

name: According to Matthew
text: yes, Father, for so it seemed good in thy sight.

name: According to Matthew
text: All things have been delivered to me by my Father; and no one knows the Son but the Father: neither knows any one the Father but the Son, and he to whomever the Son will reveal him.

name: According to Matthew
text: Come to me, all you that labor and are heavily burdened, and I will give you rest.

name: According to Matthew
text: Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart, and you shall find rest for your souls.

name: According to Matthew
text: For my yoke is good, and my burden is light.

name: According to Matthew
text: At that time Jesus went, on the sabbath, through the fields of grain: and his disciples were hungry, and they began to pull the ears of grain and to eat.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the Pharisees seeing it said to him: Behold, thy disciples are doing what it is not lawful to do on the sabbath.32

name: According to Matthew
text: But he said to them: Have you not read what David did, when he was hungry, and they that were with him?

name: According to Matthew
text: how he entered the house of God, and ate of the loaves of the presence, which it was not lawful for him to eat, nor for those who were with him, but for the priests only?

name: According to Matthew
text: or have you not read in the law, that on the sabbath days the priests in the temple profane the sabbath, and are blameless?

name: According to Matthew
text: But I say to you, that something greater than the temple is here.

name: According to Matthew
text: And if you had known what “I desire mercy and not sacrifice” means, you would not have condemned the blameless.

name: According to Matthew
text: For the Son of man is Lord of the sabbath.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he departed thence, and came into their synagogue.

name: According to Matthew
text: And behold, a man had a withered hand; and they asked him, saying: Is it lawful to cure on the sabbath? that they might accuse him.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he said to them: What man shall there be of you, who shall have one sheep; and if this fall into a pit on the sabbath, will he not lay hold on it, and lift it up?

name: According to Matthew
text: How much better then, a man is than a sheep: so then it is lawful to do well on the sabbath.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then he says to the man: Stretch forth thy hand. And he stretched it forth; and it was restored to soundness as the other.

name: According to Matthew
text: But the Pharisees went out and took counsel against him, that they might destroy him.

name: According to Matthew
text: But Jesus perceived it and withdrew thence. And many folk followed him, and he cured them all,

name: According to Matthew
text: and charged them that they should not make him known,

name: According to Matthew
text: that it might be fulfilled that was spoken through Isaiah the prophet, saying:

name: According to Matthew
text: Behold my servant whom I have chosen, my beloved, in whom my soul is well pleased: I will put my Spirit upon him, and he shall declare judgment to the Gentiles.

name: According to Matthew
text: He shall not contend nor cry out, neither shall any one hear his voice in the streets.

name: According to Matthew
text: A bruised reed shall he not break, and a smoking wick shall he not extinguish, till he send forth judgment to victory.

name: According to Matthew
text: And in his name shall nations trust.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then was brought to him a demoniac blind and dumb; and he cured him so that the dumb man spoke and saw.

name: According to Matthew
text: And all the multitudes were astonished and said: Is this the Son of David?

name: According to Matthew
text: But the Pharisees hearing it said: This man does not cast out the

name: According to Matthew
text: And knowing their thoughts he said to them: Every kingdom divided against itself is made desolate; and no city or house divided against itself shall stand.

name: According to Matthew
text: And if Satan casts out Satan, he is divided against himself: how then shall his kingdom stand?

name: According to Matthew
text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out the demons, by whom do your sons cast them out? For this reason they shall be your judges.

name: According to Matthew
text: But if I by the Spirit of God cast out the demons, then has the kingdom of God already come upon you.

name: According to Matthew
text: Or how can any one enter the house of the strong man and seize on his instruments, unless he first bind the strong man, and then he will plunder his house?

name: According to Matthew
text: He that is not with me is against me, and he that gathers not with me scatters.

name: According to Matthew
text: For this reason I say to you: Every sin and blasphemy shall be forgiven men, but the blasphemy of the Spirit shall not be forgiven.

name: According to Matthew
text: And who ever shall speak a word against the Son of man, it shall be forgiven him; but whoever shall speak against the Holy Spirit, it shall not be forgiven him, neither in this age, nor in that to come.

name: According to Matthew
text: Either make the tree goodly and its fruit goodly, or make the tree corrupt and its fruit corrupt; for by the fruit the tree is known.

name: According to Matthew
text: Brood of vipers, how can you being evil speak good things? For out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaks.

name: According to Matthew
text: The good man out of his good ; treasure brings forth good things; and the evil man out of his evil treasure brings forth evil things.

name: According to Matthew
text: But I say to you, that every idle word that men shall speak, they shall give an account of it in the day of judgment.

name: According to Matthew
text: For by thy words thou shalt be justified and by thy words thou shalt be condemned.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then answered him some of the scribes and Pharisees, saying: Teacher, we wish to see a sign from thee.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he answered and saidto them: A wicked and adulterous generation seeks for a sign and no sign shall be given it but the sign of Jonah the prophet.

name: According to Matthew
text: For as Jonah was three days and three nights in the belly of the great fish so shall the Son of man be three days and three nights in the heart of the earth.

name: According to Matthew
text: The men of Nineveh shall rise up in the judgment with this generation, and shall condemn it, because they repented at the preaching of Jonah; and lo, something, greater than Jonah is here.

name: According to Matthew
text: The queen of the south shall rise in the judgment with this generation, and shall condemn it, because she came from the most distant parts of the earth, to hear the wisdom of Solomon; and lo, something greater than Solomon is here.34

name: According to Matthew
text: When the unclean spirit has gone out from the man, he goes through dry places seeking rest, and finds none.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then he says: I will return into my house whence I came. And he comes and finds it unoccupied, and swept, and adorned.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then he goes and takes with him seven other spirits more wicked than himself, and they enter in and dwell there; and the last state of that man becomes worse than the first. So shall it be also with this wicked generation.

name: According to Matthew
text: While he was yet speaking to the multitudes, behold, his mother and his brothers stood without seeking to speak to him.

name: According to Matthew
text: And some one said to him: Behold, thy mother and thy brothers stand with out, seeking to speak to thee.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he answered and said to him that told him: Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?

name: According to Matthew
text: And stretching forth his hand over his disciples, he said: Behold my mother and my brothers;

name: According to Matthew
text: for whoever shall have done the will of my Father who is in the heavens, this is my brother, and sister, and mother.

name: According to Matthew
text: In that day Jesus went out of the house, and sat by the sea.

name: According to Matthew
text: And many multitudes came together to him so that he entered a ship and sat down, and the whole multitude stood on the shore.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he spoke many things to them in parables, saying: Behold, the sower went forth to sow.

name: According to Matthew
text: And, as he sowed, some fell by the way, and the birds came and ate them up.

name: According to Matthew
text: But others fell on rocky places where they had not much earth; and they immediately sprung up because they had no depth of earth;

name: According to Matthew
text: but when the sun had risen, they I were scorched, and because they had no root they withered.

name: According to Matthew
text: But others fell on thorns, and the thorns grew up and choked them.

name: According to Matthew
text: But others I fell on good ground, and brought forth fruit, one a hundredfold, one sixty, one thirty.

name: According to Matthew
text: He that has ears, let him hear.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the disciples came and said to him: Why speakest thou to them in parables?

name: According to Matthew
text: And he answered and said: Because to you it is given to know the mysteries of the kingdom of the heavens, but to them it is not given.

name: According to Matthew
text: For whoever has, to him shall be given, and he shall have abundance; but whoever has not, even that which he has shall be

name: According to Matthew
text: For this reason I speak to them in parables, because when seeing they see not, and when hearing they hear not, neither do they understand.

name: According to Matthew
text: And in them is fulfilled the prophecy of Isaiah which says: By hearing you shall hear, and shall not understand, and seeing you shall see, and shall not perceive.

name: According to Matthew
text: For the heart of this people has become fat, and with their ears they hear heavily, and their eyes they have closed, lest perhaps they should see with their eyes, and hear with their ears and understand with their heart, and turn, and I should restore them to health.

name: According to Matthew
text: But blessed are your eyes, for they see, and your ears, for they hear.

name: According to Matthew
text: Verily I say to you: Many prophets and righteous men desired to see what you see, and saw not, and to hear what you hear, and heard not.

name: According to Matthew
text: Hear you then the parable of him that sowed.

name: According to Matthew
text: When any one hears the word of the kingdom, and understands it not, the wicked one comes and snatches away that which is sown in his heart. This is he that was sown by the way.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he that was sown on the rocky places is he that hears the word, and immediately with joy receives it;

name: According to Matthew
text: yet he has no root in himself, but endures for a while; and when affliction or persecution arises because of the word, he immediately takes offense.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he that was sown among thorns is he that hears the word, and the care of the age and the deceitfulness of riches choke the word, and he becomes unfruitful.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he that was sown on good ground, is he that hears the word and understands it, who also bears fruit, and produces, one a hundred fold, one sixty, one thirty.

name: According to Matthew
text: Another parable laid he before them, saying: The kingdom of the heavens is likened to a man that sowed good seed in his field.

name: According to Matthew
text: But while the men slept, his enemy came and sowed tares over in the midst of the wheat and went away.

name: According to Matthew
text: But when the blade sprung up and produced fruit, then appeared the tares also.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the servants of the master of the house came and said to him; Sir, didst thou not sow good seed in thy field? Whence then has it tares?

name: According to Matthew
text: He said to them: An enemy did this. And the servants say to him: Wilt thou then that we go and gather them up?

name: According to Matthew
text: But he said: No, lest perhaps while gathering the tares you root up the wheat together with them.36

name: According to Matthew
text: Let both grow together till the harvest, and in time of harvest I will say to the reapers: Gather first the tares, and bind them into bundles to burn them; but gather the wheat into my granary.

name: According to Matthew
text: Another parable laid he before them, saying: The kingdom of the heavens is like a grain of mustard, which a man took and sowed in his field:

name: According to Matthew
text: which indeed is less than all the seeds; but when it has grown, is greater than the garden plants, and becomes a tree, so that the birds of heaven come and roost in its branches.

name: According to Matthew
text: Another parable spoke he to them: The kingdom of the heavens is like leaven, which a woman took and hid in three measures of flour, till the whole was leavened.

name: According to Matthew
text: All these things spoke Jesus to the multitudes in parables, and without a parable spoke he nothing to them,

name: According to Matthew
text: that it might be fulfilled that was spoken through the prophet Isaiah, saying: I will open my mouth in parables, I will utter things concealed from the foundation.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then dismissing the multitudes he came into the house. And his disciples came to him, saying: Explain to us the parable of the tares of the field.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he answered and said: He that sows the good seed is the Son of man:

name: According to Matthew
text: the field is the world: the good seed, these are the sons of the kingdom; but the tares are the sons of the wicked one:

name: According to Matthew
text: the enemy that sowed them is the devil: the harvest is the conclusion of the age, and the reapers are angels.

name: According to Matthew
text: As then the tares are collected and burned in fire, so shall it be in the conclusion of the age.

name: According to Matthew
text: The Son of man shall send forth his angels, and they shall gather out of his kingdom all things that cause offense, and them that do iniquity,

name: According to Matthew
text: and shall cast them into the furnace of fire: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father. He that has ears, let him hear.

name: According to Matthew
text: The kingdom of the heavens is like treasure hid in the field, which a man found and hid, and for joy over it he went and sold all that he had, and bought that field.

name: According to Matthew
text: Again: the kingdom of the heavens is like a man, a merchant seeking goodly pearls:

name: According to Matthew
text: when he had found one pearl of great value, he went and sold all that he had and bought it.

name: According to Matthew
text: Again: the kingdom of the heavens is like a net that was cast into

name: According to Matthew
text: which, when it was full, they drew to the shore, and sitting down they gathered the good into baskets, but threw the bad away.

name: According to Matthew
text: So shall it be in the conclusion of the age: the angels shall come forth, and separate the wicked from among the righteous,

name: According to Matthew
text: and shall cast them into the furnace of fire: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.

name: According to Matthew
text: Have you understood all these things? They say to him, Yes.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he said to them: Therefore, every scribe instructed in the kingdom of the heavens is like a man, a master of a house, who brings forth out of his treasury things new and old.

name: According to Matthew
text: And it came to pass, when Jesus had made an end of these parables, he departed thence.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he came into his own country, and taught them in their synagogue, so that they were astonished and said: Whence has this man this wisdom and the mighty works?

name: According to Matthew
text: Is not this the son of the carpenter? Is not his mother called Mary, and his brothers, James, and Joseph, and Simon, and Judah?

name: According to Matthew
text: And his sisters, are they not all with us? Whence then has this man all these things?

name: According to Matthew
text: And they were offended at him. But Jesus said to them, A prophet is not without honor unless in his own country and in his own house.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he did not many mighty works there because of their unbelief.

name: According to Matthew
text: At that time Herod the tetrarch heard of the fame of Jesus,

name: According to Matthew
text: and said to his servants: This is John the Baptist: he has risen from the dead, and for this reason the powers are active within him.

name: According to Matthew
text: For Herod having taken John, had bound him, and put him away in prison, because of Herodias the wife of Philip his brother.

name: According to Matthew
text: For John said to him: It is not lawful for thee to have her.

name: According to Matthew
text: And intending to kill him, he was afraid of the multitude, because they held him as a prophet.

name: According to Matthew
text: But when Herod’s birthday was kept, the daughter of Herodias danced in the midst and pleased Herod:

name: According to Matthew
text: wherefore he promised with an oath to give her whatever she would ask.

name: According to Matthew
text: And she having been before instigated by her mother, said: Give me here in a dish the head of John the Baptist.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the king though grieved, be cause of the oaths and the guests commanded it to be given,

name: According to Matthew
text: and sent and beheaded John in the prison.38

name: According to Matthew
text: And his head was brought in a dish and given to the maiden; and she carried it to her mother.

name: According to Matthew
text: And his disciples came and took away the corpse and buried it, and came and told Jesus.

name: According to Matthew
text: And when Jesus heard it, he withdrew thence in a ship to a desert place apart; and the multitudes hearing it followed him on foot from the cities.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he came forth and saw a great multitude, and was moved with pity for them and cured their sick.

name: According to Matthew
text: But when evening had come, the disciples came to him, saying: The place is desert, and the hour has already passed: therefore send the multitudes away, that they may go into the villages and buy themselves food.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he said to them: They have no need to go away; do you give them to eat.

name: According to Matthew
text: And they say to him: We have here nothing but five loaves and two fishes.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he said: Bring them hither to me.

name: According to Matthew
text: And after commanding the multitudes to recline on the grass, he took the five loaves and the two fishes, and having looked up to heaven he blessed, and broke, and gave the bread to the disciples, and the disciples gave it to the multitudes.

name: According to Matthew
text: And all ate and were filled; and they took up what remained of the broken pieces twelve traveling baskets full.

name: According to Matthew
text: And those who had eaten were about five thousand men besides women and children.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he compelled the disciples to enter the ship, and go before him to the other side, till he should send the multitudes away.

name: According to Matthew
text: And having sent the multitudes away, he went up into the mountain apart to pray. And when evening had come he was there alone.

name: According to Matthew
text: But the ship now in the midst of the sea was tossed by the waves; for the wind was against it.

name: According to Matthew
text: And at the fourth watch of the night, he came to them walking over the sea.

name: According to Matthew
text: And seeing him walking on the sea, they were troubled, saying: It is a specter; and they cried out for fear.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he immediately spoke to them, saying: Take courage, it is I: be not afraid.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Peter answered him and said: Lord, if it is thou, command me to come to thee over the waters.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he said: Come. And going down from the ship Peter walked

name: According to Matthew
text: But seeing the wind he was afraid; and beginning to sink he cried out, saying: Lord, save me.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus immediately stretched forth his hand, and took hold of him, and said to him: O thou of little faith, why didst thou doubt?

name: According to Matthew
text: And after they had come up into the ship the wind ceased.

name: According to Matthew
text: And those in the ship worshipped him, saying: Truly thou art the Son of God.

name: According to Matthew
text: And they passed over and came to the land of Gennesaret.

name: According to Matthew
text: And when they had knowledge of him, the men of that place sent into that whole region round about, and brought to him all that were sick;

name: According to Matthew
text: and they besought him that they might only touch the fringe of his mantle; and as many as touched were thoroughly restored to health.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then came to Jesus Pharisees and scribes from Jerusalem, saying:

name: According to Matthew
text: Why do thy disciples transgress the tradition of the elders? for they wash not their hands when they eat bread.

name: According to Matthew
text: But answering he said to them: Why do you also transgress the commandment of God because of your tradition?

name: According to Matthew
text: For God commanded, saying: Honor thy father and thy mother; and he that curses father or mother let him surely die;

name: According to Matthew
text: but you say: Whoever shall say to his father or his mother: That, by whatever thou mightest receive aid from me, is a gift, he shall no more honor his father or his mother.

name: According to Matthew
text: And you have made the law of God of no effect because of your traditions.

name: According to Matthew
text: Hypocrites, well did Isaiah prophesy of you, saying: This people honors me with their lips, but their heart is far distant from me.

name: According to Matthew
text: But in vain do they show devotion to me, teaching teachings the commandments of men.

name: According to Matthew
text: And calling the multitude to him he said to them: Hear and understand;

name: According to Matthew
text: not that which enters the mouth defiles the man; but that which comes forth out of the mouth, this defiles the man.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then came the disciples and said to him: Knowest thou that the Pharisees, when they heard the saying, were offended?

name: According to Matthew
text: But he answered and said: Every plant that my heavenly Father has not planted shall be rooted up.

name: According to Matthew
text: Let them alone; they are blind leaders of the blind; and if a blind man lead a blind man, both shall fall into the pit.

name: According to Matthew
text: But Peter answered and said to him: Explain to us the parable.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he said; Are you also yet without understanding?40

name: According to Matthew
text: Do you not perceive that every thing that enters the mouth goes into the belly, and is cast out into the sink?

name: According to Matthew
text: But the things that come forth from the mouth proceed from the heart; and these defile the man.

name: According to Matthew
text: For out of the heart proceed evil thoughts, murders, adulteries, lewdness, thefts, false testimonies, blasphemies.

name: According to Matthew
text: These are the things that defile the man; but to eat with unwashed hands defiles not the man.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus went out thence and withdrew into the regions of Tyre and Sidon.

name: According to Matthew
text: And behold, a woman of Canaan came forth from those borders and cried out, saying: Have mercy on me. Lord, Son of David: my daughter is grievously afflicted by a demon.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he answered her not a word. And his disciples came and besought him, saying: Dismiss her, for she cries after us.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he answered and said: I have not been sent but to the lost sheep of the house of Israel.

name: According to Matthew
text: And she came and worshipped him, saying: Lord, help me.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he answered and said: It is not right to take the children’s bread and throw it to the little dogs.

name: According to Matthew
text: And she said: Yes, Lord: and yet thou canst help me; for the little dogs eat of the crumbs that fall from their masters’ table.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then Jesus answered and said to her: O woman, great is thy faith: be it done for thee as thou wilt. And her daughter was restored to health from that hour.

name: According to Matthew
text: And having departed thence Jesus came by the sea of Galilee; and going up into the mountain he sat there,

name: According to Matthew
text: And there came to him many multitudes, having with them the lame, blind, dumb, maimed, and many others; and they threw them down at his feet; and he cured them,

name: According to Matthew
text: so that the multitude was astonished when they saw the dumb speaking, the maimed whole, and the lame walking, and the blind seeing; and they glorified the God of Israel.

name: According to Matthew
text: But Jesus called to him his disciples and said: I have pity on the multitude, because they have continued with me now three days, and have nothing to eat; and I am not willing to send them away fasting, lest perhaps they faint on the road.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the disciples said to him: Whence have we in the desert as many loaves as can fill so great a multitude?

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus said to them: How many loaves have you? They said: Seven, and a few little fishes.

name: According to Matthew
text: he took the seven loaves and the fishes, and after giving thanks he broke, and gave to the disciples, and the disciples gave them to the multitudes.

name: According to Matthew
text: And all ate and were filled; and they took up what remained of the broken pieces, seven provision baskets full.

name: According to Matthew
text: And they that had eaten were four thousand men besides children and women.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he sent the multitudes away, and entered the ship, and came into the borders of Magadan.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the Pharisees and Sadducees came, and tempting, asked him to show them a sign from heaven.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he answered and said to them:

name: According to Matthew
text: A wicked and adulterous generation seeks for a sign, and no sign shall be given it but the sign of Jonah. And he left them and departed.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the disciples having come to the other side had forgotten to take bread.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus said to them: Take heed and beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and Sadducees.

name: According to Matthew
text: And they reasoned among themselves, saying: Because we took no bread.

name: According to Matthew
text: But Jesus perceiving it, said: Why reason among yourselves, O you of little faith, because you took no bread?

name: According to Matthew
text: Do you not yet understand, and do you not remember the five loaves of the five thousand, and how many traveling baskets you took up?

name: According to Matthew
text: nor the seven loaves of the four thousand, and how many provision baskets you took up?

name: According to Matthew
text: How is it that you do not understand that I spoke not to you of bread? But beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and Sadducees.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then they understood that he did not bid them beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and the Sadducees, but of the teaching of the Pharisees and Sadducees.

name: According to Matthew
text: And when Jesus had come into the regions of Caesarea Philippi, he asked his disciples, saying: Who do men say that the Son of man is?

name: According to Matthew
text: They said: Some, John the Baptist, but others, Elijah, and yet others, Jeremiah, or one of the prophets.

name: According to Matthew
text: He says to them: But who say you that I am?42

name: According to Matthew
text: And Simon Peter answering said: Thou art the Christ, the Son of the living God.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus answering said to him: Blessed art thou, Simon son of Jonah, for flesh and blood did not reveal it to thee, but my Father who is in the heavens.

name: According to Matthew
text: And I also say to thee, that thou art Peter, and on this rock I will build my church, and the gates of Hades shall not prevail against it.

name: According to Matthew
text: I will give to thee the keys of the kingdom of the heavens, and whatever thou shalt bind on earth, shall be bound in the heavens; and whatever thou shalt loose on earth, shall be loosed in the heavens.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then he charged the disciples to tell no one that he was the Christ.

name: According to Matthew
text: From that time Jesus began to show to his disciples, that he must go to Jerusalem, and suffer many things from the elders, and chief priests, and scribes, and be killed, and rise on the third day.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Peter took him and began to rebuke him, saying: Be it far from thee, Lord: this shall not be to thee.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he turned and said to Peter: Get behind me, Satan: thou art my stumbling block, for thou thinkest not the things of God, but the things of men.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then Jesus said to his disciples: If any one will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross, and follow me.

name: According to Matthew
text: For whoever will save his life shall lose it; but whoever shall have lost his life for my sake shall find it.

name: According to Matthew
text: For what shall it profit a man, if he shall have gained the whole world, but yet shall have lost his life? Or what will a man give as a ransom for his life?

name: According to Matthew
text: For the Son of man will come in the glory of his Father with his angels, and then will he reward each one according to his work.

name: According to Matthew
text: Verily I say to you: There are some of those standing here, who shall not taste of death, till they see the Son of man coming in his kingdom.

name: According to Matthew
text: And after six days Jesus takes with him Peter and James and John his brother, and leads them up into a high mountain apart.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he was transfigured before them; and his face shone as the sun, and his garments became white as light.

name: According to Matthew
text: And behold, there appeared to them Moses and Elijah talking with him.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Peter answered and said to Jesus: Lord, it is good that we are here; if thou wiltest I will make here three tents, one for thee, and

name: According to Matthew
text: While he was yet speaking, behold, a cloud of light overshadowed them; and lo, a voice from the cloud saying: This is my beloved Son in whom I am well pleased: hear him.

name: According to Matthew
text: And hearing it the disciples fell on their face and were greatly afraid.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus came forward, and touching them said: Arise and be not afraid.

name: According to Matthew
text: But when they had lifted up their eyes they saw no one but Jesus only.

name: According to Matthew
text: And as they came down from the mountain, Jesus charged them, saying: Tell the vision to no one till the Son of man shall have risen from the dead.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the disciples asked him, saying: Why then do the scribes say that Elijah must first come?

name: According to Matthew
