text: He answered and said: Elijah indeed comes; and he will restore all things.

name: According to Matthew
text: But I say to you, that Elijah has already come, and they knew him not, but did to him what they pleased. So also shall the Son of man suffer by them.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then the disciples understood that he spoke to them of John the Baptist.

name: According to Matthew
text: And when they came to the multitude, there came to him a man kneeling to him,

name: According to Matthew
text: and saying, Lord, have mercy on my son, for he is a lunatic, and suffers grievously; for he often falls into the fire and often into the water.

name: According to Matthew
text: And I brought him to thy disciples and they were not able to cure him.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus answered and said, O generation unbelieving and perverse, how long shall I be with you? How long shall I bear with you; Bring him hither to me.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus rebuked him, and the demon came out of him, and the child was cured from that hour.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then the disciples came to Jesus privately and said: Why were we not able to cast it out?

name: According to Matthew
text: He said to them: Because of your little faith; for verily I say to you, if you have faith as a grain of mustard, you shall say to this mountain: Be removed hence to that place, and it shall remove, and nothing shall be impossible for you.

name: According to Matthew
text: And while they abode in Galilee, Jesus said to them: The Son of man shall be delivered into the hands of men,

name: According to Matthew
text: and they shall kill him, and on the third day he shall arise. And they were very sad.44

name: According to Matthew
text: And when they came into Capernaum, they that collected the didrachma came to Peter and said: Does your teacher pay the didrachma?

name: According to Matthew
text: He said: Yes. And after he had come into the house, Jesus anticipated him, saying: What think you, Simon? From whom do the kings of the earth collect tribute or custom? From their own sons, or from those of others?

name: According to Matthew
text: And when he had said: From those of others; Jesus said to him: Then are the sons free.

name: According to Matthew
text: But that we may not offend them, go to the sea, and throw in a hook, and take the fish that first comes up; and when thou hast opened his mouth, thou shalt find a stater: take that and give it to them for me and thee.

name: According to Matthew
text: In that hour the disciples came to Jesus, saying: Who then is greatest in the kingdom of the heavens?

name: According to Matthew
text: And calling a little child to him, he placed it in the midst of them,

name: According to Matthew
text: and said: Verily I say to you, unless you turn and become as little children, you shall in no way enter into the kingdom of the heavens.

name: According to Matthew
text: Whoever therefore shall humble himself as this little child, he is greatest in the kingdom of the heavens.

name: According to Matthew
text: And whoever shall receive one such little child in my name, receives me.

name: According to Matthew
text: But whoever shall offend one of these little ones that believe in me, it were better for him that an upper millstone were hung about his neck and he were drowned in the depth of the sea.

name: According to Matthew
text: Alas for the world because of offenses; for it is necessary that offenses come, yet alas for the man through whom the offense comes.

name: According to Matthew
text: But if thy hand or thy foot offends thee, cut it off and throw it from thee: it is better for thee to enter into life maimed or lame, than having two hands or two feet to be cast into the eternal fire.

name: According to Matthew
text: And if thy eye offends thee, pull it out and throw it from thee: it is better for thee to enter into life with one eye, than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire.

name: According to Matthew
text: Take heed that you despise not one of these little ones; for I say to you, that their angels in the heavens do always behold the face of my Father who is in the heavens.

name: According to Matthew
text: For the Son of man has come to save that which is lost.

name: According to Matthew
text: What think you? If any man have a hundred sheep, and one of them go astray, does he not leave the ninety-nine on the mountains, and go and seek for that which went astray?

name: According to Matthew
text: And if it happen that he find it, verily I say to you, that he rejoices

name: According to Matthew
text: So it is not the will of your Father who is in the heavens that one of these little ones perish.

name: According to Matthew
text: And if thy brother sin, go, tell him of his fault between thee and him alone; if he hear thee, thou hast gained thy brother.

name: According to Matthew
text: But if he hear thee not, take with thee one or two more, that by the mouth of two or three witnesses every word may be established.

name: According to Matthew
text: But if he refuses to hear them, tell it to the church; and if he refuse to hear the church also, let him be to thee as a heathen and a publican.

name: According to Matthew
text: Verily I say to you, whatever you shall bind on earth shall be bound in heaven; and whatever you shall loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven.

name: According to Matthew
text: Again, I say to you that if two of you on earth shall agree concerning any thing what ever they will ask, it shall be done for them by my Father who is in the heavens.

name: According to Matthew
text: For where there are two or three that have come together for my name, there am I in the midst of them.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then came Peter and said to him: Lord, how often shall my brother sin against me and I forgive him? Till seven times?

name: According to Matthew
text: Jesus says to him: I say not to thee, till seven times, but till seventy times seven.

name: According to Matthew
text: For this reason the kingdom of the heavens is likened to a man, a king, who wished to take up a settlement with his servants.

name: According to Matthew
text: And when he had begun to settle, there was brought to him one that owed him ten thousand talents.

name: According to Matthew
text: And as he was not able to pay, the lord commanded him to be sold, and his wife, and his children, and all that he had, and payment to be made.

name: According to Matthew
text: Falling down therefore, that servant worshipped him, saying: Have patience with me, and I will pay thee all.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the lord of that servant moved with pity loosed him, and forgave him the debt.

name: According to Matthew
text: But that servant went out and found one of his fellow servants that owed him a hundred denarii; and laying hold on him he took him by the throat, saying: Pay, if thou owest any thing.

name: According to Matthew
text: Falling down therefore, his fellow servant besought him, saying: Have patience with me, and I will pay thee.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he would not; but went and threw him into prison till he should pay the debt.

name: According to Matthew
text: Therefore his fellow servants seeing what had been done, were greatly grieved, and came and made known to their lord all that had been done.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then his lord called him and said to him: Wicked servant, all that debt I forgave thee, because thou didst entreat me:46

name: According to Matthew
text: did it not behoove thee also to have mercy onthy fellow servant, as I also had mercy on thee?

name: According to Matthew
text: And being angryhis lord delivered him to the tormentors, till he should pay all that was due him.

name: According to Matthew
text: So also will my heavenly Father do to you, if you from your hearts forgive not each one his brother.

name: According to Matthew
text: And it came to pass when Jesus had finished these words, he departed from Galilee and came into the borders of Judea beyond the Jordan.

name: According to Matthew
text: And many multitudes followed him, and he cured them there.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the Pharisees came to him, tempting him and saying: Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife for every cause?

name: According to Matthew
text: And he answered and said: Have you not read that the Creator at the beginning made them male and female?

name: According to Matthew
text: and said: For this cause shall a man leave father and mother, and be joined to his wife, and the two shall be one flesh.

name: According to Matthew
text: So then no longer are they two, but one flesh. What therefore God has joined together, let not man put asunder.

name: According to Matthew
text: They say to him: Why then did Moses command to give a bill of divorce and put her away?

name: According to Matthew
text: He said to them: Moses because of the hardness of your heart permitted you to put away your wives; but from the beginning it was not so.

name: According to Matthew
text: But I say to you: Whoever puts away his wife unless for lewdness, and marries another, commits adultery.

name: According to Matthew
text: The disciples say to him: If such is the case of the man with the wife, it is not good to marry.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he said to them: All cannot receive this saying, but those to whom it is given.

name: According to Matthew
text: For there are eunuchs who were born so from their mother’s womb; and there are eunuchs who were made eunuchs by men; and there are eunuchs who have made themselves eunuchs for the sake of the kingdom of the heavens. He that is able to receive it, let him receive it.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then were brought to him little children, that he might lay his hands on them and pray; but the disciples rebuked them.

name: According to Matthew
text: But Jesus said to them: Let the little children alone and forbid them not to come to me; for to such belongs the kingdom of the heavens.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he laid his hands on them, and departed thence.

name: According to Matthew
text: And behold, one came to him and said: Teacher, what good thing

name: According to Matthew
text: And he said to him: Why dost thou ask me about the good? One is good. But if thou wilt enter into life, keep the commandments.

name: According to Matthew
text: Which said he. And Jesus said: Thou shalt not kill, thou shalt not commit adultery, thou shalt not steal, thou shalt not bear false testimony.

name: According to Matthew
text: honor thy father and thy mother, and, thou shalt love thy neighbor as thyself.

name: According to Matthew
text: The young man says to him: All these have I kept; what lack I yet?

name: According to Matthew
text: Jesus said to him: If thou wilt be perfect, go sell thy goods, and give to the poor, and thou shalt have treasure in heaven, and come follow me.

name: According to Matthew
text: And hearing it, the young man went away grieved; for he had great possessions.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus said to his disciples: Verily I say to you, that a rich man will with difficulty enter into the kingdom of the heavens.

name: According to Matthew
text: But again I say to you that it is easier for a camel to enter in through the eye of a needle, than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of the heavens.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the disciples hearing it were greatly astonished, saying: Who then can be saved?

name: According to Matthew
text: But Jesus looked on them and said to them: With men this is impossible, but with God all things are possible.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then Peter answered and said to him: Behold, we have left all and followed thee: what therefore shall we have?

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus said to them: Verily I say to you that you who have followed me, in the regeneration when the Son of man shall sit on the throne of his glory, you yourselves also shall sit on twelve thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel.

name: According to Matthew
text: And every one that has left brothers, or sisters, or father, or mother, or children, or lands, or houses, for the sake of my name, shall receive many times more and shall inherit eternal life.

name: According to Matthew
text: But many first shall be last and last first.

name: According to Matthew
text: For the kingdom of the heavens is like a man a master of a house, who went out early in the morning to hire laborers into his vineyard.

name: According to Matthew
text: And when he had agreed with the laborers for a denarius a day, he sent them into his vineyard.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he went out about the third hour, and saw others standing in the market idle,

name: According to Matthew
text: and he said to them: Go you also into the vineyard, and whatever may be right I will give you.

name: According to Matthew
text: And they went. And again he went out about the sixth and ninth hour, and did in like manner.48

name: According to Matthew
text: And about the eleventh hour he went out and found others standing, and said to them: Why do you stand here all the day idle?

name: According to Matthew
text: They said to him: Because no one has hired us. He said to them: Go you also into the vineyard.

name: According to Matthew
text: And when evening had come the lord of the vineyard said to his steward: Call the laborers, and pay the hire, beginning from the last even to the first.

name: According to Matthew
text: And when those came who had been hired about the eleventh hour, they received each one a denarius.

name: According to Matthew
text: But when those came who had been hired first, they thought that they should receive more; and they also received each one a denarius.

name: According to Matthew
text: But when they received it they murmured against the master of the house,

name: According to Matthew
text: saying: These the last worked one hour, and thou hast made them equal to us who bore the burden of the day, and the heat.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he answered one of them and said: Friend, I do thee no wrong: didst thou not agree with I me for a denarius?

name: According to Matthew
text: Take that which is thine and go. But I will give to this the last even as to thee:

name: According to Matthew
text: is it not allowed me to do what I will with my own? or is thy eye evil because I am good?

name: According to Matthew
text: So the last shall be first, and the first last.

name: According to Matthew
text: And as Jesus went up to Jerusalem, he took the twelve aside privately, and on the way said to them:

name: According to Matthew
text: Behold, we are going up to Jerusalem, and the Son of man shall be delivered to the chief priests and scribes, and they will condemn him to death.

name: According to Matthew
text: And they will deliver him to the Gentiles, to mock, and to scourge, and to crucify; and on the third day he shall rise.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then came to him the mother of the sons of Zebedee with her sons, worshipping and asking something of him.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he said to her: What wilt thou? She says to him: Command that these two sons of mine may sit, one on thy right hand and one on thy left in thy kingdom.

name: According to Matthew
text: But Jesus answered and said: You know not what you ask. Are you able to drink the cup that I am about to drink? They say to him: We are able.

name: According to Matthew
text: He says to them: My cup indeed you shall drink, but to sit on my right and on my left, it is not mine to give this, but it shall be given to those for whom it has been prepared, by my Father.

name: According to Matthew
text: But when the ten heard it, they were displeased with the two

name: According to Matthew
text: But Jesus called them to him and said: You know that the rulers of the Gentiles exercise lord ship over them, and the great exercise authority over them.

name: According to Matthew
text: Not so shall it be among you; but who ever will become great among you shall be your minister;

name: According to Matthew
text: and whoever will be first among you, shall be your servant;

name: According to Matthew
text: as the Son of man came not to be ministered to, but to minister, and give his life a ransom for many.

name: According to Matthew
text: And as they went out from Jericho, a great multitude followed him.

name: According to Matthew
text: And behold, two blind men sitting by the way, hearing that Jesus was passing by, cried out saying: Have mercy on us, son of David.

name: According to Matthew
text: But the multitude rebuked them that they should be silent; and they cried out the more, saying: Lord, have mercy on us, son of David.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus stood still, and called them, and said: What will you that I should do for you?

name: According to Matthew
text: They say to him: Lord, that our eyes may be opened.

name: According to Matthew
text: And moved with pity Jesus touched their eyes; and they immediately received sight, and followed him.

name: According to Matthew
text: And when they were near to Jerusalem, and had come to Bethphage to the mount of Olives, then Jesus sent two disciples,

name: According to Matthew
text: saying to them: Go into the village that is opposite to you, and you will immediately find an ass tied and a colt with her; loose and bring them to me.

name: According to Matthew
text: And if any one say anything to you, you shall say that the Lord has need of them; and he will immediately send them.

name: According to Matthew
text: And this was done that it might be fulfilled that was spoken through the prophet, saying:

name: According to Matthew
text: Say to the daughter of Zion: Behold, thy King comes to thee meek and mounted on an ass, yes, on a colt the foal of a beast of burden.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the disciples went and did as Jesus had commanded them,

name: According to Matthew
text: and brought the ass and the colt, and put their mantles on them, and he sat upon them.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the most of the multitude spread their mantles in the road, but others cut branches from the trees, and spread them in the road.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the multitudes that went before him, and those that followed cried out, saying: Hosanna to the Son of David, blessed is he that comes in the name of the Lord, Hosanna in the highest.

name: According to Matthew
text: And as he entered into Jerusalem, the whole city was moved, saying: Who is this?50

name: According to Matthew
text: And the multitudes said: This is the prophet Jesus, who is from Nazareth of Galilee.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus entered into the temple of God, and cast out all that sold and bought in the temple, and overturned the tables of the money changers, and the seats of those that sold doves,

name: According to Matthew
text: and said to them: It is written: My house shall be called a house of prayer; but you make it a den of robbers.

name: According to Matthew
text: And there came to him the blind and the lame in the temple, and he cured them.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the chief priests and the scribes seeing the wonderful things that he did, and the children crying out in the temple and saying: Hosanna to the Son of David, they were displeased,

name: According to Matthew
text: and said to him: Hearest thou what these say? And Jesus says to them: Yes; have you never read that out of the mouth of babes and sucklings thou hast prepared praise?

name: According to Matthew
text: And he left them and went out of the city to Bethany, and spent the night there.

name: According to Matthew
text: But in the morning as he returned to the city he was hungry.

name: According to Matthew
text: And seeing a fig tree on the road, he went to it, and found nothing on it, but leaves only; and he said to it: Let fruit grow from thee no more for ever. And the fig tree immediately withered.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the disciples seeing it were astonished, saying: How did the fig tree immediately wither?

name: According to Matthew
text: But Jesus answered and said to them: Verily I say to you, if you have faith and doubt not, you shall do not only this of the fig tree, but if you say even to this mountain: Be taken up, and be thrown into the sea, it shall be done.

name: According to Matthew
text: And all things whatever you shall ask in prayer believing, you shall receive.

name: According to Matthew
text: And when he had come into the temple, as he was teaching, the chief priests and the elders of the people came to him, saying: By I what authority doest thou these things? and who gave thee this authority?

name: According to Matthew
text: But Jesus answered and said to them: I also will ask you one word, which if you tell me, I also will tell you by what authority I do these things.

name: According to Matthew
text: The baptism of John, whence was it? Of heaven or of men? And they reasoned with themselves, saying:

name: According to Matthew
text: If we say: Of heaven, he will say to us: Why then did you not believe him? but if we say: Of men, we fear the multitude; for all hold John as a prophet.

name: According to Matthew
text: And they answered Jesus and said: We know not. And he said to

name: According to Matthew
text: But what think you? A man had two sons; coming to the first he said: Son, go, work today in the vineyard.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he answered and said: I will not; afterward he regretted it and went.

name: According to Matthew
text: And coming to the other he said in like manner. And he answered and said: I go, sir; and went not.

name: According to Matthew
text: Which of the two did the will of the father? They say: The first. Jesus says to them: Verily I say to you that the publicans and the harlots go before you into the kingdom of God.

name: According to Matthew
text: For John came to you in the way of righteousness, and you believed him not; but the publicans and the harlots believed him; and you, when you saw it, afterwards felt no regret that you might believe him.

name: According to Matthew
text: Hear another parable. A man was master of a house, and he planted a vineyard, and put a hedge around it, and dug in it a wine press and built a tower, and let it out to vinedressers, and went into another country.

name: According to Matthew
text: But when the season of the fruits drew near, he sent his servants to the vine dressers, to receive his fruits.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the vinedressers took his servants and scourged one, and killed another, and threw stones at another.

name: According to Matthew
text: Again he sent other servants more than the first, and they did to them in like manner.

name: According to Matthew
text: But at last he sent to them his son, saying: They will reverence my son.

name: According to Matthew
text: But the vinedressers seeing the son said among themselves: This is the heir; come, let us kill him and have his inheritance.

name: According to Matthew
text: And they took him, and cast him out of the vineyard, and killed him.

name: According to Matthew
text: When therefore the lord of the vineyard comes, what will he do to those vinedressers?

name: According to Matthew
text: They say to him: The wretches he will wretchedly destroy them, and the vineyard he will let out to other vinedressers, who will render to him the fruits in their seasons.

name: According to Matthew
text: Jesus says to them: Did you never read in the Scriptures: A stone which the builders rejected, this be came the head of the corner: this was from the Lord, and it is wondrous in our eyes?

name: According to Matthew
text: Wherefore I say to you that the kingdom of God shall be taken from you, and shall be given to a nation bringing forth its fruits.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he that falls upon this stone shall be dashed to pieces; but him on whom it shall fall, it will make like chaff for the wind.

name: According to Matthew
text: But when the chief priests and the Pharisees heard his parables, they knew that he spoke of them;52

name: According to Matthew
text: and seeking to lay hold of him they feared the multitudes, because they held him as a prophet.

name: According to Matthew
text: And answering, Jesus again spoke to them in parables, saying:

name: According to Matthew
text: The kingdom of the heavens is likened to a man, a king, who made a marriage for his son.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he sent forth his servants to call those that had been called to the marriage; and they would not come.

name: According to Matthew
text: Again he sent forth other servants, saying: Tell those who have been called: Behold, I have prepared my dinner, my oxen and the fallings are killed, and all things are ready: come to the marriage.

name: According to Matthew
text: But they were careless and went away, one to his farm, another to his merchandise.

name: According to Matthew
text: But the rest, laying hold on his servants, outraged and slew them.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the king was angry, and sending his armies, he destroyed those murderers, and their city he set on fire.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then said he to his servants: The marriage indeed is ready, but those who were called were not worthy.

name: According to Matthew
text: Go therefore to the crossroads, and whoever you find call to the marriage.

name: According to Matthew
text: And those servants went out into the roads, and brought together all as many as they found, both bad and good, and the bride chamber was filled with guests.

name: According to Matthew
text: But when the king came in to look upon the guests, he saw there a man that had not a wedding garment.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he said to him: Friend, how camest thou in hither not having a wedding garment? But he was silent.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then the king said to the waiters: Bind his feet and hands and cast him into the darkness that is without: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.

name: According to Matthew
text: For many are called, but few chosen.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then went the Pharisees and took counsel that they might entrap him in a word.

name: According to Matthew
text: And they send to him their disciples with the Herodians, saying: Teacher, we know that thou art true, and teachest the way of God in truth, and thou carest for no one, for thou lookest not on the person of men:

name: According to Matthew
text: tell us therefore, what thinkest thou? Is it lawful to give tribute to Caesar or not?

name: According to Matthew
text: But Jesus knowing their wickedness said: Why tempt me, hypocrites?

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus says to them: Whose image is this, and the superscription?

name: According to Matthew
text: They say: Caesar’s. Then says he to them: Render therefore to Caesar the things that are Caesar’s, and to God the things that are God’s.

name: According to Matthew
text: And hearing they wondered, and leaving him they went away.

name: According to Matthew
text: In that day came to him Sadducees who say that there is no resurrection; and they asked him,

name: According to Matthew
text: saying: Teacher, Moses said: If any one die not having children, his brother shall marry his wife and raise up offspring for his brother.

name: According to Matthew
text: Now there were with us seven brothers; and the first married and died; and not having offspring he left his wife to his brother.

name: According to Matthew
text: In like manner also the second and the third, to the seventh.

name: According to Matthew
text: But last of all, the woman died.

name: According to Matthew
text: In the resurrection, therefore, of which of the seven shall she be the wife? for all had her.

name: According to Matthew
text: But Jesus answered and said to them: You err, not knowing the Scriptures nor the power of God.

name: According to Matthew
text: For in the resurrection they neither marry nor are given in marriage, but are as angels of God in heaven.

name: According to Matthew
text: But, concerning the resurrection of the dead, have you not read that which was spoken to you by God, saying:

name: According to Matthew
text: I am the God of Abraham, and the God of Isaac, and the God of Jacob? He is not the God of the dead, but of the living.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the multitudes hearing it were astonished at his teaching.

name: According to Matthew
text: But the Pharisees, hearing that he had put the Sadducees to silence, came together to the same place;

name: According to Matthew
text: and one of them, a lawyer, asked a question, tempting him:

name: According to Matthew
text: Teacher, what commandment is great in the law?

name: According to Matthew
text: And he said to him: Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with thy whole heart, and with thy whole soul, and with thy whole mind.

name: According to Matthew
text: This is the great and first commandment.

name: According to Matthew
text: A second is like it: Thou shalt love thy neighbor as thyself.

name: According to Matthew
text: On these two commandments hang the whole law and the prophets.

name: According to Matthew
text: But as the Pharisees had come together, Jesus asked them a question,

name: According to Matthew
text: saying: What think you of the Christ? Whose son is he? They say to him: David’s.

name: According to Matthew
text: He says to them: How then does David in spirit call him Lord, saying:

name: According to Matthew
text: The Lord said to my Lord: Sit at my right hand till I put thy enemies under thy feet.54

name: According to Matthew
text: If thus David calls him, Lord, how is he his son?

name: According to Matthew
text: And no one was able to answer him a word, nor did any one from that day venture to ask him another question.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then Jesus spoke to the multitudes and to his disciples,

name: According to Matthew
text: saying: The scribes and Pharisees have sat down in Moses’ seat.

name: According to Matthew
text: All things therefore whatever they bid you, do and observe; but do not according to their works; for they say and do not.

name: According to Matthew
text: And they bind heavy burdens and lay them on the shoulders of men; but themselves will not move them with one of their fingers.

name: According to Matthew
text: And all their works they do to be seen by men; for they make broad their phylacteries, and enlarge their fringes;

name: According to Matthew
text: and they love the first reclining places at suppers and the first seats in the synagogues,

name: According to Matthew
text: and the salutations in the markets, and to be called by men Rabbi.

name: According to Matthew
text: But be you not called Rabbi; for one is your teacher, and you all are, brethren.

name: According to Matthew
text: And call no one on earth your father; for one is your Father, the heavenly.

name: According to Matthew
text: Neither be called leaders; for one is your leader, the Christ.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the greatest of you shall be your minister.

name: According to Matthew
text: For whoever shall exalt himself shall be humbled; and who ever shall humble himself shall be exalted.

name: According to Matthew
text: But alas for you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites; for you eat up the houses of widows, and for a pretext make long prayers. For this reason you shall receive the greater condemnation.

name: According to Matthew
text: But alas for you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites; for you shut up the kingdom of the heavens before men; for you go not in, neither do you permit those who are entering, to go in.

name: According to Matthew
text: Alas for you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites; for you compass sea and land to make one proselyte; and when he is made, you make him twofold more a child of hell than yourselves.

name: According to Matthew
text: Alas for you, blind guides, who say: Whoever shall swear by the temple, it is nothing; but whoever shall swear by the gold of the temple, is a debtor.

name: According to Matthew
text: Fools and blind; for which is greater, the gold or the temple that sanctifies the gold?

name: According to Matthew
text: And, Whoever shall swear by the altar, it is nothing; but whoever shall swear by the gift that is on it, is a debtor.

name: According to Matthew
text: Blind! for which is greater, the gift, or the altar that sanctifies the

name: According to Matthew
text: Therefore, he that swears by the altar swears by it, and by all that is on it;

name: According to Matthew
text: and he that swears by the temple swears by it, and by him that dwells in it;

name: According to Matthew
text: and he that swears by heaven swears by the throne of God, and by him that sits upon it.

name: According to Matthew
text: Alas for you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites; for you pay tithes of mint and dill and cummin, and have neglected the weightier matters of the law, the justice, and the mercy, and the faithfulness: these ought you to have done, and those you ought not to have left undone.

name: According to Matthew
text: Blind guides, who strain out the gnat, but swallow the camel.

name: According to Matthew
text: Alas for you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites; for you cleanse the outside of the cup and the dish, but within they are full of rapine and incontinence.

name: According to Matthew
text: Blind Pharisee, cleanse first the inside of it the cup, that its outside also may become clean.

name: According to Matthew
text: Alas for you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites; for you are like whitened sepulchers, which outwardly indeed appear beautiful, but within are full of the bones of the dead and of all uncleanness.

name: According to Matthew
text: So also you outwardly indeed appear to men to be righteous, but within are full of hypocrisy and lawlessness.

name: According to Matthew
text: Alas for you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites; for you build the tombs of the prophets and adorn the sepulchers of the righteous,

name: According to Matthew
text: and say: If we had been in the days of our fathers, we would not have been partakers with them in the blood of the prophets.

name: According to Matthew
text: So then you testify for yourselves that you are the sons of those who murdered the prophets.

name: According to Matthew
text: Do you also fill up the measure of your fathers?

name: According to Matthew
text: Serpents, brood of vipers, how can you escape the condemnation of hell?

name: According to Matthew
text: Wherefore, behold, I send to you prophets and wise men and scribes: of them you will kill and crucify, and of them you will scourge in your synagogues, and persecute from city to city:

name: According to Matthew
text: that there may come on you all the righteous blood shed on the earth, from the blood of Abel the righteous to the blood of Zachariah son of Barachiah, whom you murdered between the temple and the altar.

name: According to Matthew
text: Verily I say to you, all these things shall come on this generation.

name: According to Matthew
text: Jerusalem, Jerusalem, that killest the prophets, and stonest them that have been sent to thee, how often have I desired to gather thy children, as a hen gathers her young under her wings, and you refused.

name: According to Matthew
text: Behold, your house is left to you deserted.56

name: According to Matthew
text: For I say to you, you shall no more see me henceforth till you say: Blessed is he that comes in the name of the Lord.

name: According to Matthew
text: And going out Jesus was departing from the temple; and his disciples came to him to point out to him the buildings of the temple.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he answered and said to them: See you not all these things? Verily I say to you, there shall not be left here a stone upon a stone that shall not be thrown down.

name: According to Matthew
text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives, his disciples came to him privately, saying: Tell us, when shall these things be, and what the sign of thy coming and of the conclusion of the age?

name: According to Matthew
text: And Jesus answered and said to them: See that no one deceive you.

name: According to Matthew
text: For many shall come in my name, saying: I am the Christ, and shall deceive many.

name: According to Matthew
text: But you shall hear of wars and rumors of wars; see that you be not troubled; for they must be, but not yet is the end.

name: According to Matthew
text: For nation shall rise against nation and kingdom against kingdom; and there shall be famines and earthquakes in various places.

name: According to Matthew
text: But all these are the beginning of pains.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then they shall deliver you up to affliction, and shall kill you, and you shall be hated by all nations because of my name.

name: According to Matthew
text: And then shall many be offended, and deliver one another up, and hate one another.

name: According to Matthew
text: And many false prophets shall arise and deceive many.

name: According to Matthew
text: And because iniquity shall be multiplied, the love of many shall grow cold.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he that endures to the end, he shall be saved.

name: According to Matthew
text: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in the whole world for a testimony to all nations, and then shall the end come.

name: According to Matthew
text: When therefore you see the abomination* of desolation, that was spoken of by Daniel the prophet, standing in the holy place, let the reader understand, * The Roman eagle causing desolation.

name: According to Matthew
text: then let those that are in Judea flee to the mountains;

name: According to Matthew
text: he that is on the housetop, let him not come down to take the goods out of his house;

name: According to Matthew
text: and he that is in the field, let him not turn back to take his garment.

name: According to Matthew
text: But alas for them that are with child, and them that give suck in

name: According to Matthew
text: And pray that your flight may not be in winter nor on a sabbath.

name: According to Matthew
text: For there shall be great affliction, such as has not been from the beginning of the world till now, nor shall ever be.

name: According to Matthew
text: And unless those days had been shortened, no flesh should be saved; but because of the elect those days shall be shortened.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then if any one say to you: Lo, here is the Christ, or there, believe it not.

name: According to Matthew
text: For false Christs and false prophets shall arise, and shall give great signs and wonders, so as to deceive, if possible, even the elect.

name: According to Matthew
text: Behold, I have told you beforehand.

name: According to Matthew
text: If then they say to you: Behold, he is in the desert, go not forth; behold, he is in the secret chambers, believe not.

name: According to Matthew
text: For as the lightning comes forth from the east and shines even to the west, so shall the coming of the Son of man be.

name: According to Matthew
text: Wherever the carcass is, there will the eagles come together.

name: According to Matthew
text: But immediately after the affliction of those days the sun shall be darkened, and the moon shall not give her light, and the stars shall fall from the heavens, and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken.

name: According to Matthew
text: And then shall appear the sign of the Son of man in heaven, and all the tribes of the land shall wail, and shall see the Son of man coming on the clouds of heaven with power and great glory.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he shall send his angels with a great trumpet, and they shall gather his elect from the four winds from the ends of the heavens to the ends of them.

name: According to Matthew
text: But from the fig tree learn the parable. When its branch has now become tender and put forth leaves, you know that summer is near;

name: According to Matthew
text: so also you, when you see all these things, know that it is near at the doors.

name: According to Matthew
text: Verily I say to you, this generation shall not pass away till all these things take place.

name: According to Matthew
text: Heaven and earth shall pass away, but my words shall not pass away.

name: According to Matthew
text: But of that day and hour no one knows, neither the angels of the heavens, nor the Son, but the Father only.

name: According to Matthew
text: But as the days of Noah, so shall the coming of the Son of man be.

name: According to Matthew
text: For as they were in the days that were before the flood, eating and drinking, marrying and giving in marriage, till the day in which Noah entered the ark,

name: According to Matthew
text: and knew not till the flood came and took them all away; so also shall the coming of the Son of man be.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then shall two men be in the field, one shall be taken and one left:

name: According to Matthew
text: two women shall be grinding at the mill, one shall be taken and one left.58

name: According to Matthew
text: Watch therefore: for you know not in what day your Lord comes.

name: According to Matthew
text: But know this: that if the master of the house had known at what watch the thief would come, he would have kept awake and not have permitted his house to be broken through.

name: According to Matthew
text: Wherefore be you also ready, for at an hour at which you think not the Son of man comes.

name: According to Matthew
text: Who is then is the faithful and wise servant, whom the lord has set over his household servants, to give them their food in season?

name: According to Matthew
text: Blessed is that servant whom his lord on coming shall find so doing.

name: According to Matthew
text: Verily I say to you that he will set him over all his goods.

name: According to Matthew
text: But if the wicked servant shall say in his heart: My lord delays,

name: According to Matthew
text: and shall begin to smite his fellow servants, and shall eat and drink with the drunken:

name: According to Matthew
text: the lord of that servant shall come in a day which he looks not for, and at an hour that he knows not,

name: According to Matthew
text: and shall cut him asunder, and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then shall the kingdom of the heavens be likened to ten virgins, who took their lamps and went forth to meet the bridegroom.

name: According to Matthew
text: And five of them were foolish and five were wise.

name: According to Matthew
text: For the foolish took the lamps and took no oil with themselves;

name: According to Matthew
text: but the wise took oil in the vessels with their own lamps.

name: According to Matthew
text: But while the bridegroom delayed they all nodded and fell asleep.

name: According to Matthew
text: And at midnight a cry was made: Behold the bridegroom; go out to meet him.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then arose all those virgins and adorned their lamps.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the foolish said to the wise: Give us of your oil, for our lamps are going out.

name: According to Matthew
text: But the wise answered, saying: Lest perhaps there be not enough for us and you, go rather to those that sell and buy for yourselves.

name: According to Matthew
text: And while they were going to buy, the bridegroom came; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage, and the door was shut.

name: According to Matthew
text: But afterwards came also the other virgins, saying: Lord, Lord, open for us.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he answered and said: Verily I say to you, I know you not.

name: According to Matthew
text: Watch therefore, for you know not the day nor the hour.

name: According to Matthew
text: For as a man, on leaving home, called his servants, and delivered

name: According to Matthew
text: and to one he gave five talents, to another two, to another one, to each according to his own ability, and left home.

name: According to Matthew
text: Immediately he that had received the five talents went and traded with the same, and made other five talents.

name: According to Matthew
text: In like manner he that had received the two gained other two.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he that had received the one went and dug in the earth, and hid his lord’s money.

name: According to Matthew
text: But after a long time the lord of those servants comes and takes up a settlement with them.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he that had received the five talents came and brought other five talents, saying: Lord, five talents thou didst deliver to me: see, other five talents have I gained.

name: According to Matthew
text: His lord said to him: Well done, good and faithful servant; thou wast faithful over a few things, I will set thee over many: enter into the joy of thy lord.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he that had received the two talents came and said: Lord, two talents thou didst deliver to me: see, other two talents have I gained.

name: According to Matthew
text: His lord said to him: Well done, good and faithful servant; thou wast faithful over a few things, I will set thee over many: enter into the joy of thy lord.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he that had received the one talent came and said: Lord, I knew thee that thou art a hard man, reaping where thou didst not sow, and gathering whence thou didst not scatter;

name: According to Matthew
text: and being afraid I went and hid thy talent in the earth: lo, thou hast thy own.

name: According to Matthew
text: But his lord answered and said to him: Wicked and slothful servant, didst thou know that I reap where I did not sow, and gather whence I did not a scatter?

name: According to Matthew
text: It behooved thee then to put my money with the bankers, and on coming I could have received my own with interest.

name: According to Matthew
text: Take then from him the talent and give it to him that has the ten talents.

name: According to Matthew
text: For to every one that has shall be given, and he shall have abundance; but from him that has a not, even that which he has shall be taken from him.

name: According to Matthew
text: And cast the unprofitable servant into the darkness that is without: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.

name: According to Matthew
text: But when the Son of man shall have come in his glory, and all the angels with him, then shall he sit on the throne of his glory;

name: According to Matthew
text: and there shall be gathered before him all the nations; and he shall separate them one from another, as the shepherd separates the sheep from the goats;

name: According to Matthew
text: and he shall place the sheep on his right hand, but the goats on the left.60

name: According to Matthew
text: Then shall the king say to those on his right: Come, you blessed of my Father, inherit the kingdom that has been prepared for you from the foundation of the world.

name: According to Matthew
text: For I was hungry, and you gave me to eat; I was thirsty, and you gave me drink; I was a stranger, and you took me to your homes;

name: According to Matthew
text: I was naked, and you clothed me; I was sick, and you visited me; I was in prison, and you came to me.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then shall the righteous answer him, saying: Lord, when saw we thee hungry and fed thee? or thirsty and gave thee drink?

name: According to Matthew
text: And when saw we thee a stranger and took thee to our homes? or naked and clothed thee?

name: According to Matthew
text: And when saw we thee sick or in prison and came to thee?

name: According to Matthew
text: And the King shall answer and say to them: Verily I say to you, Inasmuch as you did it to one of the least of these my brethren, you did it to me.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then shall, he say to those also on the left: Depart from me, you cursed, into the eternal fire that is prepared for the devil and his angels.

name: According to Matthew
text: For I was hungry, and you gave me not to eat; I was thirsty, and you gave, me no drink;

name: According to Matthew
text: I was a stranger, and you took me not to your homes; naked, and you clothed me not: sick and in prison, and you visited me not.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then shall they also answer him, saying: Lord, when saw we thee hungry, or thirsty, or a stranger, or naked, or sick, or in prison, and ministered not to thee?

name: According to Matthew
text: Then shall he answer them, saying: Verily I say to you, Inasmuch as you did it not to one of the least of these, you did it not to me.

name: According to Matthew
text: And these shall go away into eternal punishment, but the righteous into eternal life.

name: According to Matthew
text: And it came to pass when Jesus had finished all these words, he said to his disciples:

name: According to Matthew
text: You know that after two days the Passover is kept, arid the Son of man is delivered up to be crucified.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then came together the chief priests and the elders of the people into the court of the chief priest who is called Caiaphas;

name: According to Matthew
text: and they took counsel that they might take Jesus by craft and kill him.

name: According to Matthew
text: But they said: Not during the feast, lest a tumult arise among the people.

name: According to Matthew
text: there came to him a woman having an alabaster box of very costly ointment, and she poured it on his head as he reclined at table.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the disciples seeing it were displeased, saying: Why was this waste?

name: According to Matthew
text: for this could have been sold for much and given to the poor.

name: According to Matthew
text: But Jesus perceiving it said to them: Why trouble the woman? for she has wrought a good work on me.

name: According to Matthew
text: For the poor you have always with you, but me you have not always.

name: According to Matthew
text: For she, in pouring this ointment on my body, has done it to prepare me for burial.

name: According to Matthew
text: Verily I say to you, Wherever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world, this also which she has done shall be told for a memorial of her.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then went one of the twelve that was called Judas Iscariot, to the chief priests

name: According to Matthew
text: and said: What will you give me, and I will deliver him to you? And they weighed to him thirty pieces of silver.

name: According to Matthew
text: And from that time he sought an opportunity that he might deliver him up.

name: According to Matthew
text: And on the first day of the unleavened bread the disciples came to Jesus, saying: Where wilt thou that we prepare for thee to eat the Passover?

name: According to Matthew
text: And he said: Go into the city to a certain man, and say to him: The Teacher says: My time is at hand, with thee I keep the Passover with my disciples.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the disciples did as Jesus had commanded them, and made ready the Passover.

name: According to Matthew
text: But when evening had come, he reclined at table with the twelve disciples.

name: According to Matthew
text: And as they were eating he said; Verily I say to you that one of you shall deliver me up.

name: According to Matthew
text: And being very sad they began each one to say to him: Lord, is it I?

name: According to Matthew
text: But he answered and said: He that dips the hand with me into the dish, he shall deliver me up.

name: According to Matthew
text: The Son of man indeed goes as it is written of him. But alas for that man, by whom the Son of man is delivered up: good were it for that man if he had not been born.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Judas who delivered him up answered and said: Rabbi, is it I? He says to him: Thou hast said.

name: According to Matthew
text: But as they were eating, Jesus took bread and having blessed he broke, and giving to the disciples he said: Take, eat: This is my body.62

name: According to Matthew
text: And he took the cup, and having given thanks he gave to them, saying: Drink of it, all of you;

name: According to Matthew
text: for this is my blood of the New Covenant, that is shed for many for remission of sins.

name: According to Matthew
text: But I say to you, I will not henceforth drink of this fruit of the vine, till that day when I drink it with you new in the kingdom of my Father.

name: According to Matthew
text: And they sung a hymn and went out into the mount of Olives.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then Jesus says to them: All of you shall be offended at me this night. For it is written: I will smite the shepherd, and the sheep of the flock shall be scattered.

name: According to Matthew
text: But after I have risen, I will go before you into Galilee.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Peter answered and said to him: Though all should be offended at thee, I will never be offended.

name: According to Matthew
text: Jesus said to him: Verily I say to thee that on this night, before a cock shall have crowed, thou wilt deny me three times.

name: According to Matthew
text: Peter says to him: Though it should be necessary for me to die with thee, I will not deny thee. In like manner also said all the disciples.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then Jesus comes with them to a place called Gethsemane, and ii says to the disciples: Sit here till I go and pray yonder.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee, and began to be in grief and anguish.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then he says to them: My soul is encompassed with sorrow even to death: remain here and watch with me.

name: According to Matthew
text: And going forward a little he fell upon his face in prayer, and saying: Father, if it is possible, let this cup pass from me; and not as I will, but as thou.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he comes to his disciples and finds them sleeping, and says to Peter: So you had not strength to watch with me one hour?

name: According to Matthew
text: Watch and pray that you enter not into temptation. The spirit indeed is willing, but the flesh is weak.

name: According to Matthew
text: Again a second time he went away and prayed, saying: My Father, if this cannot pass away unless I drink it, thy will be a done.

name: According to Matthew
text: And he came again and found them sleeping; for their eyes were heavy.

name: According to Matthew
text: And leaving them he again went away, and prayed the third time, saying the same word again.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then comes he to the disciples and says to them: Sleep the remaining time and rest. Behold, the hour is at hand, and the Son of man is delivered into the hands of sinners.

name: According to Matthew
text: And as he was yet speaking, behold. Judas, one of the twelve, and with him a great multitude with swords and clubs, came from the chief priests and elders of the people,

name: According to Matthew
text: He that delivered him up had given them a sign, saying: The one that I shall kiss is he; hold him fast.

name: According to Matthew
text: And immediately he came to Jesus, and said: Hail, Rabbi! and kissed him.

name: According to Matthew
text: Jesus said to him: Friend, for what purpose have you come? Then they came, and laid hands on Jesus, and held him fast.

name: According to Matthew
text: And behold, one of those who were with Jesus stretched out his hand, and drew his sword, and struck the servant of the chief priest, and cut off his ear.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then Jesus said to him: Put back your sword into its place; for all that take the sword shall perish by the sword.

name: According to Matthew
text: Do you think that I cannot now call upon my Father, and he would cause more than twelve legions of angels to stand by me?

name: According to Matthew
text: But how then shall the scriptures be fulfilled, that thus it must be?

name: According to Matthew
text: At the same time Jesus said to the multitudes: Have you come out as against a robber, with swords and clubs, to take me? I sat daily with you in the temple and taught, and you did not take me.

name: According to Matthew
text: All this was done, that the scriptures of the prophets might be fulfilled. Then all the disciples left him and fled.

name: According to Matthew
text: And those who took Jesus led him away to Caiaphas the chief priest, where the scribes and elders had come together.

name: According to Matthew
text: But Peter followed him, at a distance, to the palace of the chief priest, and went in and sat with the attendants, to see the end.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the chief priests and the elders, and the whole Sanhedrim, sought false testimony against Jesus, that they might put him to death,

name: According to Matthew
text: and found none. Though many false witnesses came, yet they found none. At last two false witnesses came,

name: According to Matthew
text: and said: This man said, I am able to destroy the temple of God, and to build it in three days.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the chief priest arose, and said to him: Do you make no answer? What do these testify against you?

name: According to Matthew
text: But Jesus remained silent. And the chief priest answered and said to him: I adjure you, by the living God, that you tell us whether you are the Christ, the Son of God?

name: According to Matthew
text: Jesus said to him: You have said. Moreover, I say to you, Here after you shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of the Almighty, and coming upon the clouds of heaven.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then the chief priest rent his clothes, and said: He has spoken impiously; what further need have we of witnesses? See now, you have heard his impious words:64

name: According to Matthew
text: What think you? They answered and said: He is a subject for death.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then did they spit in his face, and strike him with their fists; some struck him with the open hand,

name: According to Matthew
text: and said: Give an answer to us, Christ: Who is he that struck you?

name: According to Matthew
text: But Peter was sitting without in the court; and a maidservant came to him, and said: You also l were with Jesus of Galilee.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he denied before them all, saying: I know not what you say.

name: According to Matthew
text: And when he went out into the entrance, another maidservant saw him, and said to those who were there: This man was also with Jesus the Nazarene.

name: According to Matthew
text: And again he denied, with an oath: I know not the man.

name: According to Matthew
text: After a little while, those who stood by came and said to Peter: Of a truth you also are one of them, for your speech betrays you.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then he began to curse and to swear: I know not the man. And immediately the cock crew.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Peter remembered the word which Jesus had spoken to him: Before the cock crows, you will deny me three times. And he went out, and wept bitterly.

name: According to Matthew
text: When the morning came, all the chief priests and elders of the people held a consultation against Jesus, that they might put him to death.

name: According to Matthew
text: And they bound him and led him away, and delivered him to Pontius Pilate the governor.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then Judas, who had delivered him up, when he saw that he was condemned, stung by remorse, brought back the thirty pieces of silver to the chief priests and elders,

name: According to Matthew
text: saying: I have sinned in having delivered up innocent blood. But they said: What is it to us? Thou wilt see to it.

name: According to Matthew
text: And throwing the pieces of silver into the temple, he withdrew, and went and hanged himself.

name: According to Matthew
text: But the chief priests took the pieces of silver and said: It is not lawful to put them into the sacred treasury, because they are the price of blood.

name: According to Matthew
text: But they took counsel and bought with them the potter’s field as a burial place for strangers.

name: According to Matthew
text: Wherefore, that field has been called the field of blood to this day.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken through Jeremiah the prophet, saying: And they took the thirty pieces of silver, the price of him who had a price set upon him, on whom they of the sons of Israel

name: According to Matthew
text: and gave them for the potter’s field, as the Lord commanded me,

name: According to Matthew
text: But Jesus stood before the governor; and the governor asked him, saying: Art thou the King of the Jews? And Jesus said: Thou sayest.

name: According to Matthew
text: And while he was accused by the chief priests and elders he answered nothing.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then says Pilate to him: Hearest thou not how many things they testify against thee?

name: According to Matthew
text: And he answered him to not even one word, so that the governor was greatly astonished.

name: According to Matthew
text: But at every feast the governor had been accustomed to release to the multitude one prisoner, whom they chose.

name: According to Matthew
text: And they had then a notorious prisoner, called Barabbas.

name: According to Matthew
text: When therefore they had come together Pilate said to them: Whom will you that I release to you, Barabbas or Jesus who is called Christ?

name: According to Matthew
text: For he knew that for envy they had delivered him up.

name: According to Matthew
text: And while he sat on the judgment seat, his wife sent to him, saying: Have nothing to do with that just man; for I have suffered much this day in a dream because of him.

name: According to Matthew
text: But the chief priests and the elders persuaded the multitudes that they should ask for Barabbas, and destroy Jesus.

name: According to Matthew
text: And the governor answered and said to them: Which of the two will you that I release to you? They said: Barabbas.

name: According to Matthew
text: Pilate says to them: What then shall I do with Jesus who is called Christ? They all say: Let him be crucified.

name: According to Matthew
text: But he said: Why, what evil has he done? They cried out the more, saying: Let him be crucified.

name: According to Matthew
text: And Pilate seeing that nothing avails, but rather that a tumult is rising, took water and washed his hands before the multitude, saying: I am innocent of the blood of this man: see you to it.

name: According to Matthew
text: And all the people answered and said: His blood be upon us and upon our children.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then he released to them Barabbas, but Jesus, after he had scourged him, he delivered up that he might be crucified.

name: According to Matthew
text: Then the soldiers of the governor took Jesus into the palace and brought together to him the whole band.

name: According to Matthew
text: And having stripped him they put on him a purple cloak,

name: According to Matthew
text: and having plaited a crown of thorns they put it on his head, and a reed in his right hand, and bowing the knee before him they mocked him, saying: Hail, King of the Jews;

name: According to Matthew
