text: I know thy affliction and thy poverty,  and the blasphemy of those that say that they are Jews and are not, but are a synagogue of Satan.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Fear in no way the things that thou art about to suffer. Behold now, the devil is about to cast some of you into prison that you may be tried, and you shall have affliction ten days. Be thou faithful to death, and I will give thee the crown of life.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: He that has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the churches: He that overcomes shall not be hurt by the second death.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And to the angel of the church in Pergamus write: These things says he that has the sword two-edged, sharp;

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: I know where thou dwellest, where the throne of Satan is; and yet thou boldest fast my name, and didst not deny my faith, even in the438 days in which Antipas was my faithful witness, who was slain among you, where Satan dwells.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: But I have against thee a few things: thou hast there those that hold the teaching of Balaam, who taught Balak to put a stumbling- block before the sons of Israel and to cause them to eat idol-sacrifices and to commit lewdness.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: So hast thou also in like manner those that hold the teaching of the Nicolaitans.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Repent therefore; otherwise I am coming to thee quickly, and I will war against them with the sword of my mouth.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: He that has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the churches: To him that overcomes I will give of the hidden manna; and I will give him a white stone, and on the stone a new name written, which no one knows but he that receives it.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And to the angel of the church in Thyatira write: These things says the Son of God, who has his eyes as a flame of fire, and his feet like burnished brass:

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: I know thy works and thy love and thy faith and thy service and thy patience, and thy works the last more than the first.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: But I have against thee that thou sufferest thy wife Jezebel, who says that she is a prophetess, and teaches and leads my servants astray to commit lewdness and to eat idol-sacrifices.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I gave her time to repent, and she will not repent of her lewdness.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Behold, I cast her into a bed, and those that commit adultery with her into great affliction, unless they repent of her works.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And her children will I kill with death; and all the churches shall know that I am he that searches the reins and the hearts; and I will give to you, to each one, according to your works.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: But to you I say, to the rest that are in Thyatira, as many as have not this teaching, such as have not known the depths of Satan, as they say, I lay upon you no other burden;

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: but what you have hold fast till I come.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And he that overcomes and that keeps my works to the end, to him will I give authority over the nations,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and he shall rule them with a rod of iron, as the vessels of a potter shall they be broken to pieces, as I have received from my Father,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and I will give him the morning star.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: He that has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the churches.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And to the angel of the church in Sardis write: These things says he that has the seven spirits of God and the seven stars: I know thy works, that thou hast a name that thou livest, and art dead.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Become wakeful, and strengthen the things that remain that are about to die. For I have not found thy works fulfilled before my God.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Remember therefore how thou hast received and heard, and watch and repent. If therefore thou wilt not be wakeful, I will come as a thief, and thou shalt not know at what hour I will come upon thee.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: But thou hast a few names in Sardis who have not defiled their garments, and they shall walk with me in white, for they are worthy.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: He that overcomes, he shall be clothed in white raiment, and I will not blot his name out of the book of life, and I will confess his name before my Father and before his angels.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: He that has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the churches.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And to the angel of the church in Philadelphia write: These things says he that is holy, he that is true, he that has the key of David, he that opens and no one shall shut, and shuts and no one shall open;

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: I know thy works; behold, I have placed before thee an open door, that no one can shut; because thou hast a little strength, and hast kept my word and hast not denied my name.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Behold, I will give to them of the synagogue of Satan, that say that they are Jews, and are not, but do lie: behold, I will make them come and worship before thy feet, and they shall know that I have loved thee.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Because thou hast kept the word of my patience, I also will keep thee from the hour of temptation that shall come on all the world, to try them that dwell on the earth.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: I come quickly: hold fast that which thou hast, that no one take thy crown.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: He that overcomes, I will make him a pillar in the temple of my God, and he shall go out no more, and I will write upon him the name of my God and the name of the city of my God, the new Jerusalem that comes down out of heaven from my God, and my new name.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: He that has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the churches.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And to the angel of the church in Laodicea write: These things says the Amen, the witness that is faithful and true, the beginning of the creation of God;

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: 1 know thy works, that thou art neither cold nor hot. I would that thou wert either cold or hot.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: So because thou art lukewarm, and neither cold nor hot, I will vomit thee out of my mouth.440

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Because thou sayest: I am rich and have abundance and have need of nothing, and knowest not that thou art wretched and pitiable and poor and blind and naked,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: I counsel thee to buy of me gold purified in fire, that thou mayest be rich, and white raiment, that thou mayest be clothed, and the shame of thy nakedness may not be made manifest, and to anoint thy eyes with eyesalve, that thou mayest see.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: As many as I love I rebuke and chasten: be zealous therefore, and repent.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Behold, I stand at the door and knock: if any one hear my voice and open the door, I will come in to him and will sup with him and he with me.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: He that overcomes, I will give to him to sit with me in my throne, as I also overcame and sat down with my Father in his throne.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: He that has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the churches.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: After these things I saw, and behold, a door opened in heaven, and the voice, the first that I heard, was as that of a trumpet talking with me, saying: Come up hither, and I will show thee things that must take place after these.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Immediately I was in spirit; and behold, a throne was set in heaven and upon the throne was one sitting,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and he that sat was like in appearance to a jasper and a sardine stone, and a rainbow round about the throne, like in appearance to an emerald.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And round about the throne were twenty-four thrones; and upon the twenty-four thrones I saw elders sitting, clothed in white raiment, and on their head golden crowns.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And out of the throne go forth lightnings and voices and thunders; and there were seven lamps of fire burning before the throne, which are the seven spirits of God;

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and before the throne was as a sea of glass like crystal; and in the midst of the throne and round about the throne four living creatures full of eyes before and behind.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the first living creature was like a lion, and the second living creature was like a calf, and the third living creature had the face as of a man, and the fourth living creature was like a flying eagle.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the four living creatures, each of them having six wings, are full of eyes round about and within, and have no rest day and night, saying: Holy, holy, holy is the Lord God, the Almighty, who was, and

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And whenever the living creatures give glory and honor and thanks to him that sits upon the throne, who lives from age to age,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: the twenty-four elders fall before him that sits upon the throne, and worship him that live, from age to age, and throw their crowns before the throne, saying:

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Worthy art thou, our Lord and God, to receive glory and honor and power, for thou didst create all things, and because of thy will they existed and were created.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw in the right hand of him that sat on the throne a book written within and on the back, sealed with seven seals.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw a strong angel proclaiming with a loud voice: Who is worthy to open the book and break its seals?

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And no one in heaven, neither on the earth nor under the earth, was able to open the book nor to look upon it.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I wept much, because no one was found worthy to open the book nor to look upon it.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And one of the elders said to me: Weep not; behold, he has prevailed who is the Lion of the tribe of Judah, the root of David, that opens the book and its seven seals.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw in the midst of the throne and of the four living creatures, and in the midst of the elders, a Lamb standing as if it had been slain, having seven horns and seven eyes, which are the. seven spirits of God sent forth into all the earth.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And he came and took it out of the right hand of him that sat upon the throne.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And when he had taken the book, the four living creatures and the twenty-four elders fell down before the lamb, having each one a harp and golden vials full of incense, which are the prayers of the saints.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And they sing a new song, saying: Worthy art thou to take the book, and to open its seals, because thou wast slain and didst redeem to God in thy blood out of every tribe and tongue and people and nation,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and didst make them a kingdom and priests, and they shall reign on the earth.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw, and I heard the voice of many angels round about the throne and the living creatures and the elders, and the number of them was myriads of myriads and thousands of thousands.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: saying with a loud voice: Worthy is the Lamb that was slam to receive power, and riches, and wisdom, and strength, and honor, and glory, and blessing.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And every created thing that is in heaven, and those that are on the earth, and under the earth, and in the sea, even those in them, all442 did I hear saying: To him that sits on the throne and to the Lamb be blessing, and honor, and glory, and might, from age to age.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the four living creatures heard I saying: Amen; and the elders fell down and worshipped.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw when the Lamb had opened one of the seven seals, and I heard one of the four living creatures saying as with a voice of thunder: Come.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw, and behold, a white horse, and he that sat upon him had a bow, and to him was given a crown, and he went forth conquering and to conquer.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And when he had opened the second seal. I heard the second living creature saying: Come.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And there went forth another horse that was red; and to him that sat on him was given to take peace from the earth, and that they should slay one another: and there was given to him a great sword.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And when he had opened the third seal, I heard the third living creature saying: Come. And I saw, and behold, a black horse, and he that sat on him had a balance in his hand.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I heard a voice in the midst of the four living creatures, saying: A choenix of wheat for a denarius, and three choenices of barley for a denarius: and see that thou hurt not the oil and the wine.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And when he had opened the fourth seal, I heard the fourth living creature saying: Come.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw, and behold, a pale horse, and he that sat on him, his name was death, and hades followed with him; and there was given to them authority over the fourth part of the earth, to kill with the sword and with famine and with death and by the wild beasts of the earth.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And when he had opened the fifth seal, I saw under the altar the souls of those that had been slain because of the word of God and because of the testimony that they held.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And they cried with a loud voice, saying: How long, O Sovereign holy and true, dost thou not judge and avenge our blood on them that dwell on the earth?

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And there was given to them a white robe, and it was said to them that they should rest yet a while, till the number of their fellow servants and their brethren that should be killed as they had been should be fulfilled.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw when he had opened the sixth seal, and there was a great earthquake, and the sun became black as sackcloth of hair, and

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and the stars of heaven fell to the earth, as a fig tree casting her untimely figs when shaken by a mighty wind,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and the heaven departed as a scroll rolled together, and every mountain and island were moved out of their places.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the kings of the earth and the great men and the officers and the rich and the mighty and every servant and free man hid themselves in the caves and in the rocks of the mountains,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and said to the mountains and rocks: Fall upon us and conceal us from the face of him that sits on the throne and from the wrath of the Lamb.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: for the great day of his wrath has come, and who is able to stand?

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And after this I saw four angels standing on the four corners of the earth, holding the four winds of the earth, that the wind should not blow on the earth nor on the sea nor on any tree.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw another angel ascending from the rising of the sun, having the seal of the living God; and he cried with a loud voice to the four angels to whom it was given to hurt the earth and the sea,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: saying: Hurt not the earth nor the sea nor the trees, till we shall have sealed the servants of our God on their foreheads.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I heard the number of those that were sealed; a hundred and forty-four thousand were sealed of every tribe of the sons of Israel:

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: of the tribe of Judah twelve thousand were sealed; of the tribe of Reuben twelve thousand: of the tribe of Gad twelve thousand:

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: of the tribe of Asher twelve thousand; of the tribe of Naphtali twelve thousand; of the tribe of Manasseh twelve thousand;

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: of the tribe of Simeon twelve thousand; of the tribe of Levi twelve thousand; of the tribe of Issachar twelve thousand;

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: of the tribe of Zebulon twelve thousand; of the tribe of Joseph twelve thousand; of the tribe of Benjamin twelve thousand were sealed.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: After these things I saw, and behold, a great multitude, which no one could number, out of every nation and the tribes and peoples and tongues, standing before the throne and before the Lamb, clothed with white robes, and palms in their hands;

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and they cry with a loud voice, saying: Salvation to our God who sits on the throne, and to the Lamb.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And all the angels stood round about the throne and the elders and the living creatures, and fell before the throne on their faces and worshipped God,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: saying: Amen, blessing and glory and wisdom and thanks and honor and power and strength to our God from age to age.444

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And one of the elders answered, saying to me: These “that are clothed in white robes, who are they and whence came they?

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I said to him: My lord, thou knowest. And he said to me: These are they that come out of great affliction, and they washed their robes and made them white in the blood of the Lamb.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Therefore are they before the throne of God, and they serve him day and night in his temple, and he that sits on the throne shall dwell among them.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: They shall hunger no more, neither shall they thirst any more, neither shall the sun fall upon them, nor any heat,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: for the Lamb that is in the midst of the throne shall feed them, and lead them to living fountains of waters, and God shall wipe away every tear from their eyes.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And when he had opened the seventh seal, there was silence in heaven for about half an hour.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw the seven angels that stand before God, and to them were given seven trumpets.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And another angel came and stood by the altar, having a golden censer; and there was given to him much incense, that he should offer it with the prayers of all the saints on the golden altar that is before the throne.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the smoke of the incense ascended with the prayers of the saints out of the hand of the angel before God.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the angel took the censer, and filled it from the fire of the altar and threw it into the earth; and there were thunders, and lightnings, and voices, and an earthquake.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the seven angels that had the seven trumpets prepared themselves to sound.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the first sounded; and there was hail and fire mingled with blood, and it was thrown into the earth; and the third part of the earth was burned up, and the third part of the trees was burned up, and all green grass was burned up.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the second angel sounded; and as it were a great mountain burning with fire was cast into the sea; and the third part of the sea became blood,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and the third part of the creatures that were in the sea, that had life, died, and the third part of the ships were destroyed.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the third angel sounded; and there fell from heaven a great star burning as a lamp, and it fell upon the third part of the rivers

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the name of the star is called Wormwood. And the third part of the waters became wormwood, and many men died of the waters, because they were made bitter.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the fourth angel sounded; and the third part of the sun was smitten, and the third part of the moon, and the third part of the stars, that the third part of them might be darkened, and the day might not shine for the third part of it, and the night likewise.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw, and heard an eagle flying in the midst of heaven, saying with a loud voice: Woe, woe, woe to them that dwell on the earth because of the rest of the voices of the trumpet of the three angels that are about to sound.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the fifth angel sounded: and I saw a star that had fallen from heaven to the earth, and to him was given the key of the pit of the abyss.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And he opened the pit of the abyss; and there arose out of the pit a smoke as the smoke of a great furnace, and the sun and the air were darkened by means of the smoke of the pit.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And out of the smoke came forth locusts upon the earth, and to them was given power as the scorpions of the earth have power.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And it was said to them that they should not hurt the grass of the earth, neither any green thing nor any tree, but the men such as have not the seal of God in their foreheads.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And it was given to them that they should not kill them, but that they should be tormented five months; and this torment is as the torment of a scorpion, when he strikes a man.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And in those days men shall seek death and shall not find it, and they shall desire to die and death flees from them.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the shape of the locusts was like horses prepared for battle, and on their heads as crowns like gold, and; their faces as the faces of men.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and they had hair as the hair of women, and their teeth were as the teeth of lions,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and they had breastplates as breastplates of iron, and the sound of their wings as the sound of chariots of many horses running to battle.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And they have tails like scorpions, and stings, and in their tails is their power to hurt men five months:

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: they have a king over them, the angel of the abyss, his name in Hebrew is Abaddon, but in Greek he has the name Apollyon.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: The first woe has past: behold, there come two woes more after this.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the sixth angel sounded; and I heard a voice from the four horns of the golden altar that is before God,446

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: saying to the sixth angel, that had the trumpet: Loose the four angels that are bound on the great river Euphrates.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the four angels were loosed, who were prepared for an hour and a day and a month and a year, to slay the third part of men.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the number of the armies of horsemen was two myriads of myriads: I heard the number of them.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And thus I saw the horses in the vision, and those that sat on them, having breastplates fiery, hyacinthine, and of sulphur; and the heads of the horses as the heads of lions, and out of their mouths go forth fire and smoke and brimstone.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: By these three plagues was the third part of men killed, by the fire, and the smoke, and the brimstone that went forth out of their mouths.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: For the power of the horses is in their mouth and in their tails; for their tails are like serpents, and have heads, and with them they do hurt.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the rest of men, that were not killed by these plagues, repented not of the works of their hands, that they should not worship demons and idols of gold and of silver and of brass and of stone and of wood, which can neither see, nor hear, nor walk,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and they repented not of their murders, neither of their sorceries nor of their lewdness nor of their thefts.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw another angel that was mighty descending from heaven, clothed with a cloud, and a rainbow was upon his head, and his face was as the sun, and his feet as pillars of fire;

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and he had in his hand a little book opened. And he put his right foot on the sea, but his left on the land,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and he cried with a loud voice as a lion roars. And when he had cried, the seven thunders uttered their voices.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And when the seven thunders had spoken, I was about to write; and I heard a voice from heaven, saying: Seal up the things that the seven thunders spoke, and write them not.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the angel that I saw standing on the sea and on the earth, lifted up his right hand to heaven.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and swore by him that lives from age to age, who created the heaven and the things that are in it, and the earth and the things that are in it, and the sea and the things that are in it, that time should no longer be,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: but in the days of the voice of the seventh angel, when he shall sound, and the mystery of God was finished, as he proclaimed to his

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the voice that I heard from heaven again spoke to me and said: Go, take the little book that is opened in the hand of the angel that stands on the sea and on the earth.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I went to the angel, saying to him that he should give me the little book. And he said to me: Take it and eat it up, and it will make thy belly bitter, but in thy mouth it shall be sweet as honey.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I took the little book out of the hand of the angel and ate it up; and it was in my mouth as honey, sweet; and when I had eaten it, my belly was bitter.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And they say to me: Thou must again prophesy against many peoples and nations and tongues and kings.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And there was given me a reed like a rod, saying: Arise and measure the temple of God and the altar and those that worship in it.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the court that is without the temple leave out and measure it not, for it is given to the Gentiles, and the holy city shall they tread down forty-two months.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I will give to my two witnesses, and they shall prophesy a thousand two hundred and sixty days, clothed in sackcloth.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: These are the two olive-trees and the two candlesticks that stand before the Lord of the earth.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And if any one will hurt them, fire comes forth from their mouth and devours their enemies; and if any one will hurt them, they must be put to death.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: These have authority to shut heaven, that rain fall not in the days of their prophecy, and they have authority over the waters to turn them into blood, and to smite the earth with every plague as often as they will.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And when they shall have accomplished their testimony, the beast that ascends out of the abyss shall make war with them and overcome them and kill them.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And their dead bodies* in the street of the great city, which is called, spiritually, Sodom and Egypt, where our Lord also was crucified. *No verb in Greek: perhaps “suspended” is best…

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And they of the peoples and tribes and tongues and nations see their dead bodies three days and a half, and suffer not their dead bodies to be put into a tomb.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And they that dwell on the earth rejoice over them and make merry, and shall send gifts one to another, because these two prophets tormented them that dwell on the earth.448

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And after three days and a half the spirit of life from God entered into them, and they stood upon their feet, and great fear fell upon those that saw them.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I heard a great voice out of heaven saying to them: Come up hither; and they went up into heaven in a cloud, and their enemies beheld them.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And in that hour there was a great earthquake, and the tenth part of the city fell, and there were killed in the earthquake names of men seven thousand, and the rest were frightened and gave glory to the God of heaven.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: The second woe was passed: the third woe, behold, it comes quickly.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the seventh angel sounded; and there were great voices in heaven, saying: The kingdom of the world has become our Lord’s and his Christ’s, and he shall reign from age to age.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the twenty-four elders that sat on their thrones before God fell on their faces and worshipped God,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: saying: We give thee thanks. Lord God, the Almighty who art and who wast, because thou hast taken thy great power and hast reigned;

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and the nations were angry, and thy wrath has come, and the time of the dead that they should be judged, and that thou shouldst give reward to thy servants the prophets and to thy saints and to those that fear thy name, both small and great, and that thou shouldst destroy those that destroy the earth.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the temple of God was opened in heaven, and there appeared in his temple the ark of his covenant, and there were lightnings, and voices, and thunderings, and an earthquake, and great hail.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And a great sign appeared in heaven, a woman clothed with the sun, and the moon under her feet, and on her head a crown of twelve stars;

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and being with child she cried, being in travail and in pain to be delivered.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And there appeared another sign in heaven, and behold, a great red dragon, having seven heads and ten horns, and on his head seven diadems,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and his tail drew the third part of the stars of heaven, and cast them to the earth. And the dragon stood before the woman that was about to be delivered, that when she brought forth her child he might devour it.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And she brought forth a man-child, who was about to rule all nations with a rod of iron; and her child was caught away to God and

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the woman fled into the wilderness, where she has a place prepared of God, that they should feed her there a thousand two hundred and sixty days.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And there was war in heaven: Michael and his angels went forth to war with the dragon. And the dragon fought and his angels,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and prevailed not, neither was their place found any more in heaven.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the great dragon was cast out, the old serpent, that is called devil and Satan, that deceives the whole world; he was cast out into the earth, and his angels were cast out with him.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I heard a great voice in heaven, saying: Now has come the salvation, and the power, and the kingdom of our God, and the authority of his Christ, for the accuser of our brethren has been cast out, he that accused them before our God day and night.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And they overcame him because of the blood of the Lamb and because of the word of their testimony, and they loved not their lives to their death.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Therefore rejoice, you heavens and those that dwell in them: alas for the earth and the sea, for the devil has come down to you having great wrath, knowing that he has a short time.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And when the dragon saw that he was cast out into the earth, he persecuted the woman who had brought forth the man-child.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And there were given to the woman two wings of a great eagle, that she might fly into the wilderness to her place, where she is nourished for a time and times and half a time from the face of the serpent.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the serpent cast out of his mouth after the woman water as a river, that he might carry her away with a flood.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the earth helped the woman; and the earth opened her mouth, and swallowed up the river that the dragon threw out of his mouth.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the dragon was angry with the woman, and went away to make war with the rest of her children, that keep the commandments of God, and that hold the testimony of Jesus.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I stood on the sand of the sea, and saw a beast coming up out of the sea, and he had seven heads and ten horns, and on his horns ten diadems, and on his heads names impiously irreverent.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the beast that I saw was like a leopard, and his feet were as those of a bear, and his mouth was as the mouth of a lion. And the dragon gave him his power, and his throne, and great authority.450

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw one of his heads as if it had been wounded even to death; and his deadly wound was healed; and all the earth wondered after the beast.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And they worshipped the dragon, because he gave authority to the beast; and they worshipped the beast, saying, Who is like the beast? and, Who is able to make war with him?

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And there was given him a mouth that spoke great things and impious words; and authority was given to him to continue forty-two months.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And he opened his mouth in impious speeches against God, to utter impious words against his name, and his tabernacle, and against those who dwell in heaven.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And it was given him to make war with the saints, and to overcome them; and authority was given him over every tribe and people and tongue and nation.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And all that dwell upon the earth will worship him, those whose names are not written in the book of life of the Lamb that was slain from the foundation of the world.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: If any one has an ear, let him hear.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: If any one leads into captivity, he shall go into captivity. If any kills with the sword, he must be killed with the sword. Here is the patience and faithfulness of the saints.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw another beast coming up out of the earth; and he had two horns like a lamb, and he spoke as a dragon.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And he exercises all the authority of the first beast in his presence; and he causes the earth and those who dwell in it to worship the first beast, whose deadly wound was healed.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And he does great signs, and even causes fire to descend from heaven upon the earth in the sight of men.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And he deceives those who dwell on the earth, by means of the signs which he is allowed to do in the presence of the beast, saying to those who dwell on the earth, that they should make an image for the beast which had the wound by the sword, and did live.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And it was granted him to give spirit to the image of the beast, that the image of the beast should both speak, and cause as many as would not worship the image of the beast, to be killed.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And he causes all, small and great, rich and poor, free and bond, to receive a mark on their right hand, or on their forehead,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and that no one should be able to buy or sell, but he that had the mark, the name of the beast, or the number of his name.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Here is wisdom. Let him that has understanding, count the number of the beast; for it is the number of a man, and his number is

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw, and behold, the Lamb stood on the mount Zion, and with him a hundred and forty-four thousand, that had his name and his Father’s name written in their foreheads.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I heard a voice from heaven like the voice of many waters, and like the voice of loud thunder; and I heard the voice of harpers harping with their harps.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And they sung a new song before the throne, and before the four living creatures, and the elders; and no one was able to learn the song, but the hundred and forty-four thousand that had been redeemed from the earth.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: These are they that were not defiled with women; for they are virgins; these are they that follow the Lamb wherever he goes; these were redeemed from among men, the first-fruits to God and to the Lamb.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And in their mouth was found no guile; for they are blameless.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw another angel flying in mid-heaven, having the eternal gospel to preach to those who dwell on the earth, even to every nation and tribe and tongue and people;

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and he said with a loud voice: Fear God, and give glory to him for the hour of his judgment has come; and worship him that made the heaven, and the earth, and the sea, and the fountains of waters.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And another angel followed, saying: Babylon the great has fallen, has fallen: because she has made all nations drink of the maddening wine of her lewdness.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the third angel followed them, saying, with a loud voice: If any one worship the beast and his image, and receive his mark in his forehead, or on his hand, even he shall drink of the wine of the wrath of God, which is prepared without mixture in the cup of his indignation;

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and he shall be tormented with fire and brimstone in the presence of the holy angels, and in the presence of the Lamb;

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and the smoke of their torment ascends from age to age; and they who worship the beast and his image, and whoever receives the mark of his name, have no rest day or night.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Here is the patience of the saints, who keep the commandments of God and the faith of Jesus.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I heard a voice from heaven, saying: Write, Blessed are the dead that die in the Lord from this time. Yes, says the Spirit, that they may rest from their labors, and their works do follow them.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw, and behold, a white cloud, and on the cloud sat one like the Son of man, who had on his head a crown of gold, and in his hand a sharp sickle.452

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And another angel came out of the temple, and cried with a loud voice to him that sat on the cloud: Thrust in your sickle and reap, for the time has come for you to reap; for the harvest of the earth is fully ripe.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And he that sat on the cloud thrust in his sickle on the earth, and the earth was reaped.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And another angel came out of the temple that is in heaven, and he also had a sharp sickle.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And another angel that had power over fire, came out from the altar; and he cried with a loud cry to him that had the sharp sickle, and said: Thrust in your sharp sickle, and gather the clusters of the vine of the earth, for its grapes are fully ripe.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the angel thrust in his sickle on the earth, and gathered the vine of the earth, and threw it into the great winepress of the wrath of God.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the winepress was trodden without the city; and blood came out of the winepress, even to the bridles of the horses, to the distance of a thousand and six hundred furlongs.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw another sign in heaven, great and wonderful: seven angels that had seven plagues which are the last; for by them the wrath of God is brought to an end.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw, as it were, a sea of glass mingled with fire, and those who had obtained the victory over the beast, and over his image, and over the number of his name, standing on the sea of glass, having the harps of God.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And they sung the song of Moses the servant of God, and the song of the Lamb, saying: Great and wonderful are thy works, Lord God Almighty; just and true are thy ways, thou King of saints.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Who will not fear thee, O Lord, and glorify thy name? For thou alone art holy; for all nations shall come and worship before thee, because thy judgments are made manifest.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And after this I saw, and the temple of the tabernacle of the testimony in heaven was opened;

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and the seven angels that had the seven plagues came out of the temple, clothed in pure white linen, and girded about the breasts with golden girdles.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And one of the four living creatures gave to the seven angels seven golden cups full of the wrath of God, who lives from age to age.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the temple was filled with smoke from the glory of God, and from his power; and no one was able to enter the temple, till the

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I heard a great voice out of the temple, saying to the seven angels: Go and pour out the seven cups of the wrath of God upon the earth.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the first angel went, and poured out his cup on the land; and there came a hurtful and afflictive sore upon the men that had the mark of the beast, and that worshiped his image.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the second angel poured out his cup on the sea; and it became blood, like that of a dead man; and every soul in the sea died.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the third angel poured out his cup on the rivers and the fountains of waters; and they became blood.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I heard the angel of the waters, saying: Just art thou, who art and who wast, the Holy One, because thou hast thus judged.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: For they have shed the blood of saints and of prophets, and thou hast given them blood to drink, and they are worthy.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I heard a voice from the altar saying: Even so, Lord God Almighty, true and just are thy judgments.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the fourth angel poured out his cup on the sun; and it was given to him to scorch men with fire.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And men were scorched with great heat; and they uttered impious words against the name of God who has power over these plagues; and they repented not, that they might give him glory.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the fifth angel poured out his cup on the throne of the beast; and his kingdom was filled with darkness; and they gnawed their tongues because of pain;

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and they spoke impiously against the God of heaven because of their pains, and because of their sores; and they repented not of their works.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the sixth angel poured out his cup on the great river Euphrates; and its water was dried up, that the way of the kings of the east might be prepared.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw three unclean spirits, like frogs, come out of the mouth of the dragon, and out of the mouth of the beast; and out of the mouth of the false prophet.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: For they are the spirits of demons that do signs, and they go forth to the kings of the whole world, to bring them together to the battle of that great day of God Almighty.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Behold, I come as a thief: blessed is he that watches, and keeps his garments, that he may not walk naked, and that men may not see his nakedness.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And they brought them together into a place that is called, in the Hebrew tongue, Armageddon.454

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the seventh angel poured out his cup into the air; and there came a great voice from the temple of heaven, from the throne, saying: It is done.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And there were lightnings, and voices, and thunders; and there was a great earthquake, such as has not been since men were on the earth, so great an earthquake, and so mighty.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the great city was divided into three parts, and the cities of the nations fell; and Babylon the great was remembered before God, that he might give her the cup of the wine of his fiercest wrath.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And every island fled, and the mountains were not found.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And great hail, every stone about the weight of a talent, fell from heaven upon men; and men spoke impiously against God, because of the plague of the hail; for the plague of it was very great.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And there came one of the seven angels that had the seven cups, and talked with me, saying: Come, I will show you the judgment of the great harlot that sits on many waters,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: with whom the kings of the earth have practiced lewdness, and with the wine of whose lewdness the inhabitants of the earth have been made drunk.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And he carried me, away in spirit into the wilderness; and I saw a woman sitting on a scarlet beast, that was full of impious names, and that had seven heads and ten horns.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the woman was clothed in purple and scarlet, and adorned with gold, and precious stones, and pearls; and she had in her hand a golden cup full of idolatrous pollutions, and the impurities of her lewdness.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And on her forehead was a name written: MYSTERY, BABYLON THE GREAT, THE MOTHER OF HARLOTS, AND OF THE IDOLATROUS POLLUTIONS OF THE EARTH.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw the woman drunk with the blood of the saints, and with the blood of the witnesses of Jesus; and when I saw her, I wondered with great astonishment.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the angel said to me: Why did you wonder? I will tell you the mystery of the woman, and of the beast that carries her, that had seven heads and ten horns.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: The beast that you saw, was, and is not, and will come out of the abyss, and go to perdition; and those who dwell on the earth, whose names were not written in the book of life from the foundation of the world, will wonder, when they see the beast that was, and is not, though he is yet present.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Here is the mind that has wisdom: The seven heads are seven

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And there are seven kings: five have fallen, one is, and the other has not yet come; and when he comes, he must remain but a little while.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the beast that was, and is not, even he is the eighth, and is of the seven, and goes to perdition.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the ten horns which you saw are ten kings, who have received no kingdom as yet, but receive authority as kings at the same time with the beast.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: These have one mind, and will give their power and authority to the beast.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: These will make war with the Lamb, and the Lamb will overcome them, for he is Lord of lords, and King of kings; and those with him are called, and chosen, and faithful.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And he said to me: The waters which you saw, where the harlot sits, are peoples and multitudes and nations and tongues.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the ten horns that you saw, and the beast, these will hate the harlot, and will make her desolate and naked, and will eat her flesh, and burn her up with fire.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: For God has put into their hearts to fulfill his will, and to agree, and to give their kingdom to the beast, till the words of God be accomplished.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the woman that you saw is that great city, which reigns over the kings of the earth.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And after these things I saw another angel come down from heaven, having great power; and the earth was lighted with his glory.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And he cried with a strong voice, saying: Babylon the great has fallen, has fallen, and has become the habitation of demons, and the haunt of every unclean spirit, and the resort of every unclean and hateful bird.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: For she has made all nations drink of the maddening wine of her lewdness; and the kings of the earth have practiced lewdness with her, and the merchants of the earth have become rich by the power of her voluptuousness.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I heard another voice from heaven, saying: Come out of her, my people, lest you become partakers of her sins, and lest you receive of her plagues.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: For her sins reach even to heaven, and God has remembered her iniquities.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Reward her as she has rewarded you, and render back to her double, according to her works; in the cup that she has mixed, mix for her double.456

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: As much glory and voluptuousness as she has given to herself, so much torment and sorrow give her; for she says in her heart, I sit a queen, and am no widow, and shall see no sorrow.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Therefore, her plagues shall come in one day, death and mourning and famine; and she shall be utterly burned with fire; for strong is the Lord God who judges her,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the kings of the earth. who have practiced lewdness and lived voluptuously with her, shall weep and lament for her, when they see the smoke of her burning

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: standing far off for fear of her torment, saying: Alas, alas, that great city of Babylon, that mighty city: for in one hour has your judgment come.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the merchants of the earth shall weep and lament over her, because no one buys their merchandise any more;

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: the merchandise of gold and silver and precious stones, and of pearls, and of fine linen and purple, and of silk and scarlet; and every kind of thiyine wood, and every kind of vessel of ivory, and every kind of vessel of most costly wood, and of brass, and of iron, and of marble;

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and cinnamon and amomum and incense, and ointment and frankincense, and wine and oil, and fine flour and wheat, and beasts and sheep, and horses and chariots, and bodies and souls of men.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the fruits that your soul desired have departed from you: and all things that are dainty and sumptuous have perished from you and you shall find them no more at all.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Those who traded in these things, who were made rich by her, shall stand far off for fear of her torment, weeping and mourning and

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: saying: Alas, alas, that great city that was clothed in fine linen and purple and scarlet, and adorned with gold and precious stones and pearls! for in one hour, so great riches have been brought to ruin.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And every master of a ship, and every one in ships, and sailors, and as many as trade by sea, stood far off,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and cried, when they saw the smoke of her burning, saying: What city is like the great city?

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And they threw dust on their heads, and cried, weeping and mourning and saying: Alas, alas, that great city, by which all that had ships in the sea became rich by means of costly merchandise for in one hour she is made desolate.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Rejoice over her, O heaven, and you saints and apostles and prophets; for God has avenged you on her.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And a mighty angel took up a stone like a great millstone, and threw it into the sea, saying: Thus, with violence shall Babylon, that

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the voice of harpers and musicians, and of pipers and trumpeters, shall be heard no more at all in you; and no artist of any art whatever, shall he found any more in you; and the sound of the millstone shall be heard no more in you;

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and the light of a lamp shall shine no more in you; and the voice of the bridegroom and of the bride shall be heard no more in you; for your merchants were the great men of the earth; for by your sorcery were all nations deceived.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And in her was found the blood of prophets and of saints, and of all that were slain upon the earth.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: After these things, I heard the great voice of a vast multitude in heaven, saying: Alleluia; Salvation and glory and honor and power to our God;

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: for true and righteous are his judgments, for he has judged the great harlot that corrupted the earth with her lewdness; and he has avenged the blood of his servant at her hand.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And again they said: Alleluia; and her smoke rises up from age-to age.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the twenty-four elders, and the four living creatures, fell down, and worshiped God that sits upon the throne, saying: Amen, Alleluia.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And a voice came out of the throne, saying: Praise our God, all you his servants, and you that fear him, both small and great.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I heard as it were the voice of a great multitude, and as the voice of many waters, and as the voice of mighty thunderings, saying: Alleluia; for the Lord God, the Almighty reigns.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Let us rejoice and be glad, and give glory to him; for the marriage of the Lamb has come, and his wife has made herself ready.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And to her was given that she should be clothed in fine linen, clean and white; for the fine linen is the righteousness of the saints.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And he said to me: Write, Blessed are they that are called to the marriage-supper of the Lamb. And he said to me: These are the true words of God.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I fell at his feet to worship him; and he said to me: See that you do it not; I am your fellow-servant, and of your brethren that have the testimony of Jesus; worship God; for the testimony of Jesus is the spirit of prophecy.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw heaven opened, and behold, a white horse, and he that sat on him was called faithful and true, and in righteousness does he judge, and make war.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: His eyes were like a flame of fire, and on his head were many diadems: and he had a name written which no one knew, but he himself.458

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And he was clothed with a garment dipped in blood; and his name is called The Word of God.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the armies that were in heaven followed him on white horses; and they were clothed in fine linen, white and clean.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And out of his mouth goes a sharp, two-edged sword, that with it he may smite the nations; and he shall rule them with a rod of iron; and he treads the winepress of the fiercest wrath of God, the Almighty.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And he has, on his raiment and on his thigh, a name written, King of kings, and Lord of lords.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw an angel standing in the sun; and he cried with a loud voice, saying to all the birds that fly in mid-heaven: Come, gather yourselves to the great supper of God,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: that you may eat the flesh of kings, and the flesh of officers, and the flesh of mighty men, and the flesh of horses, and of those who sit on them. and the flesh of all, both freemen and servants, both small and great.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw the beast, and the kings of the earth, and their armies, assembled together to make war with him that sat on the horse, and with his army.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the beast was taken, and the false prophet that was with him, who did signs in his presence, with which he deceived those who received the mark of the beast, and those who worshiped his image. These two were thrown alive into the lake of fire, which burns with brimstone.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the rest were slain with the sword of him that sat on the horse, which sword proceeded out of his mouth: and all the birds were filled with their flesh.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw angel come down from heaven, having the key of the abyss, and a great chain in his hand.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And he laid hold of the dragon, that old serpent, which is the devil and Satan, and bound him for a thousand years,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and threw him into the abyss, and shut him up, and set a seal upon him, that he should deceive the nations no more, till the thousand years should be completed; and after this he must be loosed for a little while.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw thrones, and they sat upon them, and the power of judging was given to them; and I saw the souls of those who had been beheaded for the testimony of Jesus, and for the word of God; and of those who had not worshiped the beast, nor his image, and had not received his mark on their forehead, nor on their hand; and they

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: * *Editor’s note: Mr. Tischendorf prepared and published, in

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: , the common version of our English New Testament, with foot- notes showing all instances in which it varies from the three oldest Greek MSS, the Sinaitic, and Vatican, above mentioned, and the Alexandrine, a later and less accurate MS. According to his account, verse 5 is spurious.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: Blessed and holy is he that has part in this first resurrection; over such the second death has no power; but they shall be priests of God and of the Christ, and shall reign with him a thousand years.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And when the thousand years shall have been completed, Satan shall be loosed from his prison,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: and shall go out to deceive the nations that are in the four corners of the earth, Gog and Magog, to bring them together to battle: the number of these is as the sand of the sea.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And they went up on the breadth of the earth, and encompassed the camp of the saints, and the beloved city; and fire came down out of heaven from God, and devoured them.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the devil who deceived them was thrown into the lake of fire and brimstone, where the beast and the false prophet are; and they shall be tormented day and night from age to age.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw a great white throne, and him that sat upon it, from whose face the earth and the heaven fled away; and no place was found for them.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw the dead, small and great, stand before the throne; and the books were opened; and another book was opened, which is the book of life; and the dead were judged out of the things that were written in the books, according to their works.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the sea gave up the dead that were in it; and death and hades have up the dead that were in them; and they were judged, every one according to his works.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And death and hades were cast into the lake of fire: this is the second death.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And if any one was not found written in the book of life, he was thrown into the lake of fire.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw a new heaven and a new earth; for the former heaven and the former earth had passed away; and the sea was no more.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I saw the holy city, New Jerusalem, coming down out of heaven, from God, prepared as a bride adorned for her husband.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And I heard a great voice out of heaven, saying: Behold, the tabernacle of God is with men and he will dwell with them; and they shall he his people, and God himself will be with them, their God.460

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And he will wipe every tear from their eyes, and there shall be no more death; neither shall there be any more sorrow, nor crying, nor pain; for the former things have passed away.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ

text: And there came one of the seven angels that had the seven cups full of the seven last plagues; and he talked with me, saying: Come hither, and I will show you the bride, the Lamb’s wife.

text: And he carried me away in spirit to a mountain, great and high, and showed me the holy city, Jerusalem, coming down out of heaven from God,

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: having the glory of God: that which gave it light was like a most costly stone, like jasper-stone, brilliant as crystal.

text: It had a wall, great and high; and it had twelve gates, and at the gates twelve angels, and names written on them, which are the names of the twelve tribes of the sons of Israel;

text: And the wall of the city had twelve foundations, and on them were the names of the twelve apostles of the Lamb.

text: And he that talked with me had a measure, a golden reed, that he might measure the city, and its gates, and its wall.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the city lies square; and its length is as great as its breadth. And he measured the city with the reed, twelve thousand furlongs: the length, and the breadth, and the height of it are equal.

text: And he measured the wall of it, a hundred and forty-four cubits, the measure of a man, that is, of an angel.

text: And the wall of it was built of jasper; and the city was pure gold, like clear glass.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the foundations of the wall of the city were adorned with every costly stone: the first foundation was jasper; the second, sapphire; the third, chalcedony; the fourth, emerald;

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And the twelve gates were twelve pearls; every gate was of one pearl: and the street of the city was pure gold, like clear glass.

text: And I saw no temple in it; for the Lord God, the Almighty, and the Lamb, are its temple.

text: And the city had no need of the sun, nor of the moon, to shine in it; for the glory of God gave it light, and the lamp of it is the Lamb.

text: And the nations shall walk by the light of it; and the kings of the earth bring their glory and their honor into it.

text: And they shall bring the glory and honor of the nations into it.

text: And there shall not enter it any thing unclean, or that does what is detestable or that makes a lie; but those who are written in the Lamb’s book of life.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And he showed me a river of water of life, clear as crystal, coming out from the throne of God and of the Lamb.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: In the midst of the street of the city, and on each side of the river, was the tree of life, which bore twelve kinds of fruit, and yielded its fruit every month; and the leaves of the tree were for the healing of the nations.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And there shall be no more curse; and the throne of God and of the Lamb shall be in it; and his servants shall serve him.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And they shall see his face, and his name shall be in their foreheads.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And there shall be no more night; and they have no need of the lamp, nor of the light of the sun; for the Lord God will give them light; and they shall reign from age to age.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And he said to me: These words are faithful and true; and the Lord God of the spirits of the prophets has sent his angel to show his servants the things that must shortly take place.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And behold, I come quickly: blessed is he that keeps the words of the prophecy of this book.

text: And I, John, am he that saw and heard these things. And when I had heard and seen, I fell down to worship before the feet of the angel that showed me these things.

name: Revelation of Jesus Christ
text: And he said to me: See that you do it not; I am your fellow servant, and of your brethren the prophets, and of those who keep the words of this book: worship God.

text: And he said to me: Seal not the words of the prophecy of this book; for the time is at hand.462

text: . Behold, I come quickly, and my reward is with me to give to every one as his work shall be.
